ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年冬</a>　至咸平，宿县驿，作诗。作品：《宿咸平驿》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年冬</a>　在咸平，喜营妓刘淑女，为作诗。作品：《赠人三首次韵道卿》（未必蝤蛴如素领）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠人三首次韵道卿》（醉里纷纷散别筵）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠人三首次韵道卿》（可是相逢意便深）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年冬</a>　在咸平，赠营妓刘淑女词。作品：《少年游》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《张耒集》卷33（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《秋蕊香》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《张耒集》卷33（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年冬</a>　寄诗孙永（字曼叔）以求酒。作品：《寄曼叔求酒》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　是岁，刘季孙（景文）自大名府赴两浙西路都监，张耒作诗赠行。作品：《送刘季孙赴浙东》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　在咸平，作诗咏县斋。作品：《县斋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　在咸平，作诗寄陈鼎。姑系于此。作品：《寄陈鼎》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《寄陈鼎》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元丰八年咸平。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年3月5日</a>　是月戊戌（初五），神宗崩，作挽词。作品：《神宗皇帝挽词三首》（独化陶钧运圣谟）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《神宗皇帝挽词三首》（三百年成玉鼎丹）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《神宗皇帝挽词三首》（风霆武略走夷蛮）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年3月</a>　春末，丞厅酴醿长势茂盛，作文记之。作品：《咸平县丞厅酴醿记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷49（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208027' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208027' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208027?labeling=true' target='_blank'>咸平县丞厅酴醾记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208027")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208027_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208027'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208027'>咸平五年，诏以陈留之通许镇为咸平县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208027_comment'></div>先是章圣皇帝幸亳，祠老子，道通许，筑宫以待幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208027_comment'></div>既为县，即以宫为县令治所，主簿居中书府，而枢密府为尉舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208027_comment'></div>熙宁某年，始置丞，于是迁县尉于外而丞居焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208027_comment'></div>丞居之堂，庭有酴醾，问之邑之老人，则为枢密府时所种也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208027_comment'></div>既老而益蕃，延蔓庇覆，占庭之大半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208027_comment'></div>其花特大于其类，邑之酴醾皆出其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208027_comment'></div>盖其当时，筑室种植以待天子之所休，必有珍丽可喜之物而后敢陈，是以独秀于一邑而莫能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208027_comment'></div>每思唐自天宝以至于周，历岁数百，天下未尝无战，其治安仅足以小康，而祸败尝至于大乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208027_comment'></div>自安、史以来，藩镇四据，而天下无完国，降及其末，分裂攘夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208027_comment'></div>至五季，而中原正朔之所加，仅止门阈之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208027_comment'></div>惟我艺祖神宗，受天休命，神武四达，马首所向，破灭摧伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208027_comment'></div>于是斸百年之蟠据，合历世之分裂，数百年间祸根乱源，薅剪堙塞，大扫而无馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208027_comment'></div>肆我章圣皇帝，诞承祖武，以无忘大功，宽赋薄征，顺天养民，四方无虞，休养滋息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208027_comment'></div>如人之疾病蛊败，医者既击逐钩取其累年之蠹矣，而后为之调利抚养，安居美食，以使之丰腴而坚强也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208027_comment'></div>由是观之，自开元以来至于章圣，而天下之人始复见大治之全国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208027_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208027_comment'></div>亦可谓盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208027_comment'></div>于是封泰山，禅梁父，祀后土，祠老子，徜徉四方，以明示得意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208027_comment'></div>闻之古者天子巡幸，所至郡国，必建原庙，所以广孝恭，示后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208027_comment'></div>而况当太平之盛时，讲一世之大礼，八鸾之所经，六龙之所驻，可以昭后世，示子孙，以为历世之大训成法者，宜何如哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208027_comment'></div>是宜一草木，一瓦砾，皆当护守保藏，无敢弃坏，以无忘祖宗骏功成烈，而使知夫百馀年间，地平天成、养生送死而无憾者谁之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208027_comment'></div>酴醾之生当是时，盖尝沾雨露之濡，近日月之光，与夫旄头属车，皆为一时之物矣，可不爱哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1208027_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年4月</a>　在咸平谒曾肇。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年6月</a>　故人子假承务郎杨克勤自合肥赴京师，过咸平，为言亳州太清宫方士自焚之事，张耒因作文记其异。作品：《记异》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷50（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208038' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208038' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208038?labeling=true' target='_blank'>记异</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208038")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208038_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208038'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208038'>元丰乙丑六月，予故人子假承务郎杨克勤，自合肥赴京师，过咸平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208038_comment'></div>为予言：道出亳州太清宫下，太清之人为杨言：「有道人方士者，贫窭，而意气甚扬，携药炉烧药老子殿下，大言自尊，指老君像曰：『吾老君师也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208038_comment'></div>众聚观，须臾有火自其炉出，然其衣，即焰发满身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208038_comment'></div>其人惊走，左右以水沃之不灭，狂走庭中，火所经地，物不然，独烧其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208038_comment'></div>须臾，北面老子像若首伏者，已而毙，视其身灼烂矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208038_comment'></div>杨问之太清宫人与验尸官不异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208038_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208038_comment'></div>其亦异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208038_comment'></div>狂士之以僭诞自尊者，其情岂有他哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208038_comment'></div>欲惊愚夫痴氓以自售其药，为一金之利而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208038_comment'></div>世之狂者，欲自售其学，以诳昧者之耳目而冒其利，灭弃训典，毁訾先儒，操臆见私智而以圣人自欺者，与太清之狂士何以异哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208038_comment'></div>得无有怒目切齿者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208038_comment'></div>夫学不死，养气鍊形者，皆宗老子，狂士之术，出于老子者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208038_comment'></div>因其师以有知，乃掩其所得而求售焉，叛其本甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208038_comment'></div>世之欲自大而忘其本者，可以鉴诸此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1208038_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年7月</a>　代文彦博作辞免文。作品：《代文潞公辞免明堂陪位表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207822' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207822?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代文潞公辞免明堂陪位表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207822")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207822_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207822'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207822'>合宫备礼，方蒇事于季秋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207822_comment'></div>列位侍祠，尚不遗于故老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207822_comment'></div>仰恩荣之优异，循衰瘵以战兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207822_comment'></div>伏惟太皇太后陛下聪明自天，博厚载物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207822_comment'></div>左右景命，已大济于艰难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207822_comment'></div>保宥神孙，既聿跻于齐圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207822_comment'></div>邦家康靖，邪正昭明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207822_comment'></div>颂德告功，既对天而不怍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207822_comment'></div>隆礼备乐，念报本之惟时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207822_comment'></div>当《鱼丽》之时，而物既盛多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207822_comment'></div>由《思齐》之圣，而神无恫怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207822_comment'></div>拥绝禧于二圣，肆大赉于万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207822_comment'></div>旷古上仪，于今盛典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207822_comment'></div>臣久辞屏著，退伏里闾，睹声名于垂尽之年，受德泽于维新之政，顾馀龄之已幸，矧召节之见临！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207822_comment'></div>是宜策励造朝，斋明就列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207822_comment'></div>而衰朽之质，登降畏失容之诛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207822_comment'></div>疾病之馀，朝夕有负薪之惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207822_comment'></div>与其失周士在朝之敬，不若同尧民击壤而歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207822_comment'></div>文物莫瞻，梦有钧天之想；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207822_comment'></div>精神未已，心为魏阙之游。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1207822_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年7月</a>　咸平任上，作谢表。作品：《谢得请表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207825' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207825' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207825?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢得请表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207825")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207825_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207825'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207825'>不能与祭，自怜衰老之无堪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207825_comment'></div>罔俾造朝，更佩恩荣之从欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207825_comment'></div>内循安便，未免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1207825", 1207825, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>惊惭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207825_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下龙德光亨，天仁覆露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207825_comment'></div>牲玉备物，允若神人之和同；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207825_comment'></div>礼乐在庭，肃然祖考之来格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207825_comment'></div>祭则受福，天且弗违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207825_comment'></div>臣猥以残年，莫瞻盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207825_comment'></div>虽行不俟驾，在常礼而有诛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207825_comment'></div>而老弗及斋，知异恩之独厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207825_comment'></div>第想光华于天汉，窃同欢忭于里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207825_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207825'><span class='label'>按：</span>《柯山集》卷三一。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷三五。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207825_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年8月6日</a>　是月丁卯，苏辙除秘书省校书郎，张耒闻讯，喜而作诗，约王适一同庆祝。作品：《闻苏先生除校书郎喜而为诗并招王子中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷16（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年9月</a>　与黄庭坚书，并寄所作诗五十首。作品：《与鲁直书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷55（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207838' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207838' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207838?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与鲁直书<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰八年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207838")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207838_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207838'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207838'>某再拜，学士足下：仆年十八九时，居陈学，同舍生有自江南来者，藉藉能道鲁直名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207838_comment'></div>后数年，礼部苏公在钱塘，始称鲁直文章，士之慕苏公者皆喜道足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207838_comment'></div>仆于斯时固已有愿交之心，不幸遭罹忧患，往来淮、浙间就食以继活，又得官西游洛阳者三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207838_comment'></div>历时益多，行四方远，而足下之名益至于予耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207838_comment'></div>最后苏公以文章得罪，而闻足下实与其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207838_comment'></div>苏公黜官，贬走数千里外，放之大荒积水之上，饘粥不给，风雨不蔽，平日之誉德美者皆讳之矣，谁复议于苏公之徒哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207838_comment'></div>宜遂灭息掩抑，而莫敢言之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207838_comment'></div>然言足下姓名文章，不减于昔而有加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207838_comment'></div>夫天下人之公议，固不可终阏，然非有气势利权而能使人称爱于寂寥蔽障之地者，非其卓然有人欲掩之而不可得者，未易至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207838_comment'></div>故仆之愿交之心与鲁直之名，其深浅常相若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207838_comment'></div>仆为丞于咸平者一年矣，闻鲁直如隔舍，如束缚甚固，不得辄见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207838_comment'></div>夫人之相好者，远而不相及，则虽思而心不劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207838_comment'></div>有可及之势，而限于咫尺，则梦寐乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207838_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207838_comment'></div>人之情固不平于理之不当然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207838_comment'></div>仆之区区，所以不能得见面，而至于奉书而请交也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207838_comment'></div>夫交者，君子之所以甚慎，而某乃请之以书，而复以是望于人，亦少轻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207838_comment'></div>惟耒之诚心，其所素信，有过于面见者，故不复自疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207838_comment'></div>又尝以谓天下之物，不能遁于至诚之外，顾耒之不才，必未有能使鲁直未尝见而如见之者，然鲁直亦安能无动于吾诚乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207838_comment'></div>鲁直以谓如何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207838_comment'></div>闻鲁直于文章无所不能，而独喜为诗，耒窃好之，然不足以望馀光，谨录其诗五十首，亦将以钓鲁直之近作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207838_comment'></div>顾投者薄矣，而求者亦重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207838_comment'></div>故于介者之行也，歌《木瓜》三章以送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207838_comment'></div>渐寒，伏惟校雠之馀，为道自爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1207838_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年秋冬</a>　有同僚告知，宰相蔡确曾问及张耒，故上书自陈身世。作品：《上蔡侍郎书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷55（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207842' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207842' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207842?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上蔡侍郎书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年秋冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207842")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207842_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207842'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207842'>丞于大尹，非有公事不敢自通姓名于下执事，而丞于邑，得赞可否而无专达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207842_comment'></div>故备执事官属者一岁矣，而不敢以一言自闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207842_comment'></div>属者邑僚有自府来者，言执事尝辱问某姓名，而窃自意何以得此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207842_comment'></div>岂执事兼爱博取，乐于闻善，而有以不肖误左右者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207842_comment'></div>其问之也，岂其欲知之也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207842_comment'></div>某之羁穷困辱于世久矣，逢之者不问，诉之者不省，一日哀而问之，若将悯焉者，则某非偶人，安能不一启口哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207842_comment'></div>某生三十有二年，弱冠得官，欲养其亲而受养者未饱，而泣血继之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207842_comment'></div>飘然羁孤，挈其妻孥，就食四方，莫知所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207842_comment'></div>陆走水涉，辛勤险艰，冒寒暑，勤手足，所欲不过斗升之粟，而常苦不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207842_comment'></div>而性又愚鲁，不习世务，屈首于官，始亦妄意欲行其所闻，而事势多端，不敢略试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207842_comment'></div>亲负担之役而不足于勤，服仆隶之辱而不足于贱，摩牙者假之以立威，辞责者倚之以归过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207842_comment'></div>受侮遭骂，喑不敢较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207842_comment'></div>出而坐曹，祷以求免；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207842_comment'></div>归而对案，叹而后食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207842_comment'></div>家本淮南，仕者数世，而浮寄南北，求咫尺之土以庇其家者，久而不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207842_comment'></div>今也寄十口之饥寒于一官之禄，故至其甚辱而不可忍者也，痛自劝励，欲勇舍其所仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207842_comment'></div>然退而熟念，参计利害，一及其所累，则其气漠然而平，是以黾勉而久不能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207842_comment'></div>自得官至于今，十有二年矣，其心未尝一日不出于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207842_comment'></div>世之仕者有如某，谓之困，可乎不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207842_comment'></div>执事诚哀而问之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207842_comment'></div>其闻某之言也，亦且愀然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207842_comment'></div>古之君子，有不肯屈其身，以一毫请于人者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207842_comment'></div>有三请而三却之，犹往而不已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207842_comment'></div>彼其心将以明道也，则一毫不可贬于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207842_comment'></div>惟其所欲徼倖于得位，而求禄止于为贫，故屡请而不嫌于辱，所恶于失己而求之者，谓其私富贵之利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207842_comment'></div>某也闻执事一言，而平生之所怀自献而不怍，于进退之分，则有罪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207842_comment'></div>惟某之不才，所志止于为贫，而所欲未过其分，或者犹在可言之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207842_comment'></div>费执事片言之劳，而某之赐足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207842_comment'></div>干冒台严，死罪死罪！</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1207842_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年12月18日</a>　苏轼除起居舍人，张耒寄诗祝贺。作品：《寄子瞻舍人二首》（皎皎连城璧）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《寄子瞻舍人二首》（纷纷名利场）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　是岁，代替兄长张柔上书孙永。作品：《上孙端明书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷55（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207841' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207841' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207841?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上孙端明书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207841")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207841_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207841'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207841'>昔乐正子用于鲁，孟子为之喜而不寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207841_comment'></div>夫功名进退之际，君子本不以累其心，其来何足喜，其去何必愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207841_comment'></div>一乐正子用于区区之鲁，而足以悦孟子浩然之怀，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207841_comment'></div>夫天下之事，不如人意者常多，而其委曲会合，与人同谋者常少故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207841_comment'></div>岂特少哉，盖千百而一遇焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207841_comment'></div>夫人之修身为善，择地而蹈之者，岂尝一日不愿取诸其身而布之天下哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207841_comment'></div>而世之人视夫贤人君子之有立于世，其心亦岂不愿为之奔走而受其泽也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207841_comment'></div>此二者，宜若物理之所当然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207841_comment'></div>然其行也或止之，其亲也或间之，谗邪间于其前，憸巧伺于其后，而贤人君子又不肯少屈其意，俯仰而有就，故戛戛乎其势欲合而常难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207841_comment'></div>故使夫物理之所当然者，一旦更指之为不可逢之会，可胜叹哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207841_comment'></div>由此言之，则其万一有合而得施其用，岂不可喜也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207841_comment'></div>某生三十有五矣，其闻执事之名亦久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207841_comment'></div>方先帝时，群才并进，多士满朝，而天下之人指以为正人大丈夫，不为利回，不为义疚，挺然于群枉之中，其进退用舍系天下轻重者，凡七八人，而公其一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207841_comment'></div>天下之士，其望受赐于公久矣，然中间何其屹屹乎欲合之难耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207841_comment'></div>今春以来，前日所指以为正人大丈夫者，翕然四合而至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207841_comment'></div>公虽优游近藩，然闻之道途，以为入陪辅弼，实在旦暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207841_comment'></div>如今日之所用，其磊落震动人者，皆往时天下之士将至于绝望而不得见者也，今也一旦而尽见之，则其喜也，是宜不独不寐而止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207841_comment'></div>某之家弟来，幸得望履幕下，未尝欣然自负，以为辱公之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207841_comment'></div>而某今也为令沈丘，得在使部，闻公之将有庆也，日夜喜跃，乐颂其事，而愿有献焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207841_comment'></div>故不量其愚，且喜为执事一道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207841_comment'></div>而某之家世单寒，无势力自拔于当途，而方天下治平，贤俊振起，区区之心，未能自甘于无用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207841_comment'></div>来岁之春，公将有荐其属为京官，某者愿沾其一乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207841_comment'></div>夫天下之士愿奔走于君子，而君子亦岂一日忘天下之士哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207841_comment'></div>伏惟察之，进退俟命。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1207841_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　是岁，读曾巩集，因作文。作品：《书曾子固集后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷53（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207902' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207902' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207902?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书曾子固集后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207902")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207902_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207902'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207902'>元丰二年夏，曾公自四明守亳，道楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207902_comment'></div>予时自楚将赴河南寿安尉，始获以书拜公于行次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207902_comment'></div>公得予书，甚喜也，谓予曰：「我与子皆溯汴而西，能从我行乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207902_comment'></div>时予舟无挽兵，为予求之甚力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207902_comment'></div>公又曰：「我行驶非子能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207902_comment'></div>子至永城，当缆舟陆走，一日至亳，为旬日会也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207902_comment'></div>公遂行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207902_comment'></div>后予病六十日，至永城病未愈，不能骑，因永城令寓书于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207902_comment'></div>六年，予罢寿安尉，居洛，而闻公卒，为文一篇将祭公于河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207902_comment'></div>而成都范祖禹梦得自言尝为公举，亦欲为文以祭，谓予有往江南者，约同祭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207902_comment'></div>而是岁予家多事，自洛来陈，明年又走淮南，未克祭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207902_comment'></div>八年四月，公弟翰林公自建昌赴京师，予谒见于咸平，知公已葬南丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207902_comment'></div>异时至南丰，或客可寓以祭者，当书所为文一吊公之墓焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207902_comment'></div>其意之所欲，则具之文矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207902_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　是岁，接王适书，始闻陈师道之名，并读其诗文。随后与王适会，听其具道师道事迹。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　元丰年间，在咸平作诗咏竹。姑系于此。作品：《东斋杂咏》（袅袅墙阴竹数竿）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。原文献诗题为《东斋杂咏七首》，搜韵网为《东斋杂咏》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　元丰年间，在咸平作诗咏菊。姑系于此。作品：《东斋杂咏》（野人斋爨屏膻腥）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。原文献诗题为《东斋杂咏七首》，搜韵网为《东斋杂咏》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　元丰年间，在咸平作诗咏盆池。姑系于此。作品：《东斋杂咏》（点点青萍秋后衰）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。原文献诗题为《东斋杂咏七首》，搜韵网为《东斋杂咏》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　元丰年间，在咸平作诗咏老槐。姑系于此。作品：《东斋杂咏》（雪霜未死阅年华）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。原文献诗题为《东斋杂咏七首》，搜韵网为《东斋杂咏》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　元丰年间，在咸平作诗咏皂荚。姑系于此。作品：《东斋杂咏》（畿县尘埃不可论）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。原文献诗题为《东斋杂咏七首》，搜韵网为《东斋杂咏》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　元丰年间，在咸平作诗咏南窗。姑系于此。作品：《东斋杂咏》（门前尘土慵驱马）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。原文献诗题为《东斋杂咏七首》，搜韵网为《东斋杂咏》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　元丰年间，在咸平作诗咏道榻。姑系于此。作品：《东斋杂咏》（纸阁芦帘小榻安）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。原文献诗题为《东斋杂咏七首》，搜韵网为《东斋杂咏》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　元丰年间腊月，在咸平，有诗抒怀。姑系于此。作品：《腊月书事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　熙宁或元丰间，作赋写暴雨忽至及雨停时天象，寓有身世之悲。姑系于此。作品：《雨望赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207801' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207801' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207801?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雨望赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207801")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207801_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207801'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207801'>淡海天之苍茫，观骤雨之霶霈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207801_comment'></div>飘风击而云奔，旷万里而一蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207801_comment'></div>卒然如百万之卒赴敌骤战兮，车旗崩腾而矢石乱至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207801_comment'></div>已而馀飘既定，盛怒已泄，云逐逐而散归，纵横委乎天末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207801_comment'></div>又如战胜之兵，整旗就队，徐驱而回归兮，杳然惟见夫川平而野阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207801_comment'></div>夫云霞风月之容，雷雨电雹之变，非巧力所能为，盖人间之绝观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207801_comment'></div>必也登雄楼杰阁之峥嵘，凭高山巨海之空旷，彻除耳目之障蔽，而后能穷极变化之奇状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207801_comment'></div>嗟我居之卑湫兮，束视听于寻丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207801_comment'></div>顾所欲之莫得兮，徒临风而惆怅。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207801_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作赋写暮秋。姑系于此。作品：《暮秋赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207802' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207802' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207802?labeling=true' target='_blank'>暮秋赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207802")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207802_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207802'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207802'>嗟予志之莫就兮，哀天时之不予谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207802_comment'></div>岁冉冉以将暮兮，无以荡吾之幽忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207802_comment'></div>昔吾之既有知兮，独信道而不顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207802_comment'></div>鞭吾驹之不戒兮，眇一世而独骛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207802_comment'></div>俨章甫以自好兮，安知越人之异容？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207802_comment'></div>恃所持之不欺兮，谓彼此之情同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207802_comment'></div>夫何事物之多故兮，因少愚而老智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207802_comment'></div>彼善恶岂有常兮，固系夫一世之贱贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207802_comment'></div>或指砾以为玉兮，人皆知其不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207802_comment'></div>众既讹而莫返兮，事随信而名迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207802_comment'></div>伪言实于众舌兮，至宝贱于独知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207802_comment'></div>正无助者必危兮，恶乘朋而或济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207802_comment'></div>决大河而东奔兮，挽予舟而上溯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207802_comment'></div>嗟尔楫之几何兮，蛟龙郁其方怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207802_comment'></div>外既揆而内度兮，考旧好之同异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207802_comment'></div>韬九袭以深藏兮，固可死而不可试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207802_comment'></div>卷杜蘅之幽佩兮，苞芳兰之翠衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207802_comment'></div>畏久畜之不扬兮，时窃陈以为戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207802_comment'></div>怨所资之不售兮，非达人之宏规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207802_comment'></div>彼废兴之有命兮，何忧乐之足系？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207802_comment'></div>奏吾琴之愤怨兮，酌吾酒之洌清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207802_comment'></div>揽芳桂与秋菊兮，聊以驻吾之颓龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207802_comment'></div>吾又将之夫深山兮，遂绝世而远去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207802_comment'></div>身九浴而后衣兮，齿三涤而后咀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207802_comment'></div>纳冰霜于胸中兮，荡焦膈之宿污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207802_comment'></div>求仙人之奇术兮，与彭咸乎为伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207802_comment'></div>彼君子之蹈常兮，曷急世之有知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207802_comment'></div>聊逍遥以卒岁兮，乐天命而不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207802_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1207802_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　熙宁或元丰间，哀伯牙，作赋。姑系于此。作品：《哀伯牙赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207810' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207810' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207810?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哀伯牙赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207810")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207810_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207810'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207810'>伯牙鼓琴，后世无如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207810_comment'></div>我哀伯牙，似智而愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207810_comment'></div>天地之间，四方万里，知尔琴者，一人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207810_comment'></div>钟子既死，其一又亡，欲弹无听，泣涕浪浪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207810_comment'></div>己奏己闻，欲诘不可，逼塞满怀，无所倾写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207810_comment'></div>《折杨》、《皇荂》，巷歌里曲，入邑娱邑，入国悦国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207810_comment'></div>回视伯牙，面有矜色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207810_comment'></div>夫操至伎者，必不和众人之耳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207810_comment'></div>而媚众耳者，又善工之深耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207810_comment'></div>违众者常孑孑其无与，而冒耻者乃身安而获利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207810_comment'></div>则亦安知夫至艺之非祸，而庸工之非祉也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207810_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207810_comment'></div>将为至巧者，必无顾于终身之无与，则至巧之于人，乃不祥之上器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207810_comment'></div>操不祥之器终身而不知，则伯牙者，乃后世之深戒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207810_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1207810'>诘：草斋本、吕本、丛刊本、《皇朝文鉴》并作「语」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1207810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207810'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207810_0'>⑴ 《柯山集》卷二。又见《皇朝文鉴》卷八，《历代赋汇》外集卷一六。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1207810_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　熙宁或元丰间十月，咏石菖蒲，作赋。姑系于此。作品：《石菖蒲赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207811' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207811?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石菖蒲赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207811")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207811_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207811'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207811'>岁十月，冰霜大寒，吾庭之植物无不悴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207811_comment'></div>爰有瓦缶，贮水斗许，间以小石，有草郁然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207811_comment'></div>俯窥其根，与石相结络。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207811_comment'></div>其生意畅遂，颜色茂好，若夏雨解箨之竹，春田时泽之苗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207811_comment'></div>问其名，曰：「是为石菖蒲也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207811_comment'></div>考诸《本草》，则所谓养性上药，仙圣之已试者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207811_comment'></div>因赋之云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207811_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1207811'>岁寒风霜，水落石洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207811_comment'></div>大木百围，僵仆摧折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207811_comment'></div>有草于此，寸根九节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207811_comment'></div>曾是莫伤，菶然茂悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207811_comment'></div>若处广深、隐奥密，而不知户牖之外平地尺雪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207811_comment'></div>将糜而饵之，私其益于我躬，则不几于夺也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207811_comment'></div>曷若致之吾前，仪之以自修兮，庶乎比德之琚玦也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207811_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　熙宁或元丰间，登高远望，怅天边碧云，作赋。姑系于此。作品：《碧云赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207817' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207817' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207817?labeling=true' target='_blank'>碧云赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207817")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207817_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207817'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207817'>蹇临高而延瞩，怅天边之碧云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207817_comment'></div>缅不知予何思，情坌至兮缤纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207817_comment'></div>怀幽兰之令姿，方扬灵乎上春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207817_comment'></div>顾来者之非其人，使暴露乎埃尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207817_comment'></div>我有旨酒，与子殷勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207817_comment'></div>终阔莫致，实劳我神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207817_comment'></div>白日西驰，去故就新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207817_comment'></div>发采舒光，念当及晨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207817_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207817_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作怨曲诗二首，其一咏南朝女。姑系于此。作品：《怨曲二首》（白首南朝女）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作怨曲诗二首，其二抒离别情。姑系于此。作品：《怨曲二首》（祖席驻征桡）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作诗咏寿阳楼。姑系于此。作品：《寿阳歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作诗咏初春。姑系于此。作品：《闲步》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷27（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　天乍晴，作诗二首。姑系于此。作品：《乍晴二首》（洗来桐叶晚青青）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷27（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《乍晴二首》（虹长饮雨川无滴）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷27（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作诗抒幽人之情。姑系于此。作品：《杂题二首》（寒雨萧萧桐叶惊）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷27（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《杂题二首》（苍苍落月井梧西）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷27（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作诗写暮春之景。姑系于此。作品：《晚春》（苔封池面草芊绵）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作诗咏荒园。姑系于此。作品：《荒园》（荒围午日照青芜）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　清晨出行，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《晓发途中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　暮春旅途中，夜宿贫民家，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《宿卢村逆旅》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　冬日有感，作诗二首。姑系于此。作品：《有感二绝》（残雪微风冷透衣）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《有感二绝》（日暇凝云去复还）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论法。姑系于此。作品：《论法上》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷35（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《论法下》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷35（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207918' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207918' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207918?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论法<span class='inlineComment2'>（上）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207918")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207918_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207918'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207918'>古之善为天下者，不患法不立，而患不能为法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207918_comment'></div>不患法不足，而患法密而不胜举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207918_comment'></div>然则天下之治乱，不系法之存亡欤，夫亦有推本而后知其至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207918_comment'></div>夫法之所生，不生于无事，事起而不可理，则法从而经之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207918_comment'></div>事日益多，法日益周；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207918_comment'></div>事日益新，政日益工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207918_comment'></div>并起而相制，则不胜者受其患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207918_comment'></div>故法不胜事，则天下之乱纷然而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207918_comment'></div>故治天下者，非无法之尚也，为其无事之可贵也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207918_comment'></div>非法备之可制也，为其事变之可虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207918_comment'></div>昔者三代之治不若尧舜，商周之治不如夏后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207918_comment'></div>孔子曰：「后世虽有作者，虞帝弗可及也已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207918_comment'></div>又曰：「虞夏之道，寡怨于民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207918_comment'></div>商周之道，不胜其弊」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207918_comment'></div>尧舜之礼，比于夏后之时则略矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207918_comment'></div>商周之礼，比于夏后之时则备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207918_comment'></div>夫四代之治否，岂礼不具之罪哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207918_comment'></div>制度日多，淳粹日衰矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207918_comment'></div>天下之势，譬如人之一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207918_comment'></div>夫世之人，有不畏寒暑，不治药石，恣口之所食，肆体之所安，夫如是者，问其年，必壮者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207918_comment'></div>深居奥处，爱养备至，药石百物毒烈并进，而炙艾针砭遍体而无遗，问其年，则必老者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207918_comment'></div>夫虞夏之道，壮者也，其不治可为也，其不足可补也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207918_comment'></div>壮者之疾易治也，其成质未亏而可以有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207918_comment'></div>商周之道，老者也，其不治难为也，以其尝治之而不信故也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207918_comment'></div>其不足难补也，以其尝补之而不满故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207918_comment'></div>以彼之疾方来，而吾之术已穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207918_comment'></div>彼之变未休，而待之道已尽，如是则死继之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207918_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207918_comment'></div>天下之不愿取办于法也如此，而世之君子抚事制变而尤法之不足，岂不悲哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207918_comment'></div>夫法度之弊，起于德不足而求胜其民，而败于启民之邪心而多怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207918_comment'></div>夏之继舜也，岂不知舜之为不可及也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207918_comment'></div>商周之继夏也，岂不知弊之将不胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207918_comment'></div>然而明见其弊而为不已，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207918_comment'></div>岂其世变日繁而德有所不足故也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207918_comment'></div>德不足以还民之初，熟视其乱而莫之禁，则将以智加之，故曰：法起于德不足而求胜其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207918_comment'></div>夫上以智胜其下，则下亦以智胜其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207918_comment'></div>不络马首，则毁御窃辔之马终身而不知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207918_comment'></div>不立门户，则穿窬窃发之盗终身而不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207918_comment'></div>法之于民，常制其一而开其一，制之者易见，而开之者难防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207918_comment'></div>上下以智相胜，而奸邪诡伪不可胜究，故天下之人始忘其欢欣戴君之心，而有怨怒忌上之仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207918_comment'></div>故曰：败于启民之邪心而多怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207918_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207918_comment'></div>夏之后为商，商之后为周，三代之治未甚相变也，其治乱之迹未甚相远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207918_comment'></div>周亡而为秦，天下大乱，三王之治扫灭而无馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207918_comment'></div>治世之迹，卒不能复先王之丝毫，而三代之俗，遂以不见于后世，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207918_comment'></div>夫法未极，则俗之变未足，夏商之法，尝若极矣，然民未大厌也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207918_comment'></div>民有未厌之心，则其淳气美质犹有存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207918_comment'></div>周之法详矣，不可以复加，其俗之变已穷，而民之奸心邪态靡不毕出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207918_comment'></div>其智备，其质尽，其恶足，其美殚，故周之亡而不可复为矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207918_comment'></div>此圣人所以深悲之，而曰：「周人之未渎神，而赏爵刑罚穷矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207918_comment'></div>此后所以为秦也欤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1207918_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207919' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207919' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207919?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论法<span class='inlineComment2'>（下）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207919")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207919_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207919'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207919'>古之有天下者，必得于纷争放乱之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207919_comment'></div>夫人之情，出于乱亡之后，则其情苦而思安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207919_comment'></div>夫惟其情苦而思安，故其事简而易教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207919_comment'></div>天下有易教之俗，则上无难立之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207919_comment'></div>故有国家者，其初世常绥静而易治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207919_comment'></div>安平之日久，而民之侈心生，嗜欲之动无穷，而罪过繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207919_comment'></div>故居其上者，乃始日夜补完其缺败，而调伏其倔强，曲为之防，多为之制，法度繁兴，刑政毕举，文胜而质不足，名美而实不称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207919_comment'></div>故大抵有国者，中世以后，天下之事常多，而国家之观益美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207919_comment'></div>生民之过日滋，而有司之文加备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207919_comment'></div>而世之惑者，以为能完上世之不足，而务求前人之所未成，以为成功，而不知其不若使上世之质未散，而前人之朴常在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207919_comment'></div>天下之物，其势相激而后变生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207919_comment'></div>观美者，实之所由亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207919_comment'></div>文备者，伪之所自起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207919_comment'></div>盖尝以汉之事考之，高祖取天下于秦，民出于百战夷伤之馀，父子弟兄仅相保聚以安其生，故其气帖然静愿而少事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207919_comment'></div>而高祖、文、景得以画一之法羁縻而安辑之，历数世而天下安妥，内有大乱而豪杰不作，此民淳而法简之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207919_comment'></div>至于武、宣，天下之势久习于无事，民意日纵，豪侠盗贼稍起于里闾，而二帝乃修明制度，收纳天下之才，讲政备物以与天下战于才智之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207919_comment'></div>才者奋而奸者随之，强者胜而乱者因之，纷纷藉藉以传于不肖之子孙，而汉以大坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207919_comment'></div>此则事众而法备之弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207919_comment'></div>故天下之难治，不在于创始卤莽之初，而常在于积安大备之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207919_comment'></div>是故君子必观其兆而审其宜，解其甚而不激其变，使其势不为周人之已甚，而务使后世可以有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207919_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207919_comment'></div>其本果安在哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207919_comment'></div>盖天下之弊，好极治者必召天下之大乱，务穷利者必贻天下之大害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207919_comment'></div>夫污尊而抔饮，蒉桴而士鼓，天下之人苟未厌其为礼乐也，则吾之礼乐，虽足以备天下之声容，藏而勿陈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207919_comment'></div>橧巢营窟之居，衣薪不封之葬，天下之人苟不失其为生死之所安，则吾之制度虽足以建九筵之堂、五称之衣，弃而勿用可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207919_comment'></div>不乱则已，不必邀其敬，不欺则已，不必尽其忠，是谓不求备于民矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207919_comment'></div>可久之道，起于不求备而效于人不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207919_comment'></div>譬之万金之家责之千金，其力亦足以供我之求，然吾日取一金焉，于是有不得已而取之百金，彼犹乐输而不怨，何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207919_comment'></div>彼惟所有者未竭而不怨故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207919_comment'></div>故礼乐刑政之设于下，使有未厌之意，则后世有作者得以复加焉，故其弊也可以有救，而不至于术智竭尽而无继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207919_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207919_comment'></div>惑者徒见法度密而民不化，文理具而功不立，日夜从而加之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207919_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207919_comment'></div>亦失其本矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207919_comment'></div>天下之势不可以激，而民之智不可以穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207919_comment'></div>激之以所欲者，必得其所不欲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207919_comment'></div>穷之以所能者，必报之以所不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207919_comment'></div>徐导其欲激之势，而不扶其未用之智，则天下久安而无虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207919_comment'></div>然则周人其未足以知此欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207919_comment'></div>彼惑者遭其会而有不得已焉故也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1207919_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论治术。姑系于此。作品：《治术》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷35（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207920' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207920' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207920?labeling=true' target='_blank'>治术</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207920")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207920_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207920'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207920'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207920_comment'></div>治天下之难也，其为物也大而难举，其为情也杂而不类，为之不得其要，用之不中其节，用力劳而功不成，是故圣人本诸道而明于术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207920_comment'></div>凡吾所以为术者，制物以使入于吾之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207920_comment'></div>然则何其不直致吾之所欲，而为是委曲迂缓而使之从也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207920_comment'></div>夫人之情，使之从我而劫之以刑，则成功难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207920_comment'></div>阴用以役其心，使之不得不从我，则成功易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207920_comment'></div>今夫欲天下之畏也，而陈之以刀锯，欲天下之爱也，而陈之以金帛，此直致其畏爱者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207920_comment'></div>夫刑戮赏赐，非不足以立畏爱也，使必陈其物，设其具，则刀锯金帛亦不给矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207920_comment'></div>且天下固有不爱金玉之赏者，则赏之所不能悦也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207920_comment'></div>有不畏刀锯之刑者，则刑之所不能惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207920_comment'></div>故欲求吾欲而直遂焉者，其事繁，其教粗，吾与物以力相胜，而物之从之也，内有不伏之心，而吾力之所不周者，乱之所从起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207920_comment'></div>今夫驷马之于车也，奔骤舒迟至难齐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207920_comment'></div>夫人之于马，必待夫躬临之而后如意耶，则一车而四驭未能足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207920_comment'></div>今以一御，而驷马之迟速惟十指之听者，以吾所执者辔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207920_comment'></div>以一辔之约制驷马之节者，执马之要，虽欲不我听而不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207920_comment'></div>是先王之所以役天下者，执天下之辔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207920_comment'></div>今夫桥衡之举水也，右仰则左俯，左抑则右扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207920_comment'></div>夫曷不欲俯则卑之，而仰者何与焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207920_comment'></div>欲扬则举之，而抑者何与焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207920_comment'></div>夫惟卑者有不能使之卑，而后仰者用也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207920_comment'></div>举者有不能使之举，而后抑者用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207920_comment'></div>先王知天下之卑高，有不可以刑为也，故为其所以卑高者，而不为其刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207920_comment'></div>古之知是道者，执天下之所必从者如辔，而制物理之必应者如衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207920_comment'></div>四凶，天下之巨蠹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207920_comment'></div>商容、比干、箕子，商之望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207920_comment'></div>舜能使天下不犯于有司，而度罪之不可以尽刑也，取天下之巨蠹者而击之，天下虽有悍强不化者，知所畏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207920_comment'></div>舜非徒能施刀锯也，能沮其不畏之情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207920_comment'></div>武王得商，而善者未可尽赏也，取世之望者三人而尊礼之，而商之为善者悦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207920_comment'></div>夫武王非徒知尊贤能也，能动其悦我之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207920_comment'></div>故舜、武王执天下之辔者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207920_comment'></div>昔梁惠王以利问孟子，而孟子非之，然其终曰：「未有仁而遗其亲者，未有义而后其君者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207920_comment'></div>何必曰利」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207920_comment'></div>夫使不遗其亲，不后其君，利之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207920_comment'></div>梁惠王以为利而孟子非之，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207920_comment'></div>孟子者以为不求不遗于民，而后民守之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207920_comment'></div>不求不后于民，而后民先之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207920_comment'></div>彼以利而责望于民，则民散而惟利之从，而卒不获吾之所求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207920_comment'></div>梁惠王之术疏，而孟子之术精；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207920_comment'></div>梁惠王之事拙，而孟子之事微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207920_comment'></div>老子之道，绌术者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207920_comment'></div>其言曰：「将欲翕之，必固张之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207920_comment'></div>将欲取之，必固与之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207920_comment'></div>又曰：「非以其无私耶，故能成其私」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207920_comment'></div>夫将翕而合之，将取而夺之，行其私以成其私，是以暑徵暑，以寒致寒，阴阳之所不能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207920_comment'></div>天之将寒也，不以霜雪为之也，金石烈、土山焦者，所以为今日之霜雪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207920_comment'></div>天之将暑也，不以蒸郁为之也，震风积雪者，所以为今日之炎烈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207920_comment'></div>故邀其反物之功不能远，守其复物之情不能伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207920_comment'></div>故孟子之术，低昂天下之衡者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207920_comment'></div>夫术有小大，道有邪正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207920_comment'></div>天下之士，徒见夫世之浅人执小术、踽邪径而流入于谲诈之域，而曰圣人无术，直道而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207920_comment'></div>呜呼，亦惑矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207920_comment'></div>圣人之所谓直道，非无术之言也，过乎术者之言也，故其道平易而有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207920_comment'></div>惑者之所谓直道，不及乎术者之言也，故其道疏鲁而多败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207920_comment'></div>文王以仁义而王，宋襄以仁义而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207920_comment'></div>均为仁义，而存亡异，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207920_comment'></div>乌获之力，弛而不用，遇盗而三揖之，则盗知服矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207920_comment'></div>无乌获之力，遇盗而揖焉，则死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207920_comment'></div>文王过乎术者也，宋襄不及乎术者也，而况圣人之未必不出乎术也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_57_1207920_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论知人。姑系于此。作品：《知人论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷35（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207921' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207921' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207921?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知人论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207921")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207921_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207921'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207921'>甚矣，用人之难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207921_comment'></div>天下之实材，常深伏而不发，非遇事焉，则有终身不可窥者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207921_comment'></div>故其勇足以暴三军，服四夷，而其外如怯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207921_comment'></div>其节足以断大事，成大功，而其外若不能有所为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207921_comment'></div>方其未发也，其言语动作，坦然无以异于常人，卒然即之而不知其器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207921_comment'></div>是故非有深智英明之君，不得而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207921_comment'></div>而世之小人，常有自蔽其不肖以惑世主之听，而卒败天下之事，可胜叹哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207921_comment'></div>彼小人者，其中实怯，而视其外则发扬振厉而若勇，其中实庸，而听其言则辩给开敏而若才，卒然即之，若真可与有为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207921_comment'></div>是故世主往往甘心而不辞，至于谋穷计失而后悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207921_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207921_comment'></div>用人之难也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207921_comment'></div>盖尝闻之，古之求知人者，于人也，不观其形似而察其中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207921_comment'></div>于己也，不逆于耳目而逆于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207921_comment'></div>察其中则见其所穷，逆于心则为虑也深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207921_comment'></div>彼小人之将欺我也，不过多为形似以动吾耳目之间而已，彼安能为实哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207921_comment'></div>而吾应之也，常出其所不意，而后小人之情见，而天下之实才亦虽欲伏匿而不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207921_comment'></div>盖昔者霍光之所为，固非有征伐攻取之谋而文采缘饰之可喜也，朴然庸人而已耳，非有武帝之聪明，不足以知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207921_comment'></div>故卒然用之而不疑，与之以兵，尊之以权，提孺子之天下使之谋之，而光果有以当之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207921_comment'></div>盖当其初，朝廷之臣孰不以为过之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207921_comment'></div>而至其有所立，则有震惧而不敢与者，然则光之平生之所为，岂可以占其后之所发者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207921_comment'></div>议者不知武帝之用光盖其知人之明，而遂以为当时之臣惟光可以胜其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207921_comment'></div>彼徒见其成功而后知之，不知当时之人，才足以治军旅，决成败，而书生儒者之论，孰非仗节死义之人，安肯弃而不求，而授一木强之霍光哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207921_comment'></div>唐之文宗、昭宗，其偾乱也甚矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207921_comment'></div>不爱高爵重禄，以致天下之士，投其诚而与之，此其志皆可与立功，而其取人无术，故徒以益乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207921_comment'></div>彼李训、张浚者，其言语动作如可以立功者也，大言而不顾，敢为而不惮，故二君惑之，虽有间焉，不可得而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207921_comment'></div>其后卒然而发，以区区之宦人，不能少制其乱，提兵数万，而不能取李克用之一镞，卒之身灭国弱，为天下笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207921_comment'></div>彼二君惑于形似故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207921_comment'></div>李系好言兵，而王铎与之兵，李元平好大言，而关播授之权，卒于无成，为天下笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207921_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207921_comment'></div>使人之知人，独视其外而可以不疑，则知人者，帝何其难之也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1207921_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论将。姑系于此。作品：《将论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷35（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207922' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207922' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207922?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207922")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207922_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207922'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207922'>天子之臣，自公卿大夫虽或阙焉，而不足以为急，其不可以一日阙者，其惟将乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207922_comment'></div>夫将之所以为急者，非以夫任之有以过夫公卿大夫也，为其事之不常有，而人之能之者少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207922_comment'></div>今夫医之为药也，金石草木之珍，世之所共有者，未必藏也，至于远方之物，山海之奇产，与夫人力之不可以常得者，则必预蓄以待其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207922_comment'></div>今夫百姓之不安而财用之不登，刑罚之未平而礼义之不兴，其为患大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207922_comment'></div>然其为事也，天下之所习知，故其为术也，人人皆足以措手足，卒然求其人而易得也，讲其术而易晓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207922_comment'></div>譬之于金石草木之珍，其所治者大矣，然人人之所知而有之，虽不素有，无害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207922_comment'></div>或一旦之急，提百万之卒以与人战，胜则生，败则死，天下之人，无事则废而不讲，有事则避而不愿见者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207922_comment'></div>故其为事，不常有于天下，幸而千万人之间而有一人，学焉而知其术，用焉而见其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207922_comment'></div>故人之习之者少，非卒然可以朝求而夕得，苟取而骤用者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207922_comment'></div>譬之有疾于此，而待远方之奇药，岂不殆哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207922_comment'></div>先王知其然，故虽隆仁义礼乐以化天下之俗，消伏悖戾好争之心，而常阴求天下之奇才，以待不测之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207922_comment'></div>盖尝寓其法于六乡六遂之间，使卒乘车徒之制素具，而朝廷之公卿大夫，外之诸侯之君，朝聘燕享、从容欢欣之际，必陈弓矢以讲射，而四时之隙，则命有司以讲武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207922_comment'></div>以天子之尊而驰骋于草野，亲金鼓干戈之劳以射取禽兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207922_comment'></div>盖享宴者，人情之所乐，而弓矢者，威武之具；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207922_comment'></div>田游者，佚乐之事，而杀兽者，征伐之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207922_comment'></div>盖先王所以藏天下之所畏于人情从容之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207922_comment'></div>凡此者所以阴养天下豪杰之气，使之一旦习知其术，安之而不慑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207922_comment'></div>是故先王之于将也，非特能求之，而又能养以致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207922_comment'></div>至于后世，秦汉以来，其虑天下之变，已不能如先王之时，而独知求而用之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207922_comment'></div>养之有术以致其才，求之有方而知其实，此先王之法也，故其术无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207922_comment'></div>养之无术而知求之，愈于不求焉可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207922_comment'></div>此于先王之时，则十已失其九矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207922_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207922_comment'></div>先王之法后世既亡矣，安坐而不求，求之而非其道者，未见其可也<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207922_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1207922'>其：原无，据草斋本、郝本、吕本及《文粹》补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1207922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207922'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_1207922_0'>⑴ 《柯山集》卷三二。又见《苏门六君子文粹》卷二，《圣宋文选》卷二五，《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷三二。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1207922_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论本治。姑系于此。作品：《本治论上》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷35（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《本治论下》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷35（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207923' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207923' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207923?labeling=true' target='_blank'>本治论<span class='inlineComment2'>（上）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207923")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207923_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207923'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207923'>治天下之道，有历万世而可知者，有朝不可以知夕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207923_comment'></div>自三代以来至于今，盖已数千百年，事势之变杂出而不可期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207923_comment'></div>然而如是而为仁，如是而为义，得之则安、失之则危者，未始有改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207923_comment'></div>此虽历万世而吾能知之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207923_comment'></div>虽然，仁与义者，吾能知之，其所以为仁义者，吾不能必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207923_comment'></div>今天下之所谓仁义者，有生之而为仁，亦有杀之而为仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207923_comment'></div>有利之而为义，亦有宥之而为义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207923_comment'></div>彼圣人之治天下，其可必者，吾之所为，未有出于不仁不义者而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207923_comment'></div>必将求其所以致仁义之迹，则虽圣智，吾知其不能前知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207923_comment'></div>夫天下之事，未始一也，循之则弊，激之则变，反覆相代而不可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207923_comment'></div>今夫质之与文，是无以异于冰炭之不可同也，然质之弊则文必至，是何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207923_comment'></div>势之所激，故物有以极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207923_comment'></div>阴极不生阴而生阳，寒极不生寒而生暑，故物有以同相戾，有以异相使，此之谓激之而变者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207923_comment'></div>彼先王之治，其初固未尝不善也，而至于后世而不能行，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207923_comment'></div>循之故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207923_comment'></div>譬之水也，决之而注于海，则有所避，有所就，纵横委曲而不可一，而后海可至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207923_comment'></div>有贱丈夫焉，不知其为如此，以为水出于西则决而西，水出于东则导而东，当避而不知避，当就而不知就，则力可竭，而海不可至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207923_comment'></div>夫圣人之法，何为而立也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207923_comment'></div>无乃因于时乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207923_comment'></div>时去矣而法不改，则虽圣人之法，有所不能为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207923_comment'></div>区区而循之，坚守而不变，时日益异，而吾方伥伥然抱已陈无用之物而求施之，则亦何施而可哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207923_comment'></div>此所谓循之而弊者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207923_comment'></div>惟其循之而弊，是故随其所激而变从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207923_comment'></div>天下之事如此而不可一也，而世之惑者犹将举腐馀已弃之空文，而求为之，无乃已疏乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207923_comment'></div>凡此者，朝不可以知夕者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207923_comment'></div>治天下者，必求至于仁义而无祸，犹治身者，必求至于安乐而无疾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207923_comment'></div>夫求安乐而无疾，则必察夫寒暑之动而为之应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207923_comment'></div>故狐貉以御寒，而絺葛以去暑，凡晦明燥湿之变，吾皆有以制之，而吾初不能自必，夫如是而后安乐可为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207923_comment'></div>寒而为裘，暑而不易，暑而御葛，寒而不变，如是则疾而死耳，尚何安逸之有哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207923_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207923_comment'></div>知此而后可以语治天下也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1207923_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207924' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207924' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207924?labeling=true' target='_blank'>本治论<span class='inlineComment2'>（下）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207924")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207924_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207924'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207924'>或曰：三代以来，天下之未大治，岂非天下之势有不便欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207924_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207924_comment'></div>是未达夫变者之论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207924_comment'></div>且天下之势，果何为而起也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207924_comment'></div>方三代之时，列而为诸侯，自王畿之外皆侯国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207924_comment'></div>当其盛也，藩翰屏蔽，而王室以之强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207924_comment'></div>及其衰也，分裂四出，更为攘僭而不可制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207924_comment'></div>而后天下之势合于一，而秦始为郡县，以收天下之权，而其弊也，天子孤立于上，匹夫横行而莫之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207924_comment'></div>至于汉而天下之势遂离而不一，裂为三国，而合于晋，分为南北，而一于隋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207924_comment'></div>天下之势，虽或不同，然当其改也，必有所惩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207924_comment'></div>当其立也，必有所利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207924_comment'></div>盖自唐之末，始有藩镇之强，而唐以之亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207924_comment'></div>历五代而不能改，至于今而藩镇之祸遂大去而不复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207924_comment'></div>今天下之势，委于守令，而分于监司，总于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207924_comment'></div>自三代以来至于今，何其屡改而不一耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207924_comment'></div>其无乃出于有所激欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207924_comment'></div>故尧舜之不得不为诸侯，犹今之不得不为郡县也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207924_comment'></div>故两出于不得不为，则势者固有所定而不可变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207924_comment'></div>故天下之政有是非，而天下之势无可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207924_comment'></div>譬如人之自少而之壮，自壮而之老也，夫三者固未始不同，而各有所养，亦各有所乐，苟不知所以待老之具，而必曰壮而后可则惑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207924_comment'></div>按今之势而善为之，其谁曰不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207924_comment'></div>而必曰唐虞三代之势而后可，则天下卒不可得而治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207924_comment'></div>然则三代以来，其隳于治者，其病果安在哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207924_comment'></div>盖有二说，一曰尚虚名而忘实利，二曰谨小过而失大患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207924_comment'></div>何谓虚名？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207924_comment'></div>好尧舜三代之名是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207924_comment'></div>世之学者，圜坐而议政，未有不曰唐虞三代者也，其言当时之病，未有不曰不如唐虞三代者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207924_comment'></div>夫唐虞三代之法，岂诚有所不足哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207924_comment'></div>时易而事迁，世变而势异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207924_comment'></div>譬之铸金琢玉以为饮食，虽美而无所用之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207924_comment'></div>有一人焉，强立而不顾，则必群笑而竞排之，以为臆说而不学，而不知吾之于尧舜三代，固相期于仁义之地，而吾何求其名哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207924_comment'></div>盖昔者夏为贡法以取其民，至商而为助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207924_comment'></div>孟子曰：「莫善于助，莫不善于贡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207924_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207924_comment'></div>使世之惑者必曰：「禹之法，岂有不善哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207924_comment'></div>而不知夫末世之利，圣人不能预为，而已去之时，圣人不能强至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207924_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207924_comment'></div>使尧舜三代之圣人复出于今，而反顾当时之所为，吾知其必不复为之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207924_comment'></div>故夫天下之不治，未始不自好名始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207924_comment'></div>昔者王莽之井田，后周之周官，房琯之车战，尝试之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207924_comment'></div>譬如病狂丧心之人，越行妄作而不顾，是果何益哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207924_comment'></div>此之谓好虚名而忘实利者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207924_comment'></div>何谓小过？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207924_comment'></div>夫世之人有好种植者，一日种之，一日溉之，一日培之，朝俟其长，夕伺其蕃，一日百至而不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207924_comment'></div>是其爱之亦至矣，然木不加盛而日槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207924_comment'></div>又有一人焉，既植而去之，行三年而反，而木之大可拱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207924_comment'></div>是何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207924_comment'></div>凡物之性，不扰则乐而滋，数治则残而槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207924_comment'></div>且秦之吏，比汉之初则勤矣，远邦小都之民，其知秦之政令亦熟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207924_comment'></div>秦之命令布于田野闾里之间者亦至矣，而民亦怨苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207924_comment'></div>而汉初之吏，虽不如秦之勤而民乐之，何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207924_comment'></div>秦之所急者，不过簿书文法之间，谨严其细而劳扰之，民固已不胜其弊矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207924_comment'></div>此无以异于爱木而日扰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207924_comment'></div>彼汉之初，虽号为文阔而网疏，然不过少弛于簿书期会纤悉委曲之间，而民乃不至于劳扰，则何怪乎天下之治哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207924_comment'></div>彼一溉一培之失时，于木之性未害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207924_comment'></div>彼不求政之所病，而乃尤天下之势，呜呼，其亦不知治本哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1207924_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论礼。姑系于此。作品：《礼论一》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷36（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《礼论二》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷36（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《礼论三》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷36（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《礼论四》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷36（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207925' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207925' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207925?labeling=true' target='_blank'>礼论<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207925")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207925_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207925'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207925'>礼之道，仁义而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207925_comment'></div>夫仁主于亲亲长幼之际，而义主于贵贵君臣之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207925_comment'></div>知亲亲而贵贵之义废，则荡而不严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207925_comment'></div>知贵贵而亲亲之仁亡，则严而不和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207925_comment'></div>是故圣人为礼以兼统之，使之两立而兼善，并行而互用，而后仁义之道行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207925_comment'></div>是故有乡饮酒以见其仁，而又制燕礼以见其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207925_comment'></div>故乡饮之礼，主人拜迎宾于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1207925", 1207925, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>庠门</span>之外，至于燕，则宾入中庭，君揖，降一等而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207925_comment'></div>乡饮之礼，主人尊宾，故介犹坐于西南，而主人亲酬之，初不敢酬宾，示尊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207925_comment'></div>至于燕，主人独升立席上，西面特立，而公卿以嫌而不得为宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207925_comment'></div>君举旅于宾，凡所赐爵，则自宾以降再拜而后受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207925_comment'></div>夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1207925", 1207925, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>庠门</span>之外已远矣，而加拜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207925_comment'></div>宾至中庭已近矣，而降止于一等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207925_comment'></div>主人之于宾，至于不敢酬而酬介，则主人之礼已卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207925_comment'></div>君举旅赐爵，而宾拜而后受，则主人之礼已重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207925_comment'></div>是何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207925_comment'></div>盖乡饮之礼，所以正长幼之序，故宾者众之所尊，而以齿命其众者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207925_comment'></div>而主人者，乡之大夫，与夫党正之属，故方其率众以明长幼之序，则使民尚齿而知贵贱有所不行，故一以尽仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207925_comment'></div>而燕礼所以明君臣之分，君为主人，而大夫为之宾，故将辨尊卑之分，则使民尊尊，而知长幼之齿有所不序，故一以尽义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207925_comment'></div>故礼者，节文仁义而行之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207925_comment'></div>夫仁义之道本于心，待礼而后见于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207925_comment'></div>而君子之于仁义，其行之或过，而众人之于仁义，往往不及，非礼不足以取中焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207925_comment'></div>故乡饮燕礼，节文仁义而裁之于中者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207925_comment'></div>故礼也，仁义也，吾未见亡一而可行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207925_comment'></div>夫乡饮酒之礼，主人坐于东南，而坐宾于西北，主人处仁而宾处义，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207925_comment'></div>盖党正属民饮酒，于序，则其主人之所与为宾者，众之所尊而贤有德者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207925_comment'></div>夫将明长幼之道，则众之所尊而贤有德者，其于众也，有教诲之义焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207925_comment'></div>故五十者立侍以听政役，则幼之于长，有奉令承教之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207925_comment'></div>夫惟长有教诲之义，则其道主严，而以齐众出令为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207925_comment'></div>夫齐众出令而其道主教者，义之事也，此宾之所以坐于西北也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207925_comment'></div>故父道主义，为其尊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207925_comment'></div>古者诸侯之射，必先行燕礼，卿大夫士之射，必先行乡饮酒之礼，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207925_comment'></div>夫先王之为礼，其升降之数，俯仰之节，为已详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207925_comment'></div>然至于宗庙之中，习之安而用之便者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207925_comment'></div>为其有渐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207925_comment'></div>故鲁人将有事于上帝，必先有事于頖宫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207925_comment'></div>晋人将有事于河，必先有事于恶池；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207925_comment'></div>齐人将有事于泰山，必先有事于配林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207925_comment'></div>将重其大，必习其小；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207925_comment'></div>将为其难，必为其易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207925_comment'></div>故其心佚而不乱，其体安而不愕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207925_comment'></div>诸侯之射，以狸首为节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207925_comment'></div>狸首者，乐会时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207925_comment'></div>夫会时者，谨朝觐，修会盟，勤燕享，不敢失时者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207925_comment'></div>故其将射也，必先习燕礼以明尊卑之序，而会时者，明尊卑之序也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207925_comment'></div>卿大夫以《采蘋》为节，而主于循法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207925_comment'></div>士以《采蘩》为节，而主于不失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207925_comment'></div>夫循法度，不失职，则其道近在于一身，而乡饮之礼，主于明长幼，而未及夫大者焉，故必先习乡饮者，其道当然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207925_comment'></div>诸侯之道，君道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207925_comment'></div>君道尊，故其射也，主于正尊卑而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207925_comment'></div>卿大夫士之道，臣道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207925_comment'></div>臣道众，故其射也，有乡人长幼之序焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207925_comment'></div>此其诸侯所以先燕礼，而卿大夫士所以先乡饮欤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1207925_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207926' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207926' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207926?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207926_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207926'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207926'>昔者孔子以为知禘之说，则其于治天下也如指掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207926_comment'></div>盖尝求其说，以为禘者祭之一名，而笾豆之事，则有司存而不能通之于治国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207926_comment'></div>盖尝思之，以为天下之所以不治者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207926_comment'></div>毋乃起于贵贱之不明欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207926_comment'></div>亲爱之不笃欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207926_comment'></div>器用之无制欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207926_comment'></div>衣服之无别欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207926_comment'></div>贤不肖之失序欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207926_comment'></div>五者不至而其国欲治者，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207926_comment'></div>今夫郊社之于上帝也，宗庙之于先君也，则夫向之尊卑、亲爱、器用、衣服、贤不肖之序，盖已并立而修饬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207926_comment'></div>上自王公大人，而下达于里闾之际，贵者亲其事而行之于身，贱者承其风而被之于政，则治天下之能事毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207926_comment'></div>此君子所以重禘之说，而又以为明乎郊社之礼、禘尝之义，则治国其如示诸掌者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207926_comment'></div>夫百神之祀，自郊丘而达于七祀，均为礼也，而莫重于郊社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207926_comment'></div>宗庙之祭，自禘祫而达于时荐，均为祭也，而莫隆于禘尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207926_comment'></div>故举郊社、禘尝则小者兼之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207926_comment'></div>夫天子之于天下，其礼无所降矣，而于享帝也，有君臣之义焉，故曰尊天而亲地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207926_comment'></div>夫宗庙之享，水陆之产苟可荐者，莫不咸在，而为之宫室之美、车服之盛，而至于享帝，则三献爓，一献熟，因地以为之丘，陶匏以象其性，玄酒以享，大辂以载，大裘以服，此疑于略矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207926_comment'></div>此其说何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207926_comment'></div>夫郊之享帝，臣之于君，非礼不敢见也，故时至然后会，非法不敢贡也，故合礼然后献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207926_comment'></div>俯仰进退于朝廷之间者，莫非礼也，故尊而不敢亵，简而不敢渎，此享帝之所以疑于略欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207926_comment'></div>宗庙之祭，则子之于父也，孙之于祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207926_comment'></div>夫事亲之道，其见也无时，其献也无节，志于和而无事于简，主于悦而不嫌于渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207926_comment'></div>此宗庙之祭所以虽降于上帝，反疑于重欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207926_comment'></div>盖尊尊之道以简，而亲亲之礼以丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207926_comment'></div>故享帝于郊，而贵贱之位别矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207926_comment'></div>虽然，别贵贱者非独如此而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207926_comment'></div>宗庙之中以爵为位，而宗人受事以官，尸之馀，君与卿馂之，卿之馀，大夫馂之，大夫之馀，士馂之，而后煇、庖、翟、阍无不沾泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207926_comment'></div>夫馂，祭之末也，而尊卑之别如此，此贵贱之所以别也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207926_comment'></div>夫追远之礼，至于七庙，而祭祀之典，行于四时，以事死如事生，事亡如事存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207926_comment'></div>割牲，贱事也，行之于君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207926_comment'></div>执盎，末役也，而从之于夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207926_comment'></div>冕而总干，率其群臣，以乐皇尸，而不嫌于卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207926_comment'></div>盖其始也，斋戒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1207926", 1207926, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>谨洁</span>，而庶几见其声音笑语之容，而其祭之也，与尸酢酬，而求象其平日饮食之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207926_comment'></div>此亲爱之所由笃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207926_comment'></div>事帝之器，不陈于庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207926_comment'></div>事死之礼，不行于郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207926_comment'></div>尊之用牺象也，罍之用山也，郁尊之用黄目也，灌之用玉瓒大圭也，荐之用玉豆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207926_comment'></div>歌者在上，舞者在下，先代之乐陈于廷，而四夷之乐陈于门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207926_comment'></div>此器用之别也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207926_comment'></div>大裘以祀上帝，龙衮以祀宗庙，玄端以朝日，皮弁以视朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207926_comment'></div>自天子至于士，一衣之不修，不敢用于祭，一器之不法，不敢行于庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207926_comment'></div>此衣服之别也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207926_comment'></div>古者，天子将祭，则必射田择士，其容体中于礼，其节中于乐，而中多者乃得预于祭，而否者不得预焉。<div class='inline'
