id='poem_sentence_42_1207926_comment'></div>夫射者，君子之所以观德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207926_comment'></div>夫德无形也，必有待以见于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207926_comment'></div>射者，君子之所见其德者也，故射中多之预于祭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207926_comment'></div>非射也，所以辨德也，此贤不肖之别也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207926_comment'></div>贵贱明，亲爱厚，器用设，衣服修，贤不肖别，而国不治者，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207926_comment'></div>道载于礼，而礼藏于器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207926_comment'></div>不知礼不足与言道，不知器不足与言礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207926_comment'></div>礼者自器而辨，道者先礼而明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207926_comment'></div>辨乎器，达乎礼，通乎道，而不通乎治国者，吾未之闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207926_comment'></div>故古之君，佩玉束带，趋翔旋揖于宗庙之中，而尽天下之能事者，如是而已矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1207926_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207927' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207927' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207927?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207927_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207927'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207927'>先王之制祭祀，自郊丘以逮夫七祀，莫非祭也，而尤重于禘尝，其说何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207927_comment'></div>盖其道有三焉：曰政事之节也，曰品物之盛也，曰阴阳之消长也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207927_comment'></div>夫禘，夏祭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207927_comment'></div>而夏者万物之始蕃，而于时则阳用事之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207927_comment'></div>故先王之政，凡所以顺阳之气者，禘而后颁焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207927_comment'></div>故曰古者于禘也，发爵赐服，顺阳义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207927_comment'></div>尝，秋祭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207927_comment'></div>而秋者万物之既成，而于时则阴之始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207927_comment'></div>故政之所以顺阴者，尝而后行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207927_comment'></div>故曰于尝也，出田邑，发秋政，顺阴义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207927_comment'></div>盖先王之政，一本于阴阳，而禘尝者谨阴阳之节而不敢违，候时辨物，以别天地之气者如此，所以重欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207927_comment'></div>然则春之礿也，冬之烝也，而政不预焉，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207927_comment'></div>盖春者物之始生，勾者始奋，萌者始达，而平秩东作之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207927_comment'></div>夫物始生，则阳气未盛而品物未备，而民方趋于东作之际，则趋功造事，而未可以听政役，故阳之政待夏而后行，盖夏者物盛而厥民因之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207927_comment'></div>冬则物之生穷，实者已敛而成者既收，塞向墐户，而民率其妇子以入室备寒之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207927_comment'></div>夫物生已穷，则非所以备财用，而民既息，则非所以听政役，故凡政之所以顺阴气者，方秋而行之矣，而秋者万物始成，而厥民夷之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207927_comment'></div>盖古者尝祭未行，则未发秋政，未发政则民勿敢艾，其谨之如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207927_comment'></div>此所谓政事之节也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207927_comment'></div>夫物之于春也始生，而于夏也始盛，成于秋而穷于冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207927_comment'></div>既盛则备于初生，而已穷则阙于始成，故禘也，尝也，万物盛多之际也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207927_comment'></div>万物盛多则品物备，故禘尝之祭，备物之享也，此禘尝之所以为重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207927_comment'></div>夫先王之于祭也，诚而已，何贵于品物之盛也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207927_comment'></div>祭之俭也，非先王之欲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207927_comment'></div>夫玉瓒而大圭，玉豆而雕俎，斋明以临之，盛服以行之，水陆之品苟可荐者无不咸在，此先王之所以事宗庙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207927_comment'></div>故天子之特礿也而废祫也，为夫物之未成而礼不备故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207927_comment'></div>礼不备则不敢用祫，则品物之重也久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207927_comment'></div>盖物者，诚之表；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207927_comment'></div>诚者，物之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207927_comment'></div>物备而诚不至者有之矣，未有诚至而物不备者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207927_comment'></div>夫祀上帝之简也，非先王之啬也，以为无物可称，而不敢近于亵，是亦诚之尽于己矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207927_comment'></div>所谓禘尝者，品物之盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207927_comment'></div>夫先王之于阴阳也，阳庆其成，而阴恶其盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207927_comment'></div>禘，夏也，于时则阳之成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207927_comment'></div>尝，秋也，于时则阴未至于盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207927_comment'></div>礿之于春也，则阳方作而未成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207927_comment'></div>烝之于冬也，则阴已穷而既盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207927_comment'></div>故禘尝之祭，阳之成也，而阴之微也，是以先王重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207927_comment'></div>此所谓阴阳之消长也，有是三者，则先王之所以重慎而不敢易之于常祭也，不亦宜乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207927_comment'></div>夫天子祫禘、祫尝、祫烝，诸侯尝祫、烝祫，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207927_comment'></div>夫祫，丧毕之祭也，而礿、禘、烝尝者，四时之祭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207927_comment'></div>天子先祫而后时祭，诸侯先时祭而后祫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207927_comment'></div>丧毕之祭无常时，而四时之祭有定法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207927_comment'></div>无常时者近私，有定制者近公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207927_comment'></div>天子制法者也，故先所私，而后法则无嫌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207927_comment'></div>诸侯从上者也，故先定法而后行其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207927_comment'></div>此所谓君臣之道也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1207927_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207928' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207928' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207928?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207928_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207928'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207928'>古之养世子而教之学，与夫凡学于国之学，何其有序而不乱也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207928_comment'></div>盖其学有常位，其习有常时，其教有常职，其礼有常法，四者立而后学之道备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207928_comment'></div>盖所谓其学有常位者，其别有四：曰东序也，曰瞽宗也，曰上庠也，曰成均也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207928_comment'></div>所谓东序者，夏后氏之学，而其事有九：一曰学干戈，二曰学羽籥，三曰养老，四曰合语，五曰授数，六曰论说，七曰傧宾，八曰释奠于先老，九曰养老幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207928_comment'></div>所谓瞽宗者，商之学也，其事止于学礼而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207928_comment'></div>所谓上庠者，有虞氏之学也，其事止于读书而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207928_comment'></div>所谓成均，五帝学也，其事则郊人取爵于上尊而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207928_comment'></div>夫备三代之学，而夏后氏之学，其事独众于有虞、商人之学，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207928_comment'></div>盖凡学于东序者，乐舞养老之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207928_comment'></div>夫乐舞养老之事，圣人之所贵，而其道主仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207928_comment'></div>东序在王宫之左，而其位则仁之方也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207928_comment'></div>此其比于二代之学，其事为众欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207928_comment'></div>夫书者，观言以取训；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207928_comment'></div>而习礼者，勤事以正容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207928_comment'></div>夫观言以取训，远道也，而三代之学莫远于虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207928_comment'></div>故读书于上庠，勤事以正容，近道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207928_comment'></div>而商人于周为最近，故习礼于瞽宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207928_comment'></div>盖成均者，意其虞氏之前也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207928_comment'></div>夫时远则制略，制略则事卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207928_comment'></div>盖所谓郊人者，既远之而在郊矣，故不得与于上庠、瞽宗、东序之事，然独至于天子饮酒于成均，然后始得酌于上尊，此不亦时远而制略，制略而事卑乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207928_comment'></div>此所谓其学有常位也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207928_comment'></div>其习有常时者，其别有九：一曰干，二曰戈，三曰羽，四曰籥，五曰南，六曰诵，七曰傧，八曰礼，九曰书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207928_comment'></div>所谓学干者，小乐正主之，而大胥赞之，而大乐正授数焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207928_comment'></div>至于学戈也，籥师主之，而籥师丞赞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207928_comment'></div>至于羽籥，则其主之无官，其赞之无助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207928_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207928_comment'></div>盖舞羽近于学干，则知舞羽之官，亦乐正与大胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207928_comment'></div>而学戈之官，固已能吹籥，则知学籥之官，是亦籥师、籥师丞而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207928_comment'></div>夫南夷之乐也，而陈于学，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207928_comment'></div>盖四夷之俗，皆有安居、和味、宜服、利用、备器，陈之于学者，学之所知博而不厌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207928_comment'></div>凡学之时，施于春夏者四：有通而习之者，干戈是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207928_comment'></div>有别而习之者，春诵夏弦是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207928_comment'></div>施于秋冬者四：有通而习之者，羽籥是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207928_comment'></div>有别而习之者，秋学礼、冬读书是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207928_comment'></div>春夏者，物盛而形显之时也，而干戈之舞形之盛也，故春夏习之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207928_comment'></div>诵与弦均为声也，而诵者人声，而弦资于器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207928_comment'></div>人声者，先王之所贵，故先诵而器次之焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207928_comment'></div>秋冬者，万物数穷形歛而体伏之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207928_comment'></div>羽舞者主于振作，而吹籥者羽声而已，故于秋冬习之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207928_comment'></div>秋习礼而冬读书，均为事也，而习礼者俯仰折旋，劳于外而后能习，于冬则寒而大苦，故于秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207928_comment'></div>冬者，人入室以居，而无事之时也，故使之读书焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207928_comment'></div>安于身，合乎时，中乎义，习焉而不困，久焉而不堕者，用此道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207928_comment'></div>盖所谓其习有常时者此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207928_comment'></div>其教有常职者，其官有十三：曰太傅，曰少傅，曰保，曰师，曰大司成，曰大乐正，曰小乐正，曰大胥，曰胥，曰执礼者，曰典书者，曰籥师，曰籥师丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207928_comment'></div>所谓太傅、少傅与夫师与保四者，以道德为职者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207928_comment'></div>而太傅之职无所系，不以教率，不以言喻，故曰审父子君臣之道以示之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207928_comment'></div>少傅则教以率之，言以告之，故曰审喻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207928_comment'></div>师也则教之以事而喻诸德，保也则慎其身以辅翼之而归诸道，则二者其职已劳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207928_comment'></div>其德有小大，故官有劳佚，以心治者其官逸，而以事诏者其任劳，此其理然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207928_comment'></div>至所谓大司成者，论说在东序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207928_comment'></div>又曰凡侍坐于大司成者，远近间三席，可以问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207928_comment'></div>则大司成者，主乐之教者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207928_comment'></div>所谓大乐正者，舞干戚，语说、合语、乞言，皆大乐正授数于大司成之教，而喻诸其下者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207928_comment'></div>所谓小乐正者，凡祭与养老、乞言、合语之礼，而诏之于东序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207928_comment'></div>则小乐正者，授数于大乐正，而喻诸其下者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207928_comment'></div>所谓大胥者，小乐正学干，则大胥赞之，盖辅小乐正之事而为佐者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207928_comment'></div>所谓胥者，大胥之佐也，故鼓南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207928_comment'></div>盖其职已卑矣，主节夷乐而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207928_comment'></div>所谓执礼者、典书者、籥师与其丞，其职虽不备见，然考其事，则皆供职效役以承其上者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207928_comment'></div>此治学之常职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207928_comment'></div>所谓其礼有常法者，其别有十：所谓立学而释奠于先师，一也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207928_comment'></div>春夏秋冬而释奠于先师，二也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207928_comment'></div>天子视学而祭先师，三也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207928_comment'></div>释奠先老于东序，四也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207928_comment'></div>释菜，五也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207928_comment'></div>大合乐，六也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207928_comment'></div>养老，七也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207928_comment'></div>合语，八也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207928_comment'></div>论说，九也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207928_comment'></div>乞言，十也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207928_comment'></div>立学而奠，示有祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207928_comment'></div>时而祭之，示不敢忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207928_comment'></div>天子视学而亲祭，示尊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207928_comment'></div>释奠于先老，示己所有事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207928_comment'></div>大合乐而后养老，始立学，既具器而后释菜，告成而不敢尊也，习而后行礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207928_comment'></div>小乐正合语为未足，故大司成论说之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207928_comment'></div>以论说为未足，故乞言于老者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207928_comment'></div>此所谓其礼有常法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207928_comment'></div>凡此者，先王教学之道也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1207928_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论敦俗。姑系于此。作品：《敦俗论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷37（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207929' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207929' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207929?labeling=true' target='_blank'>敦俗论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207929")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207929_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207929'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207929'>所谓人主之利势者，惟其能供天下之所求，而我无所求于人，故能奔走天下，使其进退取舍莫不在我，而天下之人虽欲去之而不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207929_comment'></div>盖惟其能贵，故天下之贱者尊之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207929_comment'></div>惟其能富，故天下之贫者宗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207929_comment'></div>使之脱然舍去斯二者，则天下之人，谁肯以区区之名而役之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207929_comment'></div>故富与贵者，人君操之以用其下者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207929_comment'></div>虽然，天下之利，惟富贵而后可为，则先王之治，宜其隆势利，重权位，使其民惟富贵之知，而见其己之尊严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207929_comment'></div>然其率天下也，何其退约廉逊，教其民务为安贫乐贱之事，而深抑好争务胜之心者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207929_comment'></div>夫天下之人，不可使求为利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207929_comment'></div>夫使天下之人惟利之为求，则大者篡，小者叛，惟其得之而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207929_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207929_comment'></div>使人皆欲得其上之所乐，则将日仇其上而夺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207929_comment'></div>夫如是，则吾之立于天下之上，不亦甚殆哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207929_comment'></div>是故先王思所以长享富贵之利，求其安而无乱、服而无争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207929_comment'></div>是故为是廉耻冲退之道，使之轻禄位而贱权势，而惟仁义之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207929_comment'></div>公卿之爵，人之所欲也，然三逊而后受；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207929_comment'></div>万钟之禄，人之所甚贪也，然无名而不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207929_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207929_comment'></div>使天下之人，皆仁义之人耶，则吾捐国而与之，有不受者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207929_comment'></div>三代之历年，后世莫及，而考其教化风俗之美、诗书之所载，后世亦无有继之者，然则其效可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207929_comment'></div>予尝悲夫自圣人之亡，后世之治天下者不明乎此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207929_comment'></div>开功名权利之门以诱天下，而使其民汲汲然惟利之知，而幸其区区之功利，尚功而贱德，贵才而废道，奖胜而羞退，进位而卑齿，故天下始嚣然皆有乐富好贵之心，而不安其分，反顾其贫贱而恶之，而日思其所以去之之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207929_comment'></div>夫惟人恶其贫贱而求去之，而天下之乱起矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207929_comment'></div>故后世之所谓利其国而自安者，未始不亡其国而自危也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207929_comment'></div>昔者，秦之俗盖若此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207929_comment'></div>方其疾战不顾以取诸侯也，使其人惟攻战争夺之为求，故秦之民皆忘其上而利其身，功成战克，而后天下之人移其胜敌之志为仇君之心，盖其平日之所养，耳目之所习，有以使之而无足怪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207929_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207929_comment'></div>争之不可启也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207929_comment'></div>养虎之肉，不敢全而生委之，惧其决裂以动其怒，而况持争具而授之欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207929_comment'></div>夫先王之道，其始若钝而后能利，其始若迂而效最切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207929_comment'></div>老子曰：「非以其无私耶，故能成其私」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207929_comment'></div>夫成其私而惟私之求，则天下去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207929_comment'></div>夫惟公以得天下之情者，天下之所归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207929_comment'></div>天下之所归，而有不能得其所欲者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207929_comment'></div>盖梁惠王问孟子以利，而孟子对以仁义，其说以为上下交征利而国危，又曰：「未有仁而遗其亲，未有义而后其君者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207929_comment'></div>利非危国，而其极至于国危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207929_comment'></div>仁义者，若非所以自利也，而其效也，使人不敢遗而后之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207929_comment'></div>则圣人之所以安其身者，岂匹夫匹妇之浅道欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207929_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207929_comment'></div>孟子可谓知利之实矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1207929_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论法制。姑系于此。作品：《法制论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷37（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207930' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207930' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207930?labeling=true' target='_blank'>法制论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207930")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207930_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207930'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207930'>昔者圣人之立法，告天下以其意而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207930_comment'></div>故常立其大防，而其节目委曲所以施于事者，听夫人之自为，而不必其一切先立于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207930_comment'></div>是故法立而意行，意行而利至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207930_comment'></div>盖天下之事，繁细琐屑，其情状万变，故不可以一致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207930_comment'></div>以吾一人区区之聪明，而先为之经画于此，而使之一从于我，则事将有格而不得成者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207930_comment'></div>夫其势不可以有成，而必求行焉，则物有受其弊者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207930_comment'></div>天下之法常坏于此，而世之惑者未之或知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207930_comment'></div>今夫世之教战者，其为行列什伍，亦不过数者而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207930_comment'></div>彼岂不欲尽欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207930_comment'></div>势有所不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207930_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207930_comment'></div>敌人之智，百出而不可测，而我安能委曲而预测之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207930_comment'></div>必曰必如是而后胜，如是而后败，其委曲琐屑，一切先为之所，使无顾于敌者之何如，而惟我之为听，夫如是，则必败而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207930_comment'></div>善教人者，晓之以其道，而不示以其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207930_comment'></div>故告天下使无违吾意，则其委曲琐屑，虽小不尽，而吾之意犹在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207930_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207930_comment'></div>三代之圣人，其聪明睿智足以深见天下之赜隐，然其制法也，亦何以异于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207930_comment'></div>欲均天下之田，而为之井田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207930_comment'></div>欲分天下之地，而为之诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207930_comment'></div>九夫为井，人得百亩而耕之，使夫大之不得以兼小，强之不得以并弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207930_comment'></div>而后又为沟洫之制，自一夫而积之，至于万夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207930_comment'></div>公之地方五百里，而男之地方百里，使之大小有序，而又列为九服之远近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207930_comment'></div>夫分田建国之法，如是而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207930_comment'></div>夫天下之地，高卑之不齐，广狭之不一，水泉畎亩之差殊，与夫名山大川、污池薮泽之地当居十五，则亦安能较然如画于一枰之上哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207930_comment'></div>彼圣人之法，不为之纤委琐屑以尽之，而特设其大端而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207930_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207930_comment'></div>盖圣人之告天下者，特其意而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207930_comment'></div>当是时，公卿凡当其职者，皆得出其智以尽天下之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207930_comment'></div>因规而为之规，因矩而为之矩，使之各称其宜而不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207930_comment'></div>是以天子恭己优游于上，而所以均齐天下之理，亦莫不如意，而天下安享其利，人人皆得措手足于其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207930_comment'></div>初若莫可依据，而吾之法卒立乎天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207930_comment'></div>此先王之所以有所动作而天下乐之，虽天下之大事而为之无难者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207930_comment'></div>不善为法者则不然，穷析天下之理于一身之聪明，恃区区目前之智而断万里未来之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207930_comment'></div>故其法不患于不详，而天下卒不能行，而不知其患乃出于好详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207930_comment'></div>是故善用兵者，有违法无违意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207930_comment'></div>不善用者，有违意无违法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207930_comment'></div>法可违也，意不可违也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207930_comment'></div>夫天下之情，常乐于有所为，而困于龃龉而不得放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207930_comment'></div>夫使人人足以自致，而其终不失吾之所欲，则亦足矣，何必区区使之从我而后可也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1207930_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论用大之术。姑系于此。作品：《用大论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷37（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207931' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207931' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207931?labeling=true' target='_blank'>用大论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207931")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207931_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207931'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207931'>能用大而后能治天下，而用大之术为最难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207931_comment'></div>夫惟有所不治，而后能用大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207931_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207931_comment'></div>治天下者莫若立法，有所不治而后法立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207931_comment'></div>屦人之为屦也，非量国人之足而为之也，度其中而为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207931_comment'></div>夫一国之足，虽不能尽合于吾屦，而中者居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207931_comment'></div>故虽不知国人之足，而吾不失鬻屦之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207931_comment'></div>必将人人而较之，则吾之为工，不亦甚劳，而长短小大之差，要之不可尽得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207931_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207931_comment'></div>使吾之为屦，足以半国之人足矣，虽有所遗而何害吾之大利哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207931_comment'></div>通此说者，其知用大乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207931_comment'></div>夫立法以治天下者，而吾之法果足以尽天下之理，包罗笼络，使天下之智巧不足以用其奸乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207931_comment'></div>吾知其必不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207931_comment'></div>夏后氏之为忠也，使禹不知后世之将野，则禹不智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207931_comment'></div>知而为之，是禹亦无如之何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207931_comment'></div>商之质、周之文亦犹是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207931_comment'></div>夫以圣人之智，犹有所屈于事物之变，则立法以求尽天下之理，吾知圣人有所不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207931_comment'></div>故立法于此，足以通天下之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207931_comment'></div>至于聪明之不及，思虑之所难测，出于人情之外者，吾有所不治也，而吾之法立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207931_comment'></div>且吾之法果何为而起欤，无乃出于天下之大情、万物之常理耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207931_comment'></div>嗜脍炙者百人，而恶之者一人，脍炙之美未害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207931_comment'></div>使吾法足以当国人之十九，则吾之利多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207931_comment'></div>其所不及焉，吾可以无恤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207931_comment'></div>非不欲恤也，势不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207931_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207931_comment'></div>自尧舜三代以来，更数圣人，其讲天下之法亦详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207931_comment'></div>然后世可考者，如井田、封建、车徒之制，亦不过为大法而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207931_comment'></div>世之惑者，徒见其为法之略，以为不可施于事，而不知圣人示之大法，不以臆度之区区而预尽天下之委曲，苟有不合，亦付之人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207931_comment'></div>一丝之不齐，无害其为裘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207931_comment'></div>一粒之不精，无害其为食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207931_comment'></div>故曰：有所不治，而后法立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207931_comment'></div>传曰：小有所治者，大有所失；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207931_comment'></div>近有所遗者，远有所包。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207931_comment'></div>此达于治体之论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207931_comment'></div>或曰：量国人之足而为屦，不畏劳者能之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207931_comment'></div>尽天下之情以立法，不厌详者能之，吾未见其不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207931_comment'></div>应之曰：非劳与详之避也，国人之足可以尽量，天下之情可以尽得，虽费吾终身之力而为之，何惮焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207931_comment'></div>吾知决不可为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207931_comment'></div>吾不若从其逸，而择夫为利者为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207931_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207931_comment'></div>何至屑屑然语治天下之劳哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207931_comment'></div>知所以立法，而后知用大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207931_comment'></div>知用大，而后能不出户而天下无遗虑矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1207931_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论悯刑。姑系于此。作品：《悯刑论上》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷37（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《悯刑论下》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷37（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207932' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207932' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207932?labeling=true' target='_blank'>悯刑论<span class='inlineComment2'>（上）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207932")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207932_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207932'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207932'>昔者先王之时，议事以制不为刑辟者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207932_comment'></div>夫天下之情无穷，而刑之所治有极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207932_comment'></div>使天下之吏操有限之法，以治无穷之情，而不得少议于其中，而惟法之知，则天下之情，无乃一枉于法而失其实欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207932_comment'></div>是以先王之时，一权诸人而不任法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207932_comment'></div>是故使法出于人，而不使人出于法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207932_comment'></div>至于后世其所以治天下之具，不能如先王之盛时，淳厚之德衰，而吏有率私以立法，恃其无法而放肆者，故后始有刑法之书以治天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207932_comment'></div>然天下之弊，虽不可以不救，而天下之情，不可枉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207932_comment'></div>是故法简网疏，而人与法两立而不偏废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207932_comment'></div>穆王之刑，以为轻重诸罚有权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207932_comment'></div>夫五刑之属止于三千者，法之所不可移，惟其轻重之间有所谓权者，是故犹不废行法者之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207932_comment'></div>方是时，罪入于法之内则归之法，罪出于法之外则归之权，虽不如先王之盛时，而天下犹未受其弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207932_comment'></div>呜呼，奈何一归之法而不任人也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207932_comment'></div>自秦汉以来，治天下之具苟且灭裂，务使天下为不可欺，而待天下之吏，以为不可使少行其意也，故一切任法而废人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207932_comment'></div>予尝悲夫后世任法之弊也，盖其弊非独法不足以尽其情，而其极乃至于变其情而合诸法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207932_comment'></div>盖罪无定而易移，法有限而难动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207932_comment'></div>故罪轻而法重也，不幸无轻刑以处之，则有入之重者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207932_comment'></div>罪重而刑轻，不幸无重刑以当之，则有出之轻者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207932_comment'></div>变罪而附法，失情而合文，不畏情之不尽，而虑法之不合，盖其间有所谓疑虑而上诸有司者，十不过一二而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207932_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207932_comment'></div>任法以治天下，而天下无正刑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207932_comment'></div>予尝推其原而后悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207932_comment'></div>夫天下之事，未始不自夫贤不肖始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207932_comment'></div>先王之时，天下之事简肃而精修，其人才皆足以过绝天下，而上有圣哲之绝德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207932_comment'></div>故尧舜之际与夫三代之盛时，至于鸟兽之无情，阴阳之不可测，而人之才智皆能为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207932_comment'></div>故其后有豢龙御龙之官，而四时之官皆能候天地之气，导驭其节而制其和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207932_comment'></div>由是言之，则人之所以深思极虑以治事赴功者何如哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207932_comment'></div>自圣人之亡，其后世比于先王之盛固已少减，而天下之事日以烦乱，诡伪生于其中，而信厚之德薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207932_comment'></div>人之贤者不及于先王之时，而间之以不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207932_comment'></div>至于近古，而任人之道盖已大坏，贤不肖混乱而不可知，天下之事日以废缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207932_comment'></div>夫惟得如先王之时，故可以舍法而不任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207932_comment'></div>而贤不肖之相半也，故人与法并行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207932_comment'></div>后世非无贤，而要以不可知，故一归之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207932_comment'></div>推其原，求其本，则法之弊盖出于人之弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207932_comment'></div>夫惟能隆任人之术，详于择人，而后法可以少简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207932_comment'></div>姑无望其不为刑辟人与法并行者，可庶几矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1207932_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207933' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207933' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207933?labeling=true' target='_blank'>悯刑论<span class='inlineComment2'>（下）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207933")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207933_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207933'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207933'>立法以纠天下之过者，必欲天下行之而不敢逆，然而常至于沮而不行者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207933_comment'></div>是其立法非人之情故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207933_comment'></div>何谓非人之情？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207933_comment'></div>夫天下之所共恶者，而时轻之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207933_comment'></div>天下之所共恕者，而时重之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207933_comment'></div>不当恕而强为之仁，不必恶而过为之罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207933_comment'></div>凡此者，天下之情所不安者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207933_comment'></div>今夫天下之情，有极狠恶而不逞，举国皆恶之者，幸而入于刑，而考于法则轻，而不足以惩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207933_comment'></div>则夫行法者，必有不平之心，故必入而处之于重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207933_comment'></div>夫如是，则是好为轻者之有所不行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207933_comment'></div>夫人固有不幸而入于刑者，有诚犯而其心无他者，不幸而遇刑，而考于法则重，则行法者必有不忍之心焉，是故有出而置之轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207933_comment'></div>夫如是，则好为重者之有所不行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207933_comment'></div>昔者圣人之于天下，其言无不听，其令无不信，然卒不可变者，天下之好恶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207933_comment'></div>惟其然，故天下之所恶者，圣人不强恕以为仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207933_comment'></div>天下之所哀者，圣人之不深治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207933_comment'></div>故法立而天下安之，传之后世，久而不敢易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207933_comment'></div>夫犯天下之所恶，而吾报之以所恶，当天下之所恕，而吾宽之以所欲，则天下之吏，虽不知吾法之所为，而人固已阴服之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207933_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207933_comment'></div>吾之法因彼之情故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207933_comment'></div>故欲吾之法立于天下者，莫若原天下之情而无所出入，使天下无不乐之心而后可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207933_comment'></div>后之惑者，不深求先王之意，而求夫恩威之名而不究其实，以为恩主于贷，而有罪者舍之以为恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207933_comment'></div>思有所禁，则小过者刑之以为威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207933_comment'></div>行之者不快，而被之者不服，则何怪乎吾法之不立哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207933_comment'></div>或曰吾之法过于威耶，则不惟行吾法者有不乐于其心，而固取乱于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207933_comment'></div>使过于轻耶，民将怀我，彼行吾法者之不快，是何足怪也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207933_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207933_comment'></div>是大不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207933_comment'></div>天下之情，自顾其所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207933_comment'></div>诚有拂于人而人不加怒，彼固以为可欺，而罔人之心至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207933_comment'></div>故人之不察其过而知德者，君子也，尚何怀之有哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207933_comment'></div>夫治天下者，何必苟为惠以謟天下之情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207933_comment'></div>杀之而当其罪，虽曰杀，而天下悦服矣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207933_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1207933'>为：原脱，据郝本、《文粹》补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1207933_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207933'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_1207933_0'>⑴ 《柯山集》卷三四。又见《苏门六君子文粹》卷二，《圣宋文选》卷二五，《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷二六。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1207933_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论驭相。姑系于此。作品：《驭相论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷37（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207934' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207934' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207934?labeling=true' target='_blank'>驭相论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207934")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207934_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207934'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207934'>天子能使天下之权在宰相，而进退宰相之权在天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207934_comment'></div>夫如是者，可谓知驭相矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207934_comment'></div>夫天子之所以必尊宰相者，非以私宰相也，而其势乃所以自尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207934_comment'></div>今以天子之辅相，左右朝夕之所接以取谋，而使天下之人有轻之之心，则天子之势亦卑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207934_comment'></div>夫人之情，涉江河而畏险，则终身不敢行海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207934_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207934_comment'></div>彼以为江河为可畏，而况于海乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207934_comment'></div>彼且以为宰相为不可慢，而况其君乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207934_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207934_comment'></div>又非特如此也，使天子之力足以办天下之事，则何所俟于相？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207934_comment'></div>以为吾不能独治也，而后择相而委之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207934_comment'></div>委人以事而夺之权，犹为不任而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207934_comment'></div>故必使之可取可舍，可赏可罚，舍吾疑之之心，而使少行其意，而后彼得以有尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207934_comment'></div>夫如是，故不幸而有过，吾有以责之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207934_comment'></div>夫使宰相之势无以异于群有司，必使之一听于我而后可，则彼有罪而吾将无以责之，彼且有以藉其口矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207934_comment'></div>故曰宰相不可以无权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207934_comment'></div>夫与人以权者，必使之，其利在我，以为与尔以权者，凡以为我也斯可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207934_comment'></div>使窃吾权以据之，久而不还，以为己私利，则吾将折而受制，此天下之大患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207934_comment'></div>今夫世之畜犬与鹰者，方其逐禽于野，则必解羁弛禁，纵之而不制，然至不顺而害人，则吾必能制其命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207934_comment'></div>夫纵之而不足以收之，则几何其不为患也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207934_comment'></div>诚得天下之至贤，如伊尹、周公、霍光、孔明之徒，不以天下易匹夫之命者而任之，则何所复求？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207934_comment'></div>然天下之贤不可以常得，而吾之任人，或以才而忘其污，或以功而舍其素，未必皆天下之至贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207934_comment'></div>夫使擅天下之权于掌握之间，而吾无以制之，而望其不乱，其庸可得乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207934_comment'></div>故古之待大臣者，天子为之尽恭致礼，而至其有罪则不恕，有杀而无罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207934_comment'></div>夫惟君致礼，则宰相尊，至有罪而不恕也，此所以为天子之权欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207934_comment'></div>故曰必使进退之权在天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207934_comment'></div>曹操、司马懿父子，初不过能窃天子之权，攻伐出处，放意恣行而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207934_comment'></div>而汉魏之主，惟其无有以制之，是故养其势，固其身，而卒盗其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207934_comment'></div>若唐德宗，则疑宰相而不任，惩奸臣之弊而谓天下之人举不可信，乃一切自用其聪明，当时宰相，奉行文书而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207934_comment'></div>故当是时，藩臣有轻朝廷之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207934_comment'></div>彼一人之聪明，而当天下之亹亹，则数见其所穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207934_comment'></div>而左右大臣皆有苟且之志，而无出力死难之意，则宜其陵犯而无忌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207934_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207934_comment'></div>与人以权，而我不能收，汉魏之主是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207934_comment'></div>畏权之去我，而夺人之职者，唐德宗是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207934_comment'></div>是二者皆过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207934_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207934_comment'></div>天下之事，不可以无术也，而驭臣为最难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207934_comment'></div>或者不知其故，以为先王之时，一本于忠信而无术，不亦缪乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207934_comment'></div>夫坤之道，臣道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207934_comment'></div>而象为马，吾未见马之可以亡驭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207934_comment'></div>驭之以术，何害于忠信耶？</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1207934_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作论秦文。姑系于此。作品：《秦论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷38（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207935' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207935' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207935?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秦论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207935")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207935_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207935'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207935'>贾生论秦曰：「仁义不施，而攻守之势异也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207935_comment'></div>世以为确论，予独谓之不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207935_comment'></div>夫攻守殊而事相关，异施设而同利害，其守之安危，观其攻之善恶，其报应如表影声响之不差也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207935_comment'></div>譬如人之殖产也，耕我之田，尽力以事之，岁收千石，封之仓廪而食之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207935_comment'></div>贾百金之货于邻国，而赢千金焉，邻里不我怨，有司不我罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207935_comment'></div>如是乃安坐享其福，而贻之子孙，则安乐而无后患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207935_comment'></div>今有人侵人之田，夺人之产，又杀人于道而夺之金，如是乃欲封之仓廪，藏之厩库，而守之以君子长者之事，怨仇百作，而披攘之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207935_comment'></div>故如是而取之，必如是而失之，安有以盗贼所以取之，而能以君子之道守之欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207935_comment'></div>秦明法力征以经营天下，且数世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207935_comment'></div>至于始皇之时，六国大抵皆消沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207935_comment'></div>始灭韩，后灭齐，大率十年间耳，皆灭人之国，虏人之君，其毒至惨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207935_comment'></div>夫此六国诸侯者，其上世皆有功于民，又皆据国数百年，其本根深结于人心者固，一旦芟夷荡覆之，其势必不帖然而遂已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207935_comment'></div>如塞大水、伐大木，其渐渍之末流，播散之馀种，将且复涨而暴兴，不得其寂寥气尽则不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207935_comment'></div>秦虽欲反其所以取之道守之，而其机已成，其势必复矣，故秦之事不可为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207935_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207935_comment'></div>秦灭六国，不十馀年而六国并立，秦以不祀，其故岂不然欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207935_comment'></div>故贾生之论，戏论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207935_comment'></div>乐毅贤将，一战胜齐，下城七十，齐不能支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207935_comment'></div>曾未三年，七十城者翻然为齐，乃无一城为毅守者，以是失之，岂不然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207935_comment'></div>毅贤尚然，况于暴秦乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1207935_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论魏晋。姑系于此。作品：《魏晋论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷38（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207936' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207936' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207936?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏晋论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207936")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207936_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207936'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207936'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207936_comment'></div>魏晋之乱亡，其可悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207936_comment'></div>国中之人，皆恐惧服从，大盗招之而无不应，举国以与人而犹恐其不受也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207936_comment'></div>其所循致而至此者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207936_comment'></div>盖其国轻久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207936_comment'></div>夫国重者存，国轻者亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207936_comment'></div>何谓重？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207936_comment'></div>其人可以御侮，旁观者有所忌，则重矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207936_comment'></div>鳝鳣王鲔之在江湖，非不大也，然渔者徒手取之，脍之俎上而无难，曾不如蛇虺之据穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207936_comment'></div>国之轻亦犹是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207936_comment'></div>人主非不尊，公卿大臣非不畏，百司庶府非不惧，然皆庸怯和易，说之如发蒙，举之如挈虚，朝之虑不至夕，今日之智不及明日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207936_comment'></div>夫如是，国之存，大盗拱手举之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207936_comment'></div>是谓国轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207936_comment'></div>凡人臣之能为国重者，非有服天下之名节，则必有过天下之才智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207936_comment'></div>成汤既没，太甲失道，伊尹放之，可谓乱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207936_comment'></div>而诸侯不争，商卒以安者，伊尹之节天下之所不敢议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207936_comment'></div>晏子之在齐，叔向之在晋，宫之奇之在虞，诸侯不敢侮焉，此以名节为重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207936_comment'></div>齐桓公兵车徜徉天下，而诸侯不敢议其后，管仲之智未易与为敌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207936_comment'></div>郭子仪存而吐蕃罢兵，李德裕草檄而泽潞亟灭，此以才智为重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207936_comment'></div>夫天下之人，其好争未尝一日亡也，非有大愧耻于其心而不忍为，则必有大恐惧于其身而不敢为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207936_comment'></div>夫名节者，所以愧耻天下之不义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207936_comment'></div>而才略者，所以恐惧天下之好乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207936_comment'></div>舍是二者，虽圣贤无他道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207936_comment'></div>魏之亡也，司马师杀其君如屠犬马，而大臣震悸，莫敢太息，王祥、郑冲举国而与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207936_comment'></div>夫是数人者，亦知是为不义也，而不敢不听者，彼惟素无以动其国人，而又取诸其胸中而无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207936_comment'></div>晋之臣，才者先叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207936_comment'></div>王敦、桓温才过一时，卒皆不臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207936_comment'></div>刘裕才过数人者，而遂取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207936_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207936_comment'></div>国中之人莫与之敌故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207936_comment'></div>夫挟好乱之资，而顾其国莫与之敌，则取之之心生矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207936_comment'></div>故为国之患，莫大于不崇名节而消天下之精锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207936_comment'></div>彼晋之公卿朝夕从事者，非毁名节，则尚无心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207936_comment'></div>方此时，虽有有志之士，亦且去之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207936_comment'></div>此蔡谟之所以不为司徒，而曰「吾恐后世之笑也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207936_comment'></div>天下之事，有名实，不可以不辨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207936_comment'></div>轻名节者曰：「吾恶天下之矫激也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207936_comment'></div>黜才能者曰：「吾尚德也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207936_comment'></div>夫矫激者，安能真为名节也，利至则变矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207936_comment'></div>世盖有利至不回，害至不避，而可以矫激亿之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207936_comment'></div>夫如是而未免于矫激，则庸庸者而后可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207936_comment'></div>且东汉之乱，而曹操之雄至死不敢取，惟畏天下之清议故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207936_comment'></div>党锢虽弊，犹能存国，古之所谓德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207936_comment'></div>非无才之云也，才不足以言矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207936_comment'></div>传曰：「仁者必有勇，勇者不必有仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207936_comment'></div>有德者必有言，有言者不必有德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207936_comment'></div>夫言与勇，才之类也，而仁与德必能兼之，则世有无勇之仁、不能言之德乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207936_comment'></div>子产，惠人也，谓之众人之母，可谓德胜矣，然其抗晋、楚，何其勇且辩也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207936_comment'></div>夫以无所用之质，而冒之以仁义之容，文之以礼乐之言，治国而不能靖民，临难而不能却敌，而谓之有德，此固天下英雄之所侮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207936_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207936_comment'></div>为国者盍察诸此矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1207936_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作论晋文。姑系于此。作品：《晋论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷38（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207937' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207937' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207937?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晋论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207937")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207937_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207937'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207937'>天下有大分，君臣是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207937_comment'></div>夫以天下之众而事一人，考其势，较其力，则多寡异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207937_comment'></div>然天下之人，不间于贤不肖，俯首听从，莫敢或较，一有不顺，则有起而诛之者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207937_comment'></div>夫非独君臣之分为然也，自是而下之，至于一乡一邑之际，苟有尊卑大小之分者，莫不皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207937_comment'></div>夫天下之分，惟其出于父子兄弟之际者，此其天属，宜无足怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207937_comment'></div>下至于一乡一邑，而上至于君臣，是乃设为尊卑而不敢犯，何为而然也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207937_comment'></div>盖尝求之，以为天下之分，起于天下之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207937_comment'></div>夫理者，本于天地，而莫知其所从始者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207937_comment'></div>惟其理设而不可易，故分立而不可犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207937_comment'></div>夫生民之初，未有君臣以相临、官师以相治也，纷纷藉藉，以力相胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207937_comment'></div>于是民始大病之，而后有能服其党者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207937_comment'></div>夫能服一乡，则一乡尊之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207937_comment'></div>能服天下，则天下尊之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207937_comment'></div>是故君臣之分，遂立而不可变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207937_comment'></div>夫民之于君，乃其自立以自治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207937_comment'></div>夫惟其仰之以自治，是故顺命受教，俯首听从而无足怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207937_comment'></div>自是而推之，至于一乡一邑，亦犹是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207937_comment'></div>予尝悲夫晋之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207937_comment'></div>自三代以来，其国之多故者莫如晋，外有夷狄之强，内有大臣之变，泯绝荒乱，有不忍观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207937_comment'></div>然后裂为东晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207937_comment'></div>至于东晋，而晋亦微矣，然犹相与维持至十馀世，力尽势穷，陵迟百端，而刘裕乃得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207937_comment'></div>自刘元海以来，天下分为十六国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207937_comment'></div>若苻坚、石勒之徒，皆有过人之才，辟地数千里，据有甲兵士民之众，又有忠智效死之臣，其所建立，亦有足观者，然皆不过一再传而遂亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207937_comment'></div>方其兴也，宜若可以久安，至其一败，遂灭不振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207937_comment'></div>盖尝观苻坚之败于寿春，此其力犹足以善其后，然提其馀众，困穷而无所归，盖思之主于君臣之分，而后近得其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207937_comment'></div>夫晋之有天下积久，而天下之所服也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207937_comment'></div>夫惟人安于所服，故天下遂守其君臣之分而不敢犯，人人惟恐其失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207937_comment'></div>是以播迁流徙，甚弱而难灭，忠臣义士，力以救其败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207937_comment'></div>若苻、石之徒，虽兵甚强，势甚盛，然天下之情，不爱其德而恶其乱，不幸不能制，而后使得倔强于须臾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207937_comment'></div>幸其败也，则起而共亡之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207937_comment'></div>或以为君臣之分，其始出于相制，苟为君臣焉，斯有分矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207937_comment'></div>晋与夷狄，何择也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207937_comment'></div>夫天下之情，固有所习也，习而安者，众之所归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207937_comment'></div>婴儿爱其乳之者，邻人之母乳之，则不爱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207937_comment'></div>均为乳也，而爱恶存焉，习与不习故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207937_comment'></div>然则晋之初，天下固习乎魏也，而晋之不亡何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207937_comment'></div>夫晋之不亡，是幸而不至于败，而遂成其业者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207937_comment'></div>十六国之颠沛，此败于分之不正者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207937_comment'></div>惜哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1207937_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作论唐文。姑系于此。作品：《唐论上》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷38（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《唐论中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷38（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《唐论下》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷38（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207938' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207938' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207938?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐论<span class='inlineComment2'>（上）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207938")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207938_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207938'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207938'>昔者天下之事，常患于不得已而为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207938_comment'></div>夫事至于不得已而为者，非其心之所乐，而势有所迫故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207938_comment'></div>勉强而为之，既立而不可变，则将拱手而待患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207938_comment'></div>是故古之圣人，其深谋远见，所以忧虑天下之故者，莫不备其害，先为之防，曲为之备，使天下不幸有不测之变，而吾常从容制之而不乱，无卤莽苟且之计以为后世之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207938_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207938_comment'></div>此先王之制，后世之所以不可及欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207938_comment'></div>窃尝譬之世之浅人，有居于河濒，而幸水之不至也，则安然而不为之备，一旦水至，则徬徨四顾，莫知所为，于是毁室徙薪而塞之，而后免于没溺之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207938_comment'></div>然是人也，能解目前之患，而退有失所之忧，既已失于其初，而后将复之，则薪与木者，既已溺于水而不可动矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207938_comment'></div>彼其初岂不爱室与薪哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207938_comment'></div>势有所迫故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207938_comment'></div>故天下之事，亦何以异于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207938_comment'></div>圣人者惟先见其害而预为之备而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207938_comment'></div>然岂有他术哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207938_comment'></div>是亦筑防以忧溺，贮水以救焚者之智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207938_comment'></div>昔节度之制，起于景云、开元之间，然其所治者，不过于边方控制之邦而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207938_comment'></div>天宝之乱，安、史横行于中原而莫之禁，天子兵弱而不能制，则其势不得不倚节度之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207938_comment'></div>而节度既已有功，则虽欲变之而不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207938_comment'></div>大抵至德之后，天下之兵无虑数十万，皆属于节度之府，是以天下之兵，仰食于度支，赏罚于天子，而权归于将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207938_comment'></div>天子养之于上，而将军实收其权于下，故驱之以不义之名，置之于可畏之地，则俯首尽力而不敢辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207938_comment'></div>及天下既平，前日之乱已去，而节度之患，固已不胜其深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207938_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207938_comment'></div>天下之情，不可使苟有所安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207938_comment'></div>使安于义耶，则吾固无求乎其他；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207938_comment'></div>使其不义而安之，则吾将欲改而不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207938_comment'></div>彼天下之兵，其势既已如此，则人人有当然之心，虽欲改之，其道无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207938_comment'></div>盖肃宗之时，大盗既平，而天子之威不足以大屈天下，则其所不能变节度之弊，宜无足怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207938_comment'></div>然以宪宗之英明，锄荡铲革，而卒亦不能一之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207938_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207938_comment'></div>势之所习，不亦甚固哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207938_comment'></div>盖尝以谓唐之末年，其君非有可亡之实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207938_comment'></div>夫文、武、宣之三君，其才可与有为，而一时之臣又非皆不可用，而其纪纲法度不须臾而坏，盖其大势已去，虽有绝巧，无所施之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207938_comment'></div>故唐之患不起于僖、昭之间，而起于天宝之际；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207938_comment'></div>节度之强不起于河北之继袭，而起于节度之有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207938_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207938_comment'></div>使天宝之际不为是苟且急迫之制，则僖、昭之患何自而起？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207938_comment'></div>而使吾初不倚节度之功，则河北之区区，虽欲传袭，其可得哉？</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1207938_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207939' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207939' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207939?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐论<span class='inlineComment2'>（中）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207939")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207939_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207939'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207939'>天宝承平，兵不知战，大盗突起，四海震动，御之无策，君播国残，哥舒之败，固无足道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207939_comment'></div>明皇欲下诏亲征，而奸臣嬖妾沮挠其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207939_comment'></div>意当是时，天子临戎，其有济乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207939_comment'></div>愚尝论之，天宝盗起，虽上有昏德，聪明杜塞，抑当时朝廷无人矣，故为是猖狂不审之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207939_comment'></div>夫天子临戎，其利有二，天下莫能当，而明皇皆不得行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207939_comment'></div>幸而不行，使果行之，其狼狈有甚于此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207939_comment'></div>何谓二利？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207939_comment'></div>一者压之以尊名重势，敌人虽强，不忍冒犯顺之危，而起侮上之怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207939_comment'></div>二者天子所统，必天下之重兵选卒，天下不能抗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207939_comment'></div>明皇之时，天下之势，其重在西北，而京师轻也久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207939_comment'></div>大狱屡兴，缙绅切齿，用兵无度，百姓怨苦，内煽淫泆，荒乱失度，尊名之不竞也甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207939_comment'></div>禄山教战久矣，其将卒皆蕃戎劲卒，非复唐人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207939_comment'></div>彼惟恐犯顺之不深，侮上之不快，则明皇之于尊名重势所不得行之，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207939_comment'></div>天下劲兵，皆在西北，藩臣握之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207939_comment'></div>府兵既坏，天子侍卫长征彍骑而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207939_comment'></div>有急而募，不过得长安市人子，而以之抗燕、代之劲骑，此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1207939", 1207939, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>驱羊战狼</span>，则明皇于重兵选卒所不得行之，二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207939_comment'></div>亲征不可，则无策乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207939_comment'></div>曰：知兵者，必知敌人所恃与所恶，使之行所恶而违所恃，如是者百战不殆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207939_comment'></div>禄山之利，速战也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207939_comment'></div>所恃，范阳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207939_comment'></div>十年教其民，千里而用之，其锋不可当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207939_comment'></div>虽太公、穰苴，必姑避之，故贼必乘其锋而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207939_comment'></div>彼惟恐战之不速，敌人之不我拒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207939_comment'></div>然禄山之势虽强，渡河而南则羁客也，故心不固而易摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207939_comment'></div>其恃范阳，如虎豹之有山林，急则必投之以自藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207939_comment'></div>方禄山之南也，厚集潼关之师，深沟高垒，勿与之战，委河南而与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207939_comment'></div>是时李光弼、郭子仪皆在河北，遣一将捣范阳之虚，往必得志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207939_comment'></div>彼进则不得入关，退则已失范阳，独守空虚之东都，不过半年，其势溃矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207939_comment'></div>此至计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207939_comment'></div>其后禄山既死，庆绪北走，而史思明已有范阳，庆绪卒困死河朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207939_comment'></div>以此知禄山失范阳，则必毙于河朔诸师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207939_comment'></div>其后史思明陷东都，李光弼牵之于河阳，而思明不能西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207939_comment'></div>以此知厚集潼关之师，不战以老之，而禄山无能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207939_comment'></div>禄山倾国远斗，委其所恃而不顾，固已犯天下之至危，而唐之君臣不知出此，唐为无人也夫！</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1207939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207939'><span class='label'>按：</span>此篇草斋本、吕本并题作《唐不得制禄山之策》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207939_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207940' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207940' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207940?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐论<span class='inlineComment2'>（下）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207940")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207940_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207940'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207940'>昔者先王之兵，爱其君而后死其将，以为凡吾所以致力不顾以卫其将者，无他焉，以谓吾兵之胜负者，非吾将之利害，而所系者吾之君耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207940_comment'></div>是故功成事立，而其君安然享之而无虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207940_comment'></div>其不善用者则不然，其兵死其将而忘其君，方此之时，三军之士惟其将之为听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207940_comment'></div>故不患将之不足以立功，而患乎功成而上不享其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207940_comment'></div>夫惟欲兵之爱其君而死其将，则莫若兵出于府而将出于卫，使将之于兵得以用而不得以有之，方其有事也，厉兵秣马以问有罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207940_comment'></div>将军之恩惠，虽足以取信于下，而士卒之顾其将，非我终身之所仰，则虽爱而不私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207940_comment'></div>夫惟爱而不私，是故驱之以义则有功，而不可使为不义之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207940_comment'></div>彼死其将而忘其君者，是节度之兵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207940_comment'></div>方是时，天子能使其将而不能用其兵，可使征，可使战，而不能得其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207940_comment'></div>天子常敛士卒之怨，而将军者实尸养士之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207940_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207940_comment'></div>此岂非天下之大患欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207940_comment'></div>盖自天宝以来，藩镇之祸迭起而不可制，而河北之镇，天下指为僭乱不臣之邦，弃之而不问，以为是诚不可得而为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207940_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207940_comment'></div>盍亦深思其术哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207940_comment'></div>夫以汉之时，而七国连衡以叛其上，而诸侯擅地，天子无有以制之，此其为患，岂特唐之方镇也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207940_comment'></div>其后主父偃为之一言，使得自封其子弟，而汉之君臣，无一镞之费而坐享太山之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207940_comment'></div>彼唐之节镇，何以异此欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207940_comment'></div>彼桀黠而不顾，肆傲以慢上者，是诚何恃而敢为尔哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207940_comment'></div>盖其股肱肘臂有为之出死力以为之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207940_comment'></div>使其孑然而自为，则吾一将之敌耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207940_comment'></div>故李愬之平蔡，一得李祐，则吴元济束手而无能为矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207940_comment'></div>然一节度之所领不下数郡之地，而我何不遣一介之乘，假赏功之令，拔其臣属之尤才者，使帅其属城而为之使，如是而阴离之，使其兵分地坼，则昔之豪黠而难制者不过一二耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207940_comment'></div>提一空城而守之，虽欲不臣，其可得哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207940_comment'></div>或曰：「彼臣属将佐，安能叛其素所爱耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207940_comment'></div>名为裂地，而谋相通，则安在其为利哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207940_comment'></div>是大不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207940_comment'></div>夫人惟贫也，而后肯役于富；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207940_comment'></div>惟贱也，而后肯役于贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207940_comment'></div>故两贵不能相使，两富不能相下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207940_comment'></div>彼其臣属将佐之爱其帅者，岂有他哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207940_comment'></div>惟其有功能赏之，有才能用之，是故恃之以自固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207940_comment'></div>使其位有节度之势，则将反顾其上而疾之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207940_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207940_comment'></div>势均位等，则必有相疑之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207940_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207940_comment'></div>使彼诚相乱而生疑，则吾之计行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207940_comment'></div>或曰：「我一日尽斥其臣佐，则彼安肯安然而遣之者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207940_comment'></div>使彼遏吾命而不行，则无乃益召天下之乱乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207940_comment'></div>是又大不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207940_comment'></div>夫使彼受命而遣之耶，则吾固何求？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207940_comment'></div>使彼敢遏吾命而不行，则反手而内祸及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207940_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207940_comment'></div>使人有可以得富贵之门，而有蔽于其前，则必群击而竞排之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207940_comment'></div>彼一日于行伍之间，而有一节度之权，我则顾其私而止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207940_comment'></div>夫如是而能安者，世之所未尝有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207940_comment'></div>昔者乌重胤为沧景节度，凡属城之刺史，各还于朝廷，使得自隶其州兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207940_comment'></div>尝曰：「使二千石各有镇兵，虽有安、史，无如之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207940_comment'></div>而河北之所以能拒命，正以能夺刺史县令之权耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207940_comment'></div>当是时，惟重胤之镇，独禀命受代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207940_comment'></div>然则分其地而离其兵者，真弱节度之术也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1207940_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作论五代文。姑系于此。作品：《五代论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷38（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207945' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207945?labeling=true' target='_blank'>五代论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207945")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207945_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207945'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207945'>春秋时，季梁在随，宫之奇在虞，皆明安危，晓利害，强国惮之而不敢易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207945_comment'></div>予窃怪五代之君，虽起武夫悍卒，未尝学问，不足以得士，而一时将相谋臣，当其败亡之际，皆足蹈坎井，头抵株木，安受祸患而无策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207945_comment'></div>事成则相与苟且富贵，事败则拱手受戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207945_comment'></div>岂纷乱之极而人才亦从而不振欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207945_comment'></div>予深考之，而得四人焉，皆智士也，或用或不用也，则系时君之昏明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207945_comment'></div>安重诲在明宗世，常恨不为国家去潞王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207945_comment'></div>时潞王盖一罢镇节度也，而重诲独知祸之原在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207945_comment'></div>其后卒覆国者，潞王也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207945_comment'></div>清泰帝时，石敬瑭在太原，欲叛有状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207945_comment'></div>时廷臣有吕琦者，言于朝曰：「敬瑭必结契丹为援，可先以重币结契丹，以分敬瑭之援」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207945_comment'></div>卒之立晋者，契丹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207945_comment'></div>若二人之见亦明矣，使明宗与清泰信其言而先为之所，可以纾祸也必矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207945_comment'></div>契丹大举入晋，志吞南夏，而其母述律乃独非之曰：「譬之吾国以一汉人为主，可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207945_comment'></div>耶律德光果不能安于南夏，狼狈客死于路，大劳甚费，而于契丹初无大利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207945_comment'></div>德光丧归，其母不哭，曰：「待国中人马如故，然后葬汝」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207945_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207945_comment'></div>若此戎媪亦智矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207945_comment'></div>李谷、韩熙载少以功名相期，熙载将仕江南，与谷别，熙载曰：「江南如用我，当长驱以定中原」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207945_comment'></div>谷曰：「中原见用，取江南如探囊中物耳」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207945_comment'></div>已而，谷相周世宗，遂臣江南，兵不劳而国不费，信乎其如探囊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207945_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207945_comment'></div>自古秦灭楚、晋灭吴、隋灭陈，长江复山，不能为固，天下有定势，非智力可强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207945_comment'></div>诸葛孔明且不能用蜀取魏，江南岂有长驱定中原之理乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207945_comment'></div>谷于审天下之势亦明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207945_comment'></div>此四人者，三见忽而一用，故惟李谷独有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207945_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207945_comment'></div>天下何尝无士哉，独不知之耳！</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1207945_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论汉文帝。姑系于此。作品：《汉文帝论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷39（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207946' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207946' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207946?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汉文帝论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207946")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207946_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207946'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207946'>昔者绛侯既平吕氏，亲握国玺授之孝文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207946_comment'></div>当是时，刘氏之后，惟大臣所立，文帝为诸王，特以其贤而取之，其初未可以必得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207946_comment'></div>绛侯以天下与所不可必得之人，恩德至厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207946_comment'></div>文帝之报绛侯者，宜何如哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207946_comment'></div>虽分国而王之，天下未以为过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207946_comment'></div>然内难既定，君臣之分既明，爵赏禄赐所以慰答昔日之功者，未闻有卓然过于常时，何其不旋踵而遂去之速也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207946_comment'></div>予尝观汉之大臣多祸少全，武帝以来，不啻如杀囚隶，独文帝时，公卿被诛者无几人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207946_comment'></div>然则文帝之待大臣，亦有恩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207946_comment'></div>当是时，大臣之有恩者，宜无有过绛侯，然匹夫一言，罪辜未明，廷尉折简以召之如取孤囚，侵辱困苦，仅免于死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207946_comment'></div>文帝非昏蔽无知之君，何独于勃少恩若是哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207946_comment'></div>盖尝深思其故，而得其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207946_comment'></div>夫高祖之将有大功者，至文帝时几尽矣，非以逆诛，则以疑死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207946_comment'></div>彼皆心有所恃，矜其功能，日邀其上，不得所欲则狼顾而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207946_comment'></div>绛侯，吹箫之羁民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207946_comment'></div>用兵十馀年，习见天下之势，喜事而尚功，其骁勇之习，岂能帖然无毫釐于心哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207946_comment'></div>以英雄之资，挟立君之威，临视其上，无异于保妇之提婴儿，如是而不骄者，伊尹、周公之所难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207946_comment'></div>骄则纵，纵则乱因以生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207946_comment'></div>文帝岂无爱勃之心哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207946_comment'></div>视前日之诛死族灭者，皆恃功邀君、骄蹇放纵之所致，而绛侯之迹异于韩、彭者无几耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207946_comment'></div>吾亦畏其有所恃而骄，骄而不已则乱，乱而不诛则废法，从而诛之则伤恩甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207946_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207946_comment'></div>理至于是，曾不如抑远困辱，使之慊然内顾而无所恃，锄去其骄慢之心，全其生，保其家，使其子孙长有国土之为愈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207946_comment'></div>然则文帝之恩亦深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207946_comment'></div>且能尊霍光者，莫如孝宣，委天下之政与之而不敢专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207946_comment'></div>光死，又立其子，兄弟联兵，女充后宫，赏赐宠锡不以数计，天下翕然以为孝宣无负于霍氏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207946_comment'></div>然光死未几，妻子为戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207946_comment'></div>以天下与人，而身死之后，弱子单孙之祭曾不得享，天下之人闻之者，谁不为霍光痛心哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207946_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207946_comment'></div>使宣帝既正君臣之分，则遂揽天下之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207946_comment'></div>光既死，视子孙之贤愚而授之官，与之财而收其权，取其尤无良者而屏远之，霍氏虽欲为乱，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207946_comment'></div>然则霍光无后者，非宣帝谁为之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207946_comment'></div>天下之事，要其终，而后知君子之用心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207946_comment'></div>绛侯无祸于身，则知文帝之所以裁之者，乃所以深报之也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207946_comment'></div>霍光无后于汉，则知宣帝之所以宠之者，乃所以深害之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207946_comment'></div>语曰：「婴儿常病，伤于饱也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207946_comment'></div>贵臣常祸，伤于宠也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207946_comment'></div>然则文、宣之报功，其得失可考也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1207946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207946'><span class='label'>按：</span>此篇草斋本、吕本并题作《文帝善全周勃》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207946_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论汉景帝。姑系于此。作品：《汉景帝论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷39（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207947' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207947?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汉景帝论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207947")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207947_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207947'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207947'>景帝称窦婴「沾沾自喜，多易，不足以任宰相」，因持重而相卫绾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207947_comment'></div>夫「自喜，多易」，固不足以持重是也，而求持重者必如卫绾，则已甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207947_comment'></div>古之知人者，不观其形而察其情，得其妙而遗其似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207947_comment'></div>夫天下之善恶，其似者固未必是，而其真者或不可以形求也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207947_comment'></div>绾，车戏之贱士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207947_comment'></div>其椎鲁庸钝，偶似夫敦厚长者之形耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207947_comment'></div>夫敦厚之士，其用之也，必有蒙其利者矣，岂谓其无是非可否，如偶人而已者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207947_comment'></div>苟以是为长者而用之，则世之可谓持重者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207947_comment'></div>夫恶马之奔驰不可也，求其无奔驰可矣，得偶马而爱之，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207947_comment'></div>景帝之相绾也，是爱偶马之类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207947_comment'></div>帝之恶周亚夫也，曰：「此鞅鞅非少主臣也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207947_comment'></div>卒杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207947_comment'></div>夫天下之情，其未见于利害之际者，举不可知而要之，易劫以势者易动以利，不轻许人之私者不轻行其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207947_comment'></div>亚夫之不纳文帝于细柳与夫不肯侯王信，可谓不可以势劫而无私意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207947_comment'></div>伏节死义与夫见利而心不动，非轻势而灭私者莫能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207947_comment'></div>可以相少主、共危难者，意非亚夫不可，而帝乃反之，是徒以其刚劲不苟，其形若难制而嫚上者，故杀之而不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207947_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207947_comment'></div>景帝者，求人于形似而失之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207947_comment'></div>盖昔者高祖求傅如意者而不可得，得一周昌能强项面折，而高祖遂以赵主委之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207947_comment'></div>夫昌之不能脱如意于死，其势盖有所迫，而所以任昌者，固相危弱之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207947_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207947_comment'></div>周昌以此见取，而亚夫乃用是不免，则景帝之与高祖，其观人也亦异矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207947_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论唐代宗。姑系于此。作品：《唐代宗论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷39（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐代宗论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207948")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207948'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207948'>予尝论代宗唐之庸主也，而安史坏乱之后，肃宗草创，事出一切，人情震摇，易以生变，此非常才所能定，而代宗承之，又尝一为吐蕃所惊，逃奔于陕，然国遂以定，不及其身者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207948_comment'></div>予考代宗行事，有类英主者二焉，诚率是道而充之，其身安而国定，盖无足怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207948_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207948_comment'></div>能容大功之臣，背之而不疑，犯之而不怒，而外无姑息之迹，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207948_comment'></div>仆固怀恩、李光弼二人之功著矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207948_comment'></div>怀恩之恃功犯上，自敌以下谁能忍之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207948_comment'></div>而代宗不与之较，故优容包纳，卒待其自毙，岂不曰：「与之较力，则彼骁犷也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207948_comment'></div>与之较理，则彼戎狄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207948_comment'></div>其乘气而凶悖也，盖将亡也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207948_comment'></div>是其料怀恩于目中矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207948_comment'></div>李光弼身兼将相，功无与二，而幸陕之后，坚坐不应，此其意非持两端则高卧以观变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207948_comment'></div>代宗恩礼终始不衰，岂不曰：「光弼之功而伤之，天下其谓我何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207948_comment'></div>彼之不赴吾急，吾不问则已，问之则必讨焉，彼非束手受死者，而吾使谁敌之哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207948_comment'></div>代宗之待二臣如是，天下不谓之姑息者，理当尔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207948_comment'></div>德宗之于怀光，则姑息之迹不可胜掩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207948_comment'></div>人有当其意则用之，众怒不与则必杀之，其用其杀莫或能间之者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207948_comment'></div>始用元载，委己听之，恶载之甚，诛而不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207948_comment'></div>宠鱼朝恩，几危郭子仪，然其横也，则杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207948_comment'></div>程元振之宠固矣，柳伉一言而逐之，易如反掌，卒弃不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207948_comment'></div>元载之狱，问目皆从中出，则是平日载虽擅权于外，而代宗居中无不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207948_comment'></div>去三大奸如杀犬羊，中外不惊，上下厌服，观此，则昏且孱者不能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207948_comment'></div>是二者，英主之所难，代宗有焉，所以能保国而安身也哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207948_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论唐德宗。姑系于此。作品：《唐德宗论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷39（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207949?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐德宗论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207949")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207949'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207949'>德宗愤藩镇之强僭，有鞭挞海内之志，竭其帑藏，空其禁卫，以从事于伐叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207949_comment'></div>然师出无功，兵连祸结，大盗窃发，身播国残，灭亡之祸，间不容发，自是之后，乱不得熄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207949_comment'></div>至于宪宗，用一裴度决策出师，淮西既平，山东、河北强藩大镇弭耳听命，终宪宗之世，海内略定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207949_comment'></div>二帝于用兵伐叛则同，而功烈何其相反也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207949_comment'></div>盖攻坚则瑕者坚，攻瑕则坚者瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207949_comment'></div>德宗始使马燧、李抱真讨田悦，魏镇自承嗣以来，兵强国富，屹然大镇，非可易攻者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207949_comment'></div>二将之力弊于田悦，而王武俊、朱滔相煽而起，自魏至燕数千里间莽为战场，而四方诸侯始轻京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207949_comment'></div>淮西虽积于叛，然数郡之地也，暴取其财，虐用其民，为日久矣，危亡之机已见，而元济昏庸倔强其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207949_comment'></div>此特不欲取耳，取之可以必得，岂与河朔诸镇比哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207949_comment'></div>宪宗乘其机，察其时，一举而灭之，而李师道、王承宗之徒或诛或臣，而四方靡然效顺矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207949_comment'></div>此无他，德宗先攻其坚，敌未已而己之气先索、力先弊矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207949_comment'></div>已索之气，既弊之力，人所易侮，此朱泚、李怀光所以陆梁而不忌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207949_comment'></div>宪宗先攻其易，碎其巢穴，戮其鲸鲵，兵虽未出而气已震于天下，师道、承宗所以消沮而不能抗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207949_comment'></div>有扛鼎之力者，使之负石而趋终日，则必蹶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207949_comment'></div>立谈之间而磔婴儿，则贲、育在旁必且心悸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207949_comment'></div>此攻坚、攻瑕之论也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207949'><span class='label'>按：</span>此篇草斋本、吕本并题作《德宗宪宗伐叛得失》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207949_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　作文论唐庄宗。姑系于此。作品：《唐庄宗论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷39（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为熙宁或元丰间，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207950' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207950' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207950?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐庄宗论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207950")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207950_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207950'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207950'>古之善战者，不患乎敌强而不我若，而所大患者，与之为敌而两无有以相制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207950_comment'></div>夫两无有以相制，则势足以相扰，而不可以有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207950_comment'></div>惟其旷日持久，两惫而不振，如是而后有起而收之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207950_comment'></div>虽然，非有优游久远之心，谁能安坐而待之，而至其两惫而不振也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207950_comment'></div>吾亦安能必其变之所在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207950_comment'></div>则是吾与敌人常战于不可知之间，夫岂不殆哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207950_comment'></div>是故古之善战者，必有以审天下之势而为之计，取之以可必之计，而待之以可成之功，夫如是而后能有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207950_comment'></div>今夫天下之勇夫，其才足以相胜，其力足以相困，奋臂角力以战其死，其势终日而不能解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207950_comment'></div>至其能者，则不与之致争于手足之间，而独徘徊待伺，一发而捣其虚，中其要害之地，而使之虽有手足之技，不能以与吾较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207950_comment'></div>夫知是者，胜敌之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207950_comment'></div>故力弱于敌则谋之，力倍于敌则乘之，力敌势均，则捣其虚、袭其所忌而不可战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207950_comment'></div>盖昔者唐人以河东之地，南面以争天下，百战而无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207950_comment'></div>以朱温之强，亲冒矢石与唐人从事于河上，不能有河北尺寸之地，其力之不足以相制亦明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207950_comment'></div>譬如两人终日而博也，代胜代负而不决，胜者欲罢而负者留之，负者欲返而胜者激之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207950_comment'></div>盖终朱温、李克用之世，更胜迭负，而卒不得其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207950_comment'></div>至于庄宗，力战不顾，思决成败而不可得，方其盘桓于杨刘、德胜之间，盖尝蹙而不振矣，其后郭崇韬为之决入汴之策，而后天下归于唐。<div class='inline'
