ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年7月</a>　代张方平作辞免表文。作品：《代张文定辞免明堂陪位表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207826' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207826' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207826?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代张文定辞免明堂陪位表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207826")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207826_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207826'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207826'>明德惟馨，方格神于盛礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207826_comment'></div>相予肆祀，俄赐召于老臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207826_comment'></div>衰朽知荣，兢惶靡措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207826_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下嗣隆圣统，躬致太平，翼翼文王之小心，烝烝虞舜之大孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207826_comment'></div>季秋顺序，方万物之盛多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207826_comment'></div>四方和来，加多士之奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207826_comment'></div>祗见列圣，裒对昊穹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207826_comment'></div>敞布政之法宫，大明礼乐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207826_comment'></div>受丕天之景贶，均被迩遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207826_comment'></div>喜交神人，庆浃夷夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207826_comment'></div>凡执事豆笾之末，或观光舆隶之间，足为至荣，可以无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207826_comment'></div>而况臣猥以屏退，尚叨记存，温诏在门，外庭有位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207826_comment'></div>固愿闻舜《韶》而率舞，瞻尧日以倾心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207826_comment'></div>而迟暮之馀，衰疲且久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207826_comment'></div>筋力已消于疾病，才冀尽年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207826_comment'></div>疏野久放于田闾，不足为礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207826_comment'></div>当千载之接统，自滞周南；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207826_comment'></div>奉半夜之受釐，莫趋宣室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207826_comment'></div>无阶策励，惟剧飞驰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1207826_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年秋</a>　张耒以“既见君子云胡不喜”为韵，作诗八首，赠晁补之，黄庭坚有和诗。作品：《赠无咎以既见君子云胡不喜为韵八首》（平生怀想人）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠无咎以既见君子云胡不喜为韵八首》（贤愚譬观形）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠无咎以既见君子云胡不喜为韵八首》（文风还正始）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠无咎以既见君子云胡不喜为韵八首》（文衰东京后）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠无咎以既见君子云胡不喜为韵八首》（诗坛李杜后）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠无咎以既见君子云胡不喜为韵八首》（触有羸其角）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠无咎以既见君子云胡不喜为韵八首》（黄子少年时）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠无咎以既见君子云胡不喜为韵八首》（南山缚虎师）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年秋</a>　尚未入馆之时，于学省晚归，作诗。作品：《晚归》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷27（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年秋</a>　钱勰公庭种菊有诗，张耒次韵作诗。作品：《次韵钱大尹公庭种菊》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年9月1日</a>　司马光卒，作挽词。作品：《故仆射司马文正公挽词四首》（黼座方恭点）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《故仆射司马文正公挽词四首》（辞爵浮云外）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《故仆射司马文正公挽词四首》（经济心犹壮）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《故仆射司马文正公挽词四首》（伊洛平生兴）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年9月1日</a>　司马光卒，代范纯仁作祭文。作品：《代范枢密祭司马温公文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代范枢密祭司马温公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年9月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208080")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208080'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208080'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208080_comment'></div>天祚有邦，畀之元龟，笃生我公，为世父师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208080_comment'></div>夷、齐之清，渊、骞之德，子产之惠，叔向之直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208080_comment'></div>人擅其一，足以成名，公兼众德，乾乾不宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208080_comment'></div>九流百家，金匮石室，钩索沈隐，裁其失得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208080_comment'></div>根柢治乱，经纶皇极，作为文章，有书秩秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208080_comment'></div>元圭大裘，望之肃然，冬旸夏冰，赴者争先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208080_comment'></div>仁、英两朝，锽锽厥声，国有正人，折奸于萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208080_comment'></div>荏染者木，求直于绳，我公尽规，君心则宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208080_comment'></div>烈烈神考，体貌有德，公献其可，岩岩翼翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208080_comment'></div>言有未用，不敢受爵，深衣幅巾，归休于洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208080_comment'></div>公则休矣，四方颙颙，君子野人，洎于他邦，闻者怀归，于父于兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208080_comment'></div>天施不齐，或怨寒暑，公独何施，四海一誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208080_comment'></div>元丰末年，国有大事，穆穆文母，宥我神嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208080_comment'></div>爰立作相，媚于神人，我公在廷，其重万钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208080_comment'></div>士贺于朝，民歌于廛，农庆于野，兵休于边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208080_comment'></div>燠尔慄寒，养其饥孱，无瘠于饥，无休于田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208080_comment'></div>培其本根，枝叶则茂，岂曰我作，宪章惟旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208080_comment'></div>于赫圣考，左右上帝，休公于家，实遗圣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208080_comment'></div>《卷耳》思贤，夙夜周京，不惑不疑，成此太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208080_comment'></div>公之去来，人之戚嬉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208080_comment'></div>人之戚嬉，帝之从违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208080_comment'></div>岂人事耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208080_comment'></div>天实为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208080_comment'></div>纯仁不才，辱公知深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208080_comment'></div>人之相知，贵相知心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208080_comment'></div>惟公我知，洞达表里，采其所长，谓或可使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208080_comment'></div>申结义好，丘山不移，匪我则然，公实取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208080_comment'></div>泚泚清洛，独乐之园，嘉华春敷，修竹夏寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208080_comment'></div>清酌翛然，我招我从，琅琅嘉言，有铭在躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208080_comment'></div>朝偶乏人，备位枢机，入与国论，获亲风规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208080_comment'></div>六七年间，为益不赀，私祈白首，从公以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208080_comment'></div>忧劳伤生，公既遘疾，庶几有瘳，卒相王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208080_comment'></div>国祠既誓，公以丧闻，我心之悲，不获至门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208080_comment'></div>入哭于室，公既大敛，终天之情，不一见面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208080_comment'></div>人生有死，如旦夜耳，曾子将没，知免而喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208080_comment'></div>公身既修，公志既毕，既寿令终，无有其失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208080_comment'></div>有如公者，古今万一，任重道远，税驾兹日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208080_comment'></div>庶几念此，以纾我悲，犹有鬼神，实闻我词。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1208080_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年11月</a>　代文彦博作辞免表文。作品：《代文潞公辞免明堂加恩表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207823' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207823' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207823?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代文潞公辞免明堂加恩表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207823")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207823_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207823'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207823'>礼行郊庙，方推报本之仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207823_comment'></div>燕及臣邻，皆获增封之锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207823_comment'></div>恩虽缘于有庆，赏亦恶夫无名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207823_comment'></div>惟是衰残，尤为冒昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207823_comment'></div>伏念臣朴忠一意，际会四朝，超踰等夷，出入将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207823_comment'></div>洎老休于乡社，已位极于师垣，何期垂白之馀，复相继明之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207823_comment'></div>空心半朽，久自分于不彫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207823_comment'></div>十里已疲，冀时资于辨道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207823_comment'></div>而岁月逝矣，补报缺然，惟知愧惧之无容，夫何恩礼之加厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207823_comment'></div>肆时大享，兹谓上仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207823_comment'></div>方天子致斋庄之严，而老臣私宿卫之逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207823_comment'></div>虽圣朝尚齿，惟所便安，而宠数非常，更为忧惧，已足矜荣于在位，岂当同众以疏恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207823_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下时轸睿慈，俯回神鉴，必欲宽残年之陨越，莫如裁今日之宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207823_comment'></div>耄已及之，虽终知其无补；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207823_comment'></div>天其或者，尚假息于馀龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207823_comment'></div>愿止已行，庶无太甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207823_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年11月</a>　代文彦博再作辞免表文。作品：《代文潞公辞免明堂加恩第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207824' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207824' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207824?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代文潞公辞免明堂加恩第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207824")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207824_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207824'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207824'>加地无名，方抱战兢而莫处；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207824_comment'></div>稽天未答，盖缘诚恪之罔孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207824_comment'></div>尽而腹心，再干旒扆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207824_comment'></div>臣闻事君尽礼，而臣独无趋拜之勤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207824_comment'></div>陈力就列，而臣久涉衰残之境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207824_comment'></div>两无一可，虽圣主曲为之优容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207824_comment'></div>日加三思，顾国士如何而称报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207824_comment'></div>惟有稍裁其宠数，庶几未即于颠隮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207824_comment'></div>而恩礼增繁，光华沓至，既纾勤于斋祭，又申锡其土田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207824_comment'></div>高已近危，将必忧于陨越；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207824_comment'></div>折而致覆，亦何益于生成？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207824_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下垂德乾坤，收恩雨露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207824_comment'></div>赏行四海，当酬可劝之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207824_comment'></div>职备上公，岂忧不及之禄？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207824_comment'></div>实思危于居位，非受爵以苟辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1207824_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年11月</a>　代文彦博作文谢太皇太后。姑系于此。作品：《谢太皇太后表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《谢太皇太后表》或亦作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元祐元年开封。）</span><div id='poem_1207827' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207827' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207827?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢太皇太后表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207827")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207827_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207827'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207827'>稽留君命，敢求免于刑诛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207827_comment'></div>惠养老臣，不使劳其筋力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207827_comment'></div>仰睿私之从欲，抚衰志以知荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207827_comment'></div>伏惟太皇太后陛下厚德无疆，至仁在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207827_comment'></div>神孙临祭，知保宥之圣功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207827_comment'></div>多士充庭，见肃雍之盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207827_comment'></div>恩及草木，喜同天人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207827_comment'></div>臣幸以馀龄，获逢盛典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207827_comment'></div>虽笾豆骏奔之事，徒有心哉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207827_comment'></div>而礼乐大备之时，为后死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207827_comment'></div>岂其偶尔，尚足矜荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207827_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207827_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年11月19日</a>　与黄庭坚、晁补之夜会苏轼府中，得苏轼《黄泥坂词》手稿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年11月29日</a>　张耒召试学士院。苏轼为主考官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年11月29日</a>　苏轼有《武昌西山》诗，张耒作诗唱和。苏辙、黄庭坚、张耒、晁补之三十余人均有唱和。作品：《次韵苏公武昌西山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年12月</a>　在太学，作诗寄荣辑（字子雍）。作品：《寄荣子雍三首》（东风三月洛阳城）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《寄荣子雍三首》（苍苍老柏古南禅）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《寄荣子雍三首》（家家新酒滴新醅）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年12月</a>　在太学时，试笔，有诗。作品：《试笔》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年12月7日</a>　十二月庚寅，毕仲游、张耒、晁补之等十三人并擢馆职。张耒、晁补之为秘书省正字。张耒受诏校《资治通鉴》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　与晁补之论刘奉世。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　作诗寄钱勰乞茶。姑系于此。作品：《乞钱穆公给事丈新赐龙团》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《乞钱穆父给事丈新赐龙团》，搜韵网为《乞钱穆公给事丈新赐龙团》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　赠琉璃瓶给晁补之，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《琉璃瓶歌赠晁二》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年冬</a>　代范纯仁作答文。作品：《代范枢密答陈列书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷56（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207862' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207862' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207862?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代范枢密答陈列书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207862")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207862_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207862'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207862'>纯仁启：窃服下风，闻足下之谊甚高，卓然耻与一世同好恶，追古人之迹而力守之，用此与物龃龉，年益高，持益坚，宝其所闻，不肯轻发而试之，若欲以天下之责自任者，足下之所以自尊重，亦可谓至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207862_comment'></div>非有天下之盛德，何足以致足下之礼？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207862_comment'></div>乃蒙过听，惠然以书为赐，礼意甚重，设之不当，岂乐易进善，不择所与，则将有欺听闻而进不肖者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207862_comment'></div>不然，似非足下之所宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207862_comment'></div>纯仁闻之，责有轻重，忧有深浅，责重者忧深，责轻者忧浅，各勉其所当为而施力称其所受者，天下之常道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207862_comment'></div>足下居山林，处穷约，晚蒙朝廷之知，斗升之赐未及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207862_comment'></div>然司马温公之薨，足下愁思悲伤，如其骨肉朋友，忧念世故，乃心生民，发于文辞，达之表章，申重反复，三四不厌，乃如朝廷被衮肉食之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207862_comment'></div>向之所谓天下常道，人犹不能勉而充之，而况能如足下越跌常礼万万如此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207862_comment'></div>足下之贤，不待亲辞色而可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207862_comment'></div>方今主上圣著夙成，耆老在位，神母齐圣，左右景命，四方内外，幽隐必达，敷求逸民，振拔滞屈，以足下之贤与足下之志，岂有久不得所欲者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207862_comment'></div>顾某之区区，何力之施能？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207862_comment'></div>承谕通进二表，此宜有司自有常法，当不敢妄有所蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207862_comment'></div>抑哀词诚意恻怛，发于深衷，词气高古不可窥测，承惠，幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207862_comment'></div>冬寒，伏冀为道自爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207862_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年冬</a>　代人作诗庆贺韩缜生日。作品：《代人上颍川韩端明生日》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　是岁，曾与晁补之访陈师道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　是岁，曾与黄庭坚等谈诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　有二石龟，晁补之名其大者为九江，小者为千岁。张耒因作诗。作品：《九江千岁龟歌赠无咎》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《九江千岁龟歌赠晁无咎》，搜韵网为《九江千岁龟歌赠无咎》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　是岁，黄寔赴梓州任提刑，张耒作诗送之。作品：《送黄师是梓州提刑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　为范纯仁女婿崔君作墓志铭。姑系于此。作品：《崔君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷61（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“是岁，或曾作《崔君墓志铭》”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元祐元年开封。崔君，字祖德，范纯仁女婿，程戡外甥。）</span><div id='poem_1208077' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208077' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208077?labeling=true' target='_blank'>崔君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208077")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208077_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208077'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208077'>君崔氏，讳保孙，字祖德，许人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208077_comment'></div>以其舅程康穆公恩，试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208077_comment'></div>年二十有四，居父丧，以毁卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208077_comment'></div>曾祖某，赠工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208077_comment'></div>祖某，赠礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208077_comment'></div>父某，赠中大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208077_comment'></div>夫人范氏，今枢密高平范公之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208077_comment'></div>二男子：曰履，应天府宋城县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208077_comment'></div>曰渐，举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208077_comment'></div>其孤以某年月日葬君与范夫人于郑州新郑县某乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208077_comment'></div>清河张耒实铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208077_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1208077'>惟崔氏，鄢陵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208077_comment'></div>迁于许，礼部君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208077_comment'></div>君为儿，卓不群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208077_comment'></div>长好礼，恭笃慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208077_comment'></div>不玩友，妻如宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208077_comment'></div>居期丧，戚斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208077_comment'></div>服其服，彻俎尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208077_comment'></div>或止之，君不忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208077_comment'></div>世礼衰，半亡存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208077_comment'></div>唯齐斩，仅不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208077_comment'></div>克守古，君几仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208077_comment'></div>读诗书，志本根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208077_comment'></div>曰吾学，可设陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208077_comment'></div>嗟腐生，耀浮文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208077_comment'></div>韩忠献，世大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208077_comment'></div>谓君贤，崔其振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208077_comment'></div>高平公，誉毁信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208077_comment'></div>自君少，以子嫔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208077_comment'></div>谓崔氏，是驹骏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208077_comment'></div>孰与之，幼而闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208077_comment'></div>孰夺之，冠而陨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208077_comment'></div>藏千万，不一陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208077_comment'></div>其或者，在子孙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1208077_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年2月8日</a>　二月辛卯，朝廷命苏轼撰富弼神道碑，撰成后，张耒曾建议修改其中一字。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年2月</a>　胡及通判定州，张耒作诗相送。作品：《送胡考甫》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年春</a>　与孙朴、毕仲游同游李氏园亭，作诗。作品：《暇日同孙毕二同舍游李氏园亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年春</a>　陈师道卧病，张耒作诗问候。师道有答诗。作品：《昼卧怀陈三时陈三卧疾》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年春</a>　秦觏作诗，张耒、晁补之、黄庭坚等皆作诗唱和。作品：《次韵秦觏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年春</a>　黄庭坚赠张耒、晁补之团茶与洮河石砚，并赠诗，张耒、晁补之有次韵诗。作品：《鲁直惠洮河绿石研冰壶次韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年3月21日</a>　奉安神宗御容于景灵宫。作诗。作品：《奉安神考御容入景灵宫小臣获睹有感二首》（灵风依伞绣舆深）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《奉安神考御容入景灵宫小臣获睹有感二首》（渭上衣冠故老哀）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年春</a>　休日不出，有诗。黄庭坚、晁补之、孔武仲次韵。张耒再用前韵作诗。作品：《和鲁直》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“今《张耒集》中休日不出诗共两首：卷24《休日不出》《休日不出闻西池游人之盛》，皆七言，与黄、晁次韵诗不同，故邵浩《坡门酬唱集》卷22认为张耒原作已阙。”）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年春</a>　闻陈师道病间，作诗。作品：《赠陈履常》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年5月</a>　黄好谦（字几道）卒，张耒作挽词。作品：《挽黄几道》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《黄几道哀挽》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年6月</a>　钱勰赠高丽松扇，张耒作诗谢之。苏轼、黄庭坚有和诗。作品：《谢钱穆父惠高丽扇》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年6月</a>　与苏轼等再至王才元（名王棫）园。苏轼称叹其《文周翰邀至王才元园饮》诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年6月</a>　苏轼、苏辙、黄庭坚、苏颂、刘攽、王钦臣等观李公麟所藏韩幹马图及李公麟所画天马图，作诗。张耒亦预此会，有诗。作品：《题韩幹马图》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年初伏日</a>　是日大雨，作诗赠晁补之。作品：《初伏大雨呈无咎》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）《张耒集》卷62亦收，有“戏”字。此诗编入《同文馆唱和诗》，晁补之、曹辅、邓忠臣、蔡肇皆有和诗。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年7月</a>　张商英为提点河东路刑狱，苏轼、范祖禹、黄庭坚、张耒等以“登山临水送将归”为韵分韵赋诗，为其送行。作品：《送张天觉使河东席上分题得将字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年7月</a>　苏轼为文及甫题《郭熙秋山平远二首》，张耒次韵作诗。苏辙、晁补之、毕仲游、等均有次韵。作品：《题周文翰郭熙山水二首》（鱼村橘市楚江边）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《题周文翰郭熙山水二首》（洞庭叶落万波秋）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年8月</a>　入同文馆考试吏部文武选人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年8月</a>　在试院，与晁补之、邓忠臣、曹辅、蔡肇、余幹、耿南仲、商倚、柳仲远、李公麟、孔武仲、温益、蔡向等唱酬。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年9月19日</a>　出闱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年秋</a>　晁补之弟将之（字无斁）赴咸平簿，张耒作诗相送。作品：《送晁将之咸平簿》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷16（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年秋</a>　次韵作诗答蔡肇（字天启）。作品：《次韵答天启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年10月7日</a>　与黄庭坚、晁补之等会于苏轼府中。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年11月</a>　苏辙除户部侍郎，张耒与晁补在馆中谈论此事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　是岁，常往来苏轼府中，苏轼以密云龙茶款待。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　是岁，曾为刘充作墓志铭。姑系于此。作品：《刘承制墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷59（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208064' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208064' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208064?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘承制墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208064")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208064_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208064'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208064'>君刘氏，讳充，字安道，开封人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208064_comment'></div>娶宗室女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208064_comment'></div>补右班殿直，四迁为内殿崇班、骑都尉致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208064_comment'></div>今上即位，以恩迁内殿承制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208064_comment'></div>年五十，元祐二年二月某日以疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208064_comment'></div>尝监许田、太康二县酒税，用举者监真州船场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208064_comment'></div>待制李肃之守庆州，辟公随行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208064_comment'></div>又勾当安肃军榷场，用举为霸州船鱼巡检、徐州兵马都监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208064_comment'></div>其在霸州，卒有谋叛者，发有日，一州无知者，君独以察得，密白守，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1208064", 1208064, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>验实</span>斩之，微君几扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208064_comment'></div>间罢官居京师，官府有烦使，时时犹奏遣，君至辄办，用此能自达于名卿大官，故其居官多荐之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208064_comment'></div>其为人勤敏，当官不避事，颇知书，矜持自喜，有足贤者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208064_comment'></div>曾祖某，某官，赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208064_comment'></div>祖某，某官，赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208064_comment'></div>考某，某官，赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208064_comment'></div>夫人，邓州观察使从贽女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208064_comment'></div>二子：俟，左班殿直；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208064_comment'></div>杰，举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208064_comment'></div>葬开封府某县某乡之原，实某年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208064_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1208064'>仕则有称，既惫而休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208064_comment'></div>不瑕孔修，以息兹丘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1208064_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　是岁，尝为杨名景之叔父作墓志铭。姑系于此。作品：《华阳杨君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷61（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）华阳杨君，杨名景之叔父。杨名景，生平不详，尝从张耒游。）</span><div id='poem_1208074' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208074' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208074?labeling=true' target='_blank'>华阳杨君墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208074")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208074_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208074'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208074'>华阳杨君景从余游，数为余道其叔父君之贤，曰：「叔父始好读书，博通绝人，而其意常狭儒生，思立武功奇节，人亦以是与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208074_comment'></div>两举进士，罢去，不得志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208074_comment'></div>客江湖，久之无所知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208074_comment'></div>时独游山泽间，饮酒悲吟泣下，未尝语人其意，而人亦莫能测其何为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208074_comment'></div>熙宁六年，朝廷出军治辰州诸蛮，景之先人朝奉君从军，以君从行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208074_comment'></div>师克懿洽城，主将李浩请君招未附者，君大喜，匹马怀檄入其穴，一夕报命，得降者数百人俱来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208074_comment'></div>明年，筑懿洽为沅州，帅谢麟奇君材，留馆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208074_comment'></div>君为麟画攻守策甚众，未及用而麟罢，君亦去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208074_comment'></div>明年，君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208074_comment'></div>夫人符氏，遗腹产一男子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208074_comment'></div>元祐明年某月某日，景始获迎君之丧，葬于苏州某县某乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208074_comment'></div>吾叔少孤，教养于先兄，恂恂如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208074_comment'></div>其死生三十五年矣，天穷而人厄之，有至是也夫」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208074_comment'></div>余曰：「是固无怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208074_comment'></div>彼其悲歌泣下，至匹马入敌辄大喜，此其所欲试，非易售者，穷固其所」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208074_comment'></div>君讳某，字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208074_comment'></div>曾祖某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208074_comment'></div>祖某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208074_comment'></div>考某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208074_comment'></div>世华阳人，盖汉太尉震后云<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208074_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1208074'>元祐明年：未知为何年，疑有误。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1208074_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1208074'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_1208074_0'>⑴ 《柯山集拾遗》卷一二。又见乾隆《华阴县志》卷二○。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1208074_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　是岁，尝读李廌文卷，并题诗。姑系于此。作品：《题李方叔文卷末》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年冬</a>　谒告离京回山阳，作诗。所为何事，待考。临行，孔武仲作诗相送。作品：《谒告之楚出都晚泊》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年春</a>　作诗寄堂兄张君复，贺其病愈。作品：《喜七兄疾愈二首》（净名居士本非病）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《喜七兄疾愈二首》（南邻隐士龙虎鼎）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年6月28日</a>　六月癸卯，苏轼表弟程之元移江南西路转运使，张耒有诗送行。苏轼、苏辙均有诗相送。作品：《送程德孺赴江西》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年9月</a>　苏轼戏题李公麟（字伯时）所画御马好头赤，张耒次韵作诗。苏辙、黄庭坚、晁补之均有次韵。作品：《次韵苏内相好头赤》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷60（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）据墓铭，张耒从姑父为杨希元。希元，字号爵里不详。）</span><div id='poem_1208070' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208070' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208070?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐三年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208070")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208070_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208070'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208070'>中散杨公讳希元夫人张氏，亳州谯县人，赠礼部尚书讳成之曾孙，礼部侍郎讳传之孙，赠太常博士讳彭之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208070_comment'></div>夫人秀美惠和，治女工精工绝人，内外宗族无与比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208070_comment'></div>蚤孤，母燕夫人笃爱之，曰：「有男子如吾女者，乃以归之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208070_comment'></div>媒妁日走门，燕夫人辄挥之曰：「吾女非若辈偶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208070_comment'></div>时中散公与夫人之叔为寮，来请婚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208070_comment'></div>燕夫人素闻中散公贤，又窃奇其状貌为有福禄者，曰：「是足以当吾女矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208070_comment'></div>遂归中散公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208070_comment'></div>夫人既归杨氏，其宗族敬爱之如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208070_comment'></div>夫人仁爱慈淑出天性，柔声怡色，无丝毫忤人意，其于妒忌，生不知有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208070_comment'></div>年尚少，能淡世虑，斋戒奉浮屠，不治妇女玩好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208070_comment'></div>年三十六岁，感疾，少间，召其家人婢妾环坐，酌酒饮之，劝抚之如他时，皆喜曰：「吾夫人疾且起」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208070_comment'></div>俄而正衣起坐，家人惊问之，已卒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208070_comment'></div>后二十七年，当元祐三年，而中散公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208070_comment'></div>诸孤迎夫人之柩于京师，是岁九月丁卯，合葬郑州管城县怀恩乡神崧里先茔之次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208070_comment'></div>始以中散公登朝恩，封寿昌县君，追封清河郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208070_comment'></div>子四人：彦真、彦龄，皆宣德郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208070_comment'></div>彦臣，慈州吉乡县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208070_comment'></div>彦章，绛州太平县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208070_comment'></div>五女：长嫁左班殿直李祐，次嫁左藏副使曹谱，次嫁朝奉郎程复，次嫁大名府魏县主簿王需，次嫁河南登封县尉李昂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208070_comment'></div>孙八人：长逵，次迈，皆太庙斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208070_comment'></div>馀尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208070_comment'></div>夫人于某为从姑，故诸孤属之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208070_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1208070'>择所宜从，初艰其归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208070_comment'></div>既逢其良，身先之萎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208070_comment'></div>匪谋不臧，天实戾之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208070_comment'></div>于穆夫人，令德婉娩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208070_comment'></div>物皆怛终，独裕其返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208070_comment'></div>惟昔弱子，衣冠颀颀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208070_comment'></div>逾二十年，以丧而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208070_comment'></div>鲜原靡靡，从于君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208070_comment'></div>有蕃其承，视此松梓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1208070_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年9月</a>　苏轼卧病，张耒与晁补之前往看望。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年9月</a>　曹辅（字子方）赴福建路转运判官，张耒与苏轼、黄庭坚、晁补之、刘攽、孔武仲等皆赋诗送行。作品：《送曹子方赴福建运判》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年9月</a>　与曾诚（字存之）作诗唱和。作品：《次韵曾存之直舍种竹》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）曾存之，名诚，泉州晋江人。祖父曾公亮，父曾孝宽。）</span><br /><a href="javascript:
