ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年冬</a>　寒夜回忆去年淮上之行，有诗。作品：《寒夜拥炉有怀淮上》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年12月</a>　与晁补之、盛次仲等夜饮作诗。作品：《次韵盛居中夜饮》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　是岁，尝与苏轼、宋景年（字遐叔）观晁补之所藏画野马。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　是岁，应黄庭坚之约，作诗和其伯父黄序诗。作品：《鲁直示其伯父祖善马鞍松隐斋诗次其韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年3月4日</a>　刘攽（贡父）卒，代人作祭文。作品：《代祭刘贡父文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）张耒所代之人不详，据文知为庆历六年进士，与刘攽为儿女亲家。）</span><div id='poem_1208081' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208081' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208081?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代祭刘贡父文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年3月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208081")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208081_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208081'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208081'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208081_comment'></div>子之强学博敏，超绝一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208081_comment'></div>肇自载籍，孔、墨、百氏，太史所录，俚闻野记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208081_comment'></div>延及荒外，阴阳鬼神，细大万殊，一载以身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208081_comment'></div>下至律令，老吏所疑，故事旧章，在廷不知，有问于子，归如得师，直贯旁穿，水决矢飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208081_comment'></div>一时书林，众俊并驰，满堂贤豪，视子麈挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208081_comment'></div>逸足奇毛，不受绁羁，摈守列郡，吏民畏思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208081_comment'></div>治盗冤句，不事诛斩，他严见欺，子爱不犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208081_comment'></div>中斥于南，人忧子怡，归来白首，晚职训词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208081_comment'></div>子之来归，亦既疾病，惟其精明，犹足以永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208081_comment'></div>谁云如子，竟止斯耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208081_comment'></div>国失君子，善人之嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208081_comment'></div>方其盛时，弛不得张，亦既有遭，而蛊其强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208081_comment'></div>谁与子仇，败子百方，虽然今日，竟何有亡？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208081_comment'></div>惟我与君，同年进士，申以婚媾，兼恩与义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208081_comment'></div>平生谈笑，樽席燕喜，其当鉴耶，临此酒胾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1208081_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年3月</a>　梅灏（字子明）通判杭州，张耒作诗相送。作品：《送梅子明通判余杭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年春</a>　海棠花开，作诗戏晁补之。作品：《晁二家有海棠去岁花开晁二呼杜卿家小娃歌舞花下痛饮今春花开复欲招客而杜己出守戏以诗调之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年春</a>　海棠花开，作诗呈郭明远。作品：《复答迎郭侯犊车之句》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）郭明远，不详，时或为开封府通判。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年春</a>　海棠花开，作诗呈晁补之。作品：《漫呈无咎一绝》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　尝与苏轼、黄庭坚等会，饮龙团茶，苏轼作律赋。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年5月</a>　苏轼离京赴杭，以龙图阁学士、充浙西路兵马钤辖、知杭州军州事。秦觏从游，张耒作序文送之。作品：《送秦觏从苏杭州为学序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《张耒集》卷48《送秦观从苏杭州为学序》，‘秦观’当为‘秦觏’之误”，已改之。）</span><div id='poem_1207882' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207882' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207882?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送秦观从苏杭州为学序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207882")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207882_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207882'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207882'>秦子善文章而工于诗，其言清丽刻深，三反九复，一章乃成，大抵悲愁悽婉、郁塞无聊者之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207882_comment'></div>其于物也，秋蛩寒螀、鹎鵊猿狖之号鸣也，霜竹之风、冰谷之水、楚囚之弦、越羁之呻吟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207882_comment'></div>嘻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207882_comment'></div>秦子内有事亲之喜，外有朋友之乐，冬裘而夏絺，甘食而清饮，其中宁有介然者而顾为是耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207882_comment'></div>世之文章多出于穷人，故后之为文者，喜为穷人之词，秦子无忧而为忧者之词，殆出此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207882_comment'></div>吾请为子言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207882_comment'></div>古之所谓儒者，不主于学文，而文章之工，亦不可谓其能穷苦而深刻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207882_comment'></div>发大议，定大策，开人之所难惑，内足以正君，外可以训民，使于四方，邻国寝谋，言于军旅，敌人听命，则古者臧文仲、叔向、子产、晏婴、令尹子文之徒，实以是为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207882_comment'></div>后世取法焉，其于文也，云蒸雨降雷霆之震也，有生于天地之间者实赖之，是故系万物之休戚于其舌端之语默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207882_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207882_comment'></div>天地发生，雷雨时行，子独不闻之，而从草根之虫，危枝之翼，鸣呼以相求，子亦穷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207882_comment'></div>夫古之所谓儒者，所用之国无敌，若臧文仲、叔向、子产、晏婴、令尹子文，其望孔子亦远矣，而其功烈亦足以振显一时，故犹能以儒者之效名一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207882_comment'></div>夫不足以治国，而能知今古，考妖祥，纪事实，多闻而博通，则古太史氏之职，而初不以是为儒者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207882_comment'></div>楚左史倚相能读《三坟》、《五典》、《八索》、《九丘》，而楚之治不责倚相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207882_comment'></div>由是言之，古之论史与儒异事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207882_comment'></div>而司马谈为太史，号通古今，善文词，犹曰：「文史星历，近乎卜祝之间，主上以倡优畜之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207882_comment'></div>其尊礼不如公孙丞相、汲黯，此则汉之初犹有古之遗俗在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207882_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207882_comment'></div>儒之名实不正久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207882_comment'></div>自汉以来，圣贤之学废，而孔子之徒皆以其师之书自重于世，聚徒而授之，若是者，当时皆以儒之名归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207882_comment'></div>而司马谈序九流，儒者才当其一，彼未尝见其真，而信当时之所指，故从而论其失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207882_comment'></div>而班固以为出古司徒之官，呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207882_comment'></div>何其陋也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207882_comment'></div>儒者之治天下，九流之列皆其用也，顾与浅术末数各致其一曲者同哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207882_comment'></div>吾意今儒者之所学，古太史之流，而非世之所急也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207882_comment'></div>子享其全，无食其馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207882_comment'></div>据其源，无挹其流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207882_comment'></div>子方从眉山公，其以予言质之而归告予也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1207882_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年夏</a>　为李夫人作墓志铭。作品：《李夫人墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷60（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）李夫人乃范纯仁夫人王氏之嫂。）</span><div id='poem_1208069' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208069' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208069?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐四年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208069")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208069_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208069'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208069'>故大理寺丞王君讳毖之夫人李氏，真定人也，司空、赠尚书令、韩国公、谥文正讳昉之曾孙，金部员外郎、赠礼部尚书讳宗谅之孙，工部郎中、天章阁待制、赠太尉讳迈昭之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208069_comment'></div>夫人年十有八，归大理君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208069_comment'></div>性纯孝敏静，奉事舅姑能先意集事，饮食衣服非经其手不以荐，而舅姑亦曰：「非新妇所为，吾食不甘，服不安也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208069_comment'></div>宗党相教以为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208069_comment'></div>夫人之舅与其从弟，同时拜天章阁待制，从弟家治黄金带为燕服，夫人顾舅家贫不可得，悉其奁中物易金作带藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208069_comment'></div>待制出守陕州，盛服燕客，夫人出带使大理君献之，而家人初不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208069_comment'></div>与其夫处如宾客，骨肉有不至，必面规切之，退则更誉其善，故闻者信而不怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208069_comment'></div>大理君通判夔州，卒于官，一男始生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208069_comment'></div>夫人独护其丧还京师，道峡中，舟败，舟人舍舟而逃，夫人正色叱之，命取柩挈儿以免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208069_comment'></div>然家无长男子，道远，从者慢，夫人辄能言之官府，鞭罚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208069_comment'></div>以寡妇行艰危数千里，无败事，而内外始知其才，非独办夫人常职而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208069_comment'></div>既寡居杜门，虽父母家至有时留之宿不可，曰：「吾非间吾亲，顾年少子幼，理可畏也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208069_comment'></div>子长，躬教督之，慈而不骄，于以有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208069_comment'></div>今丞相范公之配英国夫人，大理君之妹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208069_comment'></div>英国幼时得危疾，久未平，夫人昼夜调护，有恩意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208069_comment'></div>英国岁时躬省，劳之良厚，以相府恩锡夫人命服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208069_comment'></div>元祐四年，夫人年七十矣，得疾，不肯御药物，家人固劝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208069_comment'></div>夫人曰：「吾无不足者，又获托死于英国，求生何待也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208069_comment'></div>左右趣为我沐浴更衣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208069_comment'></div>遂卒，五月二十四日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208069_comment'></div>一男曰约，宣德郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208069_comment'></div>四女：长嫁隰州录事参军刘损，次嫁奉议郎、权通判火山军葛繁，次蚤卒，次嫁殿中丞钟离景圭，前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208069_comment'></div>是岁六月七日，合葬夫人于开封府开封县大边村之原大理君之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208069_comment'></div>谯郡张某曰：「尝读《太史公书》，见其为滑稽、日者作传，而不著列女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208069_comment'></div>孔子叙《诗》，首《关雎》，著后妃之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208069_comment'></div>夫女德，王化之本也，岂小补哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208069_comment'></div>顾隐没不称，而贤贱士末术，于劝善未至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208069_comment'></div>惟夫人之德之才，其于死生之际，盖知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208069_comment'></div>此士大夫之所难，而可以无传乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208069_comment'></div>于其葬也，而铭之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1208069'>有夭其叶，既叶既实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208069_comment'></div>既艰既佚，而以始卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208069_comment'></div>诹良窾吉，殡夫子穴，是谓大毕。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1208069_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年秋</a>　王蘧以病致仕还江阴，张耒作诗送别。作品：《王子开朝散早年以疾病谢事还江阴求诗为别三首》（济物昔所务）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《王子开朝散早年以疾病谢事还江阴求诗为别三首》（田园何日到）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《王子开朝散早年以疾病谢事还江阴求诗为别三首》（避禄免危疾）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年10月25日</a>　王适（字子立）卒，张耒震悼悲哭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年11月</a>　为欧阳发作墓志铭。作品：《欧阳伯和墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷59（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208062' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208062' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208062?labeling=true' target='_blank'>欧阳伯和墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐四年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208062")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208062_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208062'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208062'>君欧阳氏，讳发，字伯和，庐陵人，太子少师文忠公讳修之长子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208062_comment'></div>为人纯实不欺，内外如一，淡薄无嗜好，而笃志好礼，刻苦于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208062_comment'></div>安定胡瑗掌太学，号大儒，以法度检束士，其徒少能从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208062_comment'></div>是时文忠公已贵，君年十有五，师事瑗，恂恂惟谨，又尽能传授古乐钟律之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208062_comment'></div>既长，益学问，不治科举文词，独探古始，立论议，自书契以来至今，君臣世系，制度文物，旁至天文地理，无所不学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208062_comment'></div>其学不务为抄掠应目前，必刮剖根本见终始，论次使族分部列，考之必得，得之必可用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208062_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208062_comment'></div>其志亦大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208062_comment'></div>然其与人不苟合，论事是是非非，遇权贵不少屈下，要必申其意，用是亦不肯轻试其所有，而人亦罕能知君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208062_comment'></div>而君之死也，今眉山苏公子瞻哭之，以为君得文忠之学，汉伯喈、晋茂先之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208062_comment'></div>初以文忠公恩补将作监主簿，三迁为大理寺丞，赐进士出身，勾当箔场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208062_comment'></div>迁光禄寺丞，赐五品服，勾当京西排岸司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208062_comment'></div>又迁殿中丞，官制改为奉议郎，监粳米中第七界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208062_comment'></div>俄权少府监丞，迁承议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208062_comment'></div>某年月日卒，享年四十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208062_comment'></div>积勋至轻车都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208062_comment'></div>君为殿中丞时，曹太后崩，诏定皇曾孙服制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208062_comment'></div>礼官陈公襄疑未决，方赴临，召君问其制，君从容为言事在杜佑《通典》甚详，襄即奏用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208062_comment'></div>是时，方下司天监讨论古占书是否同异，折中为天文书，久未就，而襄方总监事，即荐君刊修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208062_comment'></div>君为推考是非，取舍比次，书成，诏藏太史局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208062_comment'></div>襄因奏言旧浑仪坏不可用，而后所造新仪，考之又不合，愿付君详定，诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208062_comment'></div>本朝自至道中用韩显符浑仪，其后司天官周琮、于渊加黄道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208062_comment'></div>熙宁中，旧器坏，诏沈公括更造，括以其意增损之，器成数年未能定，与浮漏景表不应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208062_comment'></div>君较三家，考古注，又自因事立制，先为定仪奏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208062_comment'></div>神宗召君问曰：「浮漏以玉筒下水者，当坚久也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208062_comment'></div>君对曰：「玉不如铜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208062_comment'></div>沈括长用玉，今下水比初加速矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208062_comment'></div>上以为然，遂以君法铸新仪漏表，集其说号《法要》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208062_comment'></div>其后有附括议者讼于朝，诏再定，卒行君说，讼者亦服焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208062_comment'></div>君治官无大小，不苟简，所创立，后人不能更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208062_comment'></div>其著书有《古今系谱图》、《国朝二府年表》、《年号录》，其未成者尚数十篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208062_comment'></div>夫人吴氏，故丞相正宪公充之女，封寿安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208062_comment'></div>男一人，曰宪，滑州韦城县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208062_comment'></div>女七人，其四人皆蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208062_comment'></div>一嫁权武安军节度判官苏京，次嫁承务郎王景文，亦卒，次尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208062_comment'></div>孙一人，延世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208062_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，赠金紫光禄大夫、太师、中书令兼尚书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208062_comment'></div>曾祖妣李氏，封吴国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208062_comment'></div>祖讳某，赠金紫光禄大夫、太师、中书令兼尚书令，追封郑国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208062_comment'></div>祖妣郑氏，封韩国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1208062_comment'></div>初，文忠公以观文殿学士、太子少师致仕，累赠太师，追封兖国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1208062_comment'></div>妣薛氏，累封安康郡太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1208062_comment'></div>元祐四年十一月甲子，葬君郑州新郑县旌贤乡刘村文忠公之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1208062_comment'></div>而宪来求铭，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1208062'>呜呼伯和父！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1208062_comment'></div>学不欺其志，而不以为利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1208062_comment'></div>非不售之畏，而不知之愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1208062_comment'></div>岂与世为怼，其将有所耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1208062_comment'></div>云谁之似，惟文忠之子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1208062_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年12月17日</a>　应表弟李公辅之请，为冀州州学作记文。作品：《冀州州学记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷50（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208039' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208039' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208039?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冀州州学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年12月17日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208039")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208039_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208039'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208039'>朝廷以学校道艺教天下之士，亦已久矣，而其兴衰亦系其守长之能否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208039_comment'></div>庆历中，始诏郡县立学，而信都乃即孔子庙而为之，仅以塞诏，其后为守者欲兴之数矣，皆不果成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208039_comment'></div>元祐某年，河中刘侯守冀，始大作学舍，师之授经有堂，而诸生肄业有室，凡学之百须皆具，精壮完好，可以传久远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208039_comment'></div>又为买良田，治市舍，籍其所入以养士，而士之来学者日有饩，学之有司者月有给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208039_comment'></div>其秀民良材从其先生长者，皆往游焉，四方之士，闻而来者日至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208039_comment'></div>刘侯喜其有成，而使其属李公辅请文于谯郡张某以记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208039_comment'></div>为之言曰：嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208039_comment'></div>政事之缓急，如人之于饮食，不可强也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208039_comment'></div>强使急者缓，如止饥者之食，强使缓者急，如持食以进饱，二者无怪其不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208039_comment'></div>予尝怪今之士大夫，皆能责守令不如古者兴学校，隆师儒，读书行礼其中，而为守令者，虽责之不受，亦不害其为政，论守令之能否与夫人民之利病，亦绝不在此，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208039_comment'></div>三代之时，天子诸侯之有学，其朝夕政事之所系，不啻如今省寺之要且急也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208039_comment'></div>自出师、受成、献馘，皆必由之，则一事之不率教，至勤天子公卿而亲临焉，盖无足怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208039_comment'></div>当此之时，虽欲缓而不治，亦不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208039_comment'></div>先王之俗既亡，更数千岁，风俗礼乐既已大异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208039_comment'></div>而朝廷郡县之政，视学校无毫发相及，而乃日夜责之以不如古，夫我则无用而强授之，此何为者也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208039_comment'></div>且不怪夫冠者之不为章甫，骑者之不为驷马，而独怪学校之不如三王，不亦异哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208039_comment'></div>夫求三王之治，不立学，是废食于饥，而必责学校于今日，犹强食于饱，必不行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208039_comment'></div>由是言之，学之兴废，其本末远矣，吏未有责也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208039_comment'></div>夫未可以责吏，则刘侯之为此，殆苟然欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208039_comment'></div>盖昔者子贡欲去告朔之饩羊，子曰：「尔爱其羊，我爱其礼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208039_comment'></div>夫不告朔而去羊，未害也，然使后世不知有告朔者，自去羊始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208039_comment'></div>以今之政为无事于学，而不为可也，因我之无用而毁古人之所急，安知来者之不有作乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208039_comment'></div>此刘侯之所不忍也，侯之意亦深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208039_comment'></div>元祐四年十二月十七日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1208039_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　是岁，为胡戢琬琰堂题诗。作品：《寄题何戢秀才琬琰堂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“‘何戢’乃‘胡戢’之误。”）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　在朝中，有诗抒栖迟之感。姑系于此。作品：《无题》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《无题》或作于是岁前后”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元祐四年开封。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年2月</a>　李常（字公择）卒，张耒作祭文。作品：《祭成都李龙图文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208079' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208079' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208079?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭成都李龙图文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208079")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208079_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208079'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208079'>呜呼公择！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208079_comment'></div>其中退然，如不胜衣，而能为人，所不能为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208079_comment'></div>在熙宁初，政有大议，柄臣持之，一压以势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208079_comment'></div>公奋力争，与相抵刺，厥声凛然，卒摈于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208079_comment'></div>流落十年，天子思之，归卿太常，君子之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208079_comment'></div>于穆圣后，缉熙于学，公侍讲读，以开以觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208079_comment'></div>正位地官，干邦盈虚，持国风宪，匪激匪纾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208079_comment'></div>呜呼公择，孝友烝烝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208079_comment'></div>禄富族亲，妻孥无赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208079_comment'></div>死不能丧，图书在籯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208079_comment'></div>施于朋友，孔燕岂弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208079_comment'></div>旷无累心，清有遗味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208079_comment'></div>公去朝廷，大旆高牙，孰云来归，哭引丧车！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208079_comment'></div>旦夜死生，不足叹嗟，善人存亡，实系邦家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208079_comment'></div>叙哀一觞，其饮之耶！</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1208079_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年3月20日</a>　三月乙酉，与馆阁同舍有池上之集。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年5月</a>　姐夫杨补之赴鄂州支使，张耒作诗送行。作品：《送杨补之赴鄂州支使》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年5月</a>　张耒姐夫杨补之赴鄂州支使，姐姐张氏随之，张耒作诗送行。作品：《送三姊之鄂州》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年5月</a>　张耒姐夫杨补之赴鄂州支使，外甥杨克一同往，张耒作诗送行。作品：《送杨念三监簿侍行赴鄂渚》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年5月</a>　张耒姐夫杨补之赴鄂州支使，外甥杨克一同往，张耒赠诗相送。作品：《赠杨念三道孚》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年6月22日</a>　除著作佐郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年10月</a>　卧病，李之仪尝前往探望，并为张耒访医问药。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年冬</a>　病中读韦应物诗，并作诗寄晁补之。作品：《卧病读韦苏州诗呈无咎》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年冬</a>　病间，分别寄诗苏辙、秦观、晁补之。今仅见呈子由之诗。作品：《卧病月余呈子由二首》（蔀室悠悠昏复朝）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《卧病月余呈子由二首》（风叶鸣窗已复朝）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年冬</a>　卧病期间，曾遭给事中范纯礼弹劾。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年12月4日</a>　加集贤校理。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　是岁，与秦观等观易元吉《獐猿图》，作诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　是岁，尝与秦观论定《晋贤图》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　司马温公祠堂成，为作记文。作品：《司马温公祠堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷50（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208040' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208040' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208040?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司马温公祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208040")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208040_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208040'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208040'>元祐元年九月甲子，丞相司马公薨，朝廷议所以追崇之，于是进爵为公，而国于温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208040_comment'></div>惟司马氏系出晋安平献王孚，而献王河内温人也，故推本其故家而封之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208040_comment'></div>五年，奉议郎王仲儒为温令，告其邑人曰：「惟司马公道德功烈，著于朝廷、施及生民者，自匹夫匹妇与夫荒陬外裔、悍夫奸民，心革诚服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208040_comment'></div>左右两宫，格于太平，是其功德宜配社稷，天下祀之，而温公之封国也，顾不能祀而可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208040_comment'></div>于是度地作堂，画公像而礼祀焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208040_comment'></div>告于谯郡张某，使记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208040_comment'></div>某为之言曰：盛德之不作于世久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208040_comment'></div>古之所谓盛德者，不施而民服，无事而民信，未尝动颜色，见词气，而天下从之，若子弟之慕父母，故其为功也不劳，而物莫之能御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208040_comment'></div>三代之亡，圣贤不作，而士之能有所立于世者，亦多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208040_comment'></div>然皆费心殚力，招天下而从之，以其智胜之，后能有成，是何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208040_comment'></div>德不足而取办于其才故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208040_comment'></div>故其所建立，劳苦而浅陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208040_comment'></div>夫岂不欲为盛德之事哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208040_comment'></div>盖其所积者有不足故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208040_comment'></div>子产，君子也，犹曰：「惟有德者能以宽服民，其次莫如猛」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208040_comment'></div>夫子产岂欲为猛哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208040_comment'></div>以谓德之效实难，惧夫好高之难成也，是以甘心于其次，以求夫无失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208040_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208040_comment'></div>德者子产之所难，而况其下者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208040_comment'></div>故自秦汉而后，更千有馀岁，而盛德之士不作，盖无足怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208040_comment'></div>惟司马公事君而君敬之，未尝求民而民与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208040_comment'></div>非其类者，有不合而无不信；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208040_comment'></div>受其罚者，有不悦而无敢谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208040_comment'></div>其自洛入觐也，郡邑田里至于京师，观者千万，环聚嗟叹，至于泣下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208040_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208040_comment'></div>此可以言语术智得之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208040_comment'></div>故其相天下也，因物之所利而与之，因人之所厌而更之，从容指麾，内外响应，而天下无事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208040_comment'></div>盖自秦汉以来，至公而盛德之效始见于世，可谓盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208040_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208040_comment'></div>当大事，处大疑，勇者招敌，智者招谋，惟有德而后万物服，则夫二圣之所以用公，其可知也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208040_comment'></div>某辱游公之门，而喜王君之好德，使以其说书于堂而刻之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1208040_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　是岁或此前，尝同黄庭坚、晁补之游启圣院。姑系于此。作品：《同鲁直无咎游启圣》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　是岁在汴京，作诗咏麞猿图。作品：《麞猿图》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年立春</a>　是岁在汴京。立春日作诗。姑系于此。作品：《辛未立春》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“据诗题，乃是岁作。然诗曰：‘岁穷益惨淡，何以慰老人？’张耒时年三十八，此语殊觉不伦。待考。”）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年3月</a>　见双槐新叶，作诗。作品：《双槐晚秀三月一日初见新叶》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年3月</a>　春末，作诗咏双槐。作品：《咏双槐》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年6月8日</a>　是日，改著作佐郎、集贤校理为秘书丞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年秋</a>　与吕大临于秘书省观秋兰，作诗。作品：《和吕与叔秘书省观兰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年8月</a>　和吕大临、秦观等闲谈、戏谑。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年秋</a>　与王钦臣讨论杜甫诗或在此时期。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年10月</a>　冬十月，哲宗驾幸国子监、太学。门下侍郎吕大防等从驾，张耒作诗。作品：《和门下相公从驾幸学》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年11月16日</a>　为国史院检讨官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年12月24日</a>　迁著作郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年12月</a>　复至秘书省，作题屏诗一首。作品：《予元祐六年六月罢著作佐郎除秘书丞是岁仲冬复除著作郎兼史院检讨复至旧局题屏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　是岁，或为表弟李公辅改字德载，作字序。姑系于此。作品：《李德载字序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207990' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207990' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207990?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李德载字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207990")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207990_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207990'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207990'>表弟李成甫，名公辅，告予以不安其字也，求易之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207990_comment'></div>《诗》不云乎：「其车既载，乃弃尔辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207990_comment'></div>载输尔载，将伯助予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207990_comment'></div>无弃尔辅，员于尔辐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207990_comment'></div>屡顾尔仆，不输尔载」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207990_comment'></div>夫车之所载，或安焉，或输焉，系之于辅之弃与不弃而已，则辅之于车，功亦大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207990_comment'></div>虽然，辅之于物，有功于车而非车也，考一车之物，而辅不与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207990_comment'></div>然正六辔，谨轮辐，仆在前，马伏轭，而辅不至则车不安，登险而忧倾，涉淖而忧濡，视车中之载如寄物焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207990_comment'></div>且天下之物，固有相须不同域而相成者，岂独辅也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207990_comment'></div>千金之裘，成于工人之寸针；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207990_comment'></div>南越之箭，激于飞鸟之遗羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207990_comment'></div>玉蕴于石而金发之，兵切于肤而甲拒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207990_comment'></div>故其在人，则学是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207990_comment'></div>夫学之于人，非性之所素能也，而性不得学则不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207990_comment'></div>故夫子曰：「我非生而知之，好古，敏以求之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207990_comment'></div>夫人之于天者，其道素具矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207990_comment'></div>四端之于我，非外铄我者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207990_comment'></div>尧舜之于涂人，其本则一而已，彼为是尧舜涂人之别者，学不学异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207990_comment'></div>性在己，学在物，自外而视之，相去亦远矣，而舜、蹠由之，物固不能无所待而独成哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207990_comment'></div>夫学有道，道有序，循其序而积之者，行而能远，涉而能高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207990_comment'></div>下则鸟兽虫鱼器械服物之理无不通，中则修身正家治天下之业无不立，上则达性命，通死生，官天地，府万物，独立于万物之上而无与为侣，而学庶乎至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207990_comment'></div>虽然，有患忽小而务大，躐等而求至者，吾恶之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207990_comment'></div>自燕之秦者必之晋，自鲁之楚者必历卫，天下之所共由而不能越者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207990_comment'></div>夫无见乎小而能明大，与不涉乎等而能速至者，其可信也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207990_comment'></div>故保信以为车，力学以为辅，而载尔德焉，则周流天下，徜徉海外，以求子所欲，其有不得者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207990_comment'></div>予以「德载」易之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1207990_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　作诗赠表弟李公辅。姑系于此。作品：《赠李德载》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《赠李德载》《赠李德载二首》亦或作于是岁”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元祐六年开封。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　作诗二首，赠表弟李公辅诗。姑系于此。作品：《赠李德载二首》（我家外翁天下士）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《赠李德载二首》（长翁波涛万顷陂）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年春</a>　春初，刘季孙赴隰州知州，张耒作诗相送。作品：《送刘季孙守隰州》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷14（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年春</a>　秦观作诗寄参寥，张耒次韵作诗。作品：《次韵秦七寄道潜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年2月11日</a>　秦觏（字少章）赴任临安簿，张耒作文相送。作品：《送秦少章赴临安簿序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207879' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207879?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送秦少章赴临安簿序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年2月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207879")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207879_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207879'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207879'>《诗》不云乎：「蒹葭苍苍，白露为霜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207879_comment'></div>夫物不受变则材不成，人不涉难则智不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207879_comment'></div>季秋之月，天地始肃，寒气欲至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207879_comment'></div>方是时，天地之间，凡植物出于春夏雨露之馀，华泽充溢，支节美茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207879_comment'></div>及繁霜夜零，旦起而视之，如战败之军，捲旗弃鼓，裹创而驰，吏士无人色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207879_comment'></div>岂特如是而已，于是天地闭塞而成冬，则摧败拉毁之者过半，其为变亦酷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207879_comment'></div>然自是弱者坚，虚者实，津者燥，皆歛藏其英华于腹心，而各效其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207879_comment'></div>深山之木，上挠青云，下庇千人者，莫不病焉，况所谓蒹葭者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207879_comment'></div>然匠石操斧以游于林，一举而尽之，以充栋梁、桷杙、轮舆、輹辐，巨细强弱，无一不胜其任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207879_comment'></div>此之谓损之而益，败之而成，虐之而乐者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207879_comment'></div>吾党有秦少章者，自予为太学官时，以其文章示予，愀然告我曰：「惟家贫，奉命于大人而勉为科举之文也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207879_comment'></div>异时率其意为诗章古文，往往清丽奇伟，工于举业百倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207879_comment'></div>元祐六年及第，调临安主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207879_comment'></div>举子中第可少乐矣，而秦子每见予辄不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207879_comment'></div>予问其故，秦子曰：「予世之介士也，性所不乐不能为，言所不合不能交，饮食起居，动静百为，不能勉以随人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207879_comment'></div>今一为吏，皆失己而惟物之应，少自偃蹇，祸悔随至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207879_comment'></div>异时一身资养于父母，今则妇子仰食于我，欲不为吏，亦不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207879_comment'></div>自今以往，如沐漆而求解矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207879_comment'></div>予解之曰：「子之前日，春夏之草木也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207879_comment'></div>今日之病子者，蒹葭之霜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207879_comment'></div>凡人性惟安之求，夫安者天下之大患也，迁之为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207879_comment'></div>重耳不十九年于外，则归不能霸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207879_comment'></div>子胥不奔，则不能入郢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207879_comment'></div>二子者，方其羁穷忧患之时，阴益其所短而进其所不能者，非如学于口耳者之浅浅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207879_comment'></div>自今吾子思前之所为，其可悔者众矣，其所知益加多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207879_comment'></div>反身而安之，则行于天下无可惮者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207879_comment'></div>能推食与人者，尝饥者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207879_comment'></div>赐之车马而辞者，不畏徒步者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207879_comment'></div>苟畏饥而恶步，则将有苟得之心，为害不既多乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207879_comment'></div>故陨霜不杀者，物之灾也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207879_comment'></div>逸乐终身者，非人之福也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207879_comment'></div>元祐七年仲春十一日书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1207879_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年2月</a>　表弟李公辅赴宣城任，张耒作诗相送。作品：《送李公辅赴宰宣城》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年3月3日</a>　是月上巳，馆阁诸君游金明池、琼林苑，会于国夫人园。张耒预其会，并次王古（字敏仲）韵作诗。作品：《次韵王敏仲至西池会饮》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《次韵王敏仲池上》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　有诗寄刘季孙。作品：《刘景文许惠毡裘未至督之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　供职秘书省期间，早晨赴秘书省，有感作诗。姑系于此。作品：《晓赴秘书省有感》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　供职秘书省期间，纳凉，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《纳凉》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　供职秘书省期间，作诗写沟泥。姑系于此。作品：《沟泥二首》（不嫌泥潦巷）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《沟泥二首》（沟泥不可步）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　供职秘书省期间，作诗写馆直舍。姑系于此。作品：《书馆直舍》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　任职秘书省时，曾与孔武仲、晁补之等同校《名臣事迹》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年7月12日</a>　张耒编受诏修《神宗正史》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年8月</a>　秘书省曝书，孔武仲赋诗，张耒次其韵作诗一首。作品：《次韵孔舍人曝书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年11月</a>　合祭天地于圜丘，张耒受命奉祝册。礼成，进赋。作品：《大礼庆成赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207789' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207789' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207789?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大礼庆成赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207789")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207789_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207789'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207789'>惟宋六世皇帝践阼之七年，所以和同天人，绥静中外，垂鸿袭裕，增高累厚，以对于神祇祖考者，固已蒙被充塞，光融翕赫，六合一意，四海一口，无得而言矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207789_comment'></div>粤以壬申之仲冬，将有事于南郊，乃诏列位，恪职赋事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207789_comment'></div>而有司建言：「惟我国家，因时施礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207789_comment'></div>郊丘之位，天地咸在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207789_comment'></div>牲币并荐，礼乐合举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207789_comment'></div>而古者乃以阴阳之至，即南北之郊，别位殊时，荐献异数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207789_comment'></div>有司其何从」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207789_comment'></div>于是天子惕然深思，祗畏敬慎曰：「兹大事，我其敢专？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207789_comment'></div>群公卿士、典礼之官，竭思和会，以订不易」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207789_comment'></div>于是议者曰：「先王斋明以享帝，而帝之享否，虽圣人末由知之，惟受福者其享之占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207789_comment'></div>恭惟国家合祭天地，于兹六世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207789_comment'></div>惟我太祖躬膺骏命，以遏乱略，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1207789", 1207789, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>堂皇</span>二仪，拓落八极，以定万世之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207789_comment'></div>太宗威定宇内，震荡大卤，以一九有，定天下于一尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207789_comment'></div>真宗熙洽富盛，符瑞委积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207789_comment'></div>南牧之旅，不战请命，威加北荒，奏功岱宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207789_comment'></div>仁宗席安据厚，不勤指顾，孽獠猾羌，含毒内向，吏士未顿，藏窜屈伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207789_comment'></div>终始太平，垂五十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207789_comment'></div>英宗入纂，百姓与能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207789_comment'></div>神考有为，六服承德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207789_comment'></div>此可谓受天地之福矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207789_comment'></div>然则神祇之安，吾享也其久哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207789_comment'></div>于是天子乃翳青云之屋，乘雕玉之舆，应龙受辔，招摇翼辀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207789_comment'></div>建虹电之修竿兮，飏彗星之飞斿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207789_comment'></div>太乙执节以先驱兮，二十八星拱手布武经营而周游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207789_comment'></div>貔貅六师，雷霆万乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207789_comment'></div>初海沸而云涌，忽山峙而川静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207789_comment'></div>盖天子粹然玉温，健然天运，望宫门而动色，顾执策而命进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207789_comment'></div>惟烜赫之灵源兮，实鼻祖于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207789_comment'></div>览光德而来降兮，馆玉宇之严清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207789_comment'></div>张咸英之广乐，备干籥之盛舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207789_comment'></div>景光交彻，鸾鹤来下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207789_comment'></div>神嬉灵豫，醉爵饱俎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207789_comment'></div>翼翼清庙，观德之宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207789_comment'></div>七圣在天，时降于宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207789_comment'></div>世有哲孙，岂弟无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207789_comment'></div>惠我文人，□□□□。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207789_comment'></div>瞻祖祏而念功兮，顾祢室而感亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207789_comment'></div>圣孝油然发中兮，在位望而含辛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207789_comment'></div>霁旸告旦，祥飙掠尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207789_comment'></div>从我髦士，来祗精禋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207789_comment'></div>御史肃吏，司马饬兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207789_comment'></div>既逶逶迟迟，云流而日行兮，又汹汹业业，海运而天声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207789_comment'></div>灵旂洪颐翕赫欻霍兮，攫拿龙虎而乱鲲鹏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207789_comment'></div>雄鷔憺威而震伏兮，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1207789", 1207789, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>柔良</span>化礼而肃清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207789_comment'></div>弛天威、戢天戈兮，固已熄灭蚩尤而折欃枪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207789_comment'></div>执飞廉圉商羊属之有司兮，羲和磨刮披拂尽献其光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207789_comment'></div>盖倾都空闾，翘首跂足，俯窥履綦，傍觇佩玉者，忽焉不知手之加颡，口之成祝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207789_comment'></div>于是背都城，望帷宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207789_comment'></div>郊坰坦其迤逦兮，场圃既寒而毕功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207789_comment'></div>颓青云以连属，灿虹霓之经纬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207789_comment'></div>紫微下属于两观，句陈错施于万雉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207789_comment'></div>扶倾之神，仰立而拱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207789_comment'></div>翔德之龙，下视而曳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207789_comment'></div>疑神变之欻成兮，涌九地而出峙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207789_comment'></div>连庑千柱，广殿万杙，飞甍斗桷，洞牖屹壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207789_comment'></div>酸股之隅，眩目之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207789_comment'></div>唐洛执算而莫计，班倕操斤而自惑者，类非资材于斲墁，而皆机杼之纺绩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207789_comment'></div>一室之用，足以温一家，一宫之费，何啻衣一国？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207789_comment'></div>惊霆之跸既震，汹壑之声咸寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207789_comment'></div>敞斋寝之静深兮，何清虚而邃密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207789_comment'></div>天子方端而虚，俨而一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207789_comment'></div>多仪未举，精意已塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207789_comment'></div>甲夜始晦，严鼓载作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207789_comment'></div>飞敛走伏，神詟鬼愕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207789_comment'></div>望舒腾精以烛宵兮，玄冥收威而布德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207789_comment'></div>灵鼍五震，轸车将中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207789_comment'></div>天子乃被衮执玉兮，斋明庄肃之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207789_comment'></div>动于进趋，表于形容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207789_comment'></div>千燎具扬，万炬毕融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207789_comment'></div>上掩荧惑，旁烁烛龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207789_comment'></div>近为朝阳，远为融风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207789_comment'></div>赫赫曦曦，煌煌辉辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207789_comment'></div>列次之士，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1207789", 1207789, "Clauses/190/Comments/0")'>野屯</span>之师，岿如酌醇醪而御兼衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207789_comment'></div>黄流汪洋，璧玉照彻，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1207789", 1207789, "Clauses/194/Comments/0")'>祥祲</span>衡布，协气下浃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207789_comment'></div>音为乐和，形为人悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207789_comment'></div>白质之兽，箫声之鸟，纷披杂沓，应奏而舞节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207789_comment'></div>陟降既周，燎烟始升，奔星走虹，奉璧荐牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207789_comment'></div>丰隆奔驰而仰骛兮，祝融焜煌而上征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207789_comment'></div>开阊阖兮辟清都，后帝燕兮百神愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207789_comment'></div>圆锡盖兮方献舆，岳输固兮溟效濡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207789_comment'></div>于是礼备乐成，整车而旋，万类环极，端门辟天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207789_comment'></div>赏出千庾，恩流百川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207789_comment'></div>北包大壤，南尽岛蛮，西越流沙，东穷海壖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207789_comment'></div>令未脱口，雷运风传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207789_comment'></div>野无穷人，狱无宿愆，破械解缧，负帛囊钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207789_comment'></div>车反其舍，士复其伍，效技呈才，千钟万鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207789_comment'></div>天子举酒，以属群公，咸曰「休哉，天子之功」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207789_comment'></div>系曰：于穆圣王，建皇极兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207789_comment'></div>严恭精禋，帝来格兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207789_comment'></div>柔祇并位，俨牲璧兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207789_comment'></div>文祖在坐，临有赫兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207789_comment'></div>于惟祖宗，有常则兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207789_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1207789", 1207789, "Clauses/247/Comments/0")'>讳兵畏刑</span>，后货食兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1207789_comment'></div>政有损益，兹不易兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1207789_comment'></div>帝则鉴之，戬谷锡兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1207789_comment'></div>兢兢业业，日一日兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1207789_comment'></div>三载一祀，年万亿兮。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_1207789'></div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1207789_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年11月</a>　合祭天地于圜丘，张耒受命奉祝册。礼成，进表。作品：《进大礼庆成赋表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207821' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207821' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207821?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进大礼庆成赋表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207821")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207821_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207821'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207821'>臣伏见皇帝陛下即位以来，事天治民，虔恭岂弟，光被四表，格于上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207821_comment'></div>虽太母保宥，一遵圣训，而仁厚之诚，不言而孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207821_comment'></div>乃者肇见天地，实陛下即位之初郊，内自臣工，外达海宇，于以观神人感格之际，占信顺获助之验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207821_comment'></div>前祀二日，阴霰暮集，俄而氛祲廓清，星月明润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207821_comment'></div>将事之夜，风伏不兴，景气晏温，圆穹清明，神祇来格，于是乎在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207821_comment'></div>凡执事在列之臣，与夫侍御奔走之隶，喜动乎容，和见乎声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207821_comment'></div>《记》曰：「福者，备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207821_comment'></div>备者，百顺之名也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207821_comment'></div>天既顺之，备孰甚焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207821_comment'></div>帝之来格，见于天时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207821_comment'></div>祭之受福，见于人情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207821_comment'></div>臣幸执笔，待罪太史，实奉祝册，天威咫尺，亲见斋庄粹穆之容，陟降拜俯，诚敬尽兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207821_comment'></div>臣窃喜太平之必至，多祥之必集，四方之民，受福不疑，奸宄作慝，不禁而息，谨撰成《大礼庆成赋》一篇，随状上进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207821_comment'></div>虽不足以追配《甘泉》、《河东》之广大盛丽，然犬马之愚，庶以自竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207821_comment'></div>伏惟清閒之燕，略伫览观，干犯宸严，无任激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1207821_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207821'><span class='label'>按：</span>《柯山集》卷三一。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷一○。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207821_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　郊祀期间，尝与苏轼论治眼病。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　是岁，钱勰妻吕氏卒，张耒作挽词。作品：《吕郡君挽词》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年1月</a>　黄寔为两浙刑狱，苏轼有送行诗，张耒次韵作诗。作品：《次韵苏翰林送黄师是赴两浙》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年4月</a>　晁补之弟将之（字无斁）得官曹州教授，张耒同孔平仲作诗为贺。作品：《同毅夫贺无斁教授》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年5月</a>　吴复古还山，作诗相送。作品：《送麻田吴子野还山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年6月</a>　代范纯仁作让官表文。作品：《代范相让官表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207828' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207828' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207828?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代范相让官表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207828")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207828_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207828'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207828'>不俟驾行，既已驱驰而至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207828_comment'></div>畴若予采，复膺考慎之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207828_comment'></div>在明主图旧之意则深，于愚臣陈力之义则过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207828_comment'></div>伏以二圣求治，历年于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207828_comment'></div>忠厚之泽，足以传之无穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207828_comment'></div>仁孝之诚，固已格于上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207828_comment'></div>守此成宪，底于太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207828_comment'></div>加以左右辅弼之臣，尽极老成俊乂之选，何图次辅之虚位，乃复召臣于守藩？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207828_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇皇帝陛下广度兼收，至明洞照，察其疲驽之不逮，出于悃愊之无他，意其先之教忠，恐或老而更事，责以来效，用之不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207828_comment'></div>上副眷求，敢爱竭尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207828_comment'></div>而臣伏自深念，固非饰辞，形骸已衰，心力随耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207828_comment'></div>虽辅相重任，不欲舍其旧而新图，然衰疾交攻，岂期老将知而耄及？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207828_comment'></div>虽至仁之曲被，顾公议之谓何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207828_comment'></div>岂无岩穴待招之贤，朝廷委质之彦？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207828_comment'></div>与之图国，足以格天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207828_comment'></div>而臣已试之效可知，将老之诚弥切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207828_comment'></div>不能就列，辞敢避于再三；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207828_comment'></div>因是得人，功犹期于万一。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1207828_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年8月1日</a>　苏轼继室王闰之卒，张耒作祭文。作品：《祭苏端明郡君文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208083' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208083' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208083?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭苏端明郡君文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年8月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208083")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208083_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208083'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208083'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208083_comment'></div>人生万殊，之死同科，其间疾徐，相去唯阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208083_comment'></div>作嫔大贤，克宜厥家，妇也有兹，万一则多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208083_comment'></div>显允夫人，简俭纯明，相其君子，险夷屡更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208083_comment'></div>穆穆愉愉，何易何艰，能俾君子，即居而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208083_comment'></div>象服委蛇，亦既辉光，云何不淑，乃折于强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208083_comment'></div>苏公执丧，尽礼致哀，曰予德思，匪媾之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208083_comment'></div>某等受学师门，义等族戚，矢词殡前，侑此酒食。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1208083_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年9月3日</a>　太皇太后高氏卒，张耒作挽词。作品：《太皇太后挽词》（坐安民物由修己）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《太皇太后挽词》（共政艰难际）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年9月</a>　苏轼将赴定州任，与诸馆职饯于惠济，张耒在坐。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　尝与苏轼论史，其一论司马迁《十二诸侯年表》，有书文记之。姑系于此。作品：《与大苏简》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷55（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）将本条文献系于苏轼将离开京师前，姑系于此。原文献诗题为《与大苏二简》，知识图谱网分为《与大苏简》（一）、《与大苏简》（二），由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><div id='poem_1207846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与大苏简<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207846")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207846'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207846'>昨日款举教诲，开益多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207846_comment'></div>但所论司马迁《十二诸侯年表》，并周与吴，实十四国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207846_comment'></div>周不在数，固无足疑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207846_comment'></div>并吴为十三而不数吴者，窃详考之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207846_comment'></div>吴比诸国见于表最晚，鲁成公六年，当吴寿梦元年，始见于表，然吴有国十馀世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207846_comment'></div>迁不自共和叙年与诸国一概者，考《吴世家》，去齐卒，寿梦立，自去齐以上皆不著即位年数，略叙传世而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207846_comment'></div>是迁自去齐以上，但得其世而不得其即位之年，无从为谱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207846_comment'></div>自寿梦以后，世家每世辄载其即位年数，年既可考，故自寿梦表乃见之，与十二国自共和至春秋终不得一例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207846_comment'></div>既谓之《年表》，而吴之年脱略不伦，但如附见，故止谓之十二国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207846_comment'></div>其序曰：「谱十二诸侯，自共和迄孔子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207846_comment'></div>吴既不全，意不成为谱耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207846_comment'></div>而迁于是诸国初无抑扬也，不然吴楚之僭，何有轻重？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207846_comment'></div>迁遽进楚而退吴，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207846_comment'></div>考其本末，理似应尔，不审定是与否，更俟来教。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207846_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207847' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207847' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207847?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207847_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207847'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207847'>昨日奉教赐，下情感慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207847_comment'></div>《唐六臣传》略得闻教诲，但意所未谕者，非以为史者不得少有抑扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207847_comment'></div>夫无抑扬褒贬，何用为史？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207847_comment'></div>顾所以抑扬之当有道耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207847_comment'></div>彼六人者为唐大臣，挈国而输之贼，北面而事之，为史者曰：汝唐臣也，无臣梁之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207847_comment'></div>汝虽苟免，吾从而正其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207847_comment'></div>而其人之罪无所逃，此其意有何不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207847_comment'></div>但其书谓之《五代史记》，而其中有一卷忽谓之唐，唐非五代也，标卷为唐，于史之名似不顺尔，虽不云尔，尚可以贬辱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207847_comment'></div>班氏书有后汉事，范氏书亦有前汉事，耒以为若因及之，虽上越数代犹为无害，但立名标卷似不应尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207847_comment'></div>若鲁《春秋》中忽有一篇为秦汉，则事似难行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207847_comment'></div>不审以为如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207847_comment'></div>此亦少不至者，不当反覆致论，姑欲受教耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207847_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　尝与苏轼、黄庭坚等论诗。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　尝作《七夕歌》，为苏轼称赏。姑系于此。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，作品大致作于元祐在朝期间秋日，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　曾与晁补之秋夜西岗联句。姑系于此。作品：《秋夜西岗联句》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗《张耒集》未见。原文献时间不详，作品大致作于元祐在朝期间秋日，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在朝期间，秋日在京师，遇雨受阻，作诗二首。姑系于此。作品：《京师阻雨二首》（深泥漫漫污后土）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，作品大致作于元祐在朝期间秋日，姑系于此。）</span>《京师阻雨二首》（大雨三日泥三尺）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，作品大致作于元祐在朝期间秋日，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年秋</a>　于史院直舍题诗，抒仕途倦意。作品：《题史院直舍鱼鹭屏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年10月</a>　李之仪应苏轼之辟，离京赴定州，张耒作序文相送。作品：《送李端叔赴定州序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207880' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207880' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207880?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送李端叔赴定州序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207880")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207880_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207880'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207880'>某为儿童，从先人于山阳学官，始见端叔为诸生，某虽未有知，意已相亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207880_comment'></div>后几二十年，端叔罢官四明，道楚，某又获见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207880_comment'></div>某时已孤，端叔吊我，悲怀如骨肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207880_comment'></div>后凡再遇于京师，今其再也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207880_comment'></div>然端叔每别数年一见，其议论益奇，名誉益高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207880_comment'></div>今朝廷士大夫相与称说天下士，屈指不一二，必曰吾端叔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207880_comment'></div>元祐八年，苏先生守定武，士愿从行者半朝廷，然皆不敢有请于先生，而苏先生一日言于朝，请以端叔佐幕府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207880_comment'></div>苏先生之位，未能进退天下士，故用子如此，然其意可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207880_comment'></div>某，苏先生门人之下列也，其亲慕端叔不足怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207880_comment'></div>庚午，某卧病城南，门无犬鸡，昼卧愔愔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207880_comment'></div>端叔尝夜过我，以烛视我面目，见病有间，喜动词色，访觅医药，以至无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207880_comment'></div>我之道艺无取，名誉不振，端叔独拳拳于此，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207880_comment'></div>然端叔与予外家通谱，于我舅行也，岂其出乎此，非耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207880_comment'></div>八年十月过我，告以将北，求予言为赠行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207880_comment'></div>予在交游中已号为多言，其敢有爱于子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207880_comment'></div>为今中国患者，西北二虏也，狙伺我久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207880_comment'></div>西小而轻，故为变易；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207880_comment'></div>北大而重，故为变迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207880_comment'></div>小者疥癣，大者痈疽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207880_comment'></div>自北方罢兵，中国直信而不问，君臣不以挂于口而虑于心者数十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207880_comment'></div>吾知其故，诚知骄虏之不能轻弃吾之重币也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207880_comment'></div>有司如故事，岁时发币，车马出门，而北顾无事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207880_comment'></div>凡为是说者，谓非虏情则不可，然人度量相远，未可以什百计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207880_comment'></div>世固有得一金而喜者，何必金帛数十万？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207880_comment'></div>亦有得国于人而不厌者，数十万金帛未足赖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207880_comment'></div>往赵元昊未反时，中国不为备御，犹今日之信北也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207880_comment'></div>一旦不逊，中国震动，视其治军立国，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1207880", 1207880, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>骄逆</span>悍鸷，岂特河陇间一羌酋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207880_comment'></div>吾安能复以羁縻其父祖者制畜之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207880_comment'></div>且雄杰之才未尝绝于世，不在中国，必在夷狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207880_comment'></div>高皇帝以气吞中原之雄，而冒顿张于匈奴，高帝终无以困之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207880_comment'></div>魏灭蜀，晋灭吴，大敌已尽，而苻、石骛于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207880_comment'></div>祖宗芟夷僭乱，天下听顺，无复偃蹇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207880_comment'></div>而久之元昊叛于羌，自是以来又数十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207880_comment'></div>某闻今北边要郡，有城隍不修，器械苦恶，屯戍单寡，然跬步强敌而人不惧者，诚信之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207880_comment'></div>枭鸱不鸣，要非祥也，豺狼不噬，要非仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207880_comment'></div>见其不鸣，谓之孔鸾，见其不噬，待以犬马，吁，亦过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207880_comment'></div>定武，虏冲也，其容有悔乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207880_comment'></div>某顷在洛阳，与刘几者语边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207880_comment'></div>几，老将也，谓某曰：「比见诏书，禁边吏夜饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207880_comment'></div>此曹一旦有急，将使输其肝脑，而平日禁其为乐，为今役者，不亦难乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207880_comment'></div>夫椎牛酾酒，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1207880", 1207880, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>丰犒</span>而休养之，非欲以醉饱为德，所以增士气也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207880_comment'></div>某闻定武异时从军，吏士丰乐豪盛，而今燕豆疏恶，终日受享，腹犹枵然，官吏贫窭，有愁苦无聊之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207880_comment'></div>且朝廷既委所当费而不爱矣，将军将重兵，临方面，天子属以何事，而与持筹小吏日夜计口腹之赢，此何为者也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207880_comment'></div>真能遂不费一钱，才得几何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207880_comment'></div>子从辟以佐帅军事，与有责矣，挟端叔之学问词章而从苏先生，如决大川而放之海，是则予无以赞子矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1207880_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年冬</a>　为商瑶作墓志铭。作品：《商屯田墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷59（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）商屯田，名瑶，商倚伯父。）</span><div id='poem_1208063' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208063' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208063?labeling=true' target='_blank'>商屯田墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐八年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208063")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208063_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208063'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208063'>公讳瑶，字某，淄川人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208063_comment'></div>曾祖重进，祖文俊，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208063_comment'></div>父馀政，赠大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208063_comment'></div>君登景祐元年进士第，为莱芜、单父县尉，临沂县令，知下邳县，签书平定军判官事，以尚书屯田员外郎知襄邑县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208063_comment'></div>卒，年五十，至和二年正月二十七日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208063_comment'></div>阶至承事郎，勋为骑都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208063_comment'></div>君少博学，为文词豪健，貌魁杰，严整不可犯，而平居乐易长者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208063_comment'></div>单父多盗，君以策钩猎，枭绞且尽，盗怨毒入骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208063_comment'></div>罢官还乡，次大泽中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208063_comment'></div>夕有叟密来语曰：「林中有恶少年十数，操利兵而伏，期今日必杀单父尉，是君非耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208063_comment'></div>君从者惧，欲亡去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208063_comment'></div>公执弓矢徐出，有大木去百步许，望之中有空焉，公谓其人曰：「我为若射彼空者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208063_comment'></div>再发皆中之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208063_comment'></div>林中恶少年大惧，争先遁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208063_comment'></div>其治下邳，决讼多辩谕劝说之，不尽临以法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208063_comment'></div>民始斗怒，中忽喜悟，相与请平者常十七八，老猾吏旁瞪视不得刺手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208063_comment'></div>父老戒子弟曰：「若忍犯此令乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208063_comment'></div>富韩公守青州，闻其治状，数委公决难事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208063_comment'></div>始君为包孝肃公知，韩忠献公器公，见必访以世务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208063_comment'></div>而公无所苟合，贵人终不肯出气力引挈之，其胸中不少概见而死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208063_comment'></div>先妻刘夫人，继室王夫人，封寿昌县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208063_comment'></div>三男子，皆已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208063_comment'></div>一孙，求之，举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208063_comment'></div>女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208063_comment'></div>曾孙一人，尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208063_comment'></div>公之从子太学博士倚，以元祐八年十月日，将葬公淄川万年之原，以二夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208063_comment'></div>而博士又以公之爵里行事告于著作郎张某曰：「子史官也，凡世有善而无传，则子有罪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208063_comment'></div>某不敢辞，乃为诗，使刻石墓中，曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1208063'>天下平治，士无功名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208063_comment'></div>才否一区，之死无声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208063_comment'></div>或宏其声，而中乃枵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208063_comment'></div>窾实靡计，孰昧孰昭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208063_comment'></div>有淄商公，甚畜不施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208063_comment'></div>时弃其直，则己光辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208063_comment'></div>彼不人逢，位下固宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208063_comment'></div>啬不使年，造物则奚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1208063_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年冬</a>　苏轼在定州得雪浪石，赋诗，张耒有诗唱和。作品：《和定州端明雪浪斋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷14（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年冬</a>　蔡肇（字天启）惠橘与诗，张耒作诗相答。作品：《和天启惠橘诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年冬</a>　作诗与蔡肇唱和。姑系于此。作品：《和天启画古木山石诗》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年11月</a>　苏轼在定州作《鹤叹》，张耒因作诗。作品：《寄中山鹤》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年冬至</a>　冬至日与钱勰等聚饮，后因寒热卧病多日，作诗呈钱勰。作品：《某寒热伏枕已数日忽闻车骑明当接顿睡中得韵语数句上呈四丈龙图兼记至日之饮》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　任史官期间，因病臂，挽弓无力，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《耒病臂比已平独挽弓无力客言君为史官何事挽弓戏作此诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年冬</a>　除起居舍人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　寓值散骑舍时，有诗作。姑系于此。作品：《秋日有作寓直散骑舍》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“张耒所任起居舍人亦属中书省。故暂系于此”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元祐八年开封。。搜韵网无此诗。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年11月16日</a>　十一月庚寅，监察御史来之邵、侍御史杨畏等奏论张耒。张耒上辞免状。作品：《辞免起居舍人状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207834' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207834' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207834?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免起居舍人状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年11月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207834")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207834_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207834'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207834'>窃以言动之职，最近清光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207834_comment'></div>儒学之臣，以为荣选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207834_comment'></div>臣孤贫晚进，驽散薄材，擢自选人，置之大学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207834_comment'></div>复天禄、石渠之职，首预选抡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207834_comment'></div>䌷金匮玉版之书，两领著作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207834_comment'></div>功能蔑有，屏退所甘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207834_comment'></div>加以冒昧史官，颇糜岁月，论次故事，徒事简编，何有贤劳，遽叨奖擢？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207834_comment'></div>浸阶华近，入侍禁严，内循弱植之易摇，实惧多言之可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207834_comment'></div>敢倾诚恳，祈止误恩，免速颠隮，更累乐育。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207834_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
