ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　元祐在朝期间，作论文。姑系于此。作品：《进诚明说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷47（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为元祐时期，具体不详，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1208015' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208015' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208015?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进诚明说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208015")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208015_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208015'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208015'>帝王之德莫大于务学，学莫大于根诚明之性而蹈于中庸之德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208015_comment'></div>生而不动之谓诚，知而不为之谓明，正而不邪之谓忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208015_comment'></div>是故诚者立善之本也，明者致道之用也，中庸者常德之守也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208015_comment'></div>三者立，天下之能事毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208015_comment'></div>圣人者，得乎神者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208015_comment'></div>因诚而后明，必资乎学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208015_comment'></div>全尽以居之，神固以行之，酬酢万物而无失乎曲当，此之谓诚则明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208015_comment'></div>贤人者，思诚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208015_comment'></div>因明而后诚，在也择乎善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208015_comment'></div>所谓善者，可欲之谓也，性也正而公者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208015_comment'></div>所谓恶者，有所不为之谓也，情伪也，邪而私者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208015_comment'></div>存其所谓正而公者，而去其所谓邪而私者，此之谓择善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208015_comment'></div>精一以守之，中正以养之，持循戒惧于不睹不闻之际，此之谓慎独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208015_comment'></div>而固执之矣，久而不息则形，形而不息则明，明而不息则动，动而不息则化，化而不息则神，高明博厚而配乎天地，此之谓明则诚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208015_comment'></div>子思曰：「溥博渊泉，而时出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208015_comment'></div>溥博如天，渊泉如渊」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208015_comment'></div>言其诚之笃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208015_comment'></div>诚之者笃，则其为之者至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208015_comment'></div>是以其政不肃而行，其教不言而喻，其事不劳而成，举而措之天下之民，无不从服而不知为之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208015_comment'></div>故曰凡为天下国家有九经，所以行之者一，此之谓诚明之学。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1208015_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　元祐在朝期间，夏侍禁卒，张耒作祭文。姑系于此。作品：《祭夏侍禁文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为元祐时期，具体不详，姑系于此年。夏侍禁，不详。）</span><div id='poem_1208082' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208082' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208082?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭夏侍禁文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208082")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208082_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208082'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208082'>惟灵胄出豪贵，服膺礼义，恪守官次，志于诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208082_comment'></div>云何不淑，奄至大故，命有修短，夫复何言！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208082_comment'></div>日吉时良，安以即路，奠觞为决，已矣呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208082_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1208082_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　元祐后，作赋写饮酒。姑系于此。作品：《三酌赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为元祐时期，具体不详，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1207818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207818?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三酌赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207818")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207818'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207818'>出公门而偃私，酌旨酒于良辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207818_comment'></div>缅再酌而三釂，恍如对乎佳宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207818_comment'></div>畏局促之伤怀，聊流畅乎心神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207818_comment'></div>惩荒湎乎无算，悠然合乎礼文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207818_comment'></div>荡志文史，晤言《诗》、《书》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207818_comment'></div>世醉不足，我醒有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207818_comment'></div>颐妙物表，韬精道枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207818_comment'></div>冥会独应，谁知我娱？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207818_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207818_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　元祐后，春日作诗四首。姑系于此。作品：《春日杂兴四首》（桃李用事辰）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为元祐时期，具体不详，姑系于此年。）</span>《春日杂兴四首》（昔我游京室）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为元祐时期，具体不详，姑系于此年。）</span>《春日杂兴四首》（客从远方来）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为元祐时期，具体不详，姑系于此年。）</span>《春日杂兴四首》（潭潭故邑井）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为元祐时期，具体不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年1月</a>　任礼部别头试主考官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年春</a>　去冬请郡奏状未获批准，再次作文请郡。作品：《任起居舍人乞郡状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>任起居舍人乞郡状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207835")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207835'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207835'>右，臣准尚书省劄子，以臣乞知颍、相、徐、润州一次，奉圣旨不允所乞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207835_comment'></div>臣伏以君父之命，当即奉承，尚敢烦言，罪当万死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207835_comment'></div>臣秉笔史馆，入侍禁严，渐阶宠荣，固愿冒昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207835_comment'></div>然亲近清光，而衰瘵败而支体；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207835_comment'></div>论次旧闻，其疾苦耗其心精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207835_comment'></div>常惧尸官，安能称职？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207835_comment'></div>义当自列，敢避重诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207835_comment'></div>伏念臣自患风痹，今已五年，虽粗支持，而去年冬末，因患疮疹，毒气流注支节，脚膝痛痹，甚则屈弱，乘骑拜伏，动忧颠仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207835_comment'></div>力加调养，或可完安，失今不治，必成沈痼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207835_comment'></div>圣君在上，仁爱兼容，臣下得以言情，卑贱亦思从欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207835_comment'></div>伏乞除臣知颍、陕、徐、润州一次，庶得少就优便，专意药物，民社可以竭力，俸廪足以纾贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207835_comment'></div>犹冀疲驽，复备鞭策。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207835_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年春</a>　亲友问请郡之事，张耒作诗答之。作品：《贫病投劾乞补外官亲友问者以诗答之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷27（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年3月</a>　集英殿策试礼部奏名进士，张耒与焉，并作诗叙之。作品：《叙十五日事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年3月</a>　集英殿策试礼部奏名进士，张耒与焉，作诗。作品：《绍圣甲戌侍立集英殿临轩试举人作此两绝》（春来小殿雪初残）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《绍圣甲戌侍立集英殿临轩试举人作此两绝》（弱岁干名翰墨场）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　作文论“敢言”。姑系于此。作品：《敢言说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷46（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献地点不详，姑系于此地。）</span><div id='poem_1207987' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207987' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207987?labeling=true' target='_blank'>敢言说<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：为绍圣而作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207987")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207987_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207987'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207987'>汉王凤以外戚辅政，杀王章以杜天下能言之口，而梅福以南昌尉上书显攻之而不忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207987_comment'></div>唐文宗时，宦人握禁兵制天子，枢密使权过宰相，谁敢少忤其意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207987_comment'></div>而刘蕡对策肆言其恶，斥其篡弑废立之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207987_comment'></div>而明皇时，李林甫为相几二十年，固宠恃权，愚瞽其君，内助杨氏之势，外成禄山之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207987_comment'></div>补阙杜琎尝再上书论事，斥为下邽令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207987_comment'></div>林甫以语动其馀曰：「立仗马终日无声，饫三品刍豆，一鸣则黜之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207987_comment'></div>后虽欲不鸣，得乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207987_comment'></div>由是谏诤路绝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207987_comment'></div>夫林甫之威，未惨于汉廷之外戚，唐文宗之宦官也，而梅福、刘蕡敢犯之，而林甫徒以区区贬斥，而天下之士震怖如畏虎狼，其故何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207987_comment'></div>王凤得政之初，帝失德未深，犹可与论道理，商成败，而汉之公卿犹有贤智忠义之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207987_comment'></div>文宗太和二年，名臣在朝者，如裴度、李绛、韦处厚之徒犹数人，公卿侍从之间，差可告语，其势犹足以持典型也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207987_comment'></div>故此二子者，非妄发恣行，而心实有所恃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207987_comment'></div>若林甫之时，人主昏淫于上，视天下之治乱如越人视秦人之肥瘠，不可与言矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207987_comment'></div>而朝廷之士，有一介之善，略能别黑白者，林甫斥逐之而无馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207987_comment'></div>国中空虚无人，上下内外皆从君于昏者也，而天下之士虽欲有言，何恃以救其祸乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207987_comment'></div>此人之所甚畏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207987_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207987_comment'></div>国无善人，国非其国也，可不惧哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207987_comment'></div>明皇尝论林甫曰：「此子妒贤嫉能，无与为比」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207987_comment'></div>则其时人物可知也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1207987_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　元祐、绍圣间，在朝尝有帖与右司谏朱勃。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　尝闻苏辙论察政之术。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　曾与晁补之论苏轼、秦观词。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　尝观钱勰判狱。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　曾与晁补之凝祥池上联句。姑系于此。作品：《凝祥池上联句》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗《张耒集》未见。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　王诜寄诗求唱和，张耒因作诗。姑系于此。作品：《王都尉惠诗求和逾年不报王屡求索而王许酒未送因次其韵以督之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　曾与晁补之、宋景年、李格非同游凝祥池。姑系于此。作品：《同无咎遐叔文叔同游凝祥得游字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　曾与孔武仲游州南。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　好酒而病痺，亲友相劝，张耒作诗答之。姑系于此。作品：《耒尝病痹亲友以酒为戒作小诗戏答》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年4月</a>　以直龙图阁知润州。孔武仲作诗相送。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年4月</a>　因钱仲珣追送至陈留，作诗抒别情。作品：《钱仲珣追船及陈留》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）钱仲珣，生平不详。）</span><br /></div><div class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷16（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《通海夜雨寄淮上故人》似作于自兖赴京途中”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符三年开封。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年12月</a>　岁暮，将至都城，作诗回忆是年外任经历。作品：《将至都下》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年春</a>　闻苏轼过大庾岭，欣然作诗寄潘大临。作品：《闻子瞻岭外归赠邠老》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年4月</a>　（夏四月）甲午，上大行皇太后谥曰钦圣宪肃。张耒作谥册文。作品：《皇太后谥册文》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年5月</a>　钦慈皇后陈氏陪葬神宗永裕陵，作挽词。作品：《钦慈皇后挽词二首》（畴昔熙宁盛）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在汴京，或曾为景德寺西禅院慈氏殿作记文。姑系于此。作品：《景德寺西禅院慈氏殿记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷50（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208037' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208037' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208037?labeling=true' target='_blank'>景德寺西禅院慈氏殿记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208037")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208037_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208037'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208037'>过去有佛号大通智胜佛，十方梵天、十六王子罗列上下，请转法轮，而曰「佛知时未至」，受请默然坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208037_comment'></div>及时至也，乃三转十二行法轮，如衅云普雨一切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208037_comment'></div>夫具福慧至于佛，而演法利众犹须候时者，虽圣人不能违，而况其馀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208037_comment'></div>景德寺西禅院有慈氏菩萨圣像，至和中，院僧法肇自钱塘内之而居院之傍舍，如是凡历五住持，而未有以易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208037_comment'></div>比丘诠嗣院事，乃叹曰：「此我之责也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208037_comment'></div>佛以象法道，利群品，使浊劫恶世，犹获见佛紫金光身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208037_comment'></div>其奉事当加谨，其为役当加勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208037_comment'></div>而吾慈氏像乃藏之漏屋，不大振显，天龙鬼神其谓我何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208037_comment'></div>元符元年，发愤出都，遍一切以愿力，故诸受化者欢喜施与，金帛无量，乃创为正殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208037_comment'></div>其命工以二年之春，粤五月而殿成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208037_comment'></div>慈氏居中，菩萨列侍，程程妙好庄严之具，以为供养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208037_comment'></div>青莲下观，悲悯四众；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208037_comment'></div>白毫旁耀，如现大千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208037_comment'></div>都城士女凡瞻礼者，如升兜率，游内院，闻海潮音，受胜妙乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208037_comment'></div>诠乃属予记其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208037_comment'></div>予曰：前五比丘，岂无一人尝作是念，欲集是事者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208037_comment'></div>而殿成于子，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208037_comment'></div>佛子当断一切法有时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208037_comment'></div>譬如草木，敷荣于春夏，黄落于秋冬，过去未来不可得，及时既至，则我虽不为而彼自成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208037_comment'></div>子当其时，故财不劳而足，役不久而就，如偿所负，取而不怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208037_comment'></div>时哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208037_comment'></div>时哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208037_comment'></div>当知佛子成是功德，是大福本，是大善根，尽未来世，无有穷尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208037_comment'></div>虽然，佛身充满一切声色，是行邪道，向上一路，向慈氏未生时参取。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1208037_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在汴京，作诗庆贺久旱得雨。姑系于此。作品：《贺雨拜表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“（《贺雨拜表》作于）元祐或建中靖国元年”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于建中靖国元年开封。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在汴京，曹昧取字昭父，张耒作序文。姑系于此。作品：《曹昧字昭父序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《曹昧字昭父序》作于元祐或建中靖国”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于建中靖国元年开封。）</span><div id='poem_1207989' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207989' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207989?labeling=true' target='_blank'>曹昧字昭父序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207989")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207989_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207989'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207989'>大梁曹昧，泣涕告予曰：「我不幸蚤孤，既长而族人言：『尔先人名尔昧，字尔曰昭父』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207989_comment'></div>予实用之而未能言其说，子盍为申言之乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207989_comment'></div>予曰：昧之必昭，譬之夜必有旦，晦必有明也，莫或使之而理未尝不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207989_comment'></div>其在人，则善恶是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207989_comment'></div>为善于家，而受爵于朝，车服以旌之，名号以表之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207989_comment'></div>为不善于幽，而刀锯斧钺从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207989_comment'></div>其始也，人莫或知之，而其著也，莫之能掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207989_comment'></div>《诗》云：「潜虽伏矣，亦孔之昭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207989_comment'></div>子先人之训子至矣，予虽欲言之，何以复加？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207989_comment'></div>子敬之哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1207989_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年夏</a>　出知颍州。离京城时，有感作诗。作品：《出都有感》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年夏</a>　离京，有诗寄晁补之，时晁补之在朝任国史编修官。作品：《出京寄无咎二首》（不许多闻长乐钟）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷28（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《出京寄无咎二首》（老去相看情益亲）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷28（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　离京，饮食失节致腹泻，用气术消之即愈，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《出都门泊镇外失饮食节中夕暴下用气术消息之即愈》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　赴任途中，作诗咏沿途风景。姑系于此。作品：《离京后作七首》（蘋芷江边已五年）<span -----title
渭南
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='91447e3649ab4fcca24d04b9f917949c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("91447e3649ab4fcca24d04b9f917949c");'><span id='91447e3649ab4fcca24d04b9f917949c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>，15岁</div><div id='91447e3649ab4fcca24d04b9f917949c' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在关西一带。当随父宦游。善骑马，并习于秦语。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作诗咏孟尝君故事。姑系于此。作品：《度关山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷4（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《度关山》或作于是年前后”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于熙宁元年华州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作诗感叹行路难。姑系于此。作品：《行路难》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《行路难》或亦作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于熙宁元年华州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>歌咏长安仲春，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《长安仲春二首》（长安仲春七日风）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷14（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《长安仲春二首》或作于此年前后”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于熙宁元年华州。）</span>《长安仲春二首》（长安花繁仲春月）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷14（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《长安仲春二首》或作于此年前后”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于熙宁元年华州。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e68907dce62a4a79954ae1fc70b7667c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e68907dce62a4a79954ae1fc70b7667c");'><span id='e68907dce62a4a79954ae1fc70b7667c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1070')">1069-1070年</a>，16-17岁</div><div id='e68907dce62a4a79954ae1fc70b7667c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　在华州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　作赋写函谷关，其时或仍在华州。作品：《函关赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋《张耒集》未见。知识图谱网查无此文。）</span><br /></div>

-----title
汉中

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年仲春</a>　到陈州，张耒有书与陈师道。师道有回简。作品：《与陈履常书》（一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷56（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《与陈三书》，知识图谱网分为《与陈履常书》（一）、《与陈履常书》（二），由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span>《与陈履常书》（二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷56（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《与陈三书》，知识图谱网分为《与陈履常书》（一）、《与陈履常书》（二），由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span>《与陈履常书》（三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷56（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《与陈三书》，知识图谱网分为《与陈履常书》（一）、《与陈履常书》（二），由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><div id='poem_1207857' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207857' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207857?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与陈履常书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年仲春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207857")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207857_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207857'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207857'>履常足下：去年始获闻履常名于友人王子立书中，其后颇见履常诗句文章卓伟过人，上配作者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207857_comment'></div>私自疑念，以谓士之所负如此，非久不闻于世者，何其得知名之晚也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207857_comment'></div>及后见子立，始能一一道履常事，乃知贤公卿已有为履常地者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207857_comment'></div>昨至京师，历游大人先生间，而后知履常焯焯日久，顾仆获知晚耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207857_comment'></div>耒不幸仰食冗官日久，所见大抵市井厮役贱人也，使吾履常之名何自而到？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207857_comment'></div>其晚知履常而不得早从游也，理自宜耳，夫又谁怨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207857_comment'></div>譬如窦穴之物，微景入隙，始知将晨，而不知朝阳之光在物久矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207857'><span class='label'>按：</span>《宛丘先生文集》卷六七，康熙吕无隐抄本。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207857_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207858' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207858' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207858?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年仲春）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207858_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207858'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207858'>始王子立为仆说履常不肯应举，年过三十为布衣，囊无副裘，釜无遗粒，履常甘之泰然，如食大烹、被华衮，无一毫悔心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207858_comment'></div>履常能以此胜彼，亦必有谓矣，不然履常岂真好乐贫贱与人异情也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207858_comment'></div>在京师时，已略与履常面论此事，颇欲履常稍出应有司之求，似蒙不鄙而受之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207858_comment'></div>夫凡欲履常仕者，岂谓使履常以彼易此也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207858_comment'></div>顾事势与前日所以不欲者似少异耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207858_comment'></div>使无失所守而不废得禄以养其亲，是宜履常平日之所欲，不然则是耽守贫贱，与人异情，是于道何所当哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207858_comment'></div>想既行之矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207858_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207859' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207859' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207859?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年仲春）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207859_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207859'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207859'>仆到陈十日，私干颇已办，只俟一见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207859_comment'></div>沈丘家兄遂赴亳，当在暮春之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207859_comment'></div>自少无所嗜，独知世间有文字之乐，长年以来谋衣食，逼忧患，耗失过半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207859_comment'></div>今幸得闲官，俸禄可给，朝夕欲屏去百事，复其所志，进其所未能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207859_comment'></div>履常虽奉太夫人于京师，而闻尊兄在侧，无乏养之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207859_comment'></div>亳去都五驿，亦能为我一来同乐于寂寞之间耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207859_comment'></div>昨见京师贤士大夫与履常游者，不啻如获良金宝玉，顾耒之力，安能夺君而私之也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207859_comment'></div>然于事计履常如何耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207859_comment'></div>春益暄，千万自爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207859_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年仲春</a>　离陈州，作诗抒孤征之恨。作品：《离宛丘斗门》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年仲春</a>　往沈丘探望兄长张柔（柔时为沈丘令）时，过项城，或在此题壁。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='8f467d6055a74c71b174685f7d8935ae_label'><a href='javascript: href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年秋</a>　读陶渊明饮酒诗，并次韵作诗。作品：《次韵渊明饮酒诗》（我欲常饮酒）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年闰2月</a>　作诗咏淮阳，抒离别之意。作品：《淮阳》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年闰2月</a>　至南顿驿，同李从圣叔侄小饮，作诗。作品：《谪官黄州至南顿驿同李从圣叔侄小饮》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）李从圣，生平不详。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年闰2月</a>　在南顿，游光武祠，有题诗。作品：《题南顿光武祠》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='001601393bf54eebbbfcf48a65f148ee_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("001601393bf54eebbbfcf48a65f148ee");'><span id='001601393bf54eebbbfcf48a65f148ee_link' style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过陈州。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>离陈州，感慨作诗。作品：《将别普济二首》（老槐疏竹寺门幽）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《将别普济二首》（孤城淮北晚钟残）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='eebdbb076cbc4f7c9445a544dd75b787_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("eebdbb076cbc4f7c9445a544dd75b787");'><span id='eebdbb076cbc4f7c9445a544dd75b787_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>，48岁</div><div id='eebdbb076cbc4f7c9445a544dd75b787' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过陈州，作赋。作品：《病暑赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207812' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207812' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207812?labeling=true' target='_blank'>病暑赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207812")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207812_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207812'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207812'>皇昌运之元祀兮，予出守乎清颍之区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207812_comment'></div>背国门而南骛兮，弭楫乎太昊之墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207812_comment'></div>方炎夏之隆赫兮，闵时泽之不濡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207812_comment'></div>魃乘时而行虐兮，盗威烈乎旸乌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207812_comment'></div>驾毕方而骖荧惑兮，回禄为其前驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207812_comment'></div>烬所及于一燎兮，何有瓦石与璠玙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207812_comment'></div>丰隆致其微阴兮，飞廉荡覆而无馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207812_comment'></div>野曈曈而扬尘兮，何萧艾之芬敷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207812_comment'></div>应龙矫首于下泽兮，仅自免于槁枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207812_comment'></div>鸟呀咮而忘飞兮，兽逃穴而深居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207812_comment'></div>嗟人胡独不能兮，无乃欲息而被驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207812_comment'></div>昔蕲山之秋筠兮，因冰卷而玉舒，效功能于幺么兮，曾何足以宁吾躯？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207812_comment'></div>饱风而为蜩兮，又欲泳水而为鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207812_comment'></div>出寒泉于深井兮，竭筋力于辘轳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207812_comment'></div>不计腹之所受兮，尚问山藭曲麦之有无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207812_comment'></div>乱曰：阴阳循环，靡穷极兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207812_comment'></div>时至而变，有常则兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207812_comment'></div>融液金铁，烁山石兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207812_comment'></div>谨视其报，在朔易兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207812_comment'></div>玄阴大冬，冰雪积兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207812_comment'></div>无畏其机，备其极兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207812_comment'></div>补完裘褐，戒纺绩兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207812_comment'></div>保我岁寒，以终吉兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1207812_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>暑热天气，午寝不安，作诗怀潘邠老。姑系于此。作品：《暑毒不可过又每为宾客见扰午寝不安奉怀邠老之无事也》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《暑毒不可过，又每为宾客见扰，午寝不安，奉怀邠老之无事也》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于建中靖国元年陈州。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='cdbf99679d9a4c39a4d38ecf2fbb7626_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("cdbf99679d9a4c39a4d38ecf2fbb7626");'><span id='cdbf99679d9a4c39a4d38ecf2fbb7626_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年7月</a>　为钱申《医录》作序文。作品：《钱申医录序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207891' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207891' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207891?labeling=true' target='_blank'>钱申医录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207891")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207891_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207891'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207891'>予尝爱太史公述《仓公传》，为记自齐侍御史成至齐文王病凡数十人，其察脉观色、所用药剂汤熨之法，皆载之以为后法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207891_comment'></div>所谓黄帝、扁鹊书今已不尽见，而其遗法往往见于此，世医所宜刳心而学者也，尚何议焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207891_comment'></div>予顷年谪官齐安，邻郡蕲春有庞安时者，高医也，其于黄帝内、外、甲、乙诸书深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207891_comment'></div>予尝从之游，喜闻其说而不能尽究也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207891_comment'></div>居无几何，安时死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207891_comment'></div>予为志其墓，因求其平生所尝治疾，或奇證变候，有人不能晓者，使具其说与所用药，欲载之墓志之后以为后法，而其家不甚晓知，虽有所疏陈数十条，皆无伦叙，勉择十馀事载之，而予至今以为憾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207891_comment'></div>近宛丘閒居，吴人钱申以《医录》授予，得之欣然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207891_comment'></div>盖申善医而著为录，其治疾之尝效，言其察脉观色之方，而往往著其药物之剂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207891_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207891_comment'></div>其用心可见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207891_comment'></div>憾予不学医，不能与君上下其论，愿益勉之，求世之高医而问焉，予将有得焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207891_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a6c258d0030b4a08b292598aa333df63_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a6c258d0030b4a08b292598aa333df63");'><span id='a6c258d0030b4a08b292598aa333df63_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，49岁</div><div id='a6c258d0030b4a08b292598aa333df63' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年7月27日</a>　因在颍州时为苏轼之死缟素而哭，遭言者纠弹，自管勾亳州明道宫责授房州别驾，黄州安置。<br /><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷54（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《书赵令畤字说后》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于大观二年陈州。）</span><div id='poem_1207911' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207911' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207911?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书赵令畤字说后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207911")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207911_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207911'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207911'>苏公既谪岭外，其所厚善者往往得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207911_comment'></div>德麟亦閒废且十年，其平生与公往还之迹，宜其深微而讳之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207911_comment'></div>而德麟不然，宝藏其遗墨馀藁，无少弃舍，此序其甲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207911_comment'></div>予问其意，德麟慨然曰：「此文章之传者也，不可使后人致恨于我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207911_comment'></div>予曰：「此正先生所谓笃行而刚信于为道者欤」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207911_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年3月</a>　作诗评论赵令畤言玉芝事。姑系于此。作品：《赵德麟有诗言过万寿县得玉芝乃以供一醉之味按道书凡芝皆神仙上药无乃轻用之乎》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《赵德麟有诗言过万寿县得玉芝，乃以供一醉之味，按道书凡芝皆神仙上药，无乃轻用之乎》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于大观二年陈州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年夏</a>　大暑，作诗戏赠常安民（字希古）。作品：《大暑戏赠希古》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　作文于苏轼所赠孙立节《刚说》之后。作品：《书东坡先生赠孙君刚说后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷54（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207914' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207914' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207914?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书东坡先生赠孙君刚说后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207914")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207914_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207914'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207914'>《春秋传》曰：「使勇而无刚者，尝寇而速去之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207914_comment'></div>夫果敢不畏之谓勇，无所屈挠之谓刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207914_comment'></div>或谓申枨为刚者，夫子曰：「枨也欲，焉得刚」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207914_comment'></div>夫使不以义屈于人，而无邪欲以乱其中，则其行己施于事者为仁，孰御哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207914_comment'></div>此刚者必仁之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207914_comment'></div>苏公行己可谓刚矣，傲睨雄暴，轻视忧患，高视千古，气盖一世，当与孔北海并驱，而犹称孙君之刚，又言其救十二人之死，为刚者必仁之论，则孙君可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207914_comment'></div>其子思厉，操履文词，绝人远甚，则来者未可量也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207914_comment'></div>予言其信。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1207914_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年秋</a>　孙勰（字志康）从辟高阳，作诗相送。作品：《送孙志康赴高阳》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年秋</a>　与黄仲达、黄仲闵兄弟交游，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《见黄仲达感秋意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）仲达、仲闵或为黄好谦孙、黄寔子。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年10月</a>　居陈州。是月，受义和僧人之请，为其师父宗禅师作序文。作品：《宗禅师语录序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）义和，四祖寺僧人。宗禅师，四祖寺住持，黄龙心禅师法嗣。）</span><div id='poem_1207890' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207890' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207890?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宗禅师语录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207890")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207890_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207890'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207890'>诸圣传心，不由文字；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207890_comment'></div>从来建化，咸立门庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207890_comment'></div>盖言为道诠，执之则为大病；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207890_comment'></div>语乃声法，透得方具少分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207890_comment'></div>则夫言亦末矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207890_comment'></div>四祖宗禅师，黄龙心之嫡子，临济玄之裔孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207890_comment'></div>学最上乘，悟第一义，遍参尊宿法席，归住四祖道场，雄启度门，明扬政令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207890_comment'></div>虽洪钟巨震，固尝动地雨花；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207890_comment'></div>然古涧寒泉，饮即丧身失命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207890_comment'></div>至于拈槌举唱，斯辨宣扬，门人记为《后录》若干卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207890_comment'></div>己丑孟冬，其门人义和携以示予，求序冠其篇首，勉为书此，幸无诮焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207890_comment'></div>谯郡张耒记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207890_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年9月</a>　居陈州。八月，晁补之卒于泗州任所。九月，张耒闻讣，作祭文。作品：《祭晁无咎文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208086' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208086' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208086?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭晁无咎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208086")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208086_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208086'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208086'>惟我与公，交游之义，外虽朋游，情实兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208086_comment'></div>公生癸巳，长我一岁，平生宦学，何一非是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208086_comment'></div>念初相遇，盱眙逆旅，一见如旧，绸缪笑语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208086_comment'></div>契阔积年，俱职太学，并试玉堂，同升馆阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208086_comment'></div>读书饮酒，两各壮年，意气豪盛，自以无前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208086_comment'></div>公之文章，瑰琦卓荦，割裂锦绣，挥磨矛槊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208086_comment'></div>石渠天禄，典籍之委，过目辄诵，不复再视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208086_comment'></div>我守丹阳，公镇于齐，行世之艰，坎𡒄自兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208086_comment'></div>建中之初，同官于都，相对叹息，苍鬓班须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208086_comment'></div>我出汝阴，公守于蒲，我负重谴，责居江湖，知公金山，艺圃葺庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208086_comment'></div>最后闻公，乘太守车，往刺于淮，庆未及书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208086_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208086_comment'></div>九月庚寅，闻讣于陈，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1208086", 1208086, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>惊呼</span>号天，烦冤靡伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208086_comment'></div>年且六十，非夭之恨，所甚痛者，歼此善人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208086_comment'></div>公素强健，无戾于身，何恙之速，一仆不振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208086_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208086_comment'></div>平生胶漆，永隔亡存，吊不抚棺，窆不哭坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208086_comment'></div>事也多违，不敢爱勤，聊陈菲薄，侑此一樽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208086_comment'></div>尚想平生，见我欢忻，至悲薰心，言不能文。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1208086_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年9月</a>　晁补之卒，张耒为作墓志铭。姑系于此。作品：《晁无咎墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷61（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《晁无咎墓志铭》，作年不详，当亦在此后不久”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于大观四年陈州。）</span><div id='poem_1208078' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208078' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208078?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晁无咎墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208078")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208078_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208078'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208078'>惟晁氏自汉御史大夫错而后，不能谱其世，国初为清丰人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208078_comment'></div>真宗皇帝时，有讳迥者为翰林学士承旨，谥文元，始徙居开封，或居钜野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208078_comment'></div>迥之子讳宗悫，为参知政事，谥文庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208078_comment'></div>又三世而生公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208078_comment'></div>其讳宗简，赠特进吏部尚书者，为皇曾祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208078_comment'></div>讳仲偃，尚书库部员外郎者，为皇祖考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208078_comment'></div>讳端友，赠左朝散大夫者，为皇考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208078_comment'></div>公讳补之，字无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208078_comment'></div>幼豪迈英爽不群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208078_comment'></div>七岁能属文，日诵千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208078_comment'></div>年十三，从王安国于常州学官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208078_comment'></div>安国名重天下，于后进少许可，一见公，大奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208078_comment'></div>公从皇考于杭之新城，公览观钱塘人物之盛丽，山川之秀异，为之作文以志之，名曰《七述》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208078_comment'></div>今端明苏公轼通判杭州，苏公蜀人，悦杭之美而思有赋焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208078_comment'></div>公谒见苏公，出《七述》，公读之，叹曰：「吾可以阁笔矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208078_comment'></div>苏公以文章名一时，士争归之，得一言足以自重，而延誉公如不及，自屈辈行与公交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208078_comment'></div>由此公名藉甚于士大夫间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208078_comment'></div>举进士，礼部别试第一，而考官谓其文辞近世未有，遂以进御，神宗见之曰：「是深于经，可革浮薄」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208078_comment'></div>于是名重一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208078_comment'></div>遂中第，调澶州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208078_comment'></div>召试学官，时试者累百，而所取五人，公中其选，除北京国子监教授，又为卫州教授，未行，除太学正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208078_comment'></div>哲宗即位，右丞李清臣举公馆职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208078_comment'></div>召试学士院，除秘书省正字，俄迁校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208078_comment'></div>以亲老求补外，除秘阁校理，通判扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208078_comment'></div>有逃卒用货得户部判至淮南理逋负，公辨其奸，事既决，一府不敢欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208078_comment'></div>召为著作佐郎，又迁秘书丞，又迁著作郎，官制检讨官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208078_comment'></div>于是公为秘书省官十五年矣，而怡静乐道，未尝近权要，士论高之，遂知齐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208078_comment'></div>境有群盗，白昼掠涂人，公默得其姓名，囊橐皆审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208078_comment'></div>一日，因宴客，召捕吏以方略授之，酒行未终，悉擒而还，一府大惊，郡为无警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208078_comment'></div>岁饥，河北民流，道齐境不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208078_comment'></div>公请粟于朝，得万斛，乃为流者治舍次，具器用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208078_comment'></div>人既集，则又为具糜粥药物，公皆躬临治之，凡活数千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208078_comment'></div>又择高原以葬死者，男女异墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208078_comment'></div>使者颇媢其功，欲有以挠之，既至境按视，乃更叹服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208078_comment'></div>绍圣元年，朝廷治党，公亦坐累，降通判应天府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208078_comment'></div>以亲嫌通判亳州，复落职监处州酒务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208078_comment'></div>中途丁母忧，毁瘠几不胜丧服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208078_comment'></div>除监信州酒，公治职事甚力，了无迁谪意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208078_comment'></div>今上即位，移签书武宁军节度判官，赐绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208078_comment'></div>寻复通判河中府，未行，召为著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1208078_comment'></div>俄迁尚书吏部员外郎，除哲宗实录院检讨官，改礼部郎中，又改神宗国史编修官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1208078_comment'></div>公皆以非才辞避再三，不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1208078_comment'></div>又力请外官，复留以为吏部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1208078_comment'></div>异日，事有留滞，无究治者，吏缘为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1208078_comment'></div>尝有岭外尉，捕获盗八人，法当改官，而考功谓获盗不同处，曲沮欲坏其赏，吏持之不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1208078_comment'></div>尉客京师久，窘甚，诣公诉之，公悯然曰：「当奏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1208078_comment'></div>即为上之，七日而得迁官，于是吏畏服，部无留事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1208078_comment'></div>俄除知河中府，郡当大河，扼三门，有浮梁，久且坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1208078_comment'></div>公视事，亟欲营缮，有司难之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1208078_comment'></div>公乃预为鸠材，既集，则为规画，一日而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1208078_comment'></div>城中欢呼，民为画像立祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1208078_comment'></div>徙知湖州，其治如河中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1208078_comment'></div>又徙知密州，犹用前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1208078_comment'></div>累送吏部，授知果州，不行，因得管勾江州太平观，又改管勾西京嵩山崇福宫，又管勾南京鸿庆宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1208078_comment'></div>居乡闾，以学行为乡人所敬，而尤好晋陶渊明之为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1208078_comment'></div>其居室庐园圃，悉取渊明《归去来词》以名之，其讲学至老不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1208078_comment'></div>大观四年，由近制诣部，授知达州，未行，擢知泗州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1208078_comment'></div>到官无几何，以疾卒，年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1208078_comment'></div>公于文章，盖其天性，读书不过一再，终身不忘，自少为文，即能追考左氏、《战国策》、太史公、班固、扬雄、刘向、屈原、宋玉、韩愈、柳宗元之作，促驾而力鞭之，务与之□齐而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1208078_comment'></div>其淩丽奇卓出于天才，非酝酿而成者，自韩愈已还，盖不足道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1208078_comment'></div>性刚直果敢，勇于为义，其事亲、友兄弟、睦姻族，有人所不能为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1208078_comment'></div>家素贫，先大夫没时，有女未嫁者五人，公力贫营办，皆以时嫁，为士人妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1208078_comment'></div>与人交无隐情，见事有不当于义者，必直告之，而受人之尽言，亦未尝愠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1208078_comment'></div>公既于书内外无所不观，下至于阴阳术数，皆研极其妙，其祸福往来先言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1208078_comment'></div>卒之夕，有大星殒于州廨之燕寝，人惊视之，公已奄然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1208078_comment'></div>公少好读庄、老书，通其说，既自以为未至，学于佛而求之其心，泰然若有得也，及属纩，精爽不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1208078_comment'></div>娶户部侍郎杜纯之女，治家教子皆有法，封永嘉县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1208078_comment'></div>男二人，公为、公汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1208078_comment'></div>女二人，长适梁颐吉，次尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1208078_comment'></div>有文集及著作若干卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1208078_comment'></div>其孤以某年月日葬公任城县吕村之原，从先大夫之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1208078_comment'></div>耒与公兄弟交，故其孤来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1208078_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_72_1208078'>矫矫家令，以身殉国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1208078_comment'></div>文元雍雍，为时峻德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1208078_comment'></div>凛凛无咎，继起有赫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1208078_comment'></div>束发坟、史，白首翰墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1208078_comment'></div>追古作者，蹈藉凌跞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1208078_comment'></div>气戛星斗，声韵金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1208078_comment'></div>不施于邦，祇自藻泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1208078_comment'></div>人一之难，公易百千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1208078_comment'></div>我原其文，惟质之淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1208078_comment'></div>孝爱忠信，施及乡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1208078_comment'></div>是独何亏，一仆莫振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1208078_comment'></div>车坚马良，不得出门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1208078_comment'></div>策驽驾朽，道上纷纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1208078_comment'></div>将昌其声，而啬其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1208078_comment'></div>呜呼无咎，万世之闻。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_86_1208078'></div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1208078_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　为许大方诗集作序文。姑系于此。作品：《许大方诗集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《许大方诗集序》或作于是岁”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于大观四年陈州。）</span><div id='poem_1207889' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207889' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207889?labeling=true' target='_blank'>许大方诗集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207889")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207889_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207889'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207889'>同尘子许君大方，吏于海陵，谓予言：「平生仕宦四方，所至辄为诗句文篇，未尝废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207889_comment'></div>亦辄集为一书，求人为序，取以冠于篇首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207889_comment'></div>今海陵之集将成矣，子其为我序之乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207889_comment'></div>予曰：士方其退于燕閒寂寞之境，而有以自乐其乐者，往往英奇秀发之气发为文字言语，超然自放于尘垢之外，盖有可欣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207889_comment'></div>然一行为吏，此事便废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207889_comment'></div>敲朴喧嚣，牒诉倥偬，既已变易其平生矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207889_comment'></div>风云之观，溷于泥涂，泉石之想，变于圜阓，俗虑日进，道心日销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207889_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207889_comment'></div>士之道艺不进者以此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207889_comment'></div>许君以潇洒出尘之姿，屈首徼禄于小官，又吏于僻远，职事之外，宜其有憔悴无聊之叹，尚何暇注心于笔研文墨之间耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207889_comment'></div>然既已粲然成编矣，其中非有过人者其能尔耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207889_comment'></div>是予所以喜为之序也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207889_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　作诗次韵许大方旧作。姑系于此。作品：《许同尘示张八侍郎避暑览馆中旧题绝句俾之同作次韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《张耒集》中与之相关作品尚有《许同尘示张八侍郎避暑览馆中旧题绝句俾之同作次韵》《偶成》，作时不详”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于大观四年陈州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　作诗写与许大方相会。姑系于此。作品：《偶成》（许君踏月夜相过）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《张耒集》中与之相关作品尚有《许同尘示张八侍郎避暑览馆中旧题绝句俾之同作次韵》《偶成》，作时不详”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于大观四年陈州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　为邓忠臣（字慎思）作挽词。姑系于此。作品：《邓学士慎思挽词》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“崇宁或大观间，为邓忠臣作挽词”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于大观四年陈州。）</span>《邓慎思学士挽词》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“崇宁或大观间，为邓忠臣作挽词”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于大观四年陈州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　妻子生日，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《内生日》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为大观后，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年5月</a>　是月，应陵川县令张某之请，为其县山水作记文。作品：《陵川县山水记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷49（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）张某，不详，从张耒问学。）</span><div id='poem_1208031' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208031' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208031?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陵川县山水记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1111年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208031")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208031_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208031'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208031'>陵川，河东之穷邑也，其民盖有唐晋之馀风，俭朴而敦本，而泽、潞在唐为雄镇，以精兵闻天下，故其民好武为健斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208031_comment'></div>夫以俭朴好武之民，则其于山水奇胜之观，宜其忽而不治，委弃而不惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208031_comment'></div>今县令张侯，以暇日与其僚游于县西南所谓四梁拒者，见其风景稍异，披榛而得二泉焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208031_comment'></div>其一出石下，激石而声琅然，张君名之曰漱玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208031_comment'></div>其一出大石下，而石状若龟，因名之曰龟泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208031_comment'></div>会二水而注之石螭之口，以下达于大池，构亭于泉侧，名曰爽气亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208031_comment'></div>后为石磴，磴穷为小亭，名之曰白云轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208031_comment'></div>而其乔林秀木水石奇丽之状，皆悦可人意而不可以言尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208031_comment'></div>孔子曰：「仁者乐山，知者乐水」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208031_comment'></div>夫尽仁之成名，必若尧舜，而语智之正，必若禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208031_comment'></div>然世之好山水者，岂皆具圣人之成德哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208031_comment'></div>予以为凡安静可久淳厚而不变者，皆仁之类也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208031_comment'></div>临事而不滞、遇物而不惑者，皆智之类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208031_comment'></div>张君从予游，其行己操术，其为仁知之类有馀矣，而又好学而甚文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208031_comment'></div>予意其为政滋久，政事日信于民，以其簿书之简，日徜徉于山水之间，仰乔木而俯清泉，资之以烟云鱼鸟之丽，把酒赋诗与夫杂见于文字言语者，将超然出尘拔俗，而恨未之见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208031_comment'></div>政和元年五月日记。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1208031'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1208031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1208031'><span class='label'>政和元年五月日记：</span>此句原无，据草斋本、吕本补。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1208031_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年</a>　潘大临之子戆拜张耒于陈，出大临文章若干卷，求为序，张耒为作序文。作品：《潘大临文集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207887' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207887' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207887?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潘大临文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1111年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207887")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207887_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207887'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207887'>士有闻道于达者，一会其意，涣然不疑，师其道，治其言，终身守之而不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207887_comment'></div>甚者或因是以取谤骂悔吝而不悔其心，视世之乐无足以易之者，亦可谓有志之狷士矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207887_comment'></div>彼其心以为不有得于今，必有知于后，故甘心而不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207887_comment'></div>夫既已尽弃世俗目前之所乐，而独待夫寂寥不可知之后世，则亦可悲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207887_comment'></div>予友潘大临，字邠老，其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207887_comment'></div>邠老故闽人，后家黄州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207887_comment'></div>崇宁中，予以罪谪黄州，与邠老为邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207887_comment'></div>邠老少学为人，则已不能合其乡人，众不悦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207887_comment'></div>邠老独与当世知名士游，往往屈辈行与之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207887_comment'></div>尝举于有司，与千百人偕进偕退，无知其才而力振之于困者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207887_comment'></div>后予蒙恩去黄，居于淮阴，闻邠老客死蕲春，予为之太息出涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207887_comment'></div>政和之初，邠老之子戆既免丧，拜予于宛丘，出其先人之文章若干卷，求予为序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207887_comment'></div>予知邠老为详，义不得辞，而自视亦世之穷士也，其势力曷足振邠老于无闻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207887_comment'></div>未必不夺邠老之文而并弃之也，而邠老生死之不遇如此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207887_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年12月</a>　岁暮，寄诗苏辙。张耒与苏辙文字交往止此。作品：《岁暮即事寄子由先生》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1112&endYear=1112')">1112年4月15日</a>　居陈州。是日，自孝悌坊移居冠盖孙氏第，作诗。作品：《四月望日自孝悌坊迁冠盖孙氏第》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1112&endYear=1112')">1112年秋</a>　翟汝文（字公巽）知陈州，常登门造访。家贫，翟汝文欲为买公田，谢不取。张耒作诗赠翟汝文。作品：《赠翟公巽》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1112&endYear=1112')">1112年</a>　是岁，尝作诗评翟汝文书法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1112&endYear=1112')">1112年</a>　是岁，尝称赏翟汝文之子耆年。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1112&endYear=1112')">1112年</a>　作诗咏古器。姑系于此。作品：《瓦器易石鼓文歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷4（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《瓦器易石鼓文歌》或作于是岁前后”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于政和二年陈州。诗中之“君”或指翟汝文。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1113&endYear=1113')">1113年1月</a>　居陈州。春正月，翟汝文（字公巽）离陈赴京，张耒作诗相赠。作品：《送翟公巽赴中书舍人》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1113&endYear=1113')">1113年10月</a>　初冬，晨起作诗，咏所见所感。作品：《初冬偶成》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　晚年居陈州，士人就学者众。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　晚年好诵杜甫《玉华宫》、苏轼《东栏梨花》。《容斋随笔》卷15：“张文潜暮年在宛丘，何大圭方弱冠，往谒之，凡三日，见其吟哦此诗（《玉华宫》）不绝口“。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　晚年居陈州，新居成，作上梁文。姑系于此。作品：《新居上梁文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为大观、政和，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1208109' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208109' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208109?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新居上梁文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208109")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208109_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208109'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208109'>太昊之墟，风俗素厚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208109_comment'></div>长淮以北，鱼稻渐丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208109_comment'></div>张君少也执经，常青衿庠序；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208109_comment'></div>仕而多难，遂白首闾里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208109_comment'></div>辄于阮籍之穷途，成此陶潜之环堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208109_comment'></div>虽风雨之仅庇，亦箪瓢之屡空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208109_comment'></div>敬举修梁，先成下舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208109_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1208109'>抛梁东，淮阳三月牡丹风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208109_comment'></div>已将奇丽誇天上，更有声名压洛中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208109_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1208109'>抛梁西，故祠千柱隐长堤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208109_comment'></div>广殿杉松翻燕雀，修廊风雨暗旌旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208109_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1208109'>抛梁南，艅艎万里建云帆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208109_comment'></div>淮蟹湖鱼常入馔，三餐足慰老夫馋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208109_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1208109'>抛梁北，北望宸都官道直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208109_comment'></div>霜晴日暖碧天高，郁葱时见尧云色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208109_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1208109'>抛梁上，却扫从今断还往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208109_comment'></div>里闾休叹下泽车，登降须扶灵寿杖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208109_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1208109'>抛梁下，诗书万卷束高架。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208109_comment'></div>今年雨足定丰登，更向城隅问田舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208109_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1208109'>伏愿上梁之后，人无痹疠，年屡丰登，儿孙诗书之不忘，妻孥粗粝之常饱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208109_comment'></div>咨我有众，同受多祥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1208109_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1208109'><span class='label'>按：</span>《张右史文集》卷四五，四部丛刊本。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1208109_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　居陈州，作诗咏波稜菜。姑系于此。作品：《波棱乃自波陵国来盖西域蔬也甚能解面毒予颇嗜之因考本草为作此篇》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为大观、政和，姑系于此年。原文献诗题为《波稜乃自坡陵国来，盖西域蔬也，甚能解面毒。予颇嗜之，因考〈本草〉为作此篇》，搜韵网为《波棱乃自波陵国来盖西域蔬也甚能解面毒予颇嗜之因考本草为作此篇》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href='/Writing/1208050?labeling=true' target='_blank'>淮阳郡黄氏友于泉铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208050")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208050_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208050'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208050'>东出谯门，少南驰十三里，有井焉，其味甘冽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208050_comment'></div>故驾部郎中黄公讳好谦，卜葬其亲，汲而异之，问诸野人，曰：「是友于泉也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208050_comment'></div>「何以得是名哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208050_comment'></div>曰：「昔有兄弟，灌园以奉亲者，凿井而得甘泉，邦人美之，以名其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208050_comment'></div>即其地也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208050_comment'></div>公曰：「地名胜母，曾参不入；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208050_comment'></div>邑号朝歌，墨子回车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208050_comment'></div>今吾将卜窀穸之事，而遇斯泉，吉孰胜焉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208050_comment'></div>遂葬诸泉上，而公益以孝弟著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208050_comment'></div>至公之子若孙，皆雍雍如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208050_comment'></div>人以是泉为祥，而以公家敦睦为法式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208050_comment'></div>昔有南游，过贪泉而酌之，比及南海，裹其珠玑以走，其贪如此，泉之能移人也甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208050_comment'></div>贪自其心而发于泉，然则友于独不发于泉乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208050_comment'></div>盖志士取舍，亦自有道，不得不徇其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208050_comment'></div>夫柏人者，以为迫于人也邪，蒿之不可以食世子，皆恶其名也，不然曾、墨之所以去人者，彼皆非欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208050_comment'></div>公既葬其亲，遂以泉遗子孙，子孙世饮斯泉，则孝弟世相守也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208050_comment'></div>守孝弟者，天必丰之以福，吾以是知黄氏之大未可量也，敢请铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208050_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1208050'>孝乎惟孝兮，友于兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208050_comment'></div>公之懿德兮，实天所启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208050_comment'></div>启我以兹泉兮，其甘如醴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208050_comment'></div>以羞祭祀兮，以餴以饎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208050_comment'></div>我铭其泉兮，名以定体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208050_comment'></div>世饮是泉兮，雍雍济济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208050_comment'></div>咨尔后人兮，勿忘周礼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1208050_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　在陈州，曾谒太昊祠，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《谒太昊祠》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　在陈州，受友人章邦老之请，为其父章蒙之文集作序文。姑系于此。作品：《秘丞章蒙明发集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1207886' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207886' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207886?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秘丞章蒙明发集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207886")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207886_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207886'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207886'>古之论人，考其人，不计其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207886_comment'></div>士固有其才，可以有为，而不幸不及施与，既施而中夺者，何可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207886_comment'></div>而中才常人乘时以功名显者，世常有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207886_comment'></div>孟子曰：「若夫成功，则天也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207886_comment'></div>夫成败系天者，其未可以贤不肖必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207886_comment'></div>司马子长论李将军为将，其言哀痛反覆，深悲其无功，以为百姓知不知皆为垂涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207886_comment'></div>至论霍去病，无他矣，独曰：「常有天幸，不至乏绝」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207886_comment'></div>夫子长不少假借于屡胜之去病，而独拳拳于老死之李广，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207886_comment'></div>彼惟深痛夫庸人冒时以取名，而豪杰之士制于命而不得少就其志，故其与夺之际如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207886_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207886_comment'></div>岂独人事哉，凡物亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207886_comment'></div>夫夏生殖而丛棘能有所庇，疾风烈寒，大木百围僵而死，秋水时至，沟畎有一溉之功，而岁旱渊竭，江河不足活鱼鳖，物固系其所遭者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207886_comment'></div>今年春，予遇友人会稽章邦老于宛丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207886_comment'></div>一见予，再拜泣涕，出其先人秘丞君诗文三编及其行状，求予文以为之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207886_comment'></div>其文章议论甚高，而叹其不大设施也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1207886_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　是岁，殁于陈州。<br /></div>
-----end

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年秋</a>　七月二十八日，苏轼殁于常州，张耒出俸钱，于荐福寺修供，缟素而哭，以寄托哀思。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年10月</a>　张坚（至柔）来访，从其得养生之术，张耒为其作序文。作品：《送张坚道人归固始山中序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207883' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207883' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207883?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送张坚道人归固始山中序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207883")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207883_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207883'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207883'>予元丰末年与至柔生会于宛丘，予时年壮嗜酒，驰骋世乐，虽知至柔怀道，而未暇问也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207883_comment'></div>尔后绝不相闻，至今盖十有八年，而予出入朝廷，用舍荣辱之变，历之备矣，退视其躯，亦骎骎于衰老疲病之境矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207883_comment'></div>建中靖国元年，出守汝阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207883_comment'></div>一日，至柔惠然访予于郡斋，视其精爽动作，与宛丘见时不少异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207883_comment'></div>既携其平生所尝试之方，授予以济其病，又教予以养性之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207883_comment'></div>其言曰：「大道甚简，守心而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207883_comment'></div>守心无他，守一而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207883_comment'></div>静一之极，则玄通四达而真气应之，大非意之所能测，言之所能尽也，得者知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207883_comment'></div>真气来降，则百病除而永年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207883_comment'></div>经曰：『无视无听，抱神以静，形将自正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207883_comment'></div>必静必清，无劳汝形，无摇汝精，乃可以长生』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207883_comment'></div>老子曰：『虚其心，实其腹，弱其志，强其骨』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207883_comment'></div>心虚志弱，则腹自实、骨自强矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207883_comment'></div>是道也，智者得之为止观，司马子微得之为坐忘，皆一道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207883_comment'></div>此皆真人修身之要，而今人忽之，乃苦其形骸，妄想变怪，吞饵金石，去古道远矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207883_comment'></div>予三复其言，因尽屏其平日之所闻，伏而思之，若有悟焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207883_comment'></div>《抱朴子》谈道数十卷，而曰：「若夫至道，则尺素而足」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207883_comment'></div>信谓是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207883_comment'></div>如吾至柔之论，则尺素为多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207883_comment'></div>至柔隐居固始之野，人莫见其面，而时为人治病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207883_comment'></div>将归，求予书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207883_comment'></div>予书不工，因志其所教，以告世之好道而不得其要者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207883_comment'></div>辛巳孟冬日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1207883_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在颍州，与表弟李公辅（字德载）相会，张耒次公辅韵作诗。作品：《丁丑岁与德载相别辛巳复会于颍相视而叹仍蒙先惠佳句谨次韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在颍州，有诗寄赵令铄。作品：《次韵寄赵伯坚二首》（西湖望中潬）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《次韵寄赵伯坚二首》（相思何处望）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年12月</a>　岁暮，尝作诗咏颍州。作品：《美哉》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在颍州，次韵作诗答存之。作品：《次韵答存之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）此诗亦收入秦观《淮海集》卷9。《宋诗钞》则两见，一属张耒，一属秦观。搜韵网系于秦观名下。存之，或即曾诚。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年冬</a>　移知汝州，过万寿县，县令皇甫君馆于新学舍，张耒作文记之。作品：《万寿县学记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷50（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）皇甫君，名不详。）</span><div id='poem_1208042' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208042' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208042?labeling=true' target='_blank'>万寿县学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208042")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208042_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208042'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208042'>万寿令皇甫君，治县有馀力，吏之常职无不举矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208042_comment'></div>而尝慨然曰：「是未足以为政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208042_comment'></div>今吾民小之为斗阋，大之为盗贼，鞭笞戮死相继于有司而不知耻，意者未尝教之欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208042_comment'></div>教之道，必先治学校，诱其民之才秀而劝养之，使之业成出仕，受禄于朝，而后田里闾井之人，风动慕悦而兴于善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208042_comment'></div>盖汉文翁之治蜀，唐常衮之治闽，皆用此道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208042_comment'></div>然蜀、闽皆去中原数千里，其民杂乎蛮夷，犹且教之有成，而况吾邑之在淮颍间，去王都才数百里，其民俭朴而倡优拙，静慎而狱讼稀，若是而不教，令之罪也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208042_comment'></div>县故有孔子祠，前令尝增为学舍，而不果成，废且二十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208042_comment'></div>君于是相地赋工兴役，四旬而学成，自孔子之堂与夫门庑斋序，凡学之百须皆具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208042_comment'></div>而邑之士买田十有二顷以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208042_comment'></div>君又辟学之四隅，得地六十亩，植杂果千本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208042_comment'></div>凡此十二顷六十亩之地，取其毛足以给养士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208042_comment'></div>而又为之延师儒以教之，而邑之子弟来学者日加多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208042_comment'></div>予守颍时，则闻君之兴学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208042_comment'></div>辛巳之冬，予移官临汝，道邑中，君馆我于新学，而属予记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208042_comment'></div>予谓之曰：今州县之吏，取办目前，责以教民则不受，而上之人亦不复责之者，而君乃引以自任如此，古循吏之用心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208042_comment'></div>虽然，为政易，教民难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208042_comment'></div>教民者始于至诚，终于不倦，二者皆本于治吾心，一不至焉，则不能以有成，盖未易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208042_comment'></div>君勉之哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1208042_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
宿迁（临淮）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d5ecfbacc0854e3d9bf1ff702b3e20a4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d5ecfbacc0854e3d9bf1ff702b3e20a4");'><span id='d5ecfbacc0854e3d9bf1ff702b3e20a4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1075')">1074-1075年</a>，21-22岁</div><div id='d5ecfbacc0854e3d9bf1ff702b3e20a4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　临淮居淮南冲要，地大而多薮泽，民风骁悍，多嚣讼争斗，到任后公务甚为繁剧。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　邑之东南即淮水，朝游夕济于其间。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年冬至</a>　是日，有感作诗三首。作品：《冬至三首》（昨夜新霜落）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《冬至三首》（汴水日夜浅）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年春</a>　春初，因公务至太湖，作诗呈刘伯声。作品：《湖上成绝句呈刘伯声四首》（湖北风来吹晓钟）<span href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　临淮道中，作诗。作品：《临淮道中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='3d54c57fecf542b4919b5c28ec73ec7f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3d54c57fecf542b4919b5c28ec73ec7f");'><span id='3d54c57fecf542b4919b5c28ec73ec7f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>，22岁</div><div id='3d54c57fecf542b4919b5c28ec73ec7f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在临淮观潮水，作诗。作品：《潮水二首》（水满清淮自在流）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年秋</a>　困于疾疠，而公务之劳不稍减，欲于自我与公事之间求得平衡，作文叙之。作品：《临淮县主簿厅题名记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷49（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208033' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208033' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208033?labeling=true' target='_blank'>临淮县主簿厅题名记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208033")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208033_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208033'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208033'>四方之车舟，其之乎东南者，十九出于泗，而临淮者又据汴，凡往来于泗者必之焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208033_comment'></div>淮南之冲，以重法禁盗贼者三郡，而泗之临淮、宿之虹，地大而多薮泽，与丰沛接，其民骁悍而剽轻，于三郡之盗居多焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208033_comment'></div>其丰年无事，则寇盗为之少息，而其悖戾之气，发于嚚讼争斗，欺妄诡诈而不畏法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208033_comment'></div>故临淮为泗之剧，而吏于泗者，于临淮为最劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208033_comment'></div>自予之来未几，而得安坐以治事，与夫寮属之往来而閒以休于家者，才十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208033_comment'></div>凡饮食之安、朋友之欢、疾病之养，率无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208033_comment'></div>予亦幸未至于衰老病惫，意犹足以及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208033_comment'></div>而今年之秋，困于疾疠者数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208033_comment'></div>吾闻之，君子之道，使内不伤己，外不伤物可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208033_comment'></div>不当事物之责，而求尸天下之至劳，则伤己；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208033_comment'></div>必求甚安至乐之地，而不能少行所不欲，则伤义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208033_comment'></div>是二者皆过矣，择乎中而无伤者，君子之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208033_comment'></div>既求其凡主簿于此者名氏日月著之，而又告之如此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1208033_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在临淮，尝与刘伯声会于青阳镇驿舍，作诗。作品：《青阳驿会刘伯声夜话》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在临淮，为挂剑台作诗。作品：《挂剑台》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷28（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a
