href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　苏轼葺园北旧台，苏辙名之曰“超然”，苏轼作《超然台记》，令刘攽来命赋之，张耒受命作赋。作品：《超然台赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207803' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207803' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207803?labeling=true' target='_blank'>超然台赋<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207803")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207803_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1207803_0'>① 有序　原注：苏子瞻守密，作台于囿，名以「超然」，命诸公赋之。予在东海，子瞻令贡父来命。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207803'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207803'>或有疑于超然，曰：「古之所谓至乐者，安能自名其所以然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207803_comment'></div>今夫鸟之能飞，兽之能驰，与夫人之耳目手足、视听动作，自外而观之者，岂不以为大乐乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207803_comment'></div>然鸟兽与人未尝自以为乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207803_comment'></div>古之有道者，其乐亦然，又安能自名其所以然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207803_comment'></div>彼方自以为超然而乐之，则是其心未免夫有累也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207803_comment'></div>客应之曰：「吾岂以子之言非耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207803_comment'></div>吾方有所较，而后知超然者之贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207803_comment'></div>予视世之贱丈夫方奔走劳役，守尘壤，握垢秽，嗜之而不知厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207803_comment'></div>而超然者方远引绝去，芥视万物，视世之所乐，不动其心，则可不谓贤耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207803_comment'></div>今夫世之富人，日玩其金玉而乐之，是未能富也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207803_comment'></div>忘其所有而安之，是真能富矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207803_comment'></div>夫惟有之，是以贵其能忘之，使其无有，则将何所忘耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207803_comment'></div>子以为将忘超然为真超然，则其初必有乐乎超然而后忘可能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207803_comment'></div>子以为乐夫世之乐者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207803_comment'></div>然则子亦安知夫名超然者果非能至乐者也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207803_comment'></div>赋曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1207803'>登高台之岌峨兮，旷四顾而无穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207803_comment'></div>环群山于左右兮，瞰大海于其东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207803_comment'></div>弃尘壤之喧卑兮，揖天半之清风，身飘飘而欲举兮，招飞鹄与翔鸿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207803_comment'></div>莽丘原之茫茫兮，吊韩侯之武功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207803_comment'></div>提千乘之富强兮，凭百胜而称雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207803_comment'></div>忽千年而何有兮，哀墟庙之榛蓬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207803_comment'></div>有物必归于尽兮，吾知此台之何恃？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207803_comment'></div>惟废兴之相召兮，要以必毁而后止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207803_comment'></div>彼变化之无穷兮，嗟其偶存之几何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207803_comment'></div>聊徼乐于吾世兮，又安知夫其他？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207803_comment'></div>或有疑夫超然者兮，岂其知道而未纯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207803_comment'></div>曰：「彼天下之至乐兮，又安能自名其所以然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207803_comment'></div>惟乐而不知所以乐兮，此其所以为乐之全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207803_comment'></div>彼超然而独得兮，是犹存物我于其间」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207803_comment'></div>客有复之者曰：「子知至乐之无名兮，是未知世之所可恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207803_comment'></div>世方奔走于物外兮，盖或至死而不顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207803_comment'></div>眇如醯鸡之舞瓮兮，又似乎青蝇之集污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207803_comment'></div>众皆旁视而笑兮，彼独守而不能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207803_comment'></div>较此乐于超然兮，谓孰贤而孰愚？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207803_comment'></div>何善恶之足较兮，固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1207803", 1207803, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>天渊</span>之异区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207803_comment'></div>道不可以直至兮，终冥合乎自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207803_comment'></div>子又安知夫名超然兮，果不能造至乐之渊乎」？</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1207803_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年春</a>　至海州怀仁县，为县令题诗藏春亭。作品：《题海州怀仁令藏春亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年6月</a>　登蓬瀛台，作诗。作品：《蓬瀛台二首》（青冥不尽海茫茫）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《蓬瀛台二首》（苍烟乔木古台荒）<span <div class='label1' id='9f7442b2da5d47f9813b185f809e0cb2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9f7442b2da5d47f9813b185f809e0cb2");'><span id='9f7442b2da5d47f9813b185f809e0cb2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>，26岁</div><div id='9f7442b2da5d47f9813b185f809e0cb2' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过阳翟，作诗。作品：《离阳翟》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在颍川停留，作诗。作品：《次颍川》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='db49e0b909f647dc90a77261f80e149b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("db49e0b909f647dc90a77261f80e149b");'><span id='db49e0b909f647dc90a77261f80e149b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，49岁</div><div id='db49e0b909f647dc90a77261f80e149b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年1月15日</a>　雨夜，宿襄城古驿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年1月</a>　过颍昌，谒苏辙，作诗和苏轼《归去来词》。作品：《次韵和陶渊明归去来辞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷5（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《和归去来词》，搜韵网为《次韵和陶渊明归去来辞》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年1月</a>　苏过、吕知止来访，苏过赠诗，张耒有答诗。作品：《苏叔党吕知止许下见访叔党有诗戏赠以此奉答》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年1月</a>　过阳翟，作诗咏沿途春景，有漂泊不定之叹。作品：《阳翟道中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
郑州（登封）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='aecd11a282fe47e48551a451310d9222_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("aecd11a282fe47e48551a451310d9222");'><span id='aecd11a282fe47e48551a451310d9222_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>，26岁</div><div id='aecd11a282fe47e48551a451310d9222' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至河南府登封县曲河镇，见嵩山、少室二山，有诗。作品：《曲河驿初见嵩少》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至河南府登封县曲河镇，见嵩山，再作诗。作品：《初见嵩山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过少室山，作诗。作品：《过少室》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='0533ff6dae744a56a8a990ac49176cbb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0533ff6dae744a56a8a990ac49176cbb");'><span id='0533ff6dae744a56a8a990ac49176cbb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>，29岁</div><div id='0533ff6dae744a56a8a990ac49176cbb' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在寿安任上，宿西京府登封县峻极下院，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《宿峻极下院》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在寿安任上，过登封县费庄镇，道中有诗。姑系于此。作品：《惠庄道中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。崔书言：“据《元丰九域志》卷首，河南府登封县有费庄镇。”）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在寿安任上，宿凤翅山悬泉寺，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《宿凤翅山悬泉寺》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。《永乐大典》卷一三八二四：“（悬泉）寺在河南府凤凰台，有张文潜留题。”所题即本诗。）</span><br /></div>

-----title
洛阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4a5d8f10714b4bd7ae3def9c252960e7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4a5d8f10714b4bd7ae3def9c252960e7");'><span id='4a5d8f10714b4bd7ae3def9c252960e7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1082')">1079-1082年</a>，26-29岁</div><div id='4a5d8f10714b4bd7ae3def9c252960e7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年12月</a>　至洛阳，访司马光，有书文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　在洛阳，拜见转运司判官唐义问兼上所作之文。姑系于此。作品：《上唐运判书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷56（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《上唐运判书》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元丰二年洛阳。）</span><div id='poem_1207855' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207855' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207855?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上唐运判书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207855")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207855_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207855'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207855'>某闻昔者三代之时，公卿大夫之待其下，何其仁爱忠厚，发于至诚，而能尽下之情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207855_comment'></div>下之事上，何其夷易简直，各得自献其意，无有阻塞不达之恐，而不限于势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207855_comment'></div>夫惟上能尽下之情，故下不限于势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207855_comment'></div>上俯而就之，下仰而及之，故尊卑之情通，而贵贱之士达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207855_comment'></div>然某尝疑之，天下急于求其上者，物理之所当然，公卿大夫既贵矣，宜其偃然无待于物，彼汲汲以求于下，苟有善焉，如恐失之，此其故何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207855_comment'></div>盖天下之位有尊卑贵贱之不同者，势之所当然，非其事亦判然为两而不相与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207855_comment'></div>今夫贵者止于自安，一切无事于功名可也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207855_comment'></div>苟有功名之心，则贵者之功贱者之力也，尊者之名卑者之成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207855_comment'></div>故上之求乎下，犹下之求其上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207855_comment'></div>昔周公既尊矣，身履天下之富贵，而后世称急贤待士者必稽焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207855_comment'></div>故其效也，百官庶府莫不修治，制度文理莫不彰明，周公之身无遗德焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207855_comment'></div>夫岂周公一人之力哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207855_comment'></div>惟其然，故古之公卿大夫，不敢苟简守常以便其私，尊者汲汲有求于卑，贵者汲汲不遗于贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207855_comment'></div>夫上有至诚恻怛之心，不敢遗忘疏远之士，则士之在下者，亦不敢复爱其所有，至于奋厉出奇惟恐不逮者，繇此故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207855_comment'></div>三代之政既亡，公卿大夫无复向者至诚尽天下之意，谨身无过，自处甚重，忘其立功立事之心，浸然锄去感发激昂之气，以谓无所事于贱微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207855_comment'></div>于下者不过言功，不幸功不至焉，虽有过人拔俗之才，不闻之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207855_comment'></div>其斥而去之，不过论罪，幸而无过，虽天下之冗琐，不复问之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207855_comment'></div>情阻而不合，气否而不交，下畏其上则有之矣，而不爱也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207855_comment'></div>下恭其上则有之矣，而不忠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207855_comment'></div>贵贱异志，尊卑不亲，而三代之风泯然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207855_comment'></div>事功之不立，岂不以此哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207855_comment'></div>某尝读《西汉》，见吴公之取贾生，田延年之用尹翁归，暴胜之之礼隽不疑，盖尝窃叹三人者犹能降心迹古之义，居尊以礼贤，致诚以纳士，以太守之尊，使者之贵，亲与匹夫下士相接，务尽人之才而忘下之渎之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207855_comment'></div>夫如前三君者，未足道也，然已能如此；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207855_comment'></div>然则天下之贤者多矣，安知无有慨然能用古义，不溺于流俗，有功名之心而忘其区区之尊严者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207855_comment'></div>呜呼，安得斯人者而处天下之富贵哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207855_comment'></div>使诚有之，天下之遗善潜德，庶几乎兴矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1207855_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年12月</a>　至寿安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年12月</a>　在寿安，赋诗谢蔡绳（字彦规）寄酥梨。作品：《寄蔡彦规兼谢惠酥梨二首》（自煮新酥笼旋开）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《寄蔡彦规兼谢惠酥梨二首》（洛川北岸锦屏西）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年春</a>　梦周楚望，作诗。作品：《梦周楚望》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年春</a>　初识晁应之，作诗。作品：《赠晁十七》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）晁应之，字号不详。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年4月</a>　寿安夏旱，麦死，民忧之，张耒作诗控诉旱神“魃”之恶行，向天帝祷雨。作品：《愬魃》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷5（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《诉魃》，搜韵网为《愬魃》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年4月</a>　寿安夏旱，百姓取山泉祠之而得雨，张耒作诗。作品：《叙雨》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷5（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年5月</a>　寄书司马光并寄新文七篇，司马光有答书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年秋</a>　离开山阳已一年，有感作诗。作品：《归马二首》（归马骎骎不受鞭）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《归马二首》（萧萧霜鬓独惊秋）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年秋</a>　作诗寄周楚望。作品：《秋日晨与寄楚望》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《秋日晨兴寄楚望》，搜韵网为《秋日晨与寄楚望》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年9月</a>　率僚属砍伐官舍北面的杂草荆棘，有诗。作品：《新开北原》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年9月</a>　率僚属砍伐官舍北面的杂草荆棘，作文记之。作品：《伐木记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷50（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208035' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208035' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208035?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伐木记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208035")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208035_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208035'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208035'>人与物各以其气相胜，而后能全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208035_comment'></div>夫气也者，假其所托而后有者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208035_comment'></div>夫长江大河，积水之渊，俯视杳然，莫知其深，长波巨派，出没奔突，近窥而神寒，远视而目竦，此则蛟龙虬蜃鱼鼋之所托，以御物之害己者而全其生者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208035_comment'></div>高山大麓，绵亘盘屈，翳以林薄，捍以木石，萦溪络涧，悬壁千仞，使人望而不敢近，近则畏而走，此则虎豹熊罴之所托，以御物之害己者而自全其生者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208035_comment'></div>使虎豹窥鱼龙之渊，蛟龙视熊罴之薮，则惶怖疾走而求去之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208035_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208035_comment'></div>物各以其所托者见其气，气胜则非其类者避之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208035_comment'></div>今夫丛祠墟墓之间，入者惨然而心不宁，目不敢肆视，足不敢肆游，其背肃肃如畏，是何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208035_comment'></div>丛祠墟墓，鬼神之所托，而人之气不胜故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208035_comment'></div>夫惟气胜者全，故气不胜者受其病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208035_comment'></div>故虎兕蛟鼍易其所处，则其心悲沮而无聊者，病之所从入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208035_comment'></div>予官福昌，福昌，古邑之废者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208035_comment'></div>官舍依山，为地十馀亩，其竹与木居十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208035_comment'></div>地旷人寡，草木茂遂，其大者皆百馀年，根干蔽覆，若幄若屋，交罗笼络，萦以茑蔓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208035_comment'></div>凡日将旦，夕将晦，鸟鸣兽号，声音百千，终日阒然，不闻人声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208035_comment'></div>夫环为城，通为衢，限为域，立为屋室，辟为场圃，夷易洞达，内外相应，面阳而背阴，附燥而瞰湿，间以草木，表以台观，人之所托也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208035_comment'></div>惟其所托者若是，故禽兽不敢藏，蛇蚖无所蟠，居之而安，游之而乐，而人之气乃能胜其异己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208035_comment'></div>是故无疾患，无惊惕，寿考安乐，远去疾疠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208035_comment'></div>而今吾之所居，草木居大半矣，其坚顽硕老，无以异于薮泽，此则鸟兽之所恋，而蛇蚖狐貉之所乐，而人之所居，乃其弃馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208035_comment'></div>则凡使吾四邻之外，晨夜而不敢出，其心矜矜，若畏敌国，一夕数兴，寝而不梦，是岂非蛇蚖狐貉之气胜，而人之所托者弱耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208035_comment'></div>于是聚吏徒，集斧斤，一日之役十夫，不三日而尽伐之，剖根穷本，芟伐剪剔，大者备梁柱，小者中椽杙，弱者补藩篱，恶者从薪蒸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208035_comment'></div>洒扫垦除，平地乃见，阴阳疏通，表里洞然，屋室阶闼，如涌而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208035_comment'></div>于是鸟兽之声，狐貉之迹，不复至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208035_comment'></div>朝游而足不忌，夜处而心不惕，吾知人之气胜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208035_comment'></div>夫气也者，起乎其所类，发乎其所托，莫知其然而然者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208035_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208035_comment'></div>物以类处者，未尝自见其气也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208035_comment'></div>所托者无情，不能与物为始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208035_comment'></div>至其相待而后成，相感而后发，自外而视之，隐然不可无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208035_comment'></div>大荒之濒，行者反顾，久废之室，寝者数惊，推之而无故，穷之而无物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208035_comment'></div>故物之未始有形而不可慢者，其气也欤？</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1208035_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年9月</a>　文彦博判河南府，张耒拜谒，有书文。作品：《上文潞公献所著诗书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷56（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207850' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207850' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207850?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上文潞公献所著诗书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207850")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207850_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207850'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207850'>古之言诗者，以谓动天地，感鬼神，莫近于诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207850_comment'></div>夫诗之兴，出于人之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207850_comment'></div>喜怒哀乐之际，皆一人之私意，而至大之天地，极幽之鬼神，而诗乃能感动之者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207850_comment'></div>盖天地虽大，鬼神虽幽，而惟至诚能动之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207850_comment'></div>彼诗者虽一人之私意，而要之必发于诚而后作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207850_comment'></div>故人之于诗，不感于物、不动于情而作者，盖寡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207850_comment'></div>今夫世之人，有顺于其心而后乐，有逆于其心而后怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207850_comment'></div>当乐而反悲、当怨而反爱者，世之所未尝有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207850_comment'></div>而乐与怨者，一有使之，莫知其然而然者也，此非至诚之动也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207850_comment'></div>彼诗者，宣所乐所怨之文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207850_comment'></div>夫情动于中而无伪，诗其导情而不苟，则其能动天地、感鬼神者，是至诚之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207850_comment'></div>夫文章蓄其变多矣，惟诗独迩于诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207850_comment'></div>故欲观人者，莫如诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207850_comment'></div>故古之君子相与燕乐酬酢之际，必赋诗以观宾主之意，虽不作于其人，而必取古人之诗以见其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207850_comment'></div>故先王之时，大至于朝廷之政事，广至于四方之风俗，微至于匹夫贱士之悲嗟，妇人女子之幽怨，一考于诗而知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207850_comment'></div>而使有可以时陈，取而藏诸太师，又播之乐章，大者荐之郊庙，而次者陈之燕享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207850_comment'></div>则夫诗之可以观故察物，其重盖如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207850_comment'></div>自周衰以来，后世作者纷然并出，以至于今数千年，其间变制异技，奇言诡术，不可胜纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207850_comment'></div>其间卓然而可称者，不过数人，其馀纷纷籍籍，皆不足道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207850_comment'></div>而违情拂志之作，往往或有，非如古之于诗，必出于诚意而不诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207850_comment'></div>然违情拂志者，盖有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207850_comment'></div>至于显情之真，发志之实者，尚十九也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207850_comment'></div>某不肖，自幼至今，颇考□历世之为诗者，上自《风》、《雅》之兴，而中观骚人之作，下考苏、李以来至于唐，扫除蕃秽而摭其真，刊落蔓衍而食其实，颇有得于前人，而时时心之所感发，亦窃见之于诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207850_comment'></div>且夫人之生于天地之间，目之所见，耳之所闻，心之所思，一日之间无顷刻之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207850_comment'></div>而又观夫四时之动，敷华发秀于春，成材布实于夏，凄风泠露，鸣虫陨叶而秋兴，重云积雪，大寒飞霰而冬至，则一岁之间无一日隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207850_comment'></div>以人之无定情，对物之无定候，则感触交战，旦夜相召，而欲望其不发于文字言语，以消去其情，盖不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207850_comment'></div>则又知诗者虽欲不为，有所不能。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1207850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207850'><span class='label'>按：</span>《柯山集拾遗》卷一二。又见《苏门六君子文粹》卷一八，《圣宋文选》卷二八，《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷八二，清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷九四。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207850_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年9月</a>　蔡绳（字彦规）卒于醴泉，归葬山阳，张耒赋诗哭之。作品：《哭蔡彦规二首》（青衫未白首）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《哭蔡彦规二首》（文章不用世）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年春</a>　接同年进士余中来信，作诗相寄。作品：《寄余五十五》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年5月</a>　知河南府长水县毕仲游赴环庆路转运司属官，张耒作诗相送。作品：《送毕公叔奉诏赴陕西》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年夏</a>　与晁应之作诗唱和。作品：《和应之盛夏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年夏</a>　与晁应之作诗唱和。姑系于此。作品：《和应之永日》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“与晁应之唱和，作《和应之盛夏》。同卷《和应之永日》或亦作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元丰四年寿安。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年秋</a>　观秋风日之景状，作诗三首。作品：《秋风三首》（秋风萧萧洛川渡）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《秋风三首》（秋风萧萧吹野桑）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《秋风三首》（昏鸦归栖暮天迥）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年10月</a>　岁暮感怀，作诗五首。作品：《官舍岁暮感怀书事五首》（衙鼓鼕鼕送夕阳）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《官舍岁暮感怀书事五首》（北风吹雁去翩翩）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《官舍岁暮感怀书事五首》（笔床茶灶素围屏）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年冬至</a>　是日，在寿安已过两冬，有感作诗。作品：《至日有感二首》（一卧孤村两见冬）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《至日有感二首》（两逢至日惊身老）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年冬至</a>　是日，回忆赴寿安尉任途中逢至日，作诗。作品：《至日有感》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年冬</a>　冬日感怀，作诗六首。作品：《冬日杂兴六首》（小园晴自扫）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《冬日杂兴六首》（水落桥痕在）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年冬</a>　因刘几介绍，与陈集节论交。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年春</a>　作诗怀念蔡彦规、秦观、参寥、江瞻道、徐积、周楚望等淮南旧友。作品：《感春》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年6月</a>　闻蛩声，作诗抒乡情。作品：《闻蛩有感》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年7月</a>　初秋，与晁应之作诗次韵唱和三首。作品：《秋怀次韵晁应之三首》（木落晚风急）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《秋怀次韵晁应之三首》（衰鬓不堪洗）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《秋怀次韵晁应之三首》（清秋万里兴）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年7月</a>　初秋，与晁应之作诗唱和四首。作品：《遣兴次韵和晁应之四首》（老去诗书倦讨论）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《遣兴次韵和晁应之四首》（西风淅淅满征衣）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《遣兴次韵和晁应之四首》（夜泛孤舟清洛津）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《遣兴次韵和晁应之四首》（蓬门鸟雀啅黄昏）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年秋</a>　感慨岁月蹉跎，作赋。作品：《怀知赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《遣忧赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《遗忧赋》，搜韵网为《遣忧赋》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><div id='poem_1207808' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207808' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207808?labeling=true' target='_blank'>怀知赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207808")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207808_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207808'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207808'>嗟予生之苦艰，涉世故而多违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207808_comment'></div>坌群嘲而众侮，独孑孑其从谁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207808_comment'></div>嗟若人之好修，外洵直而中奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207808_comment'></div>挈予手而指津，谓予车之不迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207808_comment'></div>遵常度以夷行，正六辔而安驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207808_comment'></div>嗟终日而无禽，曰固然而曷疑？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207808_comment'></div>惟言动之合符，若方圆于矩规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207808_comment'></div>振高言于皇极，流馀丽于奇辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207808_comment'></div>沃道德以相酬，心厌满而忘饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207808_comment'></div>爱日月而畏别，卒悠远而多怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207808_comment'></div>跂予望兮莫瞻，将驾言其从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207808_comment'></div>何出门之多艰，顿我马以嗟咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207808_comment'></div>山丛丛而造天，车欲进而畏摧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207808_comment'></div>临江湖以浮舟，蛟龙郁其扬鬐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207808_comment'></div>路幽回而莫通，心郁塞而增悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207808_comment'></div>赠琼瑶以致情，恐所托之吾欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207808_comment'></div>惟至技之难投，或举世而莫知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207808_comment'></div>倘一遇而见明，盖至乐之无俪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207808_comment'></div>彼取舍之迷方，或骨肉而相遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207808_comment'></div>苟我心之不察，虽亲爱而何恃？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207808_comment'></div>故烈士之报知己，或杀身而不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207808_comment'></div>岂以生而易名，诚内激而忘私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207808_comment'></div>风萧萧以戒秋，蝉嘒嘒而鸣悲，白露团兮夕凉，庭木飒其先衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207808_comment'></div>羁我马于东周，盖三岁其于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207808_comment'></div>老骎骎而来逼，心郁郁而不夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207808_comment'></div>顾所乐之莫从，托宵寐兮庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207808_comment'></div>酌尊酒以忘忧，写我心兮陈诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1207808_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207809' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207809' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207809?labeling=true' target='_blank'>遣忧赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207809")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207809_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207809'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207809'>居孑孑以无与兮，出莫知其所之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207809_comment'></div>独端居以终日兮，耿默默以长思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207809_comment'></div>古之人不可得而见兮，存者灭略之遗辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207809_comment'></div>顾一世之异情兮，予谁者其从之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207809_comment'></div>惟我生之拙迂兮，嗟所慕之名奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207809_comment'></div>挹廉清之遗风兮，曰吾其进难而退易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207809_comment'></div>百驱不加于跬步兮，却辔疾返而莫追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207809_comment'></div>践斯言之不欺兮，庶吾心之无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207809_comment'></div>日月忽其迁流兮，老忽忽而既来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207809_comment'></div>惟所蹈之日迷兮，抚前心而自非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207809_comment'></div>欲改故而图新兮，从灵龟而问疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207809_comment'></div>兆改横而上从兮，史为予而告辞：「横为窒而善处兮，上从直达其无巇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207809_comment'></div>岂外拘而中泰兮，或者既塞而将遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207809_comment'></div>保尔守而无变兮，神明于汝其遗之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207809_comment'></div>相利害而为术兮，彼乡人其犹耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207809_comment'></div>美灵龟之告繇兮，得我心之所止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207809_comment'></div>彼跹跹其焉往，聊安安以自恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207809_comment'></div>岁冉冉以将老兮，草木飒其变衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207809_comment'></div>玄蝉号乎高柳兮，溢菡萏于清池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207809_comment'></div>宵虫悲鸣以相语兮，朔雨振迅而南窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207809_comment'></div>嗟吾客于东周兮，周天星之三移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207809_comment'></div>写我忧以命驾兮，凭高明以远视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207809_comment'></div>览平田以芒泱兮，瞰清洛之东驶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207809_comment'></div>山重复而南积兮，万岭矗矗以鳞次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207809_comment'></div>微云霮䨴以忽布兮，孤翼灭没而高逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207809_comment'></div>熊耳高高而西峙兮，女几奋涌而南危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207809_comment'></div>束平川于两间兮，散佃渔于平地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207809_comment'></div>鸡犬密其相闻兮，沟塍布而如棋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207809_comment'></div>牛羊閒以就牧兮，乌鸟号呼以群嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207809_comment'></div>登故国之馀墟兮，望遗宫之颓基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207809_comment'></div>伤者来世而无穷兮，乐者昔人其既止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207809_comment'></div>惟达观其超忽兮，等废兴于一视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207809_comment'></div>考物变以自乐兮，遗馀情于酒醴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207809_comment'></div>大人无即而非乐兮，浅夫系物以自治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207809_comment'></div>彼方窘我以局促兮，我则顾步而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1207809", 1207809, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>广肆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207809_comment'></div>制忧乐于在彼兮，夫何贵乎明智？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207809_comment'></div>忘吾忧以洋洋兮，将以语夫君子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1207809_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年秋</a>　见寒鸦，感慨作诗。作品：《寒鸦词》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷4（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年秋</a>　见枝叶散落，作诗咏怀。作品：《摇落》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年秋</a>　作诗写秋日景象。姑系于此。作品：《九月一日有作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《九月一日有作》，与《摇落》不仅情意颇同，用语亦多相类，如‘秋物’‘摇落’等。或亦作于同时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元丰五年寿安。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年秋</a>　感慨岁月蹉跎，作诗十二首。作品：《岁暮书事十二首》（岁晏北风疾）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（清洛鱼梁浅）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（风捲尘沙白）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（牛羊已归去）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（原庙依冈起）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（北风吹马疾）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（壮心常许国）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（自昔周人俗）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（千载伤顽俗）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（陈叶不肯堕）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（日落擎明烛）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《岁暮书事十二首》（云去暮天迥）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年冬</a>　独酌，作诗寄晁应之。作品：《岁暮独酌书事奉怀晁永宁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年冬</a>　陈集节将往成州栗亭，张耒作诗相寄，邀其临行前来寿安相聚话别。作品：《寄集节二首》（陈侯气飘飘）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《寄集节二首》（北风号空庭）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　是岁，见伊阳巡检任青，为其作传。作品：《任青传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷52（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208059' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208059' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208059?labeling=true' target='_blank'>任青传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208059")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208059_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208059'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208059'>任青，寿春人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208059_comment'></div>少无赖，为盗，以智数雄其党，有声群盗中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208059_comment'></div>然青为盗不多杀害，为济所欲不多求，稍有以贤其类矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208059_comment'></div>里僧有善驴，其值数万钱，僧爱之，所以圉备之甚固，盗数取之不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208059_comment'></div>于是里少年聚数万钱邀青，曰：「子能得驴，则请以钱为君寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208059_comment'></div>不能得，君妄得名也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208059_comment'></div>青笑谢少年，辞不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208059_comment'></div>少年固强之，青曰：「具饮，夜半吾乘驴来诣君矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208059_comment'></div>虽然，愿以是为戏，卒事请以驴还僧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208059_comment'></div>少年曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208059_comment'></div>夜半，青怀刀超其垣入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208059_comment'></div>僧系驴房外，锁驴前足，无可解理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208059_comment'></div>青即解刀，微刺驴足间见血，以刀击地跑者久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208059_comment'></div>僧闻，使童疾走烛视驴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208059_comment'></div>青疾起匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208059_comment'></div>童即语锁啮驴足流血矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208059_comment'></div>僧即取钥，命童解锁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208059_comment'></div>童去，寝熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208059_comment'></div>青即牵驴自其门出，疾驱而至少年所，一座大惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208059_comment'></div>明日，乃使谢僧还驴，曰：「吾以为戏，愿勿罪也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208059_comment'></div>其多智数率如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208059_comment'></div>后稍聚党，罪过数发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208059_comment'></div>吏捕逐不得，闻朝廷，诏使招出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208059_comment'></div>青即自诣寿春，诏以补卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208059_comment'></div>太守使捕部中盗，往辄得，境为无盗，以劳稍迁等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208059_comment'></div>后数得尤贼，诏授官至右侍禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208059_comment'></div>元丰三年，河南伊阳贼张晏，聚党抄掠，伤吏士，朝廷选青为伊阳巡检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208059_comment'></div>五年，盗劫伊阳之小水，青追盗至福昌，予因见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208059_comment'></div>青长六尺馀，慷慨敢勇，持刀入山独行二百馀里，以一时往返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208059_comment'></div>然貌恂恂谦恭，事士大夫甚谨，惟恐不当其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208059_comment'></div>居官小心，畏法廉洁，御下有恩，其语捕盗甚有方略云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208059_comment'></div>先是朝廷兴师取灵州，陕西转运使李察当领徒从大将高遵裕军出塞，察与青有旧恩，奏辟青从行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208059_comment'></div>遵裕军疾驱入塞，察数危窘矣，青卫之，夜则被甲守其寝，抚左右得其欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208059_comment'></div>察卒赖以全者，青之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208059_comment'></div>张子曰：青始强暴，为盗贼，后乃折节，士大夫或愧焉，其始盖无有教之者故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208059_comment'></div>夫中道为善，犹不失为士，况终始于善者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208059_comment'></div>然青才有过人者，彼虽为盗，固有以自异也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1208059_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　观莲花，作诗戏赠晁应之。姑系于此。作品：《对莲花戏寄晁应之》<span /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　任寿安尉期间，尝与杨国宝谈论道士齐希庄所遇异事，有文记之。姑系于此。作品：《书道士齐希庄事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷54（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1208049' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208049' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208049?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书道士齐希庄事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208049")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208049_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208049'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208049'>道士齐希庄，颇学养生，喜游名山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208049_comment'></div>至王屋山，乐之不忍去，搆草堂，居燕真人岩前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208049_comment'></div>王屋多栗橡芜菁及诸果蔬可食者，以时采收给食，居三年，自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208049_comment'></div>一日，有猴入其室，希庄初不甚怪，逐之不去，视希庄坐起百为，从傍效之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208049_comment'></div>希庄大怪，念初居山时，客有教希庄逐猴法：取猴矢悬而击之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208049_comment'></div>试用，猴为去，希庄独喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208049_comment'></div>居数日，有大猴，异甚，如五六岁儿，垂毛至地，孰视希庄，效其动作如前猴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208049_comment'></div>希庄惧，莫知所为，不敢复逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208049_comment'></div>久之，猴复去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208049_comment'></div>希庄意欲出山，未决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208049_comment'></div>一日，有人呼，希庄出视，有人若两髻童子，黄单衣，绿带，目有光，貌不甚类人，问麻笼山安自往，希庄指告之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208049_comment'></div>童子疾去如飞，直度岭壑，望视不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208049_comment'></div>自是希庄夜闻舍傍百物有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208049_comment'></div>一夕，大雪，晨出视，门外人迹无数，希庄发悸，不能复居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208049_comment'></div>走山下，得瘖疾，数岁方愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208049_comment'></div>濮阳杜毅言尝主簿王屋县，有登王屋天坛峰得方玉如镜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208049_comment'></div>毅读道家书，载黄帝尝以八方玉镜悬坛八方，祀上帝云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208049_comment'></div>予尝以此事语洛人杨国宝应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208049_comment'></div>应之云，其故人有居嵩高者，言凡天下名山，有神主之，非有道者不得居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208049_comment'></div>若顽然无闻，徒中夜咽唾，山鬼笑汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208049_comment'></div>齐希庄，庸道士也，仅闻养生小术，其不容于王屋之猴，何足怪哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1208049_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　任寿安尉期间，与刘几交往，听其谈养生、论乐律、议边事，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《刘伯寿秘校》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在寿安任上，独居，以为无与为友，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《友山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷5（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在寿安任上，福昌官居有大蛇穴堂北，见者不敢逐，张耒逐之，因作诗。姑系于此。作品：《逐蛇》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在寿安任上，登高作诗。姑系于此。作品：《登高》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷5（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在寿安任上，降雨缓天旱，因作诗。姑系于此。作品：《飞云》<span href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在寿安任上，夏日，与友人作诗唱和。姑系于此。作品：《和应之出城》<span 之或杨应之，待考”。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在寿安任上，依韵作诗与晁应之唱和。姑系于此。作品：《依韵和晁十七落花二首》（投老殷勤向物华）<span /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在寿安任上，春日交游，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《探春》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在寿安任上，作文书写对淮水的思念。姑系于此。作品：《思淮亭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷49（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1208034' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208034' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208034?labeling=true' target='_blank'>思淮亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208034")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208034_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208034'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208034'>淮之源发于桐柏，其初甚微，或积或行，洋洋而东，旁会支合，滂沛淫溢，连颍合蔡，一流而下，会于寿春，其流浩然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208034_comment'></div>于是蛟龙之所藏，风雨之所兴，包山界野而负千斛之舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208034_comment'></div>又东行数百里，而汴、泗合焉，水益壮，其所负益重，而游者益谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208034_comment'></div>旁沾远溉，丰田沃野，物赖其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208034_comment'></div>而萦抱城郭，间以山麓，洄洑清泚，长鱼美蟹，茭蒲葭苇之利，沾及数百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208034_comment'></div>而南商越贾，高帆巨舻，群行旅集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208034_comment'></div>居民旅肆，烹鱼酾酒，歌谣笑语，联络于两隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208034_comment'></div>自泗而东，与潮通而还于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208034_comment'></div>予淮南人也，自幼至壮，习于淮而乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208034_comment'></div>凡风平日霁，四时之变，与夫蛟龙风雨之怪，无所不历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208034_comment'></div>而今也得官于洛阳之寿安，而官居福昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208034_comment'></div>凡风俗之所宜，饮食之所嗜，与淮之南异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208034_comment'></div>官居之西，有泉幽幽，出于北阜，瀹而注之，有声淙然，聚为小潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208034_comment'></div>其上有亭，环以修竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208034_comment'></div>吾游而乐之，漱濯汲引，无一日不在其上，而时时慨然南望，思淮而莫见之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208034_comment'></div>于是易亭之故名，曰「思淮」焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208034_comment'></div>夫士虽耻怀其故居，而君子之于故国也，岂漠然若秦越之人哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208034_comment'></div>故孔子之去鲁也，迟迟吾行也，曰：「去父母国之道也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208034_comment'></div>君子不敢乐其所私而无志于天下，故自其壮也，则出身委质，奔走从事于四方，以求行其学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208034_comment'></div>至安其旧而乐其习，岂与人异情哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208034_comment'></div>特与夫怀土而不迁异耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208034_comment'></div>夫弃故而不念，流寓而忘返，则必薄于仁者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208034_comment'></div>予既不敢爱其所处，出而仕矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208034_comment'></div>然少之所居处，耳目之所习狎，岂能使予漠然无感于中哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208034_comment'></div>且夫怀居而不迁，流寓而忘返者，均有罪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208034_comment'></div>然与其轻弃其旧也，则累于所习者，不犹厚欤？</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1208034_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年春</a>　罢寿安尉，居洛阳。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年春</a>　谒司马光、范纯仁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年春</a>　游李氏园，作诗。作品：《游李氏园》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年春</a>　至天津桥观景。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年春</a>　与周锷（字廉彦）作诗唱和。作品：《和周廉彦》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年3月</a>　与荣辑（字子邕）订交，为其作赋。作品：《得友赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207807' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207807' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207807?labeling=true' target='_blank'>得友赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（答子邕）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207807")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207807_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207807'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207807'>予趋世之僻迂，独孑孑而无朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207807_comment'></div>信所乐以直前，尝媒仇而贾憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207807_comment'></div>惟物态之多艰，抚危心而自惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207807_comment'></div>甘默默以退藏，包薄技而无成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207807_comment'></div>何吾迹之不常，旅成周之故京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207807_comment'></div>眷吾游之悠远，耿谁语兮吾情？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207807_comment'></div>惟夫子之好修，昔固闻乎德声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207807_comment'></div>独顾我而忘勤，握未暖而心倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207807_comment'></div>发键钥而不疑，奏金石之铿锽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207807_comment'></div>内端肃而粹温，外炳焕而清明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207807_comment'></div>嗟我鄙而子奇，谓欲合而莫能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207807_comment'></div>援古义而见交，愧此意之何胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207807_comment'></div>既两尽而莫疑，亦交规而共评。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207807_comment'></div>驱昔懑之无馀，抚新乐而生矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207807_comment'></div>岂目前之欢愉，实未得乎平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207807_comment'></div>惟清洛之名都，窥园沼之清澄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207807_comment'></div>语寒堂之夜烛，醉春圃之朝英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207807_comment'></div>徵逸士于古初，亦穷微而造精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207807_comment'></div>投明珠之的历，报美璧之煌荧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207807_comment'></div>惟此乐之无穷，使我爱日而兢兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207807_comment'></div>虽所历之万殊，愿勿疾兮兹诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207807_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207807_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年春</a>　同荣辑登石家寺阁，作诗。作品：《同荣子邕登石家寺阁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a class='authorDate'>（1107年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207916'>予见少游投卷多矣，《黄楼赋》、《哀镈钟文》卷卷有之，岂其得意之文欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207916_comment'></div>少游平生为文不多，而一一精好可传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207916_comment'></div>在岭外亦时为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207916_comment'></div>临殁自为挽诗一章，殊可悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207916_comment'></div>此卷是投正献公者，今藏居仁处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207916_comment'></div>居仁好其文，出予览之，令人怆恨。<div class='inline' id='fa05916ec81240738b7fa7dba1bb6195_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fa05916ec81240738b7fa7dba1bb6195");'><span id='fa05916ec81240738b7fa7dba1bb6195_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年闰4月29日</a>　到任，有谢执政启文。作品：《润州谢执政启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷57（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207868' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207868' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207868?labeling=true' target='_blank'>润州谢执政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年闰4月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207868")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207868_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207868'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207868'>比者伏奉告命，除直龙图阁、知润州军事，已于闰四月二十九日到任交割讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207868_comment'></div>伏以文章为学者馀事，故先王不以经世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207868_comment'></div>富贵非人力所制，故君子以为在天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207868_comment'></div>而况修词蹇浅，未涉作者之流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207868_comment'></div>趋世阔迂，每在众人之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207868_comment'></div>则其投閒置散，疐后跋前，在所当然，夫复何恨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207868_comment'></div>伏念某羁旅一介，憔悴馀生，困箠楚者十年，逭饥寒于斗禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207868_comment'></div>仕已成于漫浪，意何有于功名？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207868_comment'></div>始误置于成均，复进升于儒馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207868_comment'></div>佐东观之论著，颇见旧闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207868_comment'></div>纪先帝之事功，遂游藏室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207868_comment'></div>擢升右史，密侍清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207868_comment'></div>虽学儒之至荣，岂草茅之素望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207868_comment'></div>而疾病侵耗，心力衰疲，分敢自安，义当引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207868_comment'></div>驽马自竭，骥历块而已超；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207868_comment'></div>神山在前，风引舟而忽远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207868_comment'></div>尚叨便郡，获养残躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207868_comment'></div>静循此恩，盖有所自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207868_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇某官曲成万类，器使庶工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207868_comment'></div>直镈蒙镠，疾者未尝遽废；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207868_comment'></div>大杗小桷，施之各以其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207868_comment'></div>致此枵虚，未即捐弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207868_comment'></div>狱讼希简，职事不废乎诗书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207868_comment'></div>山林幽深，形骸颇为之清快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207868_comment'></div>庶馀龄之可养，幸沈痼之有瘳，仰报至恩，将必有在。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1207868_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年5月</a>　苏轼谪知英州，途经真州，张耒自润州遣兵王告、顾成侍奉苏轼路途。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年夏</a>　作诗写润州生活。作品：《题斋壁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　游焦山，题诗。作品：《题焦山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　作诗抒游子之思。作品：《润州书事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年7月</a>　初秋，解润州任。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　在润州，翟汝文从张耒游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　在润州，尝游甘露寺，作诗咏李德裕祖父李栖筠画像。作品：《李赞皇画像》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　在润州，尝游甘露寺，作诗咏李德裕祖父李栖筠。作品：《赞皇公》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　李推官寄来诗文，张耒作文答之。姑系于此。作品：《答李推官书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷55（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《答李推官书》或作于润州任上”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于绍圣元年润州。）</span><div id='poem_1207839' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207839' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207839?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答李推官书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207839")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207839_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207839'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207839'>李君足下：南来多事，久废读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207839_comment'></div>昨送简人还，忽辱惠及所作《病暑赋》及杂诗等，诵咏爱叹，既有以起其竭涸之思，而又喜世之学者，比来稍稍追求古人之文章，述作体制，往往已有所到也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207839_comment'></div>某不才，少时喜为文词，与人游，又喜论文字，谓之嗜好则可，以为能文，则世自有人，决不在我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207839_comment'></div>足下与某平居饮酒笑语，忘去屑屑，而忽持大轴细书，题官位姓名，如卑贱之见尊贵，此何为者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207839_comment'></div>岂妄以某为知文，谬为恭敬，若请教者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207839_comment'></div>欲持纳而贪于爱玩，势不可得舍，虽怛然不以自宁，而既辱勤厚，亦不敢隐其所知于左右也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207839_comment'></div>足下之文，可谓奇矣，捐去文字常体，力为瑰奇险怪，务欲使人读之如见数千载前蝌蚪鸟迹所记弦匏之歌、钟鼎之文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207839_comment'></div>足下之所嗜者如此，固无不善者，抑某之所闻，所谓能文者，岂谓其能奇哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207839_comment'></div>能文者固不能以奇为主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207839_comment'></div>夫文何谓而设也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207839_comment'></div>知理者不能言，世之能言者多矣，而文者独传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207839_comment'></div>岂独传哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207839_comment'></div>因其能文也而言益工，因其言工而理益明，是以圣人贵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207839_comment'></div>自《六经》以下，至于诸子百氏、骚人辩士论述，大抵皆将以为寓理之具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207839_comment'></div>是故理胜者文不期工而工，理诎者巧为粉泽而隙间百出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207839_comment'></div>此犹两人持牒而讼，直者操笔不待，累累读之如破竹，横斜反覆，自中节目；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207839_comment'></div>曲者虽使假词于子贡，问字于扬雄，如列五味而不能调和，食之于口无一可惬，况可使人玩味之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207839_comment'></div>故学文之端，急于明理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207839_comment'></div>夫不知为文者，无所复道，如知文而不务理，求文之工，世未尝有是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207839_comment'></div>夫决水于江河淮海也，水顺道而行，滔滔汩汩，日夜不止，冲砥柱，绝吕梁，放于江湖而纳之海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207839_comment'></div>其舒为沦涟，鼓为波涛，激之为风飙，怒之为雷霆，蛟龙鱼鼋，喷薄出没，是水之奇变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207839_comment'></div>而水初岂如此哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207839_comment'></div>是顺道而决之，因其所适而变生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207839_comment'></div>沟渎东决而西竭，下满而上虚，日夜激之，欲见其奇，彼其所至者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1207839", 1207839, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>蛙蛭</span>之玩耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207839_comment'></div>江河淮海之水，理达之文也，不求奇而奇至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207839_comment'></div>激沟渎而求水之奇，此无见于理，而欲以言语句读为奇之文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207839_comment'></div>《六经》之文莫奇于《易》，莫简于《春秋》，夫岂以奇与简为务哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207839_comment'></div>势自然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207839_comment'></div>《传》曰：「吉人之词寡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207839_comment'></div>彼岂恶繁而好寡哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207839_comment'></div>虽欲为繁，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207839_comment'></div>自唐以来至今，文人好奇者不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207839_comment'></div>甚者或为缺句断章，使脉理不属，又取古书训诂希于见闻者，挦扯而牵合之，或得其字不得其句，或得其句不得其章，反覆咀嚼，卒亦无有，此最文之陋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207839_comment'></div>足下之文，虽不若此，然其意靡靡似主于奇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207839_comment'></div>故预为足下陈之，愿无以仆之言质俚而不省也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1207839_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年秋</a>　离润州，至金山，困于风浪，逗留五日。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
扬州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c5e02227b7f742abb1a84bf20323b8ae_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c5e02227b7f742abb1a84bf20323b8ae");'><span id='c5e02227b7f742abb1a84bf20323b8ae_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>，41岁</div><div id='c5e02227b7f742abb1a84bf20323b8ae' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>接表弟李公辅所寄蜂儿、木瓜、笔，作诗相谢。作品：《瓜洲谢李德载寄蜂儿木瓜笔》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷14（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>故人吴孟求赠酒，作诗谢之。作品：《赠吴孟求承议二首》（我生仕宦求糊口）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷14（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）吴孟求，生平不详。）</span>《赠吴孟求承议二首》（我非初平叱羊口）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷14（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）吴孟求，生平不详。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在瓜洲，遇父执李处道。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='2eca777999bf4f45ad9536bd17e50305_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2eca777999bf4f45ad9536bd17e50305");'><span id='2eca777999bf4f45ad9536bd17e50305_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>，43岁</div><div id='2eca777999bf4f45ad9536bd17e50305' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年寒食</a>　是日，游扬州山光寺，作诗。作品：《山光寺》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷21（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div>

-----title
南京
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='47d4a123d0334fdc9e3ff43f55ddf20e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("47d4a123d0334fdc9e3ff43f55ddf20e");'><span id='47d4a123d0334fdc9e3ff43f55ddf20e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>，41岁</div><div id='47d4a123d0334fdc9e3ff43f55ddf20e' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至江宁府，题诗新亭。作品：《将之天长题新亭壁二首》（新亭登眺解征鞍）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《将之天长题新亭壁二首》（云捲山光到眼前）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='bbcdaec4902b4284a311b70341507cfa_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bbcdaec4902b4284a311b70341507cfa");'><span id='bbcdaec4902b4284a311b70341507cfa_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>，43岁</div><div id='bbcdaec4902b4284a311b70341507cfa' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至江宁府，谒蒋帝祠，过钟山，作诗。作品：《谒蒋帝祠过钟山下二首》（野塘春水绿迢迢）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）钟山，即蒋山。）</span>《谒蒋帝祠过钟山下二首》（溶溶野水戏凫鹥）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）钟山，即蒋山。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至江宁府，作文记谒蒋帝祠。姑系于此。作品：《杂书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷53（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“以上所叙皆可与张耒行迹相合，然此文结尾曰：‘白公少客杭州，自言欲得守杭，卒如其言，予亦云。’颇可疑，待考。”）</span><div id='poem_1208047' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208047' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208047?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杂书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年暮春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208047")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208047_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208047'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208047'>予自金陵月堂谒蒋帝祠，初出北门，始辨色，行平野中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208047_comment'></div>时暮春，人家桃李未谢，西望城壁壕水，或绝或流，多鵁鶄白鹭，逦迤近山，风物夭秀，如行锦绣图画中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208047_comment'></div>旧读荆公诗，多称蒋山景物，信不诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208047_comment'></div>白公少客杭州，自言欲得守杭，卒如其言，予亦云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1208047_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在金陵，游赏心亭，作诗。作品：《赏心亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在金陵，作诗怀古。作品：《金陵怀古》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）此诗与王珪《华阳集》卷3《金陵怀古二首》（其二）同，《两宋名贤小集》卷40亦作王珪之作，收入《王岐公集》，《瀛奎律髓》卷3亦题王珪作。待考。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>逗留金陵十日。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>离金陵，从折柳亭出发，作诗二首。作品：《发金陵折柳亭二首》（绿衮溶溶日）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《发金陵折柳亭二首》（桃李蕃晴日）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《发金陵折柳亭二首》（匆匆十日事）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《发金陵折柳亭二首》（瞿昙昔教我）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>离金陵，从折柳亭出发，作诗一首。作品：《发金陵折柳亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）搜韵网无此诗。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>离金陵，将渡长江北上，作诗。作品：《渡江》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>冈沙渡阻风，作诗。作品：《冈沙阻风》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
宣城
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='0bc9d2fc6b85416abb12bf1955a642bc_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0bc9d2fc6b85416abb12bf1955a642bc");'><span id='0bc9d2fc6b85416abb12bf1955a642bc_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1095')">1094-1095年</a>，41-42岁</div><div id='0bc9d2fc6b85416abb12bf1955a642bc' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年秋冬</a>　至宣州，有启文。作品：《宣州谢两府启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷57（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207870' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207870' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207870?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宣州谢两府启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年秋冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207870")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207870_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207870'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207870'>比者法当易地，恩使造庭，方奔命于半途，遽分符于使郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207870_comment'></div>地未殊于南北，舟楫相通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207870_comment'></div>忧方切于困穷，廪禄有继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207870_comment'></div>虽徼幸出圣朝之厚，而曲成皆高位之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207870_comment'></div>已见吏民，粗知风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207870_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇某官，受天间气，为国元臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207870_comment'></div>道德致君，议论垂世，器众材而无弃，虑一物之遐遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207870_comment'></div>遂令罔功，每辄得所；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207870_comment'></div>退观所领，自昔有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207870_comment'></div>道德在人，有颜真卿之政事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207870_comment'></div>登高旧赋，称谢玄晖之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207870_comment'></div>某素乏词华，不通吏道，一无称可，全有便安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207870_comment'></div>民消愁叹之声，自缘圣治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207870_comment'></div>家受饱暖之福，徒费君恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207870_comment'></div>尺寸无施，冒昧而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207870_comment'></div>岁事云宴，几政多閒，伏乞俯为华夷，精调寝味。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207870_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年冬至</a>　是日，谒天庆观行香，作诗。作品：《宣城至日谒天庆观行香呈郡僚》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年冬至</a>　是日，谒天庆观，观三色桧，作诗。作品：《天庆观三色桧》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年冬</a>　游览敬亭山，谒敬亭祠，有诗。作品：《谒敬亭祠》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年冬</a>　接陈鼎来信，为其母符夫人作墓志铭。作品：《符夫人墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷61（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208075' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208075' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208075?labeling=true' target='_blank'>符夫人墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍圣二年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208075")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208075_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208075'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208075'>夫人符氏，南海番禺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208075_comment'></div>曾祖、祖为布衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208075_comment'></div>父臻，虔州司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208075_comment'></div>年二十，嫁故大理寺丞陈君世则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208075_comment'></div>寺丞，参知政事讳恕之孙，赠金紫光禄大夫讳执礼之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208075_comment'></div>夫人归陈氏，陈氏族素贵，夫人起寒家，以礼奉顺，莫或敢以贵临之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208075_comment'></div>寺丞君宦坎坷，家徒四壁立，夫人安之，内外忘其贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208075_comment'></div>性宽仁，无怨恶，抚异出子如己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208075_comment'></div>子男四人，鼎、鼐、鼒、鼏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208075_comment'></div>孙四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208075_comment'></div>鼎与余同学宛丘，是时鼎叔为郡要官，而鼎刻苦自同诸生，穷冬积雪，寒坐一室，杜门讽诵不辍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208075_comment'></div>余窃贤之，而考其渊源，固已知其亲之贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208075_comment'></div>今年冬，鼎以书来云：「夫人没矣，将葬于池州青山之南原」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208075_comment'></div>而属余铭状其行事如此，其不诬已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208075_comment'></div>夫人年七十，其葬实绍圣二年正月己酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208075_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1208075'>自微嫔贵俨弗陵，从夫以艰顺以承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208075_comment'></div>考终同穴如平生，子孝而贤以有铭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1208075_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年12月</a>　岁暮，效仿白体，作诗寄晁补之。作品：《效白体赠晁无咎》（过去生中作弟兄）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《效白体赠晁无咎。白公守苏时，刘梦得守和，有岁暮赠刘诗三首，因效其体，寄齐州知府无咎学士二哥，虽愧仰声华，然亦不惭分义》，搜韵网为《效白体赠晁无咎》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span>《效白体赠晁无咎》（江南岁晚水风寒）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《效白体赠晁无咎。白公守苏时，刘梦得守和，有岁暮赠刘诗三首，因效其体，寄齐州知府无咎学士二哥，虽愧仰声华，然亦不惭分义》，搜韵网为《效白体赠晁无咎》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span>《效白体赠晁无咎》（关河战国东秦地）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《效白体赠晁无咎。白公守苏时，刘梦得守和，有岁暮赠刘诗三首，因效其体，寄齐州知府无咎学士二哥，虽愧仰声华，然亦不惭分义》，搜韵网为《效白体赠晁无咎》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　是岁，钱勰入翰苑，张耒作文祝贺。姑系于此。作品：《贺钱内翰启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷57（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207869?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺钱内翰启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207869")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207869'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207869'>伏承内翰侍读四丈罢直内阁，升华禁林，解天府之浩繁，侍经帷之清燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207869_comment'></div>虽众望所属，理固当然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207869_comment'></div>而成命既行，士以相贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207869_comment'></div>伏以学士号为职亲地要，实儒者之至荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207869_comment'></div>训辞欲其言近指深，必文人为充选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207869_comment'></div>设官虽专于书诏，储才常用于钧衡，被选益艰，因人增重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207869_comment'></div>虽从容入侍，独高太白、乐天之词华；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207869_comment'></div>而论议经邦，复重德裕、敬舆之术业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207869_comment'></div>苟擅一长于此，皆为称职之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207869_comment'></div>洪惟本朝，继有硕望，方当圣主之图任，果见异人之来仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207869_comment'></div>伏惟某官，学总百家，才高一世，经守韦、平之学，世登晁、董之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207869_comment'></div>无施不长，所治皆最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207869_comment'></div>批窦蹈窾，在庖丁如无牛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207869_comment'></div>越国过都，于骐骥为历块。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207869_comment'></div>隐然公辅之望，久矣中外所期，俄闻异恩，大慰众论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207869_comment'></div>谋谟黼座，何惭天子私人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207869_comment'></div>顾瞻玉堂，应叹吾家旧物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207869_comment'></div>即膺大拜，用究远图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207869_comment'></div>某每愧庸虚，素承知奖，其为欣快，实倍等伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207869_comment'></div>叹白发之侵陵，望青云于寥廓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207869_comment'></div>岁事已晏，德履多祥，更冀保颐，下副祝愿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207869_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献地点不详，姑系于此地。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年1月15日</a>　上元节有所叹，作诗三首。作品：《上元思京辇旧游三首》（万雉春城逼绛霄）<span
