ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　春末至夏，旱情严重，至敬亭广惠王庙求雨，作祭文。作品：《敬亭广惠王求雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208094' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208094' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208094?labeling=true' target='_blank'>敬亭广惠王求雨文<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208094")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208094_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208094'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208094'>嗟乎吾民，其困久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208094_comment'></div>去岁积雨，大江横流，两圩既隳，一境受弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208094_comment'></div>补复亡散，实在今年，死生存亡，间不容发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208094_comment'></div>而自春及夏，时泽未滋，芃芃四郊，稻且不植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208094_comment'></div>吏术莫救，必神之求，神食斯民，忍视其疾？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208094_comment'></div>惟王威灵功德，烜赫在民，指挥蛟龙，震作云雨，一瞬之力，岂或难之！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1208094_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1208095' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208095' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208095?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208095_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208095'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208095'>山川之神，能出云气，见变怪，以司雨旸之权，以佐民衣食之用，则是有职于民者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208095_comment'></div>故朝廷隆以爵号，表以庙貌，有司岁时奉祀不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208095_comment'></div>自四月至今，以旱祷于王者，于是三矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208095_comment'></div>今事已益急，虽渎神有罪，而不敢避也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208095_comment'></div>惟王俯而听之，油然而云，沛然而泽，以除民之病，以纾吏之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208095_comment'></div>于王之神，謦欬之力，有职于民，宜不爱惜也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1208095_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1208096' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208096' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208096?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208096_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208096'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208096'>宣之为州，被山带江，民耕于高，无灌溉之利，而仰泽于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208096_comment'></div>故阅月不雨，则以旱告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208096_comment'></div>今兹季夏之初，时雨大至，诸山之田，既植且茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208096_comment'></div>比日乏雨，积水且竭，亦尝雨矣，然方作而止，又不遍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208096_comment'></div>是以民心惶惶，忧在岁事，吏无以为术，但知有谒于神而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208096_comment'></div>夫囷廪之有，将入手而取之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208096_comment'></div>稊稗之食，将下咽而夺之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208096_comment'></div>抑又神之所不忍也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1208096_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1208097' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208097' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208097?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208097_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208097'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208097'>南方之民，以稻为命，而稻非水不植，神所知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208097_comment'></div>今兹四月且尽，而原田槁乾，待水种稻，而雨不降，涧溪之流，亦复浅涸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208097_comment'></div>民情惶惶，如失火之待水，寒疾之待汗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208097_comment'></div>失今不种，则一岁且无食，其饥饿死亡，流转于沟壑，可立而待，则其忧惧危迫之情，盖可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208097_comment'></div>乃兹月甲申，尝率僚属有祷于神，神如答之，翌日而雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208097_comment'></div>然施泽未渥，云日已霁，岂神未念民之病，姑以塞其意而已耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208097_comment'></div>审如是，其继有请，虽十百其未止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208097_comment'></div>神虽欲罪其渎而降之罚，亦末如之何矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208097_comment'></div>今事已甚迫，敢尽布之，惟立兴风雨，一雨三尺，其于农事，乃克有济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208097_comment'></div>某亦有不腆之牲酒，以报神之德，惟王速图之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1208097_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　春末至夏，旱情严重，至三天洞求雨，作文。作品：《三天洞求雨疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷57（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208092' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208092' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208092?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三天洞求雨疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208092")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208092_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208092'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208092'>伏以宣城之境，春末以来，雨施不时，稻未得种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208092_comment'></div>父子熟视而无告，官吏不知其所为，凡曰有神，靡不致祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208092_comment'></div>岂德薄莫能感格，抑民灾未易祓除？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208092_comment'></div>莽大泽与高原，赫炎风兮畏日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208092_comment'></div>恭惟禅师具千乘眼，得一佛乘，无有亲疏，等加悲悯，护众生如赤子，观此世如掌中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208092_comment'></div>则夫郁兴大云，普降甘雨，宜翘足可待，实伸臂之劳，其在神通，盖甚容易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208092_comment'></div>眷兹千里之泽，请以三日为期，时或有愆，事且无及。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1208092_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　春末至夏，旱情严重，至灵济王庙求雨，作祭文。作品：《灵济王求雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208099' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208099' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208099?labeling=true' target='_blank'>灵济王求雨文<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208099")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208099_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208099'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208099'>惟王昔以功德，受国爵命，衮服南面，抗仪王者，可谓盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208099_comment'></div>数州之民，奔走奉祀，以时不懈，积有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208099_comment'></div>受国爵命，则如有位于朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208099_comment'></div>食民奉祀，则如受禄于国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208099_comment'></div>然则其可不察民之利病，与之同忧乐哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208099_comment'></div>今民之大忧，王亦知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208099_comment'></div>乃自春末至今，时雨不降，仲夏而稻不得种，一方之民拱手而待饥馑，甚可哀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208099_comment'></div>而王之威灵光烈，烜赫甚著，其于蛟龙以致云雨，且无所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208099_comment'></div>夫为所不难，以解民之大忧，以是致祷，当在所答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208099_comment'></div>今旱已甚，非沛然大雨，则于农事犹无所补也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208099_comment'></div>若夫苟施微泽，姑以塞其意，而曰吾尝雨矣，则非某之所敢知也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1208099_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1208100' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208100' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208100?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208100_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208100'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208100'>水旱有数，尚忧尧、汤，圣无如何，矧此一方？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208100_comment'></div>人治其阳，数之所拘，神造数者，可得卷舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208100_comment'></div>戊戌有请，逮今未至，神之威灵，胡难其易？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208100_comment'></div>旱野童童，尘生沟浍，神其鉴之，赐以滂沛。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1208100_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1208101' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208101' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208101?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208101_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208101'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208101'>自夏徂秋，谒雨于王者数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208101_comment'></div>岂惟厌之而不答，将怒其渎而降之罚也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208101_comment'></div>某则谓之不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208101_comment'></div>求者以不隐为情，施者以不倦为仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208101_comment'></div>譬之君亲，求则谒之，何渎之嫌？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208101_comment'></div>为之君亲者，视其所求，可则与之，何倦于数？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208101_comment'></div>用是辄有请于王而不疑，惟王威德烜赫，临此一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208101_comment'></div>吏民奉事，岁时不懈，则其有请，尤在所答也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1208101_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　春末至夏，旱情严重，作祭文以求雨。作品：《祭天齐仁圣帝并城隍祈雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208104' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208104' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208104?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭天齐仁圣帝并城隍祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208104")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208104_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208104'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208104'>比以旱故，祷于一二神，幸时雨之沛施，免斯民于饥馑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208104_comment'></div>而诚薄未格，报至不时，岂媚于神者有未至耶，抑在兹境者或不举也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208104_comment'></div>今旱既甚矣，民亦殆哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208104_comment'></div>莫知所为，惟有致祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208104_comment'></div>谨遣僚属，遍诣祠宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208104_comment'></div>于赫有神，时赐甘沛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208104_comment'></div>惟民与吏，皆获即安，牲酒馨香，将以为报。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1208104_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年4月</a>　受恤刑之诏，向皇帝上表文。作品：《谢钦恤刑表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207830' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207830' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207830?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢钦恤刑表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207830")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207830_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207830'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207830'>岁举旧章，虽谨有司之职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207830_comment'></div>诏颁列郡，实皆天子之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207830_comment'></div>恭以圣人之于物，盖本好生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207830_comment'></div>哲王之用刑，初非获已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207830_comment'></div>方天时之炎燠，悯囹圄之系累，涣发德音，恤及民隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207830_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下哀矜庶狱，明慎用刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207830_comment'></div>内修百度，以肃权纲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207830_comment'></div>外推至仁，以惠黎庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207830_comment'></div>下念狴牢桎梏之苦，必使饮食沐浴以时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207830_comment'></div>君恩及斯，民命何有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207830_comment'></div>臣职当赋政，责在承流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207830_comment'></div>虽未能裨圣代之措刑，必使无讼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207830_comment'></div>而窃慕古人之为狱，自以不冤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207830'><span class='label'>按：</span>《柯山集》卷三一。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷三八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207830_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年4月</a>　向皇帝上表文。姑系于此。作品：《谢明堂赦书表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《谢明堂赦书表》或亦作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于绍圣二年宣州。）</span><div id='poem_1207831' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207831' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207831?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢明堂赦书表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207831")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207831_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207831'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207831'>伏以宗祀于明堂，既尽寅恭之志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207831_comment'></div>大赉于四海，遍覃在宥之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207831_comment'></div>凡出照临，悉周惠泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207831_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下尧仁若日，舜孝格天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207831_comment'></div>法度修明，既聿追于先烈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207831_comment'></div>号令宽厚，已深结于民心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207831_comment'></div>肆时大享于合宫，是谓严亲之盛节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207831_comment'></div>礼成有庆，既赉予于善人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207831_comment'></div>德及无疆，将陈常于时夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207831_comment'></div>兴哀多罪，囹圄涣然一空；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207831_comment'></div>颁锡六师，忠勇为之十倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207831_comment'></div>丕冒出日，罔不向风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207831_comment'></div>洪惟盛朝，集此熙事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207831_comment'></div>臣职司牧养，责在承宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207831_comment'></div>敢不抚陛下可封之民，镇以无事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207831_comment'></div>布陛下维新之惠，期在措刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207831_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1207831_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年4月</a>　作诗咏宣州初夏之景。作品：《书壁》（后院人稀到）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年夏</a>　曾至三天洞谢雨，作文。作品：《三天洞谢雨疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷57（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208093' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208093' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208093?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三天洞谢雨疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208093")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208093_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208093'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208093'>维清净心，虽于三界无所著；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208093_comment'></div>以慈悲故，常悯一切诸有情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208093_comment'></div>顷以旱灾，辄伸诚祷，即时感达，应念雨来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208093_comment'></div>变饥馑为丰穰，易烦恼为欢喜，顾兹恩施，曷有报偿？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208093_comment'></div>哀民生之多艰，愿真乘之卒相，俾无失望，是谓大慈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1208093_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年夏</a>　曾至敬亭广惠王庙谢雨，作文。作品：《广惠王谢雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208105' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208105' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208105?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广惠王谢雨文<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208105")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208105_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208105'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208105'>祷旱壬寅，雨既随至，匪亟匪徐，泽此厚地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208105_comment'></div>旱野千里，稻如云浮，农人笑歌，以乐易忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208105_comment'></div>哀此困穷，神德之厚，躬羞菲薄，吏则何有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208105_comment'></div>我闻仁者，施不责偿，鉴其诚悃，临此一觞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1208105_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1208106' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208106' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208106?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年夏）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208106_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208106'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208106'>一岁荐祷，我颜则羞，神乃哀之，辄与所求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208106_comment'></div>问我农夫，我田既臧，无有高卑，均为丰穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208106_comment'></div>父子相保，鳏寡有依，守臣何功，神则与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208106_comment'></div>牲酒瘠酸，报微施丰，惟诚与洁，庶以荐衷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1208106_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年夏</a>　曾至灵济王庙谢雨，作文。作品：《灵济王谢雨文二首》（一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《灵济王谢雨文二首》（二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208107' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208107' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208107?labeling=true' target='_blank'>灵济王谢雨文<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208107")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208107_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208107'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208107'>间者有祷，实以亢阳，神答其诚，翌日沛滂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208107_comment'></div>风驾云旗，飞泽淋浪，应龙翔嬉，妖魃奔忙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208107_comment'></div>霭霭田原，万畦齐秧，父老相庆，丰年有祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208107_comment'></div>牲酒微薄，愧升庙堂，抑神之仁，岂责报偿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1208107_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1208108' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208108' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208108?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年夏）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208108_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208108'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208108'>顷以旱故，遣吏致祈，其慢宜罚，神顾听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208108_comment'></div>猎猎风云，来自东南，协气横流，妖魃奔潜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208108_comment'></div>沟浍毕通，高卑具沾，活此一方，老稚舞歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208108_comment'></div>守臣冒功，幸此时和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208108_comment'></div>牲酒不腆，匪以报德，光扬威灵，传示无极。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1208108_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年6月</a>　夏末，淫雨不止，至广惠王庙祈晴，作祭文。作品：《广惠王祈晴文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208098' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208098' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208098?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广惠王祈晴文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208098")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208098_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208098'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208098'>请雨未几，又复谒晴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208098_comment'></div>在人宜怒，况神之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208098_comment'></div>沃野茫茫，岁将有秋，谁为之孽，雨淫不收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208098_comment'></div>失望垂成，吁嗟悯忧，不敢避渎，冒昧有求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208098_comment'></div>神或哀之，疾尚可瘳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1208098_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年6月</a>　夏末，淫雨不止，至灵济王庙祈晴，作祭文。作品：《灵济王祈晴文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208102' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208102' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208102?labeling=true' target='_blank'>灵济王祈晴文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208102")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208102_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208102'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208102'>彻救旱之奠，曾未逾旬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208102_comment'></div>陈止雨之辞，则已在庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208102_comment'></div>不修人事，惟神之求，罔忌威灵，其渎已甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208102_comment'></div>罪不能脱，诚或可通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208102_comment'></div>今兹多稼既成，败于将穫，积水且溢，决则不支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208102_comment'></div>始幸仓廪之将盈，俄忧父子之不保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208102_comment'></div>盛德未竟，大恩宜终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208102_comment'></div>夫呼而为风云，吸而为开霁，于神无费，庶祷必从。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1208102_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年6月</a>　淫雨不止，作诗抒发民生之忧。作品：《苦雨》（伏尽暑初变）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年秋</a>　朝堂颁朔布政，因作谢表。姑系于此。作品：《谢宣赐历日表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207829' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207829' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207829?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣赐历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207829")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207829_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207829'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207829'>在昔哲王，德暨鸟兽鱼鳖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207829_comment'></div>肆时治古，历象日月星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207829_comment'></div>既推步以授人时，又协正以观候度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207829_comment'></div>惟盛朝之稽古，盖列圣之在民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207829_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下聪明宪天，仁厚爱物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207829_comment'></div>顺帝之则，既先后而不违；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207829_comment'></div>使民以时，无困穷之失所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207829_comment'></div>顾兹寒暑之节，实惟衣食之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207829_comment'></div>以臣职在承流，恩叨颁朔，敢不推风化之有本，躬劝农耕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207829_comment'></div>顾畎亩之无知，孰原帝力！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1207829_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207829'><span class='label'>按：</span>《柯山集》卷三一。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷三九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207829_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年秋</a>　下雨日，回忆往年，作题壁诗。作品：《雨中题壁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年秋</a>　泛宛溪至敬亭祠送别，有诗。作品：《泛宛溪至敬亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《泛宛溪至敬亭祠送别》，搜韵网为《泛宛溪至敬亭》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。另，本诗系为北宋苏为所作。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年秋</a>　作诗写宣州晚秋景色。作品：《腊》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷27（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>　宣州任上，作文祝贺广德知军。姑系于此。作品：《贺广德知军启》<span href='/Writing/1207873?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺广德知军启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1207873'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207873'>伏以星回于天，既发春而献岁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207873_comment'></div>帝出乎震，方去故而就新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207873_comment'></div>天时于是更端，贤者受其介福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207873_comment'></div>伏惟某官风猷强敏，道义深纯，度越众人，独立一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207873_comment'></div>乌台弹击，彀千钧之弩而发机；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207873_comment'></div>山郡剸裁，持屠牛之刀而破虱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207873_comment'></div>惟其道用，焕然日新，俯同世人，仰受天福。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207873_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_1207875' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207875' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207875?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺太平知州启</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207875'>伏承辍讲经帷，剖符江国，馀光所芘，弱植知安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207875_comment'></div>伏惟某官奥学造微，高行绝众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207875_comment'></div>赫奕家世，照临远方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207875_comment'></div>清净道心，消镇浮俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207875_comment'></div>遥想公馀之多暇，未妨禅观之无为，出入起居，轻利安稳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207875_comment'></div>某夙怀问道，幸托为邻，惟仁人志常在民，自今日请学为政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207875_comment'></div>虽相闻鸡犬，实一苇可航之川；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207875_comment'></div>而坐困简书，有其人甚远之叹。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>　在宣州，尝向笔工请教制作紫毫笔的相关知识。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1207874_comment'></div>通家之欢，伤前人之零落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207874_comment'></div>俯跪之际，感喜交并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207874_comment'></div>伏惟某官文学承家，吏能绝俗，一见许论于家世，并游遂列于弟兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207874_comment'></div>昔日桑弧，交庆两家之生子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207874_comment'></div>相逢樽酒，共惊五十之几年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207874_comment'></div>敢不传义好于子孙，谨铭藏于肺腑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207874_comment'></div>过此以往，未知所裁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207874_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
驻马店（真阳）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3171af7e5ff84ed3995cbe9f050a7658_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3171af7e5ff84ed3995cbe9f050a7658");'><span id='3171af7e5ff84ed3995cbe9f050a7658_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>，44岁</div><div id='3171af7e5ff84ed3995cbe9f050a7658' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至蔡州真阳县，与真阳县令钱君（钱彦远孙）相会，为县舍素丝堂作记文。作品：《真阳县素丝堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷50（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）钱君，名字不详，钱彦远之孙。彦远字子高，钱塘人，吴越王俶侄孙，钱惟演之侄，钱易之子。时钱氏任蔡州真阳县令。）</span><div id='poem_1208041' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208041' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208041?labeling=true' target='_blank'>真阳县素丝堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年闰2月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208041")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208041_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208041'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208041'>庆历中，起居钱公守真阳，名其燕寝曰「素丝堂」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208041_comment'></div>耒绍圣初忝守是郡，此堂具存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208041_comment'></div>而四年谪齐安，道蔡之真阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208041_comment'></div>真阳宰钱君，起居之孙也，授馆于县舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208041_comment'></div>其西有堂，宏敞而高洁，寒暑之居咸宜，而钱君名之曰「素丝」，而属予记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208041_comment'></div>惟钱氏有大功事于吴，为宋忠臣，著于令甲，而子孙仕于朝，以才德为名臣者相继，号为天下甲族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208041_comment'></div>观钱君所以名堂之意，则其洁己守公之意，有自来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208041_comment'></div>钱君治真阳，不劳而庶务举，与客终日清言于堂上，视其规画，继其祖无难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208041_comment'></div>起居讳彦远，吴越忠懿王之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208041_comment'></div>闰月二十五日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1208041_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至蔡州真阳县，与真阳县令钱君（钱彦远孙）相会，为县舍素丝堂作诗。作品：《真阳县昼睡县舍素丝堂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='439a1f0a7ba74722a6ecf97c94dfdf78_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("439a1f0a7ba74722a6ecf97c94dfdf78");'><span id='439a1f0a7ba74722a6ecf97c94dfdf78_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，47岁</div><div id='439a1f0a7ba74722a6ecf97c94dfdf78' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年8月</a>　在蔡州，访裴晋公祠，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《偶成题裴晋公祠》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div>
-----end

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年寒食</a>　是日，作诗咏所见。姑系于此。作品：《寒食日作二首》（荒山野水非吾土）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年3月</a>　过麻城县万松亭，有诗。作品：《万松亭有感》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年3月</a>　到黄州，有谢表文。作品：《黄州谢到任表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207832' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207832' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207832?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207832")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207832_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207832'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207832'>准告，罢管勾明道宫，落职添差监黄州酒税矾务者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207832_comment'></div>臣已于今年三月到任管勾讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207832_comment'></div>伏以矜其多病，禄之仙圣之祠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207832_comment'></div>诛其积愆，斥之筦榷之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207832_comment'></div>雷霆既震，蝼蚁曷逃？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207832_comment'></div>罪大责轻，感深涕陨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207832_comment'></div>伏念臣粗亲翰墨，笃好文词，曾未窥其藩墙，妄见称于流辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207832_comment'></div>漫蒙宠禄，颇躐等夷，久雠中秘之逸书，与记汉家之故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207832_comment'></div>入侍帷幄，曾未岁时，而疾病侵陵，精神疲耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207832_comment'></div>一辞螭陛，两换虎符，蔑闻报政之能，徒幸养疴之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207832_comment'></div>投閒置散，于分为宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207832_comment'></div>号寒啼饥，其穷已甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207832_comment'></div>方大明于淑慝，固无逭于诛夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207832_comment'></div>惟是齐安，近在淮右，虽薄加于黜削，乃犹即夫便安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207832_comment'></div>非大明之烛幽，顾微生之何恃？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207832_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇皇帝陛下至仁溥及，盛德好生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207832_comment'></div>谓刑以止邪，用之初非获已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207832_comment'></div>而罪非极恶，议之必傅惟轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207832_comment'></div>遂致夙愆，犹逃大戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207832_comment'></div>臣敢不改心思过，择地图新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207832_comment'></div>驽马已疲，久息锵鸾之望；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207832_comment'></div>秋葵未陨，常倾向日之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207832_comment'></div>苟一介之有施，终九死而无悔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1207832_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年3月</a>　上知州杨瑰宝启文。作品：《上黄州郡守杨瑰宝启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷57（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207876' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207876' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207876?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上黄州郡守杨怀宝启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207876")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207876_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207876'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207876'>某愚暗触禁，懵不自知，仁圣至明，罚惟当罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207876_comment'></div>虽从黜责，尚得依归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207876_comment'></div>平生京洛之游，交情有素；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207876_comment'></div>千里江山之别，老境已侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207876_comment'></div>岂知投窜之馀，忽有笑谈之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207876_comment'></div>淋漓醉舞，坐沉痼而少衰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207876_comment'></div>慷慨悲歌，抚壮心而犹在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207876_comment'></div>静言思咎，亦既戒行，忽忘跋履之勤，喜遂瞻依之素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207876_comment'></div>伏惟某官天资拔俗，国器冠时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207876_comment'></div>利刃吹毛，长剑耿介倚天外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207876_comment'></div>高标绝众，野鹤昂藏在鸡群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207876_comment'></div>擅风流独步之名，有雍容甚都之观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207876_comment'></div>左挽繁弱，迈越石之奇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207876_comment'></div>一割牛心，兼武子之逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207876_comment'></div>盖尝奉使诸部，固已著迹本朝，赋吴郡之溪山，醉金陵之风月，遗爱犹在，陈迹可寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207876_comment'></div>屈临方州，实幸远俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207876_comment'></div>某去国流浪，多病变衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207876_comment'></div>流水高山，知者益寡，附舆执辔，今也则亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207876_comment'></div>虽无聊远窜之可怜，得相逢一笑而何恨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207876_comment'></div>私用自贺，夫复何言！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207876_comment'></div>春序正暄，更祈保卫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207876_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年7月</a>　初秋作诗三首，其一咏初秋景象。作品：《夜坐三首》（门庭草草是客）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年7月</a>　初秋作诗三首，其三咏初秋景象。作品：《夜坐三首》（微寒骚屑窗竹）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《节孝集》卷32。原文献诗题为《张宛丘帖》，知识图谱网为《与节孝先生书》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><div id='poem_1207863' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207863' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207863?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与节孝先生书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207863")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207863_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207863'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207863'>耒拜上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207863_comment'></div>季春极暄，恭惟仲车教授先生尊体起居万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207863_comment'></div>耒向罢宣州，到京，蒙除管勾明道宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207863_comment'></div>寻便居陈，仅半年馀，邛颇优游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207863_comment'></div>今年闰月初，忽捧告命，谪监黄州酒税，仍落职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207863_comment'></div>遂出陆，自陈入蔡，自蔡入光，遂至贬所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207863_comment'></div>黄在大江上，风土食物却相得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207863_comment'></div>太守乃杨怀宝，与之亲旧，通守山阳人也，真长者，谪官之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207863_comment'></div>耒卑体亦顽健，新妇以次各无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207863_comment'></div>职事亦不绝冗，公私既无事事，中亦泰然，其他外物应自有命，非人能与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207863_comment'></div>先生以为如何，有以见教，乃卑诚所愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207863_comment'></div>末由参省，伏乞顺时保重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207863_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《冬日放言二十一首》（清晨坐官舍）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《冬日放言二十一首》（日暮归饮酒）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年10月</a>　冬日作诗二十一首，其十二有称黄州有佳酒，乃谪官中一幸。作品：《冬日放言二十一首》（我初谪官时）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年10月</a>　冬日作诗二十一首，描写黄州生活之所见、所感。作品：《冬日放言二十一首》（吾腹如鸱夷）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年10月</a>　冬日作诗二十一首，其十四抒发对陈州的怀念。作品：《冬日放言二十一首》（淮阳名都会）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年10月</a>　冬日作诗二十一首，其十五叙绍圣三年寓居陈州灵通禅时，于季冬手值两海棠之事。作品：《冬日放言二十一首》（灵通古丛林）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年10月</a>　冬日作诗二十一首，描写黄州生活之所见、所感。作品：《冬日放言二十一首》（塞向久室处）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年10月</a>　冬日作诗二十一首，其十七咏陶渊明。作品：《冬日放言二十一首》（陶潜经世才）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年10月</a>　冬日作诗二十一首，描写在黄州时之所思、所感。作品：《冬日放言二十一首》（葛公盖世才）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《冬日放言二十一首》（秦人焚诗书）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《冬日放言二十一首》（元子本豪爽）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年10月</a>　冬日作诗二十一首，描写黄州生活之所见、所感。作品：《冬日放言二十一首》（渊明非无心）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　与潘鲠游从，甚相得。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　代人作书文。作品：《投知己书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷55（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207840' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207840' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207840?labeling=true' target='_blank'>投知己书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207840")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207840_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207840'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207840'>五月日，某谨因仆夫百拜献书某官：某闻古之致精竭思以事一艺，而其志不分者，其心之所思，意之所感，必能自达于其技，使人观其动作变态，而逆得其悲欢好恶之微情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207840_comment'></div>故工乐者能使喜愠见于其声，工舞者能使欣戚见于其容，当其情见于物而意泄于外也，盖虽欲自掩而不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207840_comment'></div>昔伯牙之所好者琴耳，钟子期坐而听之，而伯牙不能藏其微情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207840_comment'></div>夫伯牙之情，岂与琴谋哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207840_comment'></div>惟其专意一心以事其技，故意之所动，默然相授而不自知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207840_comment'></div>某自丱角而读书，十有三岁而好为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207840_comment'></div>方是时，虽不能尽通古人之意，然自三代以来，圣贤骚人之述作，与夫秦汉而降，文章词辩，诗赋谣颂，下至雕虫绣绘，小章碎句，虽不合于大道，靡不毕观，时时有所感发，已能见之于文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207840_comment'></div>所习益久，所亲益众，所嗜益深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207840_comment'></div>故自十有三岁而至今三十有二年，身之所历、耳目之所闻见，著于当世而可知，与夫考于前古而有得者，无一不发之于文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207840_comment'></div>不幸少苦贫贱，十有七岁而亲病，又二年而亲丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207840_comment'></div>既仕而困于州县者，十有二年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207840_comment'></div>其悲忧惊悸，煎熬逼迫之情，憔悴萎苶，郁塞愤懑之气，充满羡溢，盈心满怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207840_comment'></div>而又饥寒困穷，就食以活其妻孥者，往来奔走率常数千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207840_comment'></div>西走巴蜀，南尽吴会，陆困于周秦，而水穷于江淮，江湖波涛鱼龙之惊荡，重山复岭猿猩猱鼯之出入，大夏炎暑，流金裂石，与夫雷电雨潦之震恐，积阴大寒，烈风霰雪，龟手刮肌之悽怆，皆已习见而安行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207840_comment'></div>昼则接于起居，夜则见于梦寐，计其安居饱燠，脱忧危而解逼仄，扬眉开口无事一笑者，百分之中不占其一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207840_comment'></div>又观一世之情，其所矜尚可以自振于贫贱厄穷者，某素于其身无有其一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207840_comment'></div>故虽出仕四方，修身治官，庶几于有闻，而门单族薄，气焰寒冷，执版趋拜以见大吏，大则骂辱诟责，小则诘问陵侮，得其漠然不问，弃置其谁何，则过而欣然，辄自庆喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207840_comment'></div>其穷愁困塞有不可胜言者，又岂独此哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207840_comment'></div>古之能为文章者，虽不著书，大率穷人之词十居其九，盖其心之所激者，既已沮遏壅塞而不得肆，独发于言语文章，无掩其口而窒之者，庶几可以舒其情，以自慰于寂寞之滨耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207840_comment'></div>如某之穷者，亦可以谓之极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207840_comment'></div>其平生之区区，既尝自致其工于此，而又遭会穷厄，投其所便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207840_comment'></div>故朝夕所接，事物百态，长歌恸哭，诟骂怨怒，可喜可骇，可爱可恶，出驰而入息，阳厉而阴肃，沛然于文，若有所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207840_comment'></div>某之于文，虽不可谓之工，然其用心，亦已专矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207840_comment'></div>夫文章之于人心，其理之相近，与夫工人之于技，则有间矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207840_comment'></div>某之区区，盖已尽布于此，则世之高明博达之君子俯而听之，盖有不待夫疑而问，问而后知其心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207840_comment'></div>伏惟某官以文章学术暴著天下，方为朝廷训词之臣，而不腆之文尝欲奖与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207840_comment'></div>人谁不欲自达于世之显人，而某自顾所藏，无一而可，敢书其平日之文与诗几六十卷，以辱左右，伏惟閒暇而赐观焉，则某之精诚，虽欲毫发自伏，而不可得矣，公亦念之耶？</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1207840_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　故人王仲孺之子王雯来谒，张耒为王仲孺作墓志铭。作品：《王仲儒墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷60（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208071' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王仲儒墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍圣三年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208071")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208071_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208071'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208071'>河南王雯者，齿少笃于自修，好学而能文，予闻之而未见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208071_comment'></div>绍圣四年，予以罪戾谪官齐安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208071_comment'></div>一日，有客墨衰造门，视其谒，雯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208071_comment'></div>见予则泣而言曰：「先君与子旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208071_comment'></div>雯不幸既孤，将葬而无词以刻先君之墓，敢以是属诸子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208071_comment'></div>某曰：「予尝见朝奉君于京师，其深者，某之陋所不敢知，而其粗与夫众所誉者，窃闻之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208071_comment'></div>不曰笃躬好学而廉俭者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208071_comment'></div>敏于为吏，爱民徇公，直己不挠于权者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208071_comment'></div>然其人厚于实而薄于名，丰内而廉外，世之君子未必知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208071_comment'></div>予尝辱闻焉，则属铭于我固宜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208071_comment'></div>谨取其爵里行事叙之曰：君曾祖讳恪，西头供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208071_comment'></div>祖讳淮，越州诸暨主簿，赠太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208071_comment'></div>考讳起，尚书屯田员外郎、秘阁校理，赠左中大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208071_comment'></div>君初补太庙斋郎，调陕府湖城县尉，又为渑池、安邑二县主簿，河中府猗氏县令，改宣德郎，监解州盐池兼知县，覃恩迁通直郎，赐五品服，知孟州温县，迁奉议郎，加武骑尉，管勾京北排岸司，迁承议郎，加云骑尉，监京米仓，迁朝奉郎，知德州，加飞骑尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208071_comment'></div>绍圣三年五月二十六日，卒于官，享年五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208071_comment'></div>以某月某日，雯奉君之丧葬于河南府某县某乡某原，以夫人杨氏、李氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208071_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1208071'>君讳仲儒，时中其字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208071_comment'></div>世河南人，河清其里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208071_comment'></div>以荫筮仕，湖城是尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208071_comment'></div>湖废官罢，留君一岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208071_comment'></div>实惟相绛，从湖民志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208071_comment'></div>其在安邑，涌水于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208071_comment'></div>邑人走祠，君鞭而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208071_comment'></div>后令猗氏，有爱其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208071_comment'></div>既去十年，见之如亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208071_comment'></div>实其耆老，以谓子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208071_comment'></div>民居侵逵，使者议毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208071_comment'></div>君舒其苛，一道是赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208071_comment'></div>安邑贾盐，民富悍豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208071_comment'></div>君教之学，奖礼其髦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208071_comment'></div>孝秀聿兴，鄙悖滋消。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208071_comment'></div>西民餫师，履产输泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208071_comment'></div>君力弛之，鳏寡用安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208071_comment'></div>令温治盗，曰姑安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208071_comment'></div>勿浚其奸，吏逸民嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208071_comment'></div>盗悔而耕，厥壤大滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208071_comment'></div>邑豪坐狱，重贿而逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208071_comment'></div>君以奇购，唾手则获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208071_comment'></div>君之去温，其民涕留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208071_comment'></div>耆老百千，声言于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1208071_comment'></div>惟河内温，邑联部异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1208071_comment'></div>河内有请，假君决事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1208071_comment'></div>后守德州，河溢而骛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1208071_comment'></div>羁民流殍，所活万数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1208071_comment'></div>伍长悍骄，其将笞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1208071_comment'></div>长以众逃，斥将之疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1208071_comment'></div>君请长叛，立置于罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1208071_comment'></div>贷将不问，境为无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1208071_comment'></div>一时持权，争欲用君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1208071_comment'></div>勉之比周，君为不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1208071_comment'></div>云何不淑，五十而偾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1208071_comment'></div>君凡三娶，皆有妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1208071_comment'></div>粤初氏杨，其父曰慥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1208071_comment'></div>继李父周，学士集贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1208071_comment'></div>今夫人陈，姻党称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1208071_comment'></div>刘时、张𨶝，又杨克中，婿其三子，惟德之同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1208071_comment'></div>君三男子，惟雯在耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1208071_comment'></div>进士登科，甚饬而艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1208071_comment'></div>陶牙之原，郁乎松楸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1208071_comment'></div>乘者下之，君子之丘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1208071_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　与庞安时（字安常）相识。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　接李援诗、书，作答文。作品：《答李援惠诗书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷55（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207843' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207843' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207843?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答李援惠诗书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207843")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207843_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207843'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207843'>某顿首，李君足下：相望近尔，各有职守，不得相过从，甚可叹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207843_comment'></div>人来，蒙示书及新诗一轴，书词亹亹，推与过当，尤以自愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207843_comment'></div>某家素贫，未壮而孤，应举觅官，累于饥寒耳，非欲取好官厚禄以自荣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207843_comment'></div>因循不已，颇践显美，又暗于事几，不能蚤避患祸，坐此得谪辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207843_comment'></div>但沾沾省过，非不欲自奋举以干世而脱贫者，亦非内有以自珍而轻世肆志者，顾坐钝弱不能耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207843_comment'></div>若足下所引张、范之徒，是皆抱奇行异才，视一世之祸福为不足以易其所有者，仆何足以与是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207843_comment'></div>诗轴已三阅之矣，韵格清奇，词藻俊发，其于用事尤精稳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207843_comment'></div>足下齿少而已能尔，何可量哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207843_comment'></div>唐人作诗，用思甚苦，而所得无多，至有终身习之，而但一章数句便名世者，何足下取之容易而用之不既也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207843_comment'></div>叹仰叹仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207843_comment'></div>虽未得熟接话言，然观书与诗，亦足以略测足下之好恶矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207843_comment'></div>胸中所有，无乃欲玩而藏之以待价欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207843_comment'></div>将持此以求售欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207843_comment'></div>玩而藏之，斯可矣，似非求售之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207843_comment'></div>惟以时自重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207843_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207843_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　是岁，刘羲仲索诗，张耒因作诗。作品：《漫浪翁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　初夏晨起，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《旦起》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣后，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　因事兴感，作诗二首。姑系于此。作品：《感事二首》（投老益无趣）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣后，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《感事二首》（自古衣食勤）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣后，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　效仿柳宗元，作饮酒诗。姑系于此。作品：《饮酒拟柳子厚》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣后，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　架蒲萄，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《架蒲萄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷15（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣后，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　作诗咏秋日夜景。姑系于此。作品：《捲帘》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣后，地点不详，姑系于此。原文献诗题为《卷帘》，搜韵网为《捲帘》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　姐夫杨补之离世，外甥杨克一纂其遗文来，张耒怀想平昔，泣涕作诗。姑系于此。作品：《奉议杨君予姊丈也廉静乐道不交世俗造道微妙自得不耀未六十而终予实铭其墓其子克一又纂其遗文求书卷末怀想平昔不知涕之横集也》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣后，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　作诗抒平生壮节。姑系于此。作品：《平生》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣后，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　智轸禅师圆寂卒于绍圣三年，是年张耒作文。姑系于此。作品：《智轸禅师塔记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷49（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣后，地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1208030' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208030' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208030?labeling=true' target='_blank'>智轸禅师塔记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208030")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208030_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208030'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208030'>惟正法眼藏，流布震旦，涉其道者，如恒河沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208030_comment'></div>然根有利钝，知有深浅，故号老宿宗匠者，以之教人，未免或滞于一隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208030_comment'></div>而惟云门正真大师文偃，始以其道振于岭表，诸方大士，无不敛衽，与夺可否，莫有间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208030_comment'></div>云门之后，至雪窦重显，最盛于东南，其嗣法门人众矣，而天衣义怀号为偏得其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208030_comment'></div>自天衣之殁，其法嗣往往出现一方，四方禅学之所折中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208030_comment'></div>比丘载者，学于天衣，既得其道，而隐德晦迹，终始莫得而考，独泉南比丘智轸，问道于载而得法焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208030_comment'></div>智轸少为儒，卓荦有奇志，忽悟世幻，遂为佛徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208030_comment'></div>既悟道于载，人亦颇闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208030_comment'></div>尝往楚州寿昌、涟水淳化，然师之道孤峻而行介，若其徒非似之者，莫能亲焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208030_comment'></div>某居忧山阳时，尝从师游，其所以开警者至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208030_comment'></div>每劝师少出其有以为众福，而窃考其志，盖笃于己而虑于外，尊其道而不妄以及人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208030_comment'></div>其后襄州守逐其部中禅院主者，请住持，师曰：「此将有讼矣，不可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208030_comment'></div>因拒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208030_comment'></div>而后果兴狱，逮捕甚众，而师独免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208030_comment'></div>来京师閒居天清，士大夫有欲请师说法者，师言佛化人各有分，何待说为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208030_comment'></div>卒亦不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208030_comment'></div>此岂载之微意欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208030_comment'></div>或议师，以为佛之道主于利物，而师深閟其有不以及人，岂佛意欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208030_comment'></div>予曰不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208030_comment'></div>五膳玉食，不入瓦缶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208030_comment'></div>四大海水，不灌牛迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208030_comment'></div>吾何容心哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208030_comment'></div>虚无以受之，则一毫不以及物，道当然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208030_comment'></div>师以绍圣丙子十月二十八日夜，右胁示寂于天清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208030_comment'></div>朝请郎李延世者办其终事，挈其骨葬于涟水淳化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208030_comment'></div>后若干年，有盱眙杨某者，欲刻铭焉，以予尝从游而请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208030_comment'></div>请以此铭之，复说偈曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1208030'>云门大开士，后世继始祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208030_comment'></div>具佛正知见，建此妙法幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208030_comment'></div>师灭度已久，正法讹变时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208030_comment'></div>雪窦及天衣，二大士出现。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208030_comment'></div>挽佛日回照，嗣说云门法，裔盖其曾玄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208030_comment'></div>天衣有逸嗣，号曰比丘载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208030_comment'></div>独此具妙法，付之智轸师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208030_comment'></div>轸真似其师，曰道本为己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208030_comment'></div>视人不我契，不施以一毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208030_comment'></div>毋以天酥馔，而投之秽器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208030_comment'></div>是将不能受，为般若之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208030_comment'></div>以是坐道场，俄即自谢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208030_comment'></div>或悲后无述，谓师道不显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208030_comment'></div>稽首窣堵坡，师所在不灭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1208030_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年1月7日</a>　在黄州。是日雪晴，作诗。作品：《正月七日雪晴》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年1月</a>　梦游陈州柳河，醒而作诗，抒滞留之悲。作品：《梦游陈州柳河觉而作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷16（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年3月1日</a>　马令送花，张耒作诗回忆自陈赴黄之事。作品：《三月一日马令送花》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）马令，生平不详。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　随事吟咏三首。姑系于此。作品：《西窗杂咏三首》（翠蔓垂檐笋过篱）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《西窗杂咏三首》或亦作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符元年黄州。）</span>《西窗杂咏三首》（穿篱两竹是龙孙）<span
