ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　作诗咏黄州寒食时节风俗。姑系于此。作品：《一百五歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷4（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《一百五歌》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符元年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　作诗写黄州寒食时节风俗。姑系于此。作品：《黄人谓寒食上冢为浇山其祭馔多用蒻菜事已则鸣钲而归》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《黄人谓寒食上冢为浇山，其祭馔多用蒻菜。事已则鸣钲而归》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符元年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年3月</a>　寄居僧寺，早晨饮酒时，闻莺啼，有感作诗。作品：《今早将饮酒闻莺有感》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年3月</a>　接陈州灵通禅院寺僧来信，作赋。作品：《问双棠赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207791' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>问双棠赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207791")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207791'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207791'>双棠者，予寓陈僧舍，堂下手植两海棠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207791_comment'></div>始余以丙子秋寓居宛丘南门灵通禅刹之西堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207791_comment'></div>是岁季冬，手植两海棠于堂下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207791_comment'></div>至丁丑之春，时泽屡至，棠茂悦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207791_comment'></div>仲春，且华矣，余约常所与饮者，且致美酒，将一醉于树间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207791_comment'></div>是月六日，予被谪书，治行之黄州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207791_comment'></div>俗事纷然，余亦迁居，因不复省花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207791_comment'></div>到黄且周岁矣，寺僧书来，言花自如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207791_comment'></div>余因思兹棠之所植，去余寝无十步，欲与邻里亲戚一饮而乐之，宜可必得无难也，然垂至而失之，事之不可知如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207791_comment'></div>今去棠且千里，又身在罪籍，其行止未能自期，其于棠未遽得见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207791_comment'></div>然均于不可知，则亦安知此花不忽然在吾目前乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207791_comment'></div>因赋《问棠》以自广云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207791_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1207791'>寓舍之壤，既膏且腴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207791_comment'></div>手植两棠，于堂之隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207791_comment'></div>风来自东，冰雪融液。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207791_comment'></div>兴视吾棠，既葩而泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207791_comment'></div>乃沽我酒，又命我人，期一醉于树间，聊快酬于芳春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207791_comment'></div>夹钟之初，谪书在门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207791_comment'></div>陆走千里，止于江滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207791_comment'></div>天星一周，穆然旧春，想见吾棠，粲然含姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207791_comment'></div>俯睨旧堂，今居者谁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207791_comment'></div>婉如怨而有待，淡无言其若思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207791_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207791_comment'></div>始种自我，其享将获，盈我旨酒，会我宾客，一酌未举，俯仰而失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207791_comment'></div>事至而惊，其初孰测？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207791_comment'></div>惟得与失，相寻无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207791_comment'></div>则亦安知夫此棠，不忽然一日复在余侧也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207791_comment'></div>且夫棠得其居，愈久愈敷，无有斧斤斲伤之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207791_comment'></div>我行世间，浮云飞蓬，惟所使之，何有南东？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207791_comment'></div>夫以不移，俟彼靡常，久近衡从，其志必偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207791_comment'></div>歌以讯之，用著不忘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1207791_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年春</a>　尝病风痹数年余，庞安时（字安常）为治风痹。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　受庐山太平观道士温信之之请，作赞文。作品：《新开朝天九幽拔罪忏赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷52（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208054' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208054' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208054?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新开朝天九幽拔罪忏赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208054")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208054_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208054'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208054'>庐山太平观，盖唐开元中所建九天采访使者之祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208054_comment'></div>其地邃洁而严清，故四方之为道者乐居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208054_comment'></div>又为藏室，以藏道家之书，盖无所不有，而独所谓《朝天》、《九幽》二拔罪忏者久之未补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208054_comment'></div>道士温信之谓二书皆众真之格言，拯下民之多罪，援之沦坠，教以自修，在道家尤重者也，其可使学者不见乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208054_comment'></div>乃独丐钱于旁郡，凡一年得五百千，而二书复完，又模散印施，使人皆获见焉，非立心诚笃用力勤久者，能及此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208054_comment'></div>绍圣戊寅岁，予谪官齐安，见信之有求于人而问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208054_comment'></div>信之以告我，故于二书之成也，求予纪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208054_comment'></div>为之赞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1208054'>上真高居，悯下民兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208054_comment'></div>导以格言，出苦沦兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208054_comment'></div>昔亡其书，今复新兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208054_comment'></div>谁力成之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208054_comment'></div>道士温兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208054_comment'></div>畴嘉尔心，有至神兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208054_comment'></div>报之以福，名不泯兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1208054_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　于黄州酒务税宿房北窗种竹，作诗。作品：《黄州酒务税宿房北窗新种竹戏题于壁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年夏</a>　苦于酷暑。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年夏</a>　游黄州，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《齐安行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷4（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《齐安行》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符元年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年秋</a>　见秋园景象，有感作诗。作品：《秋园》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年8月</a>　为吴天常作墓志铭。作品：《吴天常墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷60（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208072' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208072' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208072?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吴天常墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元符元年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208072")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208072_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208072'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208072'>公讳天常，字希全，河南府洛阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208072_comment'></div>惟吴氏之先，与周同姓，至越入吴，子孙散居四方，以国为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208072_comment'></div>公自祖考始占籍河南之洛阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208072_comment'></div>公少贫，不治生产，以气节自许，力学问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208072_comment'></div>河南大府，号多士，而公自少已知名里中，而舅建宁军节度使王正伦深器之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208072_comment'></div>以正伦死事恩为郊社斋郎，调濮阳县主簿，又调舒州司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208072_comment'></div>郡大猾章氏数犯法系狱，其势能得于有司，公论正其罪，流之，一郡畏伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208072_comment'></div>迁泗州盱眙县令，守笞病人死，公当覆验，而前验官言死者不病，公将直之，守以利啖公，欲得如前验，公谢守曰：「我受公恩固善，如死者恨何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208072_comment'></div>卒直之，守为得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208072_comment'></div>知洪州奉新县，奉新号难治，讼者或先以钉贯其足，以胁有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208072_comment'></div>公画巨钉于市，令之曰：「钉必如此，则受讼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208072_comment'></div>乃稍变俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208072_comment'></div>知彭州永昌县，转运使范公纯仁深知公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208072_comment'></div>是时方变差科为免役钱，公原究蜀役法利害，讲之至精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208072_comment'></div>后以书见王荆公，荆公召公议于司农寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208072_comment'></div>时欲举江西役法行于蜀，公曰：「蜀不足于地，江西不足于民，利害异宜，恐不可行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208072_comment'></div>主者是公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208072_comment'></div>久之，公所陈浸忤，遂罢归审官调院，签书镇南军节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208072_comment'></div>丁母忧，服除，以便亲调蕲州蕲口镇都大监辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208072_comment'></div>俄丁父忧，服除，通判无为军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208072_comment'></div>公讽军守兴庠序，勉士以学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208072_comment'></div>部有矾池，官专利，民多冒禁，公为立法，公私便之而犯者鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208072_comment'></div>改通判鼎州，以朝命按知诚州周世隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208072_comment'></div>帅司部使者皆欲致世隆于罪，公言世隆习蛮事，且未尝有罪，论执甚坚，卒免世隆，人以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208072_comment'></div>辰州有军事，以公摄守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208072_comment'></div>公之官，见属县吏部夫千馀挽木山间，公曰：「方春役民，妨农耕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208072_comment'></div>悉罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208072_comment'></div>公至郡，蛮酋系狱者，公谕以朝廷德意，尽遣之，皆感泣而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208072_comment'></div>公因言自诚州抵融州道新通，请每三十里建一佛寺，择僧知蛮情者居之，诸蛮信佛，平时可使入蛮与之习熟，有警可用以间谍，而佛舍可因以储粮，其利边甚大，朝廷许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208072_comment'></div>后为谏官，言不当废诚州为军，顷蛮所以数叛者，盖虽输款而未尝去巢穴，一失抚循则乱，稍内徙则定矣，虽不致州尚可，安事废州乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208072_comment'></div>是时方议役法，有访公者，公陈三事，谓州县之役莫重于衙前，今虽易雇为差，衙前数之多寡与役之优重，请守熙宁、元丰之旧，毋辄改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208072_comment'></div>又言乡差于官类不知书计，势必雇人，代者必要厚价，请官为立直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208072_comment'></div>又言县所积免役钱，请皆纳州或输旁郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208072_comment'></div>户部皆奏行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208072_comment'></div>用荐者除知宿州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208072_comment'></div>时荆门新复军，择守，乃以公为知军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208072_comment'></div>宰相召公，谕以择才之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208072_comment'></div>军久废，百事圮毁，公至，为兴起弊败，必使完好可持久，不为苟且计，人至今颂之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208072_comment'></div>俄知沅州，其去荆门，人为立祠，岁时父老率子弟拜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208072_comment'></div>公既习知蛮情，其治沅务安静，严守备，抚溪獠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1208072_comment'></div>久之，奏请出巡边防，军行，有告帐下谋变者，公独保其不然，罪告者，卒如公言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1208072_comment'></div>又檄诸县寨，使察游民与蛮交易为向导者捕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1208072_comment'></div>俄复知辰州，公去沅如去荆门，而辰之吏民与蛮酋皆相贺曰：「我公复来矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1208072_comment'></div>蛮相约无犯边，郡为无警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1208072_comment'></div>辰民春夏多疫，公饬医工亲视药物，人赖以全甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1208072_comment'></div>乃立学校，劝以读书，人皆服从，风俗为变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1208072_comment'></div>朝廷既知公有功南边，将用之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1208072_comment'></div>以病求告，卜居蕲州金沙溪上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1208072_comment'></div>家藏书万卷，有以自乐，泰然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1208072_comment'></div>公喜读书，于书无所不观，自少至老，未尝一日废卷，至其閒居，好之尤笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1208072_comment'></div>有诗集三卷，奏议三卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1208072_comment'></div>绍圣四年八月六日以疾卒，预治终事，至属纩精爽不乱，享年六十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1208072_comment'></div>公曾祖讳延庆，祖讳泽，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1208072_comment'></div>考讳英，以公登朝恩，授大理评事，累赠朝议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1208072_comment'></div>三男子：长忱，太庙斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1208072_comment'></div>仲惇，未官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1208072_comment'></div>季悟，假承务郎，皆以进士知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1208072_comment'></div>三女：长嫁万载县令黄公孺，次嫁进士胡世南，季嫁宁州录事参军谭康世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1208072_comment'></div>公自濮阳县主簿积官至朝奉大夫，积勋至柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1208072_comment'></div>公为人厚重宽博，达于为吏，官无大小，所临必有绩，当其有所建立，必得所欲而后已，或以利害怵之，不顾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1208072_comment'></div>其仕宦多往来南边，故深知溪洞诸蛮所以治乱，有所措置，后不能易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1208072_comment'></div>然考其大体，本于安静宽简，不为苛扰，而颇立堤防，明条教，期无乱而已，不徼有功也，君子韪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1208072_comment'></div>公少尝从丁宝臣学，宝臣异其才，荐于欧阳文忠，文忠称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1208072_comment'></div>既仕，则不苟取知于人，而一时贤公卿咸知之，独吴正宪知之尤深，而公自重，不轻就人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1208072_comment'></div>故虽知之，不绝出力，而公才见于世者，如此而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1208072_comment'></div>其孤将以元符元年八月二十有一日，葬公于蕲春县安平乡黎企里，启先夫人之兆而合焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1208072_comment'></div>夫人程氏，有贤行，封文安县君，前公二年卒云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1208072_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_1208072'>其直非以为讦，其和非以为悦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1208072_comment'></div>独尽力于为吏，无剧易必达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1208072_comment'></div>其至民以为赐，其去民以为夺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1208072_comment'></div>既或知之矣，乃掩而不发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1208072_comment'></div>进啬而退果，而后知公之节也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1208072_comment'></div>安平之丘，公藏惟列，尚语后人，洛阳之吴也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1208072_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年8月</a>　潘鲠致仕，作贺文。作品：《贺潘奉议致仕启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷57（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207877' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207877' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207877?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺潘奉议致仕启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207877")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207877_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207877'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207877'>伏审亲家致政奉议，上还印绶，退即里闾，已私知止之安，将受永年之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207877_comment'></div>凡居亲旧，实助忻愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207877_comment'></div>窃以人之多难，在于儒者尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207877_comment'></div>壮年讲学，谓富贵利禄之可期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207877_comment'></div>小试多违，信功名遇合之有命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207877_comment'></div>加以岁月荏苒，时不待人，顾瞻簪裳，义则当止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207877_comment'></div>彼贪冒无耻者，率皆优佚而老；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207877_comment'></div>惟进退顾义者，不免饥寒之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207877_comment'></div>未馀汉庭之赐金，复休故社之乔木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207877_comment'></div>追计宦游之廪禄，何有一毫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207877_comment'></div>复与平生之箪瓢，相从三径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207877_comment'></div>莫非命也，谓之何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207877_comment'></div>伏惟某官奥学渊源，懿行金玉，久栖迟于末路，遂高退于明时，清誉益隆，多祥有在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207877_comment'></div>某自怜罪戾，久困泥涂，延企高风，但怀景仰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207877_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年9月</a>　九月末大风，安置火炉，作诗。作品：《九月末大风一夕遂安置火炉有感二首》（谪官两向黄州火）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《九月末大风一夕遂安置火炉有感二首》（风声一夜下林端）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　天冷，安置火炉，有诗。姑系于此。作品：《新葺附火小阁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《新葺附火小阁》，诗意和语词接与《九月末大风一夕遂安置火炉有感二首》近似，或作于同时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符元年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年秋</a>　秋日作诗咏橘。姑系于此。作品：《橘》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣末元符初，地点在黄州或复州，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年10月</a>　潘鲠卒，张耒为作挽词。作品：《潘鲠奉议挽词》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年10月</a>　潘鲠卒，张耒为作墓志铭。作品：《潘奉议墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷60（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208073' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208073' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208073?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潘奉议墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208073")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208073_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208073'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208073'>齐安有君子曰潘昌言，其学也正，其言也文，其家居笃于孝悌，其为吏清介刻苦，而为政本于惠下爱民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208073_comment'></div>至大吏势力能寒热人者，必与之较义理，一毫不为屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208073_comment'></div>其为人务内而简外，信己而不求人知，而人之知者，必皆诚心愧服焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208073_comment'></div>呜呼，君子哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208073_comment'></div>盖绍圣丁丑岁，某得罪，谪官于齐安，自幸得从君游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208073_comment'></div>既至而君病矣，无几何而卒，实元符元年十月某日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208073_comment'></div>齐安之君子皆相吊，已而又曰潘君之墓宜有铭矣，咸以铭事属某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208073_comment'></div>某既素高君之义，用不复辞，走其家哭之，求其世家历官行事于其子大临，而次叙之曰：「潘氏在唐为荥阳人，当僖宗时，有名季荀者，仕为太仆卿，官于福州，避乱，因家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208073_comment'></div>季荀之弟曰季翱，为太子司议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208073_comment'></div>季翱后二世生吉甫，事吴越，入朝终国子博士，累赠工部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208073_comment'></div>侍郎生衢，为屯田郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208073_comment'></div>屯田尝官于黄，遂居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208073_comment'></div>屯田生处士革，隐德不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208073_comment'></div>君讳鲠，字昌言，处士长子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208073_comment'></div>生而俊警绝人，为儿时，赋诗已有奇语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208073_comment'></div>闽有周希孟者，博学笃行之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208073_comment'></div>君从之学，希孟以为尽己之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208073_comment'></div>君居乡里，以经教授，聚徒常百馀人，后进皆师尊之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208073_comment'></div>登元丰己未进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208073_comment'></div>初调蕲水县尉，迁和州防御推官，知江州瑞昌县，监楚州都盐仓，迁吉州军事推官，改宣德郎，监汉阳军酒税，遂以奉议郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208073_comment'></div>卒年六十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208073_comment'></div>蕲水民有以花为献者，君一嗅而还之，曰：「受赐多矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208073_comment'></div>其廉洁类是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208073_comment'></div>江州赋属县鬻建茶，太守问君：「瑞昌岁可售若干」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208073_comment'></div>公曰：「四斤耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208073_comment'></div>守惊诘其说，君曰：「县小民贫，米盐犹不足，而暇及茶乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208073_comment'></div>独县僚四人，人一斤可矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208073_comment'></div>守悟，以故诸县皆得无多售，而旁郡有卖千斤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208073_comment'></div>后七年，君以事过瑞昌，有两民拜马前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208073_comment'></div>其一曰：「异时君为县，我讼得直」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208073_comment'></div>其一曰：「异时君刑我当罪，我心服，是以偕来」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208073_comment'></div>君之为吏得民，举如是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208073_comment'></div>元祐赦民负官钱无奸者悉免之，吉州通判摄守事，乃悉下负者于狱，将鞫其奸，君曰：「赦欲宽之，而君故狱之耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208073_comment'></div>执不可，民乃得免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208073_comment'></div>龙泉令捕得私酒三十家，将上府，君谓令曰：「是法皆当徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208073_comment'></div>龙泉小邑，一日徒三十人，君为令安乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208073_comment'></div>令乃颇减出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208073_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208073_comment'></div>其历官微而见于行事者寡矣，然其修身治人，立心操术，亦可概见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208073_comment'></div>向使之得富贵，立朝廷，据位操柄，以行其义，达其道，其不贪利苟得如还蕲水之花，其忤上爱下如鬻瑞昌之茶，民甘其罚如瑞昌之拜者，则虽古之君子，无以加分寸于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1208073_comment'></div>有集三十卷，曰《春秋断义》者十二卷，《讲义》者十五卷，《易要义》者三卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1208073_comment'></div>致仕时家无一金，骨肉衣食仅给，而君萧然病卧一榻，口不及俗事，时与其子清言而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1208073_comment'></div>娶何氏，有贤行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1208073_comment'></div>男二人，长大临，次某，皆力学有文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1208073_comment'></div>一女，嫁进士罗启宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1208073_comment'></div>四孙，其一男也，曰戆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1208073_comment'></div>以某年某月某日葬某县某原，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1208073'>白壁芳兰，包以九袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1208073_comment'></div>长于外者，千万而一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1208073_comment'></div>莫为出之，卒殒无施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1208073_comment'></div>呜呼昌言，不幸类兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1208073_comment'></div>致美在里，不耀于肌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1208073_comment'></div>岂人是谋，谓天实知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1208073_comment'></div>黄冈之原，松柏其猗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1208073_comment'></div>我相后人，将穫其菑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1208073_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年10月</a>　夜晚办公，有诗，姑系于此。作品：《十月十二日夜务宿寄内》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣末元符初，地点在黄州或复州，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年冬</a>　负暄读书，作诗三首。姑系于此。作品：《局中负暄读书三首》（辉辉短景留寒光，重裘不暖贪负阳）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣末元符初，地点在黄州或复州，姑系于此。）</span>《局中负暄读书三首》（辉辉短景留寒光，瓦檐霜湿梧桐黄）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣末元符初，地点在黄州或复州，姑系于此。）</span>《局中负暄读书三首》（辉辉短景不能春）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣末元符初，地点在黄州或复州，姑系于此。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年10月20日</a>　是日，夜有冰雹雷电，作诗。作品：《十月二十日夜大雨雹震电先是数日极暖至是方稍晴》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《十月二十日夜天雨雹震电先是数日极暖至是方稍晴》，搜韵网为《十月二十日夜大雨雹震电先是数日极暖至是方稍晴》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年12月8日</a>　腊日作诗二首，咏冬景。作品：《腊日二首》（腊日开门雪满山）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年12月8日</a>　腊日作诗二首，咏冬景兼抒感慨。作品：《腊日二首》（异乡怀旧人千里）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年12月17日</a>　生病居家，作诗五首。作品：《十二月十七日移病家居成五长句》（水国穷冬犹未雪）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《十二月十七日移病家居成五长句》（老去尘怀痛洗煎）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《十二月十七日移病家居成五长句》（凭高游目快遐瞻）<span href='/Writing/1207849?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与杨道孚手简</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207849")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207849_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207849'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207849'>来篇绝妙，行色有光，老拙之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207849_comment'></div>毛楮有便，当分寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207849_comment'></div>从公之外，刻意书史是望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207849_comment'></div>耒致司理三哥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1207849_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年1月25日</a>　是日苦寒，以病告假，有诗。作品：《正月二十五日以小疾在告作三绝是日苦寒》（黄土冈头荠麦长）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年3月</a>　作诗咏暮春景色。作品：《春暮有感二首》（午枕消暗永）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《春暮有感二首》（江城春雨暗）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　受父执李竦之子李廷老之请，为其母杜氏作墓志铭。作品：《福昌县君杜氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷60（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208068' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208068?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福昌县君杜氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元符二年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208068")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208068_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208068'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208068'>某先君之执友曰长沙李公，讳竦，与先君生同年，其应举得官，游宦四方，祸福淹速，多相似也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208068_comment'></div>某为儿童时，两侍先君，遇公于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208068_comment'></div>其出入游处，必相与偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208068_comment'></div>其议论谈笑，率常自旦至夕，继之以夜，其仆役至惫，言不能支，而两公未尝倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208068_comment'></div>某时窃听之，则其是非好恶，十尝同八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208068_comment'></div>已而别去，则两家之书问必以时至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208068_comment'></div>盖李公之与人，其倾倒言笑若无不可，而于节义廉耻之际，其彊御甚严且固也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208068_comment'></div>先公前公且十年殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208068_comment'></div>而公晚稍被任使，屡使诸部，卒以无所附离，不大振显也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208068_comment'></div>元符二年，某得罪，谪官黄州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208068_comment'></div>而公之子廷老寓书状，以其母杜夫人之行来求铭其墓，盖后公之卒，又十馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208068_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208068_comment'></div>先君同时之人尽矣，昔之儿曹皆已班白矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208068_comment'></div>而某又得罪圣世，幽忧无聊，不得齿于平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208068_comment'></div>其阅人之盛衰存亡，未尝不动心悲怀，不能自已，其尚忍闻其不幸而铭其墓哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208068_comment'></div>虽然，不可已也，姑次序其状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208068_comment'></div>夫人，洪州人，天章阁待制讳杞之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208068_comment'></div>天章在仁宗时，号有风力名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208068_comment'></div>夫人生贵家，自幼严饬好礼，不妄笑语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208068_comment'></div>天章公为择对，久之，乃以归李公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208068_comment'></div>而姑朱夫人老且病，又素刚，人少能中其意，而夫人在旁辄欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208068_comment'></div>公之弟妹未婚姻者，夫人出所有为成之，无所爱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208068_comment'></div>李公素贫，不治生事，夫人为均节其有无以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208068_comment'></div>由此李公之仕宦，得以直己行义而不累于私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208068_comment'></div>以李公登朝恩，封某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208068_comment'></div>既寡居，乃归心于佛，奉其教，读其书，若有得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208068_comment'></div>绍圣五年十二月二十八日，终于道州司法参军楚老之官舍，年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208068_comment'></div>曾祖某，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208068_comment'></div>祖某，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208068_comment'></div>二男子：长廷老，衡州衡阳令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208068_comment'></div>次楚老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208068_comment'></div>四女：嫁太博学士虞蒉，福建转运判官檀宗臣，大理正张近，衡阳县令关沅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208068_comment'></div>孙男女十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208068_comment'></div>以元符二年十月，合葬夫人于荆门军长林县白阳乡李公之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208068_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1208068'>惟妇之德顺以庄，既庄而和顺以方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208068_comment'></div>夫人蹈此有耿光，而享不丰后其昌。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1208068_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年6月</a>　夏末，徙复州监酒税。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　作诗别去年于酒务税宿房北窗所种之竹。作品：《别齐安税务窗竹二绝》（何独王郎与尔欢）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　将去黄州，栾仲实以黄庭坚《庞安常〈伤寒论〉后序》来求书，张耒作跋文。作品：《跋庞安常〈伤寒论〉》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷53（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）栾仲实，生平不详。）</span><div id='poem_1207899' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207899' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207899?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋庞安常伤寒论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207899")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207899_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207899'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207899'>古之良医，皆不预为方，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207899_comment'></div>病之来无穷，而方不能尽，使不工者惑其疑似而用之，则害大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207899_comment'></div>惟仲景《伤寒论》，论病处方，纤悉必具，又为之增损进退之法，以豫告人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207899_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207899_comment'></div>仁人之用心，且非通神造妙者不能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207899_comment'></div>庞安常又窃忧其有病證而无方者，续著为论数卷，其用心为术，非俪古人，何以及兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207899_comment'></div>淮南人谓庞安常能与伤寒说话，岂不信然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207899_comment'></div>予将去黄，栾仲实以黄别驾后序求予书，而仲实之父为医得庞君之妙，谓予言何如也？</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1207899_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在黄州，与罗田县主簿吴怡交游，曾读其诗作，有诗。作品：《读吴怡诗卷二首》（罗田春动雪消初）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　吴瑛（字德仁）能诗善书。在黄州期间，张耒题文于吴瑛诗卷。姑系于此。作品：《题吴德仁诗卷》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷53（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣末元符初，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1207895' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207895' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207895?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题吴德仁诗卷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207895")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207895_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207895'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207895'>陶元亮虽嗜酒，家贫不能常饮，而况必饮美酒乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207895_comment'></div>其所与饮，多田野樵渔之人，班坐林间，所以奉身而悦口腹者盖略矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207895_comment'></div>白乐天亦嗜酒，其家酿黄醅者盖善酒也，又每饮必有丝竹童妓之奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207895_comment'></div>洛阳山水风物甲天下，其所与饮，如裴度、刘禹锡之徒，皆一时名士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207895_comment'></div>夫欲为元亮，则窘陋而难安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207895_comment'></div>欲为乐天，则备足而难成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207895_comment'></div>德仁居二人之间，真率仅似陶，而奉养略如白，至其放达，则并有之，岂非贤哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207895_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年7月</a>　初秋赴景陵，过白云山，作诗。作品：《发云山近岐亭望光蔡接尉氏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）景陵，古称竟陵。建隆三年，为避赵匡胤祖父赵敬之讳，改竟陵为景陵。《明一统志》卷61《黄州府》：“白云山在蕲州西八里”。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' href='/Writing/1207913?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东坡书卷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207913")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207913_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207913'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207913'>苏公谪居黄州时，为奉议郎潘公书一卷，备正书行草数体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207913_comment'></div>予再官于黄，首尾且三年，尝假此书于奉议之子大临，以为书法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207913_comment'></div>庚辰孟秋，蒙恩守鲁，将之官，尽出所假潘氏诸书归之，独此一卷，令男秬纳之箧中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207913_comment'></div>予与邠老皆苏学士徒也，舍潘归张奚择焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207913_comment'></div>邠老惧后东坡复徵此书，疑于收视之不谨也，使书此以为据。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207913_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　作诗怀复州莲花。姑系于此。作品：《怀竟陵莲花》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　天雨，至景德寺祈晴，作文。姑系于此。作品：《景德寺祈晴文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208103?labeling=true' target='_blank'>景德寺祈晴文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208103")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208103'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208103'>伏以雨既时若，岁将大熟，而阴霖不止，水潦将增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208103_comment'></div>大惧堤防之圮隳，偃潴之垫溺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208103_comment'></div>欲除民病，惟赖佛乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208103_comment'></div>伏望消伏阴魔，开通慧日，拔幽沉为明达，变苦恼为欢谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208103_comment'></div>众生之疾既除，能仁之愿亦满。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1208103_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　在黄州，游东湖，作赋文。姑系于此。作品：《游东湖赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣元符间，地点在黄州，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1207790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游东湖赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207790")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207790'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207790'>纷不知吾之所如兮，独漫漫而若狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207790_comment'></div>乘醉饱之馀力兮，遂陟巘而缘冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207790_comment'></div>惟大冬之栗烈兮，莽川泽之茫茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207790_comment'></div>农功休乎场圃兮，平陆散夫牛羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207790_comment'></div>悯大木之百围兮，惨赤立而无裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207790_comment'></div>鹳鹤群鸣而下上兮，杂篁竹之青黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207790_comment'></div>忽平陆之既穷兮，渐积水之汪洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207790_comment'></div>曰是为齐安之东湖兮，右派合乎涛江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207790_comment'></div>荒湾寂寥而葭苇兮，悬疏罾于夕阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207790_comment'></div>为举网而无获兮，嘉鱼逝而洋洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207790_comment'></div>吊村落之柴荆兮，哀淮夷之陋荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207790_comment'></div>呼徒侣而还归兮，阴风振而尘飏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207790_comment'></div>畏星昴之将中兮，冒玄夜之飞霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207790_comment'></div>顾谓童子，汝其赋诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207790_comment'></div>爰有小子，褒然致辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207790_comment'></div>歌曰：「岁穷木落兮大泽空，雁宵征兮天北风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207790_comment'></div>曷不饮酒兮御玄冬？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207790_comment'></div>归来归来兮乐未终」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207790_comment'></div>余曰：「汝歌置之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207790_comment'></div>乃歌曰：「临山川兮怀故乡，岁穷阴兮昼不旸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207790_comment'></div>升高堂兮洁余樽，耿余思兮古之人」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207790_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年秋</a>　过万松亭，感慨作诗。作品：《万松亭有感》（荦确山行穿翠微）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年9月3日</a>　到黄州，有谢表文。作品：《黄州安置谢表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷34（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207833' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207833' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207833?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄州安置谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年9月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207833")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207833_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207833'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207833'>准告，责授房州别驾，黄州安置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207833_comment'></div>臣已于九月初三日到黄州公参讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207833_comment'></div>率情而动，盖缘不学之愚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207833_comment'></div>议罪惟轻，上赖好生之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207833_comment'></div>伏念臣僻迂陋学，庸琐散材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207833_comment'></div>顷守汝阴，实名长吏，不能明义以自立，乃敢徇私而致哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207833_comment'></div>迹涉背公，事非考古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207833_comment'></div>果不逃于正论，犹窃逭于严诛，尚畀散官，更居善地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207833_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇皇帝陛下聪明洞照，博厚有容，论罪必原其情，用法每加之恕，故令蝼蚁，少缓雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207833_comment'></div>臣敢不祗服上仁，深思往咎，禔身以敬，学礼必明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207833_comment'></div>从多士以立朝，莫谐素愿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207833_comment'></div>问老农而学稼，誓毕馀生。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207833_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年9月</a>　寓郡东乾明寺。<br /><a href="javascript: href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　潘大临作诗相赠，张耒次其韵作诗。作品：《次韵邠老见贻》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年10月</a>　将移居柯山何氏第，遣儿辈料理新居，有诗。作品：《余谪居齐安寓郡东佛舍而制不得逾岁今冬遂移居因遣秬秸料理新居作诗示之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《自乾明移居柯山何氏第令秬秸先葺所居》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年冬</a>　居柯山，与潘大临为邻，作赋文。作品：《柯山赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207792' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207792' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207792?labeling=true' target='_blank'>柯山赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207792")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207792_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207792'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207792'>入东门而右回兮，原迤靡以相属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207792_comment'></div>拔磅礴以隆起兮，是为柯山之麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207792_comment'></div>其上萧森而晻霭兮，冠万竿之修竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207792_comment'></div>下硗确而坚密兮，拱高林与乔木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207792_comment'></div>散鸡犬于危阨兮，杂茅茨与夏屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207792_comment'></div>通樵牧之蹊径兮，路纵横而断续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207792_comment'></div>撮土石列，暗窦谷虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207792_comment'></div>鸣鸟上下，伏兽号呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207792_comment'></div>俯江流之荡潏，招列山之蟠纡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207792_comment'></div>林峦作态而蔽亏兮，风云效技而卷舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207792_comment'></div>固可以开阖阴阳于一气，寅饯日月于天衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207792_comment'></div>爰有穷人，癯然无归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207792_comment'></div>旷四海无所投其足兮，后帝命我于山之隈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207792_comment'></div>庇茅蓬之数椽兮，抚枵腹而常饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207792_comment'></div>时醉饱而自得兮，亦杖履而遨嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207792_comment'></div>逾山而东，席门草藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207792_comment'></div>爰有君子，于兹考槃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207792_comment'></div>自种自食，邻里莫干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207792_comment'></div>图书满家，儿稚饥寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207792_comment'></div>相见辄喜，有时不冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207792_comment'></div>寄万事于一笑兮，不知食粝而衣单。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207792_comment'></div>吾不加物以一毫兮，亦莫受人之燠寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207792_comment'></div>悟纷华之多虞兮，幸寂寞之至安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207792_comment'></div>饮我薄酒欢有馀，啜我豆羹甘而腴，隐几而休读我书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207792_comment'></div>乃曳杖歌曰：升柯之巅，明远眺兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207792_comment'></div>筑柯之庵，可以老兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207792_comment'></div>终古不忒，天之道兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207792_comment'></div>于于而行，无丧吾宝兮。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1207792'></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1207792_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年冬</a>　自号柯山老人、柯山居士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年冬</a>　制作屏障以抵东堂寒气，喜作诗。作品：《东堂初寒创意作竹屏障门屏脚偶得朽梅枝截用之完固质野可喜二首》（丈室新屏用此君）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《东堂初寒创意作竹屏障门屏脚偶得朽梅枝截用之完固质野可喜二首》（简册林中老蠹鱼）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年12月26日</a>　闻啄木声，回忆寿安往事，作诗。作品：《十二月二十六日旦闻东堂啄木声忽记作福昌尉时在山间环舍多老木腊后春初此鸟尤多声态不一今琵琶筝中所效既不类又百不得一二云》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年1月</a>　柯山居处有梅一株，作诗咏之。作品：《所居有梅一株在堂东荒秽中正月二十六日已谢矣二首》（平生常恨逢梅少）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《所居有梅一株在堂东荒秽中正月二十六日已谢矣二首》（冷落疏枝寒草冈）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年3月</a>　在柯山闻鹎鵊啼，感而作诗。作品：《柯山闻鹎鵊》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年3月</a>　作诗咏鹎鵊。姑系于此。作品：《鹎鵊词》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷4（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《鹎鵊词》或亦作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁三年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年3月</a>　于东堂下种芭蕉，作诗。作品：《种芭蕉》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年3月</a>　作诗咏东堂。作品：《东堂四首》（主人怜客置东堂）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年3月</a>　堂下种芭蕉时，遂得泉水一泓，作诗。作品：《东堂四首》（老翁还作小儿情）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年3月</a>　回忆近年居所变化，感而作诗。作品：《东堂四首》（居止年来如传舍）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年3月</a>　作诗抒谪居孤独之感。作品：《东堂四首》（乌衣更士能呼旦）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　向潘大临乞竹，作诗。作品：《乞竹赠邠老》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　作诗咏堂东之竹。姑系于此。作品：《竹》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《竹》《石竹》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁三年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　作诗咏竹。姑系于此。作品：《石竹》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《竹》《石竹》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁三年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年7月</a>　吴瑛卒于是年四月十一日，七月安葬蕲春，张耒作墓志铭。作品：《吴大夫墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷59（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208065' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208065' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208065?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吴大夫墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁三年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208065")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208065_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208065'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208065'>公吴氏，讳某，字德仁，龙图阁学士、赠太尉讳遵路之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208065_comment'></div>太尉为时名臣，公少以父任补太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208065_comment'></div>年四十六，以虞部员外郎知郴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208065_comment'></div>罢官归京师，即上书请致仕，方是时，上自执政大臣，下至搢绅士大夫，凡知公者相与出力挽留之，不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208065_comment'></div>盖始闻而惊，已而皆叹服，以为不可及，相率赋诗饮饯于都门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208065_comment'></div>公既谢仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208065_comment'></div>归蕲春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208065_comment'></div>有薄田，仅给伏腊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208065_comment'></div>公临溪筑室，种花酿酒，家事付子弟，一不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208065_comment'></div>宾客有至者，不问贤愚贵贱，与之饮酒必尽醉，公或醉卧花间，客去亦不问也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208065_comment'></div>客有臧否人物，公不酬一语，促左右行酒，客不得卒语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208065_comment'></div>人皆爱其乐易而敬其高，凡见公者皆欣然忘其鄙吝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208065_comment'></div>尝有贵客过公而饮，公酒酣而歌，以乐器扣其头为节，客亦不以为忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208065_comment'></div>其放诞乃如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208065_comment'></div>平生视财物如粪土，未尝与人较多寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208065_comment'></div>太尉薨时，其妹婿辄以家钱数百千贷人，其人不能偿，公哀之曰：「是人有母，闻之将重其忧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208065_comment'></div>乃召其人谕之，焚其券。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208065_comment'></div>尝有客为公治田事二十年，谢去，见公欲计之，公取前后文书示之，乃未尝发封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208065_comment'></div>盗夜入其家，公觉之，不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208065_comment'></div>盗且取其被，公顾谓盗曰：「室中惟所欲，大寒，幸舍吾被」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208065_comment'></div>凡见公外者，徒知其真率旷达，至究观古今治乱成败，人物之贤愚臧否，其中了然甚察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208065_comment'></div>其积官自太庙斋郎至朝奉大夫，勋至护军，赐至三品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208065_comment'></div>历官自监西京竹木务，签书淮南判官厅公事，监真州榷货务，通判池州、黄州，乃知郴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208065_comment'></div>其治官主于忠信仁厚，故所在有称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208065_comment'></div>哲宗朝，有荐公者，诏落致仕赴阙，而公坚卧不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208065_comment'></div>卒年八十四，崇宁三年四月十一日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208065_comment'></div>初公感疾，即闭閤，谢药物，至属纩不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208065_comment'></div>或言公少遇异人，服其药，故寿而康宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208065_comment'></div>亦其潜德美行，不究其位，故享其报如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208065_comment'></div>公娶张氏，继李氏，封德清县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208065_comment'></div>三男子：曰禧，蚤卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208065_comment'></div>曰升，曰奕，皆举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208065_comment'></div>四女，徐暨、张之仪、徐闾、胥彦博其婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208065_comment'></div>是岁七月某日，葬公蕲春县永福乡新安里芙蓉山，以李夫人祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208065_comment'></div>曾祖讳文，大理司直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208065_comment'></div>祖讳叙，尚书职方员外郎、秘阁校理、赠尚书右丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208065_comment'></div>升匍匐乞铭于谯郡张某，某熟公之名迹，且爱慕之无穷，则铭之也实宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208065_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1208065'>吴公出延陵，以国为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208065_comment'></div>而始居京师者，自司直君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208065_comment'></div>老于蕲，今其子孙遂家蕲春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1208065_comment'></div>呜呼德仁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1208065_comment'></div>梦幻斯世，蘧庐其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1208065_comment'></div>寓百年于一醉兮，不以万物易吾之真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1208065_comment'></div>人何足以知之，抱所有以灭泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1208065_comment'></div>殆古所谓得道逍遥，御风<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1208065", 1208065, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>骑气</span>之人欤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1208065_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年秋</a>　作诗咏秋风。姑系于此。作品：《秋风谣》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷4（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《秋风谣》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁三年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年秋</a>　秋日下雨，喜作诗。姑系于此。作品：《喜雨四首》（阴阳不暂驻）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《喜雨四首》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁三年黄州。）</span>《喜雨四首》（手种五色蕉）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年秋</a>　病中卧床，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《卧病昼眠秋风作恶》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　是岁，春末所种芭蕉，长势茂盛，作诗。作品：《手种芭蕉秋来特盛成二大丛》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　是岁，吴瑛卒后不久，为吴瑛书作跋文。姑系于此。作品：《跋德仁书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷53（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207894' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207894' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207894?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋德仁书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207894")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207894_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207894'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207894'>斯人也，梦幻一世，刍狗万物，而独嗜于酒，行年八十馀以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207894_comment'></div>予为志其墓，而平生事为之详，多得之熙老也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1207894_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　吴怡将赴蕲水县丞，张耒为作序文。作品：《送吴怡序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷48（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207881' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207881' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207881?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送吴怡序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207881")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207881_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207881'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207881'>吾友吴熙老，好学乐善，敏于为吏，不苟于其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207881_comment'></div>尝主簿于蕲之罗田，部使者才之，使尉黄冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207881_comment'></div>予旧与之相闻，而来黄冈也，予方坐事屏居，而熙老独喜从予游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207881_comment'></div>予谓之曰：「予弃人也，又负罪于有司，子与罪人游，且累君」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207881_comment'></div>熙老不谓然，尤喜予翰墨言语，得之辄宝藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207881_comment'></div>予年老多病，学问日衰落，文字尤荒梗，熙老所求十不能答一二，而熙老意益勤不倦，夫人之好恶不可解如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207881_comment'></div>居黄冈无数月，又迁蕲水丞，将去黄，求予言赠其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207881_comment'></div>予为之不能无言，曰：「子盍观于货乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207881_comment'></div>所操者愈奇，则藏之也愈深，知之者愈寡，然一旦而得所售，则万金之直有不较而乐输之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207881_comment'></div>方其未售也，闭肆而处，终日寂然，其邻里莫知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207881_comment'></div>而持盘卖饼儿，日一操盘而出，自誉其货呶呶也，十人之聚则往即之，自旦至夜，劳力如此，得百钱之直之外，则偃然有过望之喜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207881_comment'></div>夫所操者不厚，则自处也薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207881_comment'></div>夫自处也薄，则亦无所不至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207881_comment'></div>其理然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207881_comment'></div>君子进德修业，夙夜强学，其所操者岂万金之货也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207881_comment'></div>吾愿熙老好学愈勤，乐善愈富，为吏而有赐于民，多积而深藏之，自爱而重出之，则将名誉充于四海，出入紫闼，吁谟黄阁也，可跂而俟也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207881_comment'></div>敢以是为遗行之言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1207881_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　与潘大临同观吴怡家所藏《风云图》，作诗。作品：《题吴熙老风云图》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　观孙彦古画风雨山水，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《孙彦古画风雨山水歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷3（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《孙彦古画风雨山水歌》似亦作于同时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁三年黄州。孙彦古，不详。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　为吴怡（字熙老）古铜榼题诗。姑系于此。作品：《题吴熙老古铜榼》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年闰2月</a>　秦观之子秦湛奉父丧归葬广陵，过黄州，谒张耒，耒为文祭奠。作品：《祭秦少游文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208085' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208085' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208085?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭秦少游文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年闰2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208085")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208085_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208085'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208085'>维崇宁四年岁次乙酉闰月某朔某日甲子，具位张某谨以家馔清酒，遣男秬敬祭于亡友秦少游学士之灵：呜呼少游，淮海之英，自其少时，文章有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208085_comment'></div>脱略等辈，论交老成，众誉归之，谁敢改评。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208085_comment'></div>聿来秘书，亦既飞鸣，脱身亟去，事变随生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208085_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208085_comment'></div>官不过正字，年不登下寿，间关忧患，横得骂诟，窜身瘴海，卒仆荒陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208085_comment'></div>君孤奉丧，归葬广陵，拜我于黄，尚有典刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208085_comment'></div>会葬抚孤，我穷不能，具此菲薄，聊致我诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208085_comment'></div>只鸡斗酒，怀想平昔，嗟我少游，尚肯来食。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1208085_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年3月</a>　三月生日，潘大观致酒为贺，作诗二首。作品：《与潘仲达二首》（东风沛甘雨）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷7（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《与潘仲达二首》（淮阳牡丹花）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年3月</a>　招潘大观饮，作诗，有累年谪居之叹。姑系于此。作品：《招潘郎饮》<span
