ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年3月</a>　怀念元祐在京时，苏门诸友相聚之事，作诗。作品：《江城》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年3月24日</a>　是日闻莺啼，有感作诗。作品：《三月二十四日闻莺》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年夏</a>　晨起远眺，作诗咏所见景象。作品：《晨起眺望》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年5月</a>　为唐太宗画目作跋文。作品：《跋唐太宗画目》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷53（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207898' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207898' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207898?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋唐太宗画目</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207898")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207898_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207898'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207898'>唐太宗躬擐甲胄，出入行阵，亲与群雄搏战而胜之，计其勇健虓武，岂复翰墨间人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207898_comment'></div>《官法帖》帝王部中，有太宗书真行千馀字，观其用笔精工，法度粹美，杂之《二王帖》中，不能辨也，而其雄杰迈秀之气，则冠诸书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207898_comment'></div>呜呼盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207898_comment'></div>宜其备文武之大美，兼圣贤之能事，除隋之乱，比迹汤、武，致治之美，庶几成、康，虽数十年慨然可想也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207898_comment'></div>此书画目是其真迹，前数行亦自有法度可爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207898_comment'></div>乙酉仲夏柯山东堂书<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柯山集》卷四四。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207898_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1207898'>「乙酉仲夏」句：原无，据草斋本、吕本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207898_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年7月</a>　为范坦所藏《高闲帖》作跋文。作品：《跋范坦所藏高闲帖》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷54（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207917' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207917' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207917?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋范坦所藏高閒帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207917")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207917_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207917'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207917'>予治平末，尝见太学直讲杨褒家藏唐高閒上人二帖石本，欧阳文忠公书其末，以为高閒之书如此，则韩序乃实录矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207917_comment'></div>后予官秘书且十年，凡秘府所藏与一时士大夫家所有晋、唐以来名书妙墨，皆获见之，而高閒书绝未尝见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207917_comment'></div>岂閒自重其艺，不妄为人书，故后之传者少耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207917_comment'></div>崇宁乙酉孟秋，始见范伯履所藏《千文》，追想杨褒石本，真出一手，足知退之之言不妄也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1207917_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年9月5日</a>　九月己亥（五日），诏元祐党人量移，如愿依旧者亦听。张耒移兖州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年10月</a>　闻量移诏书，有感作诗。作品：《冬后三日郊赦到同郡官拜敕回有感》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年10月</a>　黄庭坚于九月三十日卒于宜州，《读黄鲁直诗》当作于闻凶耗之后。姑系于此。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年10月27日</a>　将赴兖州，作诗。作品：《将离柯山十月二十七日》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年10月27日</a>　将离柯山，作诗别梅。作品：《别梅》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷16（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年1月17日</a>　正月庚戌，叙复元祐党人。张耒叙复承议郎，监南山岳庙。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年1月18日</a>　雪后初晴，登柯山远眺，作诗。作品：《正月十八日晴霁登柯眺望二首》（柯山通细履）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《正月十八日晴霁登柯眺望二首》（寂寂池亭古）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年1月</a>　作诗咏雪后初晴景象。作品：《雪斋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷19（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献诗题为《雪霁》，搜韵网为《雪斋》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。但从文献来看，应为《雪霁》，搜韵似误。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年春</a>　听春鸟鸣叫，有感作诗。作品：《听鸣禽》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷30（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年春</a>　作诗咏所见之景。作品：《即事二首》（大明海底生）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年春</a>　作诗咏所见之景，写近日发生之事。作品：《即事二首》（嚣尘屏繁务）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年春</a>　吃菝葜苗，作诗。作品：《食菝葜苗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年3月6日</a>　三月戊戌，诏许任便居住。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年4月1日</a>　是日，同友人小酌，有感有诗。作品：《四月一日同潘何小酌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）潘何，或即潘大临、何颉之（一作：“颃之”）。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年夏</a>　作诗呈晁郎，抒不舍之情。作品：《喜晴有感呈晁郎》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷9（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）晁郎，名字、生平不详，或为张耒女婿。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年夏</a>　同晁郎、张秬、张秸游乾明寺，作诗写所见景象。作品：《同晁郎及秬秸步游乾明晚逾柯山归》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）晁郎，名字、生平不详，或为张耒女婿。崔书言：“《同晁郎及秬秸步游乾明晚逾柯山归》似亦作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年7月14日</a>　前夜风雨，暑气尽消，是日与晁郎饮酒，作诗。作品：《十三夜风雨作暑气顿尽明日与晁郎小饮》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）晁郎，名字、生平不详，或为张耒女婿。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　是岁，同年徐正夫欲卜筑嵩洛间，因作诗。姑系于此。作品：《酬同年徐正夫司户时欲卜筑嵩洛间》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　崇宁在黄州，杜崯师事之。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　崇宁在黄州，与何颉之（字斯举）交往，尝作诗咏何颉之赠酒。姑系于此。作品：《何斯举惠酒》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。何颉之（一作：“颃之”）。李处道之婿。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　崇宁在黄州，与何斯举交往，有诗次韵唱和。姑系于此。作品：《次韵斯举送岩桂新酿》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　崇宁在黄州，曾为李处道之妻龚氏作墓志铭。姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　崇宁在黄州，李处道卒，张耒为作挽词。姑系于此。作品：《李处道都曹丈挽词》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷18（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。原文献诗题为《李处道都曹挽词》，搜韵网为《李处道都曹丈挽词》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　崇宁在黄州，李处道（字深之）卒，张耒为作祭文。姑系于此。作品：《祭李深之文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1208084' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208084' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208084?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭李深之文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208084")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208084_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208084'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208084'>维年月日甲子，从表侄、责授房州别驾、黄州安置张某，谨遣男秬以羊酒米面之奠，致祭于故兴国军都曹李公八丈之灵：呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208084_comment'></div>昔我先人，刚介峭峙，行于天下，得友无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208084_comment'></div>遇公兄弟，则无间言，惟屯田君，则实同年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208084_comment'></div>公时尚少，多病癯然，江淮之间，相与周旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208084_comment'></div>耒之兄弟，应举姑苏，朝夕诵习，托公学庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208084_comment'></div>公晚得官，拜公宛丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208084_comment'></div>后二十年，遇公瓜洲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208084_comment'></div>相从武昌，亦既谢仕，杖履逍遥，旁有令子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208084_comment'></div>何图末疾，百治不完，殁不得归，即丘于焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208084_comment'></div>幽宫之刻，委于不肖，文不称事，矧能有耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208084_comment'></div>身在罪籍，动有絷维，无穷之别，不获往辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208084_comment'></div>寓诚薄奠，尚釂一卮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1208084_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　崇宁在黄州，李处道卒，张耒为作墓志铭。姑系于此。作品：《李参军墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷60（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1208066' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208066' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208066?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李参军墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208066")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208066_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208066'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208066'>公讳处道，字深之，吾先君子之友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208066_comment'></div>自言系出唐太宗皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208066_comment'></div>五代时有讳澄者，尝为梁使闽，遂居晋福之连江，故今为福唐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208066_comment'></div>公性刚特，耿介不群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208066_comment'></div>少孤贫，自力学问，记览淹博，工于文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208066_comment'></div>某少时犹及见其赋篇，其文赡丽雄放，属比精切，一时望士皆慕与之游，名声绝辈行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208066_comment'></div>五举于乡，中治平四年进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208066_comment'></div>初调陈州南顿尉，更成州同谷、处州缙云、泉州德化令，建州浦城丞，南雄州始兴令，最后为兴国军录事参军以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208066_comment'></div>令同谷时，公与转运使厚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208066_comment'></div>知州孙京不法，欲因公自托，公不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208066_comment'></div>京怒，所以捃公万方，卒无所得，然犹以公坐免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208066_comment'></div>缙云有女子徐，自号菩萨，家有井，诡言能治病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208066_comment'></div>赵清献守杭，亦信之，尝求其水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208066_comment'></div>由此群无赖为倡议，声动数州，所居成市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208066_comment'></div>公怒，捕徐，杖之，塞其井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208066_comment'></div>初，清献闻之，大惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208066_comment'></div>无几何，徐氏生子，遂皆服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208066_comment'></div>福建转运使贾青，系福州衙前数辈，劾其盗，督以赃，必欲论死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208066_comment'></div>狱成，不引伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208066_comment'></div>公令德化，以狱属公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208066_comment'></div>公缓其狱，竟青去部，卒出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208066_comment'></div>始公知其冤，欲直之，既而思曰：「直之则青怒，必以狱他付。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208066_comment'></div>谁不畏青者，则此数人无类矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208066_comment'></div>姑缓之而觊其去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208066_comment'></div>卒如公计焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208066_comment'></div>浦城民有自称徐偃王之神，颇动众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208066_comment'></div>公捕械系之，民初不惧，犹陈说鬼怪，一邑惑之，公以置于法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208066_comment'></div>始兴，岭外小邑，前令多以富归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208066_comment'></div>公罢，无南中一物，束书而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208066_comment'></div>始兴人至今道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208066_comment'></div>其在兴国，公已老且倦游矣，犹力治曹事，无所苟，数年反重囚得免死者甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208066_comment'></div>罢官，而子援为鄂州武昌尉，迎养公于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208066_comment'></div>卒年七十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208066_comment'></div>公性纯孝信厚，不逮事其亲，每忌日则涕泣感慕，戚见于色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208066_comment'></div>抚兄弟之孤过己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208066_comment'></div>平居虽与仆妾语，必诚必信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208066_comment'></div>既老且病，犹不废书，时时与宾客饮酒赋诗，其诗句甚工，然多悲壮感慨，闻者哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208066_comment'></div>有文集十卷，藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208066_comment'></div>先娶林氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208066_comment'></div>继室龚氏，先公二年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1208066_comment'></div>三男子：据、抗、援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1208066_comment'></div>据蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1208066_comment'></div>抗、援皆有文行，援举进士中第矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1208066_comment'></div>三女：嫁赵僎、何颉、陈任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1208066_comment'></div>五孙，其二男也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1208066_comment'></div>以某年某月某日葬公武昌樊山之原，举二夫人祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1208066_comment'></div>曾祖郁，故赠虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1208066_comment'></div>祖汾，故赠工部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1208066_comment'></div>父馀庆，故赠屯田郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1208066_comment'></div>始，公与其兄载之，皆友某之先人，相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1208066_comment'></div>某尝从公于姑苏之学官，故公之子侄往往获交焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1208066_comment'></div>诸孤以铭属我，宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1208066_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1208066'>尧理之后氏李子，唐宗赫赫自成纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1208066_comment'></div>惟澄胄出贞观帝，使闽不归连江沚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1208066_comment'></div>猗欤深之文有斐，内怀刚方志孔伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1208066_comment'></div>六迁州县临辄靡，力抗豺虎傲爪齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1208066_comment'></div>谳疑伸枉脱垂死，械神鞭佛破讹诡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1208066_comment'></div>彼民于我父母视，我有甚富见无几，岂其爱之莫吾以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1208066_comment'></div>樊山之藏非其里，后望武昌自公始。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1208066_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　崇宁在黄州，曾为王夫人（王沔之曾孙女，晏殊之儿媳）作墓志铭。姑系于此。作品：《王夫人墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷60（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。据墓志，墓主乃太宗时期参知政事王沔曾孙女，仁宗时宰相晏殊儿媳。其子晏铚监黄州酒税。）</span><div id='poem_1208067' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208067' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208067?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208067")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208067_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208067'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208067'>夫人王氏，曾祖沔，事太宗、真宗，为执政，号名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208067_comment'></div>祖睦，尚书司勋员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208067_comment'></div>父乙，尚书库部员外郎、库部主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208067_comment'></div>于咸平时，夫人年十六，丞相晏元宪闻其贤，为子虞部君娶之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208067_comment'></div>夫人家中微，起嫔相门，能以礼自持，接上下有则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208067_comment'></div>堂无姑，夫人宰家事，内外无不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208067_comment'></div>元宪尝曰：「吾无忧矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208067_comment'></div>夫人宽裕而好礼，简俭而乐施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208067_comment'></div>夫族有负市易钱百万者，夫人为出所有偿之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208067_comment'></div>次子方提孩，其伯父以为己子，奏得官，后伯父失官，子未官，夫人曰：「吾子可教」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208067_comment'></div>取补牒还之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208067_comment'></div>以虞部升朝，封寿安县君，又以长子恩改封崇德县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208067_comment'></div>而元宪薨，时仁宗临奠，面赐冠帔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208067_comment'></div>生三子：长某，朝散郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208067_comment'></div>次藻，先夫人卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208067_comment'></div>季铚，左班殿直，监黄州酒税，乐善好学，敏于为吏职，从予游甚善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208067_comment'></div>方夫人疾革，铚尝刲股肉以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208067_comment'></div>三女：长嫁某，次嫁某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208067_comment'></div>孙男十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208067_comment'></div>王氏旧为霸州文安人，自司勋始居开封之咸平，今为咸平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208067_comment'></div>以某年某月葬颍昌阳翟旧学乡，合于虞部之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208067_comment'></div>铚求铭于予，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1208067'>隐而闻于显，微而立于贵，吾何为哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208067_comment'></div>终始吾义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208067_comment'></div>有子而孝，归从其良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208067_comment'></div>仪尔山川，德音不忘<span class='inlineComment2'>（《柯山集》卷五○。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208067_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1208067'>铚：草斋本、吕本作「经」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208067_comment'></div>下同。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1208067_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c11a40ad66524767ba302d2364c85711_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c11a40ad66524767ba302d2364c85711");'><span id='c11a40ad66524767ba302d2364c85711_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>，53岁</div><div id='c11a40ad66524767ba302d2364c85711' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁在黄州，僧允怀赠紫竹杖，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《僧允怀惠紫竹杖》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁在黄州，僧允怀赠紫竹杖，作赞文。姑系于此。作品：《紫君赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷52（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，岁暮苦寒，作赋咏燔薪。姑系于此。作品：《燔薪赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><div id='poem_1207797' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207797' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207797?labeling=true' target='_blank'>燔薪赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207797")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207797_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207797'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207797'>岁暮苦寒，烈风不休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207797_comment'></div>先生家贫，衣无重裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207797_comment'></div>读书夜阑，炉炭已灰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207797_comment'></div>先生瑟缩，凄然不怡，顾谓童子，与薪偕来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207797_comment'></div>童子抱薪而来曰：「是薪也，陈之壁间，自春徂冬，风日所熯，埃尘所蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207797_comment'></div>固沈液之乾竭，乃外槁而中空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207797_comment'></div>惟利簇燔，无所献功，与火相得，赫然大烘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207797_comment'></div>坚蘖劲节，久而后燃，既群枯而效技，又荧荧而不烟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207797_comment'></div>于是先生欣然，环坐皆喜，或裸股赤足，或引手张臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207797_comment'></div>穷谷萧条，薪炭如土，盖取之而不竭，顾此乐之甚富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207797_comment'></div>又何必琴材修直、兽材攫抟，汉壁之椒效暖，魏宫之金辟寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207797_comment'></div>谁知空山寒夜之叟，敢傲温于狐貉之前。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207797'><span class='label'>原注：</span>今供上方炭，率斲成琴材、胡桃文、鹁鸽色。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207797_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，秋日作乐府诗。姑系于此。作品：《年年歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷4（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，作诗咏鸬鹚。姑系于此。作品：《夜思》（江边鸬鹚鸣）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，作诗咏春雨。姑系于此。作品：《小雨》（稍稍阴霭集）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷8（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，作诗抒迁谪意。姑系于此。作品：《晨起二首》（仲春忽过半）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span>《晨起二首》（穷居无远念）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，早起作诗咏所见，抒发衰盛之感。姑系于此。作品：《晨兴》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，作诗咏朝阳，有衰老、萧条之叹。姑系于此。作品：《朝日》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，七月十日下雨解暑，感慨作诗。姑系于此。作品：《七月十日雨炎暑顿解有感》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，夏日出伏，作诗戏潘大临。姑系于此。作品：《出伏调潘十》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，春雨不止，作诗抒愁情。姑系于此。作品：《春雨》（春雨不肯晴）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷10（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，腊月十八日与妻子饮酒，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《腊月十八日蚤苦寒与家妇饮》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，作诗戏潘大临、潘大观。姑系于此。作品：《迁居罗溪潘邠老昆仲比以火惊相见殊阔作诗调之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，下四望亭至东坡柳径，访潘大临不遇，作诗咏所见景象。姑系于此。作品：《步下四望亭至东坡柳径访邠老不遇》<span gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，四月初风雨凄冷，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《四月之初风雨凄冷如穷秋兀坐不夜堂二首》（东君已成归）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，作诗咏谷鸟。姑系于此。作品：《谷鸟》<span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，正月作诗咏黄州。姑系于此。作品：《新正二首》（新正阅月天苦阴）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，正月作诗咏黄州生活。姑系于此。作品：《新正二首》（柯山老人尽日闲）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，作粥记文赠潘大临。姑系于此。作品：《粥记赠邠老》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷50（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，具体不详，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><div id='poem_1208044' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208044?labeling=true' target='_blank'>粥记赠邠老</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208044")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208044_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208044'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208044'>张安定每晨起，食粥一大碗，空腹胃虚，谷气便作，所补不细，又极柔腻，与肠腑相得，最为饮食之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208044_comment'></div>妙齐和尚说山中僧每将旦一粥，甚系利害，如或不食，则终日觉脏腑燥渴，盖能畅胃气，生津液也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208044_comment'></div>今劝人每日食粥，以为养生之要，必大笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208044_comment'></div>大抵养性命，求安乐，亦无深远难知之事，正在寝食之间耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1208044_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇宁时期，秋日作诗咏菜园。姑系于此。作品：《步蔬圃》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷11（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁时期，地点不详，录入者个人认为在黄州，因为诗中称“荒城”，检阅崇宁时张耒所在地点:汝州、楚州、陈州、黄州，只有黄州符合“荒城”，另外，张耒在诗中常这样形容黄州。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，作赋文，写贬谪环境之窘迫。姑系于此。作品：《芦藩赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），地点在黄州，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1207796' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207796' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207796?labeling=true' target='_blank'>芦藩赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207796")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207796_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207796'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207796'>张子被谪，客居齐安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207796_comment'></div>陋屋数椽，织芦为藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207796_comment'></div>疏弱陋拙，不能苟完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207796_comment'></div>昼风雨之不御，夜穿窬之易干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207796_comment'></div>上鸡栖之萧瑟，下狗窦之空宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207796_comment'></div>先生家贫，一裘度寒，曾胠箧之不恤，何藩篱之足言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207796_comment'></div>鼓钟于宫，声出于垣，中空然而无有，徒望意而辄还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207796_comment'></div>故吾守此败庐，其固比夫河山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207796_comment'></div>若夫朝旸不出，微霰既零，声如跳珠，淅淅可听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207796_comment'></div>及夫衡门暮掩，乌雀就栖，挂荒山之落景，络衰蔓之离离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207796_comment'></div>其下榛草，樵苏往来，蝼蚓出入，羊牛觇窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207796_comment'></div>先生跫然杖藜过之，瞻顾四隅，悯然歌之曰：公宫侯第，兼瓦连甍，紫垣玉府，十仞涂青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207796_comment'></div>何尝知淮夷之陋俗，穷年卒岁乎柴荆也哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207796_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='ea67071c618345eab01361311be5597f_label'><a href='javascript: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，寒食日作诗。姑系于此。作品：《寒食歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷4（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），地点在黄州，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: color: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，作诗咏冬日黄州。姑系于此。作品：《雪中狂言五首》（江乡密雪常在春）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷16（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），地点在黄州，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><span 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，秋日泛江，作诗怀古。姑系于此。作品：《泛江偶成》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），地点在黄州，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，作诗抒思归之情。姑系于此。作品：《暮归》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），地点在黄州，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，九月十八日，梦中闻雁，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《九月十八日梦中作闻雁诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），地点在黄州，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，潘处士卒，张耒作挽词。姑系于此。作品：《潘处士挽诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷24（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），地点在黄州，姑系于此年。潘处士或即潘丙，潘大观、潘大临叔。原文献诗题为《潘处士挽词》，搜韵网为《潘处士挽诗》，由此改之，以方便机器识别。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，秋冬时节，夜晚作诗咏怀。姑系于此。作品：《夜霜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷25（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），地点在黄州，姑系于此年。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，秋日潘主簿惠酒，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《齐安今秋酒殊恶对岸武昌酒可饮故人潘主簿时惠双榼》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　在黄州，作诗呈宜君。姑系于此。作品：《呈宜君》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　在黄州，生日赠诗潘大观，兼咏淮阳牡丹。姑系于此。作品：《生日赠潘郎》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　三月作诗咏芍药。姑系于此。作品：《三月小园花已谢独芍药盛开》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　五月十八日晚，作诗写雨后之景象。姑系于此。作品：《大雨十日不止五月十八日晚始霁》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年冬</a>　正月作诗咏新春景象。姑系于此。作品：《新春》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年冬</a>　野外散步，作诗咏春景。姑系于此。作品：《野步》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣、元符或崇宁间，地点似在黄州或复州。姑系于崇宁五年黄州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年冬</a>　有书文答杜锋。姑系于此。作品：《答杜锋书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷55（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣、元符或崇宁间，地点似在黄州或复州。姑系于崇宁五年黄州。杜锋，不详。）</span><div id='poem_1207844' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207844' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207844?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答杜锋书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207844")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207844_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207844'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207844'>某启：罪垢谪官于此，多病懒放，旧学荒废，无以见贤俊，故久不果奉谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207844_comment'></div>而足下意益勤，两坠珠玉，又副以新文一轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207844_comment'></div>披读累日，不胜钦仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207844_comment'></div>试陈所疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207844_comment'></div>其一篇曰《非季札》，夫季札何可非也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207844_comment'></div>札之达于礼乐，盖孔子之所与，而其人之贤，则非管、晏、叔向、子产、韩厥所可及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207844_comment'></div>然则其于辞受之际，宜亦至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207844_comment'></div>彼其辞千乘之国于争夺之世，盖欲制行以高天下而教后世，将以愧夫盗据窃取，而使乱臣贼子之祸少息焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207844_comment'></div>使季札受亦可，辞亦可，而卒辞之者，亦行其志云尔，夫岂有所不可哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207844_comment'></div>夫季札非忘吴也，岂不曰「国之存亡废兴，天也」，非人之所能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207844_comment'></div>昔孤竹君以国与叔齐，叔齐让伯夷，而卒皆逃去，入周不反其国，而孤竹之后不闻有兴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207844_comment'></div>而孔子论二子曰「求仁而得仁」，未尝罪以亡其国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207844_comment'></div>夫子之不非夷、齐，则季札之不得罪于夫子明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207844_comment'></div>足下试详思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207844_comment'></div>世之贵王衍，以器用言之，譬如玩好间一物耳，未可格以法度也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207844_comment'></div>愚以谓季札为不可非，王衍为不足非也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207844_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207844'><span class='label'>按：</span>《三杰赞》文字丰缛，布叙详密，有作者之风，更加老成，则无可议。辱问甚勤，不敢不尽。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207844_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年冬</a>　再作书文答杜锋。姑系于此。作品：《再答杜锋书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷55（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为绍圣、元符或崇宁间，地点似在黄州或复州。姑系于崇宁五年黄州。杜锋，不详。）</span><div id='poem_1207845' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207845' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207845?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再答杜锋书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207845")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207845_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207845'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207845'>承谕亹亹，似未达鄙意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207845_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207845_comment'></div>季子让国，几千馀岁，历数圣贤，未尝有说，独见黜于吾子，盖夫子谓后生可畏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207845_comment'></div>夫季子之不肯受吴，直是不欲有国耳，故其言曰：「愿附子臧之义」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207845_comment'></div>彼视弃千乘之国如草芥，亦必有乐乎此而易彼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207845_comment'></div>苟求其所以让之之名，则寿梦欲越诸兄而立季子，固不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207845_comment'></div>至馀昧卒，而子僚之才亦足以君国，则季子不得废嫡而立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207845_comment'></div>孟子曰：「天之所废，必若桀、纣者，故益、伊尹、周公不有天下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207845_comment'></div>此札之所以必辞者，恶乱君臣之大分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207845_comment'></div>季札之于道德，其深矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207845_comment'></div>屈狐庸曰：「季子，守节者也，虽有国不立」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207845_comment'></div>可谓知其心矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207845_comment'></div>孟子曰：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1207845", 1207845, "Clauses/35/Comments/2")'>好名</span>之人能让千乘之国」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207845_comment'></div>则自夷、齐以来，札一人而已，所谓圣人之清者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207845_comment'></div>夫岂在所黜哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207845_comment'></div>孟子曰：「若夫成功，则天也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207845_comment'></div>则古之论存亡废兴，未有不言天者，非幸不幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207845_comment'></div>孤竹之君欲越次而立叔齐，叔齐辞之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207845_comment'></div>伯夷长，当立而辞之，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207845_comment'></div>商人世及，则叔齐将以次亦当立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207845_comment'></div>而夫子初不论此，直曰「古之贤人也」，其意可见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207845_comment'></div>季子之听乐，其于礼乐之际深矣，其于辞受必不草草，更宜详之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207845_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　作赋写家养之鸡。姑系于此。作品：《鸣鸡赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁后，地点不详，似在黄州，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207794' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207794' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207794?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鸣鸡赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207794")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207794_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207794'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207794'>先生閒居学道，昧旦而兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207794_comment'></div>家畜一鸡，司晨而鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207794_comment'></div>畜之既久，语默有程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207794_comment'></div>意气武毅，被服鲜明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207794_comment'></div>峨峨朱冠，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1207794", 1207794, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>丹颈</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1207794", 1207794, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>玄膺</span>，苍距矫攫，秀尾翘腾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207794_comment'></div>奉职有恪，徐步我庭，啄粟饮水，孔肃靡争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207794_comment'></div>山川苍苍，风霰宵凝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207794_comment'></div>黯幽窗之沈沈，恍余梦之初惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207794_comment'></div>万里一寂，钟鼓无声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207794_comment'></div>闻振衣之腷膊，忽孤奏而泠泠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207794_comment'></div>委更筹之离乱，和城角之凄清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207794_comment'></div>应云外之鸣鸿，吊山间之落星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207794_comment'></div>歌三终而复寂，夜五分而既更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207794_comment'></div>万户皆作，车驱马行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207794_comment'></div>先生杖履而出，观大明之东生。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1207794_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　夏日有雨，作赋。姑系于此。作品：《暑雨赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷1（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁后，地点不详，似在黄州，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207795' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207795' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207795?labeling=true' target='_blank'>暑雨赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207795")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207795_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207795'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207795'>提九山于空虚，忽并击而俱裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207795_comment'></div>壅百川于河汉，乃防隤而一决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207795_comment'></div>哀下土之微生，何足供夫摧折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207795_comment'></div>方朱鸟之宵中，岁仲夏兮大热。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207795_comment'></div>虽惔炎之一快，俄郁蒸之莫泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207795_comment'></div>丛百指于环堵，顾杖屦之安设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207795_comment'></div>委熏风于九旬，淫疾苦于百节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207795_comment'></div>付六凿于浑沌，独天游而神悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207795_comment'></div>忽翛然而轻举，固已窥寒门而蹈冰雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207795_comment'></div>揽北斗而酌天酒，觐上帝于玄阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207795_comment'></div>聊逍遥兮穷年，俯故居兮蚁垤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207795_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207795_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　仲夏斋居，作赋。姑系于此。作品：《斋居赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁后，地点不详，似在黄州，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207805' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207805' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207805?labeling=true' target='_blank'>斋居赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207805")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207805_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207805'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207805'>仲夏之月，阴气始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207805_comment'></div>阳既盛而初剥，阴浸亨而用事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207805_comment'></div>水伏畏涸，火燎方炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207805_comment'></div>其于人也，心实过炎，而肾受其弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207805_comment'></div>惟人之生，受命在子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207805_comment'></div>推卦曰《坎》，于行为水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207805_comment'></div>微阳所潜，元气之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207805_comment'></div>故火甚烈，则正气或因而衰，则水受害者，君子之所深畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207805_comment'></div>于是屏事燕息，涤虑斋居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207805_comment'></div>既静事以无刑，又远眺而高居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207805_comment'></div>却纷华而弗陈，与淡泊乎为徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207805_comment'></div>绝嗜窒欲，爱精<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1207805", 1207805, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>啬神</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207805_comment'></div>声色不御，滋味弗亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207805_comment'></div>冲然与和俱游，湛兮以道合真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207805_comment'></div>故能体强志宁，愉乐寿考，远去疾疠，保此难老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207805_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207805_comment'></div>苟能推此以尽道，考此以察物，则岂惟斋戒以御时，宜其颠沛而勿失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207805_comment'></div>且夫冰炭相乘，利害交至，陨真盗和，岂独阴沴！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207805_comment'></div>道心惟微，易失难常，困于侵陵，有如微阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207805_comment'></div>则洗心涤虑以却外垢，虚中保和以全天君，故能涉至变而不濡，更万变而常存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207805_comment'></div>盖将穷年以斋居，岂特养生而善身乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207805_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　作赋咏蜘蛛。姑系于此。作品：《蜘蛛赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间大致标为崇宁后，地点不详，似在黄州，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207806' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207806' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1207806'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207806'>鱼游假渊，鸟栖求木，而我所宅，独取诸腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207806_comment'></div>巢于墙屋，人不予取，朝蝇暮蚊，食人所恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207806_comment'></div>彼残物以养，而无益于世，虽名人兮，斯虫是愧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1207806_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　积雨初止，清明肃然，喜而作赋。姑系于此。作品：《喜晴赋》<span id='poem_sentence_1_1207813_comment'></div>晨起载欣，朝晖在门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207813_comment'></div>起往从之，清明肃然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207813_comment'></div>蚓安其穴，蜗不遗涎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207813_comment'></div>还开通于滞湿，失沮洳之垫昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207813_comment'></div>列缺弭鞭，丰隆偃麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207813_comment'></div>羲和缓辔而安行，背扶桑而经天街。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207813_comment'></div>顾大田之多荒，乃愀然而兴哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207813_comment'></div>聊雷霆之一嬉，遽下土而罹灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207813_comment'></div>诏龙螭使伏蟠，息愤怒之喧嘳，曰：「予悔祸于斯人，劳苦雨师以一杯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207813_comment'></div>惠我农师，岂不休哉」！</div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年秋</a>　李援（文举）来访，同游西禅刹、陆子泉，登梦野亭，烹茶酌酒，有诗。作品：《与李文举登梦野亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年秋</a>　再登梦野亭，作诗怀旧。作品：《登梦野亭怀旧》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年秋</a>　游陆羽祠堂，作诗二首兼寄李援。作品：《题陆羽祠堂兼寄李援援有诗殊佳二首》（陆子不可招）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《题陆羽祠堂兼寄李援援有诗殊佳二首》（清诗吊陆子）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年秋</a>　作诗咏复州秋景。作品：《绝句》（竟陵秋色清如水）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年秋</a>　夜晚作诗咏所思。作品：《小斋夜思》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷20（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年闰9月</a>　庞安时（字安常）于二月初六卒，张耒于闰九月为作墓志铭。作品：《庞安常墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷59（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208061' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208061' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208061?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庞安常墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元符二年闰九月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年闰9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208061")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208061_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208061'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208061'>吾尝谓医之在天下，其资民生之用，盖与谷帛等，窃怪世之工其道者何少也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208061_comment'></div>自三代以来至今，以医名世者多矣，其为论说方术大备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208061_comment'></div>又尝怪夫世之医者，皆忽而不学，大抵从里闾俗师，其治病苟不杀人，众已指为良医矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208061_comment'></div>使孝子慈孙不能无恨于疾苦之际者，以此也，可不悲哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208061_comment'></div>予少多病，世之医往往与之游，率按前人成说而用之，未有心得而能原其所以说者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208061_comment'></div>盖医之为道，推本天地阴阳，经纪寒暑日星，考验国土山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208061_comment'></div>而人身外则骨节、脉络、腧穴，内则脏腑、焦鬲、井谷，其出入会通之变，甚多且微，非夫致至精之察，不惑之知，不足以尽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208061_comment'></div>而世医不以术易衣食者鲜矣，何暇及此哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208061_comment'></div>宜工之者寡，而古学之废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208061_comment'></div>意必有聪明微妙之君子，悯兹学之不振，悼生人之疾疠，独治其道，修其术，而莫或知之者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208061_comment'></div>绍圣丁丑，予得罪谪官齐安，而得蕲水庞君焉，其于医殆所谓聪明微妙者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208061_comment'></div>君讳安时，字安常，蕲州蕲水人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208061_comment'></div>其在孕时，颇有异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208061_comment'></div>及儿时读书，隽颖绝人，一经目辄终身不忘，乡党奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208061_comment'></div>其父讳之庆，号高医，年老且病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208061_comment'></div>君问医于父，父授以脉诀，君曰：「是不足为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208061_comment'></div>独取黄帝、扁鹊之脉书治之，未久已能通其说，时出新意，辩诘不可屈，父大惊，君时未冠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208061_comment'></div>已而病聋，君曰：「天使我隐于医欤」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208061_comment'></div>乃益读《灵枢》、《太素》、《甲乙》诸秘书，凡经传百家之涉其道者，靡不贯通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208061_comment'></div>时时为人治病，有奇功，率十愈八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208061_comment'></div>而君性恺悌明豁，好施而廉，于是有舆疾自千里踵门求治者，君为辟第舍居之，亲视饘粥药物，既愈而后遣之，如是常数十百人不绝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208061_comment'></div>其不可为者，必实告之，亦不复为治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208061_comment'></div>活人无数，病家持金帛来谢，不尽取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208061_comment'></div>戊寅之春，予见君于蕲水山中，深衣幅巾，延客坐堂上，视其貌伟然，听其议博而不繁，妙而易晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208061_comment'></div>告予曰：「世所谓医书，予皆见之，惟扁鹊之言深矣，盖所谓《难经》者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208061_comment'></div>扁鹊寓术于其书，而言之不详，意者使后人自求之欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208061_comment'></div>予之术盖出于此，以之视浅深，决死生，若合符节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208061_comment'></div>且察脉之要，莫急于人迎、寸口，是二脉阴阳相应，如两引绳，阴阳均则绳之大小等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208061_comment'></div>凡平人之脉，人迎大于春夏，寸口大于秋冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208061_comment'></div>何谓人迎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208061_comment'></div>喉旁取之，《内经》所谓别于阳者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208061_comment'></div>越人不尽取诸穴之脉，但取手太阴之行度，鱼际后一寸九分，以配阴阳之数，而得关格之脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208061_comment'></div>然不先求喉手引绳之义，则脉尺寸、阴阳、关格之所起，寸四倍于尺，则上鱼际而为溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208061_comment'></div>故言溢者，寸倍尺极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208061_comment'></div>溢之脉，一名外关，一名内格，一名阴乘之脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208061_comment'></div>曰外关者，自关以上外脉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208061_comment'></div>阴拒阳而出，故曰内格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208061_comment'></div>阴生于寸，动于尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208061_comment'></div>今自关以上溢于鱼际，而关以后伏行，是为阴壮乘阳而阳竭，阳竭则死脉，有是者死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208061_comment'></div>此所谓寸四倍于人迎，为关阴之脉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1208061_comment'></div>关以后脉当取一寸而沈，过者谓尺中，倍于寸口，至三倍则八寸而为覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1208061_comment'></div>故言覆者，尺倍寸极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1208061_comment'></div>覆之脉，一名曰内关，一名曰外格，一名曰阳乘之脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1208061_comment'></div>曰内关者，自关以下内脉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1208061_comment'></div>外格者，阳拒阴而内入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1208061_comment'></div>阳生于尺，动于寸，今自关以下覆入赤泽，而关以前脉伏行，则为阳亢乘阴而阴竭，阴竭亦死脉，有是者死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1208061_comment'></div>此所谓人迎四倍于寸口，为格阳之脉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1208061_comment'></div>《经》曰：『人迎与寸口皆盛，过四倍则为关格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1208061_comment'></div>关格之脉赢，不能极天地之精气而死』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1208061_comment'></div>所谓关格者，覆、溢是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1208061_comment'></div>虽然，独覆独溢，则补泻以生之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1208061_comment'></div>尺部一盛，泻足少阳，补足厥阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1208061_comment'></div>二盛，泻足太阴，补足少阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1208061_comment'></div>三盛，泻足阳明，补足太阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1208061_comment'></div>皆一泻而一补之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1208061_comment'></div>四盛，则三阳极，导之以针，当尽取少阳、太阴、阳明之穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1208061_comment'></div>脉静者取三阳于足，脉数者取于手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1208061_comment'></div>泻阳二，当补于阴一，至寸而反之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1208061_comment'></div>脉有九候者，寓浮、中、沉于寸、关、尺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1208061_comment'></div>且越人不取十二经诸穴，直以二经配合于手太阴行度，自尺至寸一寸九分之位，复分三部，部中有浮、中、沉，以配天、地、人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1208061_comment'></div>又曰：「中风、木伤寒、金湿、水热、火温，病起于湿，湿则土病，土病而诸脏受害，其本生于金、木、水、火四脏之变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1208061_comment'></div>阳浮阴濡为风温，阳数阴实为温毒，阳濡阴急为湿温，阴阳俱盛为温疟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1208061_comment'></div>其治之也，风温取足厥阴木，手少阴火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1208061_comment'></div>温毒专取少阳火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1208061_comment'></div>伤寒取足太阴金，手少阴火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1208061_comment'></div>温湿取足少阴水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1208061_comment'></div>乡人皆谓我能与伤寒语，我察伤寒与四温之变，辨其疑似而不可乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1208061_comment'></div>故定阴阳于喉手，配覆溢于尺寸，寓九候于浮溢，分四温于伤寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1208061_comment'></div>此皆扁鹊略开其端，而予参以《内经》诸书，考究而得其说，审而用之，顺而治之，病不得逃焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1208061_comment'></div>君为予言者尚多，独著其大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1208061_comment'></div>又曰：「予欲以其术告后世，故著《难经解》数万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1208061_comment'></div>观草木之性与五脏之宜，秩其职位，官其寒热，班其奇偶，以疗百疾，著《主对集》一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1208061_comment'></div>古今异宜，方术脱遗，备伤寒之变，补仲景《伤寒论》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1208061_comment'></div>药有后出，古所未知，今不能辨，尝试有功，不可遗也，作《本草补遗》一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1208061_comment'></div>吁，其备矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1208061_comment'></div>予问以华佗之事，君曰：「术若是，非人所能为也，其史之妄乎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1208061_comment'></div>某尝病风痹数年馀，苦未尽瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1208061_comment'></div>君切脉曰：「脏病传所胜，君之疾，肝传于脾，脾气欲转运而肝制之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1208061_comment'></div>去木邪，行土气，而后愈」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1208061_comment'></div>因授予以方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1208061_comment'></div>少焉，疾有间，又曰：「一方不可瘳，当增损之以应疾」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1208061_comment'></div>时时致方与药之难得者，察君于予尽心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1208061_comment'></div>见君之岁，是冬而君痼疾作，明年春而剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1208061_comment'></div>门人请自视脉，君笑曰：「予察之审矣，且出入息亦脉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1208061_comment'></div>予胃气已绝，死矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1208061_comment'></div>因尽屏药饵，忽为韵语数句，授其婿魏渊，盖超然达者语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1208061_comment'></div>后数日，与客坐语而卒，年五十八，时二月初六也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1208061_comment'></div>君性喜读书，闻人有异书，购之若饥渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1208061_comment'></div>书工日夜传录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1208061_comment'></div>君寒暑疾病未尝置卷，其藏书至万馀卷，然皆以考医方之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1208061_comment'></div>晚好佛学，盖有得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1208061_comment'></div>以是年闰九月二十七日，葬于蕲水龙门乡图佛村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1208061_comment'></div>君曾祖讳慥，祖讳震，及父，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1208061_comment'></div>娶陈氏，生二男子，曰瓘，曰琪，皆笃孝修饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1208061_comment'></div>二孙，曰仲容、叔达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1208061_comment'></div>三女已嫁，魏渊、郭迪、陈翔其婿也，各举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1208061_comment'></div>君临终以书遗予，若托以铭其墓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1208061_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1208061_comment'></div>予名微位卑，又方得罪于时，何足以为君重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1208061_comment'></div>然君尝有德于予，且其孙必以见属，不得辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1208061_comment'></div>既铭其藏，又著所尝治而愈、人所传道者，更刻于碑阴，且以为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1208061_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_101_1208061'>生民之病，尧舜是医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1208061_comment'></div>惟周与孔，世之良师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1208061_comment'></div>遘疠于身，扁鹊善治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1208061_comment'></div>惟民与身，同一矩规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1208061_comment'></div>猗欤庞君，有见于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1208061_comment'></div>独显以方，用不大施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1208061_comment'></div>孰疾于衷，孰毒于肢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1208061_comment'></div>有来求予，径取无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1208061_comment'></div>饮酒著书，终身遨嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1208061_comment'></div>欲知其仁，吊者垂洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1208061_comment'></div>即化而安，不爽厥知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1208061_comment'></div>有考其书，铭以昭之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_112_1208061_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年秋</a>　秋雨日饮酒，作诗赠贾七。作品：《秋雨小酌赠贾七》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年秋</a>　作诗咏暮秋。作品：《秋晚》（日转秋庭树影斜）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷28（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年冬</a>　冬日赏腊梅，作诗二首。作品：《腊初小雪后圃梅开二首》（风格孤高又国香）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年春</a>　官舍北有小草，尝惜护之，一日大火焚舍，草亦不免，因作诗。作品：《竟陵酒官舍北有数步草岁寒霜落犹郁然也予为障其风霜暮冬尚自如一日大火焚舍无遗往寻草不复有矣》<span href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年春</a>　作诗咏复州暮春景象。作品：《晚春四首》（杨柳藏鸦笋作竿）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年春</a>　将离复州，为读书舍鸿轩作记文。谓秋至而春去，有若鸿雁。作品：《鸿轩记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷49（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208032' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208032' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208032?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鸿轩记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208032")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208032_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208032'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208032'>鸿轩者，张子读书舍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208032_comment'></div>客有言曰：「吾闻之，时其往来，以避寒暑之害，而高飞远举，能使弋人无慕者，鸿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208032_comment'></div>今子以戆暗不见事，几得谴辱于圣世，蒙垢忍耻于泥涂，苟升斗以自养，而欲自比于鸿，不亦愧乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208032_comment'></div>张子曰：「子之言是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208032_comment'></div>然予居此以己卯之秋，其迁也庚辰之春，与夫嗷嗷陂泽中猎食以活，秋至而春去者，得无类乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208032_comment'></div>客曰：「唯」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1208032_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年春</a>　将离复州，酌酒赏别鸿轩下之蔷薇，作诗。作品：《鸿轩下有蔷薇予初至时生意盖仅存耳予为灌溉壅护今年春遂大盛仲春著花数百萼大几如芍药丰盛妍丽顷所未见也余有黄州之行酌酒赏别》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷23（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年春</a>　作诗咏巫臣。作品：《巫臣二首》（万古风情不易禁）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《巫臣二首》或作于复州”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符三年复州。）</span>《巫臣二首》（咫尺山河不易知）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷29（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《巫臣二首》或作于复州”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符三年复州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　离复州前，曾游五华山。姑系于此。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='585a81d981e4409983e4bd22844616dd_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("585a81d981e4409983e4bd22844616dd");'><span id='585a81d981e4409983e4bd22844616dd_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: href='/Writing/1208029?labeling=true' target='_blank'>二宋二连君祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208029")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208029_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208029'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208029'>治国有善政，不如在位有善人之化民速也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208029_comment'></div>在位有善人，不如乡有善人之化民易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208029_comment'></div>夫人之情所感动，常在其所易接而亲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208029_comment'></div>若夫政事者，固民之所畏，则其从之盖有不得已之心焉，其及物浅矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208029_comment'></div>安陆之应山，楚之穷邑也，然其民好文，多学者，其俗善良不争，纯静易治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208029_comment'></div>其里之人为予言曰：「始吾邑之人，未甚知学之利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208029_comment'></div>有宋氏兄弟者，讲学吾邑之法兴佛舍，其后两人皆取高第，有声名，久之并为大官，名尊益显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208029_comment'></div>所以吾邑之人，其鄙鲁不学自弃于夷者愧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208029_comment'></div>其居法兴时，有连氏兄弟者，与二宋君游，相好也，其后亦登科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208029_comment'></div>两人起家仕不振，然视所同舍生富贵光显，可攀为声势，而两人亦自力，不少屈己以附之，其官终不显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208029_comment'></div>故吾邑之人，其不笃于廉耻徼倖贪利者愧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208029_comment'></div>凡吾邑之俗，好学而文、纯静有耻者，四君子之化也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208029_comment'></div>后五十年，宋景文之孙羲年令应山，与连君之从子仲儒，缘邑人之意作祠堂于法兴方丈之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208029_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208029_comment'></div>为吏于乡，其有恩德久而民祠之者几人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208029_comment'></div>在位之人，不如其乡里之君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208029_comment'></div>二宋公之行事爵里，书于《国史》，士大夫举知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208029_comment'></div>连君锡，以尚书职方员外郎致仕，好修而自重，直谅多闻之君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208029_comment'></div>其仲讳庠，字元礼，为尚书都官郎中，敏于政事，号良吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208029_comment'></div>世称王阳在位，贡禹弹冠者，为故旧之美，然严光所以逃光武不肯仕，彼独何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208029_comment'></div>连君不因宋君以显名当世，卒以湮没而不悔，彼诚知所处，与世俗所谓显晦异矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1208029_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

武汉（汉阳）

-----title
鄂州（武昌）
-----detail

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年7月</a>　夜宿樊溪，有诗。作品：《宿樊溪》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='665099f9d4ff49e08f1387869c4c126b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("665099f9d4ff49e08f1387869c4c126b");'><span id='665099f9d4ff49e08f1387869c4c126b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　崇宁时期，曾携家人游寒溪、西山二寺，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《西山寒溪》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b0ab2b8cf2c0420f8337a5b2a427db49_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b0ab2b8cf2c0420f8337a5b2a427db49");'><span id='b0ab2b8cf2c0420f8337a5b2a427db49_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>，53岁</div><div id='b0ab2b8cf2c0420f8337a5b2a427db49' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　与人访吴王故宫，拟曹植赋而作赋文。姑系于此。作品：《吴故城赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《张耒集》卷2（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），地点在黄州，姑系于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1207820' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207820' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207820?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吴故城赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207820")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207820_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207820'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207820'>乱吾舟兮大江，夕余济兮樊口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207820_comment'></div>登武昌之故墟，吊西门之衰柳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207820_comment'></div>出东郊而南眺，访遗城之培塿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207820_comment'></div>嗟颓墙之迤靡，半已平乎耕耨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207820_comment'></div>杂溪涧而沮洳，稻冉冉而将秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207820_comment'></div>曰是吴王之故宫兮，昔孙仲谋之所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207820_comment'></div>当弊汉之委地，群凶聚而啄剖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207820_comment'></div>伟紫髯之永图，独穴据乎江右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207820_comment'></div>岂无意于雍洛，易虚夸为善守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207820_comment'></div>观其作都于武昌，夫何险陋而即安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207820_comment'></div>是为大江之上流兮，于备敌焉不繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207820_comment'></div>顾诸将之凡才，岂袁、曹之敢班？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207820_comment'></div>欲身当中原之一面兮，事便时利一苇济乎涛澜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207820_comment'></div>当是之时，两观万雉，缥阙应门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207820_comment'></div>内拥燕赵之美，外屯貔貅之军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207820_comment'></div>笙磬钟鼓之喧阗，旗旆车马之缤纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207820_comment'></div>固已包蒙川泽，震耀山原，安知夫千载之后，陵谷易位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207820_comment'></div>夫何遗珠与弃玉，顾此遗墟之将圮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207820_comment'></div>于是与客休于祠宫，披樵苏之微路，嗟牛羊之入室，固牲酒之不具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207820_comment'></div>与客愀然，三叹而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207820_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1207820'>予近读曹植诸小赋，虽不能缜密工致，悦可人意，而文气疏俊，风致高远，有汉赋馀韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207820_comment'></div>是可矜尚也，因拟之云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207820_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c7394fcb918a448488671fa2922d9fbb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c7394fcb918a448488671fa2922d9fbb");'><span id='c7394fcb918a448488671fa2922d9fbb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>，53岁</div><div id='c7394fcb918a448488671fa2922d9fbb' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>　作诗写樊山秋景。姑系于此。作品：《樊山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷32（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详（难以分辨是绍圣、元符年间亦或是崇宁年间所作），姑系于此年。樊山，一名西山。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='8e066392e1364f7bb1946b992d08ff73_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8e066392e1364f7bb1946b992d08ff73");'><span id='8e066392e1364f7bb1946b992d08ff73_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>，53岁</div><div id='8e066392e1364f7bb1946b992d08ff73' class='detail'><a href="javascript: -----title
黄石
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='99547a56e1d34a2ca5a89c7305a54c9e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("99547a56e1d34a2ca5a89c7305a54c9e");'><span id='99547a56e1d34a2ca5a89c7305a54c9e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，47岁</div><div id='99547a56e1d34a2ca5a89c7305a54c9e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月17日</a>　离蕲春，夜泊富池，作诗。作品：《离蕲阳守风林皇方虑风壮晚未知所止俄顷风息一食顷宿富池作诗示同行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月18日</a>　晨发富池，有感作诗。作品：《自离富池凡三祷顺济龙求便风皆获应又风日清霁舟行安稳委曲如所欲感而成诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='42ec6b7a3b8e492d9a4ee6fad81922d0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("42ec6b7a3b8e492d9a4ee6fad81922d0");'><span id='42ec6b7a3b8e492d9a4ee6fad81922d0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，47岁</div><div id='42ec6b7a3b8e492d9a4ee6fad81922d0' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; -----title
九江（德化）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='70e393a8c1bb4b058b7f55575a0e69f1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("70e393a8c1bb4b058b7f55575a0e69f1");'><span id='70e393a8c1bb4b058b7f55575a0e69f1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，47岁</div><div id='70e393a8c1bb4b058b7f55575a0e69f1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月18日</a>　黄昏时，顺利至江州，作诗。作品：《离富池望庐岳是日入夹口直达浔阳遂舍大江之险示同行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷22（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月18日</a>　游琵琶亭，作诗。作品：《题江州琵琶亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷13（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月18日</a>　作诗咏德化县。姑系于此。作品：《楚城晓望》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《楚城晓望》《楚桥秋暮阻雨》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符三年江州。《明一统志》卷52《九江府·古迹》：“废楚城县在德化县，唐武德中置，属江州，贞观中省。”）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月18日</a>　在德化遇雨，作诗。姑系于此。作品：《楚桥秋暮阻雨》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《楚城晓望》《楚桥秋暮阻雨》或作于此时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符三年江州。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月18日</a>　是日，夜宿浔阳太平观冷翠亭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月19日</a>　遇邹浩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月20日</a>　游庐山，提及苏轼诗《初入庐山三首》其二，因作诗。作品：《昔苏先生游庐山诗云平日怀真赏神游杳霭间如今不是梦真个有庐山辄继一首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月20日</a>　游庐山，提及苏轼诗《初入庐山三首》其三，因作诗。作品：《苏先生诗云芒鞋青竹杖自挂百钱游何事春山里人人识故侯辄继其后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷26（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月20日</a>　是日，游东林，观神运殿，礼远公像，见《晋安帝辇游达摩院》，遂登白公草堂，读欧阳文忠公题石，上五杉阁而归。晚浴东林，纳凉神运殿之南，望香炉、天池、化城。有诗。作品：《神运殿望香炉天池等峰晚宿官厅明旦早发》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月20日</a>　宿官厅，有题壁诗。作品：《题庐阜官厅壁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷17（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月20日</a>　在庐山，谒刘涣、刘恕父子故居，作记文。作品：《冰玉堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷49（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208028' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208028' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208028?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冰玉堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年6月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208028")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208028_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208028'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208028'>熙宁中，予为临淮主簿，始得拜刘公道原于汴上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208028_comment'></div>是时道原方修《资治通鉴》，而执政有素高其才者，欲用以为属，道原义不屈，遂与绝，复以亲老求为南康酒官，故书未成而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208028_comment'></div>予既慕公之义，而望其眉宇，听其论议，其是非与夺之际，凛然可畏而服也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208028_comment'></div>士大夫皆曰：「刘君之贤，非独其信道笃，立心刚，博学洽闻之所至，是盖得父之风烈」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208028_comment'></div>公之父讳涣，字凝之，有词学，为小官，数以事屈在势者，节高不能容于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208028_comment'></div>年五十馀为颍上令，即致仕归隐于庐山，筑室种蔬而食之，无求于物，人皆师尊焉，于是既老矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208028_comment'></div>公归庐山无几何，得疾，以元丰元年九月卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208028_comment'></div>公讳恕，道原盖其字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208028_comment'></div>后十馀年而当元祐元年，予受诏校《资治通鉴》于秘书省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208028_comment'></div>是时公同时修书之人往往而在，道公之事本末尤详，皆曰：道原廉介刚直，其仕必欲达其道，不以一毫挫于人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208028_comment'></div>方其激于义而作，虽足蹈坎井，手揽虎兕，视之若无见，虽古烈士或愧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208028_comment'></div>平居自负经济大略，而视其为吏，则严簿书，束胥吏，抚鳏寡，绳豪猾，纤悉曲当，皆可为后法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208028_comment'></div>其学自书契以来以至于今，国家治乱，君臣世系，广至于郡国山川之名物，详至于岁月日时之后先，问焉必知，考焉必信，有疑焉必决，其言滔滔汩汩，如道其闾里族党之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208028_comment'></div>其著书有《疑年谱》、《年略谱》、《通鉴外纪》、《十国纪年》，惟《十国纪年》先成，世传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208028_comment'></div>世以比迁、固、歆、向，公亦自以不愧，而自蔚宗以降不论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208028_comment'></div>当时司马君实、欧阳文忠，号通史学，贯穿古今，亦自以不及而取正焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208028_comment'></div>凝之晚善养性笃行，老益壮，年八十一，后道原数年卒，累官至屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208028_comment'></div>其终也未尝疾，沐浴正冠而绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208028_comment'></div>呜呼，亦异矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208028_comment'></div>元符中，予谪官庐陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208028_comment'></div>道原之子羲仲主簿，于德安叙其大父与父之事于予，且曰：「顷眉山苏子由尝道庐山，拜我大父于床下，出而叹曰：『凛乎非今世之士也』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208028_comment'></div>其卒，为词以哭曰：『凝之为父，与道原之为子，洁廉不挠，冰清而玉刚』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208028_comment'></div>乡人是其言，名吾大父故居之堂曰『冰玉』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208028_comment'></div>君为我实记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208028_comment'></div>予曰：「昔司马谈能推明孔子作《春秋》之意，欲为史未成，以授其子迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208028_comment'></div>而迁遂能网罗三代放逸旧闻，驰骋上下数千岁，成一家之意，与六经并传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208028_comment'></div>父子之于文学美矣，而风节无闻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208028_comment'></div>疏广、疏受于汉宣帝有师傅恩，而父子一旦弃去，视舍富贵如弃尘垢，骨肉之际，风节同矣，而文学无传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1208028_comment'></div>孰如君家父子，文学风节辉焯并著，名立于父而显于子，千载之远，四海之广，而一家擅之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1208028_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1208028_comment'></div>世固未尝有也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1208028_comment'></div>始予应举时，与道原之弟格游，爱其学博而论正，是盖得其兄之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1208028_comment'></div>而羲仲敏于学而健于文，屹然好名而立节者也，予知冰玉堂之洒扫有继矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1208028_comment'></div>其爵里世系与其行事之详，则既有志之者矣，故不复出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1208028_comment'></div>因为词以系之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1208028'>我所思之人兮，嗟可想而不可见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1208028_comment'></div>意其人兮，俯青云而下睨，瞩九日而不眩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1208028_comment'></div>超然不知其何之兮，遗此空山之故居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1208028_comment'></div>岂访重华而陈义兮，父唱子和与仙圣乎为徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1208028_comment'></div>纾为云霓兮，注为江湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1208028_comment'></div>伟为哲人兮，我言在书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1208028_comment'></div>超驾言而从之兮，指庐山乎休吾车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1208028_comment'></div>耕山而食兮，梁溪而渔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1208028_comment'></div>俨顿辔而不敢留兮，恐其尚谓我污也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1208028_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月21日</a>　出庐山，作诗。作品：《出山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷6（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月21日</a>　在彭泽道中，作诗怀陶渊明。姑系于此。作品：《道彭泽》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷28（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《道彭泽》或作于游庐山旅途中”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符三年彭泽。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月21日</a>　作诗咏陶渊明。姑系于此。作品：《题五柳亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷31（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）崔书言：“《题五柳亭》当作于同时”，本处为编年系地，将该作品姑系于元符三年彭泽。）</span><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
济宁

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月</a>　祭孔庙，有祭文。作品：《祭文宣王文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭文宣王文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208089")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208089'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208089'>惟吾圣师，生于此，又尝仕于此，盖自卫而删《诗》定《乐》，既没而葬，皆在此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208089_comment'></div>教之在鲁深矣，某受朝命，来守此土，意遗风逸礼，必有在民，愿与诸生究观而讲明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208089_comment'></div>莅事之始，敢不致告，非以为礼，庶用致虔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1208089_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月</a>　祭东岳天齐仁圣帝，有祭文。作品：《祭圣帝文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1208091' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208091' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208091?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭圣帝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208091")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208091_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208091'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208091'>贬逐积年，穷无所诉，而圣上哀其不辜，复畀之民社，而来守此邦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208091_comment'></div>则亦惟是旱乾水溢之不时，将有请于帝，帝之仁民，宜无或难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208091_comment'></div>莅事之始，敢以告，姑以致虔，礼则已略，惟帝鉴之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1208091_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月9日</a>　重阳节，登高赏菊，次李晋裕韵而作诗。作品：《次韵李晋裕教授九日见赠》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　子野大夫罢兖倅归汶上，作诗相送，以抒别情。作品：《送子野大夫罢兖倅归汶上》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷12（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）子野大夫，姓名不详。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年11月</a>　左司谏陈祐奏称张耒为可用之才。耒以太常少卿奉召进京，有诗。作品：《蒙恩除奉常有感》<span -----title
泰安（奉符）
-----detail

-----title
平顶山

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年2月</a>　社日，作祭文。作品：《祭社文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷58（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span>《祭稷文》<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208087_comment'></div>莅事之始，敢敬致告，惟神鉴之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1208087_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1208088' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208088' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208088?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭稷文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1208088_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208088'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208088'>惟神之功，立我烝民，有邰之君，实兴周室，万世通祀，光配无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208088_comment'></div>某受命天子，来长斯民，岁时奉祭，牲币有秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208088_comment'></div>莅事之始，敢告有常，神其鉴之，永锡斯土。</div><div
