ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年4月</a>　备礼祭范祖禹，并作书致范祖禹长子范冲。作品：《与范十三元长书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷56（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207860' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207860' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207860?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与范十三元长书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207860")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207860_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207860'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207860'>耒启：方君护丧北归，耒时守汝阴，不知其审也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207860_comment'></div>今春到汝，久之乃承尝经过城中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207860_comment'></div>春末有提举买木君，亦君族人也，方知襄事于偃师，如闻今已还洛，始办为此薄祭，惟以少叙哀诚耳，不敢以为礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207860_comment'></div>初暑，孝履如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207860_comment'></div>愿省哭泣，强力支持。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207860_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207861' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207861' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207861?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年4月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207861_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207861'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207861'>耒再启：每怀先公平昔相与之诚，又闻在岭外时失所爱弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207861_comment'></div>天乎，有是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207861_comment'></div>无可言者，奈何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207861_comment'></div>吕家诸舅又复不振，想时复书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207861_comment'></div>书不尽意，何时面慰，临书陨涕。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207861_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年5月</a>　坐党籍落职，主管亳州明道宫。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　在汝州，于司马光《布衾铭》后作跋文。作品：《书布衾铭后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷54（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207909' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207909' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207909?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书布衾铭后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207909")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207909_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207909'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207909'>司马公之俭德，盖望其眉宇，闻其语言，而使奢逸之意消，不必考其服器而后知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207909_comment'></div>公薨于东府，某往哭之，见覆尸以布衾，上有铭焉，盖此铭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207909_comment'></div>某年月日，张某汝州东斋记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1207909_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　在汝州，为司马池《行色》诗作跋文。作品：《记行色诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷54（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版））</span><div id='poem_1207912' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207912' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207912?labeling=true' target='_blank'>记行色诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1207912")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207912_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207912'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207912'>「冷于陂水淡于秋，远陌初穷到渡头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207912_comment'></div>赖是丹青不能画，画成应遣一生愁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207912_comment'></div>右《行色》诗，故待制司马公所作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207912_comment'></div>公讳池，以某年中尝监安丰酒税，实作此诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207912_comment'></div>距今若干年，其孙宏知县事，刻此诗于石，属予记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207912_comment'></div>惟公以文学风节为时名臣，是生丞相温公，以盛德名世，以直道立朝，名闻华夷，功施社稷，其完节美行既载在天下，而著书立言皆足以师范来世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207912_comment'></div>盖尝评古今诗句，著《诗话》一卷，亦载此诗，以其甚工，不敢以父子之嫌废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207912_comment'></div>梅圣俞以诗名一时，尝言诗之工者：「写难状之景如在目前，含不尽之意见于言外」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207912_comment'></div>此诗有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207912_comment'></div>年月日，朝散郎、直龙图阁、知汝州谯郡张某记书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1207912_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年5月20日</a>　应南顿令江惇裕书信之请，为汉世祖光武皇帝庙作记文。姑系于此。作品：《汉世祖光武皇帝庙记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《张耒集》卷49（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献地点不详，姑系于此地。）</span><div id='poem_1208026' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1208026' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1208026?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汉世祖光武皇帝庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年5月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_1208026")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1208026_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1208026'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1208026'>南顿令江君惇裕，以书属某曰：「吾邑有汉世祖光武皇帝祠，邑人奉祀甚谨，而昔人所记陋甚，君为我述焉，将刻石以诏后世」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1208026_comment'></div>某辞之，不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1208026_comment'></div>谨按光武皇帝以哀帝建平元年生于济阳，而皇考钦实为南顿令，帝尝从父于此，既得天子，亦屡临幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1208026_comment'></div>盖平生之所游处，则邑之有祠，所从来久矣，岂独水旱疾疠之请，有赐于民，亦其功盛德尊，后世有不能忘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1208026_comment'></div>故南顿之民世祠之惟谨，盖无足怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1208026_comment'></div>汉自成、哀不君，权归外家，王莽卒盗而有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1208026_comment'></div>天下大乱，民心思汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1208026_comment'></div>惟世祖以匹夫起田亩，出入行阵，躬夷大难，勇无坚敌，智无遗策，故能祀汉配天，光复旧物，一时群雄，芟夷略尽，抚有方夏，覃及蛮貊，声教所暨，比隆武、宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1208026_comment'></div>是宜暴蛰强伉，玩兵黩武，视民如草芥，而不讲于治国之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1208026_comment'></div>而武功既成，海内既定，则抑功臣，进文吏，投戈讲艺，息马论道，英伟之度屈于礼乐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1208026", 1208026, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>骁猛</span>之气束于儒学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1208026_comment'></div>敦尚经术，宾延儒雅，开广学校，修明典礼，涣然一变旧汉之俗，盖尝以为吾理天下欲以柔道行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1208026_comment'></div>至于明、章，继志承统，纂修洪业，典章文物，粲然大备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1208026_comment'></div>故后世言礼乐稽古，称东汉焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1208026_comment'></div>孝和已后，汉德不竞，破坏板荡，可谓极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1208026_comment'></div>而仗节死义之士，如袁安、杨震、李固、陈蕃之徒救于上，符融、郭泰、范滂、许劭之徒助于下，矜尚名节，以震激衰敝，蹈死而不悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1208026_comment'></div>至于献帝，人主特号而已，而曹操终不敢身自取之，彼其心诚有所畏故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1208026_comment'></div>盖礼乐之功，风化之美，足以保国长世如此，皆世祖之遗烈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1208026_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1208026_comment'></div>自三代以来，一人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1208026_comment'></div>建武十九年，南巡，进幸南顿县舍，置酒会，赐吏人，复南顿田租一岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1208026_comment'></div>父老前叩头言：「皇考居此日久，陛下之寺舍，每来辄加厚恩，愿赐复十年」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1208026_comment'></div>帝曰：「天下重器，常恐不任，日复一日，安敢远期十岁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1208026_comment'></div>吏人又言：「陛下实惜之，言何谦也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1208026_comment'></div>帝大笑，又增一岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1208026_comment'></div>中元元年，又复南顿徭役，同之济阳，则帝之于是邦，岂若他邑漠然而已乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1208026_comment'></div>高祖曰：「吾万岁后，魂魄犹思沛」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1208026_comment'></div>吾意光武于南顿亦云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1208026_comment'></div>崇宁元年五月二十九日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1208026_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
淮北（临涣）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ffa447781a064e029710bc7070ddedba_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ffa447781a064e029710bc7070ddedba");'><span id='ffa447781a064e029710bc7070ddedba_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1107&endYear=1107')">1107年</a>，54岁</div><div id='ffa447781a064e029710bc7070ddedba' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1107&endYear=1107')">1107年</a>　在宿州临涣县，尝作诗。姑系于此。作品：《过蕲泽》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《张耒集》卷28（李逸安、孙通海、傅信点校，中华书局1990年出版）原文献时间不详，姑系于此年。）</span><br /></div>
-----end
